1/Text/AD218AAEter1/Root/ComicsCanvas/Co.eng:
Located 250 kilometers above the Earth’s surface, Alpha Flight Low-Orbit Space Station is attacked by HYDRA.
On hearing a radio distress call from S.H.I.E.L.D., the Avengers hurriedly head for A.F.L.O.S.S. on their Quinjet.

On the station, Captain America confronts Red Skull, trying to seize the Cosmic Cube.
Good and evil clash, fighting to protect and snatch the Cube.

The Cosmic Cube is shattered in the course of the battle, and its Shards are scattered around the earth.
1/Text/AD218AAEter1/Root/ComicsCanvas/Co.cht:
地球大氣層的阿爾法飛行宇宙停靠站正遭受九頭蛇的攻擊。
神盾局聽到緊急求救訊號，復仇者成員們搭乘昆式噴射機，正在前往這裡。

美國隊長在停靠站碰到覬覦著宇宙魔方的紅骷髏。
為了守護魔方的善與
想要搶奪的惡發生衝突，
兩者的戰鬥導致宇宙魔方被破壞，並散落到地球各地。

CampaignScenarioScripts/Registration/Age.eng: Since the Cosmic Cube shattered,\r we've been on the lookout for\r people who might be able to handle\r\nthe shards.
CampaignScenarioScripts/Registration/Age.cht: 宇宙魔方破裂後，神盾局便在尋找能控制魔方碎片的能力者。

CampaignScenarioScripts/Registration/Age.eng: But before we do that, let's get you\r registered in our personnel\r database.
CampaignScenarioScripts/Registration/Age.cht: 必須先在神盾局的資料庫登錄你的名字。

CampaignScenarioScripts/Registration/Age.eng: Welcome aboard the Helicarrier. We\r saw what you did down there. Very\r interesting, to say the least.
CampaignScenarioScripts/Registration/Age.cht: 歡迎來到神盾局飛行航母。你好。

CampaignScenarioScripts/Registration/Age.eng: Looks like you can. We'd like\r to help you learn more about your\r potential.
CampaignScenarioScripts/Registration/Age.cht: 你也是那樣的能力者。和我們一起探究你擁有的究竟是什麼樣的潛力吧。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/1919AD5BA.eng: Anger of the lord of Muspelheim shakes the plateau of lava.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/1919AD5BA.cht: 穆斯貝爾海姆的君主蘇爾特爾的憤怒撼動大地。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/1F81EB825.eng: The heroes discover that Ymir has overpowered Heimdall by sealing the shard containing his clairvoyant power in enchanted ice.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/1F81EB825.cht: 在約頓海姆的冰柱裡，發現了失去意識的海姆達爾。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/25B65BDDE.eng: Hela’s skeletal forces are coming down through the dimensional portal.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/25B65BDDE.cht: 從傳送門裡下來的海拉的骷髏部隊橫掃紐約。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/457E7A4EE.eng: After returning to the rooftop of Avengers Tower, the details about Hela's plan become clear.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/457E7A4EE.cht: 從復仇者大廈回來的英雄們。海拉的詳細計畫變得更加明確。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/471DD35FE.eng: The heroes sight Odin, fighting by himself surrounded by an army of Surtur’s demons.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/471DD35FE.cht: 英雄們發現獨自在穆斯貝爾海姆中與惡魔戰鬥的奧丁。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/527AB6081.eng: As the heroes get closer to the gates of Asgard, they see that it has become a war zone.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/527AB6081.cht: 穆斯貝爾海姆的主人蘇爾特現身阻止英雄們時，奇異博士帶來了一個壞消息。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/62A998D29.eng: The heroes prepare to fight the Destroyer.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/62A998D29.cht: 從傳送門出現的毁滅者，對英雄們露出了敵意。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/653C3BB87.eng: Nick Fury, director of S.H.I.E.L.D., sets out to personally evaluate the abilities of this new hero.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/653C3BB87.cht: 尼克‧福瑞為了驗證新能力者的實力而親自出馬。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/71ECF921F.eng: Training goes on with Tony's advice.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/71ECF921F.cht: 在東尼不吝嗇的建議之下，訓練持續的進行著。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/72393996F.eng: Our new hero and Avengers locate Hela and prepare to attack.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/72393996F.cht: 英雄一行人眼前出現了淪陷的阿斯嘉黃金關口。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/78B14CFD0.eng: Villains hunting Shards appear one by one.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/78B14CFD0.cht: 想要搶奪宇宙碎片的紐約惡徒開始逐一現身。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/78B14CFD4.eng: While villains launch an assault, heroes jump into battle to deal with them.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/78B14CFD4.cht: 在惡徒連續的攻擊中，為了死守宇宙碎片而踏入戰鬥中。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/78B14CFD8.eng: A world-wide organization has joined this gathering of Cosmic Shards. Heroes must stop them.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/78B14CFD8.cht: 世界級的犯罪組織九頭蛇為了宇宙魔方襲來。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/822583926.cht: 出現在回到地球的英雄們面前的毁滅者露出了樣貌。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/85D3415F8.eng: A new face is introduced to the S.H.I.E.L.D. agents. And a drill is waiting ahead.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/85D3415F8.cht: 以飛行航母前往，並進入利用魔方能量的訓練。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/8C1F89637.eng: A fresh wave of undead approaches.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/8C1F89637.cht: 英雄們一邊應付海拉成群的手下，一邊等待著支援軍。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/9B3D0F18D.eng: It's a last stand against Hela and her legions.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/9B3D0F18D.cht: 完成所有準備的英雄將要進行最後的決戰。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/9B68E1E26.eng: The details about Hela’s plan become clear: She is going to raise all of the dead in all of New York’s cemeteries.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/9B68E1E26.cht: 英雄們為了阻止海拉的計畫，開始行動了。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/A0FD601C6.eng: In Jotunheim, the heroes emerge from Thor's portal and are surrounded by Malekith's forces.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/A0FD601C6.cht: 魔雷基和黑暗精靈部隊為冰霜巨人補充力量。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/A525EDFBB.eng: Nick Fury, director of S.H.I.E.L.D., sets out to personally evaluate the abilities of this new hero.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/A525EDFBB.cht: 尼克‧福瑞為了驗證新能力者的實力而親自出馬。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/A79E2ED05.eng: The Enchantress has been biding her time, waiting for the right moment to make her move.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/A79E2ED05.cht: 突然出現在史克奇面前的的魅惑魔女企圖奪走瓦圖姆之杖。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/A9B0556D8.eng: You and the Avengers locate Hela together and prepare to attack.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/A9B0556D8.cht: 英雄們發現了正在破壞紐約的海拉，並開始準備攻擊。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/A9B08DA30.eng: You and the Avengers work together on a new plan to defeat Hela.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/A9B08DA30.cht: 想要前往阿斯嘉的英雄們遇見了黑暗精靈群。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/B05DF921F.eng: Learning how to control the battlefield with the help of S.P.I.K.E.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/B05DF921F.cht: 透過史派克的幫助，學習了解戰場的狀況並學習控制的方法。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/B1BDF921F.eng: Getting used to the S.P.I.K.E. device, more drills lie ahead.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/B1BDF921F.cht: 為了能適應史派克的功能，訓練強度越來越強。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/B2D00DBDE.eng: Odin prepares the last fight against Surtur.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/B2D00DBDE.cht: 奧丁準備好了和永遠的宿敵蘇爾特爾的最後戰役。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/BDF2F9F14.eng: Our heroes battle on the Bifrost against a heavy force of undead.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/BDF2F9F14.cht: 在彩虹橋上，敵人們正在佈陣。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/CDAE9DB36.eng: As they get closer to the gates of Asgard, the heroes see that it’s a war zone.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/CDAE9DB36.cht: 雷神索爾對倒在關口前的阿斯嘉人說了讓人聽不懂的話...

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/CEF61C08B.eng: Ymir presides over a new battle with Jotun.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/CEF61C08B.cht: 尤彌爾站在冰霜巨人部隊的先鋒向英雄宣戰。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/D5B3B9BCD.cht: 與渴望力量的魅惑魔女決一死戰。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/DFBA00CEF.eng: When Iron Man returns to Earth, he discovers one of the Cosmic Shards just as someone approaches.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/DFBA00CEF.cht: 在偶然對上的宇宙碎片上開始了所有的事情。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/E5C484B63.cht: 穆斯貝爾海姆的火焰惡魔們猛烈地攻擊。

CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/FB93B0C0B.eng: Loki reveals that he has been pretending to be Thor to draw out the enemies of Asgard, while also acting as a double agent.
CampaignStageData/Data/Comment/FB93B0C0B.cht: 收到海拉命令的魔雷基威脅聽見邪神洛基計畫的英雄們。

CampaignStageData/Data/Title/005ABBB1BA8.cht: 火焰的王國穆斯貝爾海姆

CampaignStageData/Data/Title/C68989B0FC0.cht: 冰霜巨人的世界約頓海姆

CardData/Data/currentAlias/BE3B8BE3567D.cht: 領多少做多少的暗殺者

CardData/Data/currentAlias/FABA9D95C8CC.cht: 神盾局訓練用人形機器

CardData/Data/finishword/016866557BA6.eng: The sight of you weaklings demoralize me. Get out of my sight.
CardData/Data/finishword/016866557BA6.cht: 雖然弱沒有罪，但是膽敢反抗我就是有罪！

CardData/Data/finishword/02C63D293E7A.eng: I will destroy you, and you will love me for it.
CardData/Data/finishword/02C63D293E7A.cht: 沒有比拉攏他們更簡單的事情了。

CardData/Data/finishword/034147E23619.eng: This is all a child's play compared to when I was in action with Steve!

CardData/Data/finishword/06A3DDFD0447.eng: I'll show you some real strength.
CardData/Data/finishword/06A3DDFD0447.cht: 該給他們看看真正的力量。

CardData/Data/finishword/0824F86BB27E.eng: Eternal Winter has come for you…

CardData/Data/finishword/083FCA228A8E.eng: Whoever you are, Where ever you're from, encountering me was your worst mistake.
CardData/Data/finishword/083FCA228A8E.cht: 無論你是誰、來自何處，見到我就是最大的失誤！

CardData/Data/finishword/0A5A6F055B8D.eng: Classic adventure story here, guys! And we’re the heroes!
CardData/Data/finishword/0A5A6F055B8D.cht: 團體攻擊真是太刺激了！我會輕一點不弄痛你，別擔心！

CardData/Data/finishword/0C8BAF3DADF4.eng: Struggle all you want! But your fate's been sealed!
CardData/Data/finishword/0C8BAF3DADF4.cht: 就算掙扎，也無法改變未來！

CardData/Data/finishword/0DBE9ADFD0DC.eng: All I’ve been through doesn’t change one thing. I’m a soldier.
CardData/Data/finishword/0DBE9ADFD0DC.cht: 過去沒有改變。我是位軍人。

CardData/Data/finishword/0F2F57E2DD27.eng: For Malekith, whom none can destroy!

CardData/Data/finishword/0F667EFA703E.cht: 你有信心能承受得住憤怒嗎？

CardData/Data/finishword/10EEE695A974.eng: We know your weakness. We will teach you fear.
CardData/Data/finishword/10EEE695A974.cht: 讓狂妄的臭蜘蛛體驗一下何謂恐懼吧！

CardData/Data/finishword/10F84D29D092.eng: This might hurt, but the world needs saving from its so-called heroes.
CardData/Data/finishword/10F84D29D092.cht: 雖然可能會受傷，但這世界需要被所謂的英雄拯救!

CardData/Data/finishword/1123A5A88AFA.eng: I bring death, the only true experience of the infinite.
CardData/Data/finishword/1123A5A88AFA.cht: 我將使用無限之力降臨死亡，服從吧！

CardData/Data/finishword/113EB0E1E0FD.eng: I feel your fear…you exist only to be reaped.

CardData/Data/finishword/11B393E8ED90.eng: Assets are in position. Let’s move.
CardData/Data/finishword/11B393E8ED90.cht: 目標抵達位置了。快點行動！

CardData/Data/finishword/1545817A09A8.cht: 一定要消滅目標。那就是我的鐵原則。

CardData/Data/finishword/1867820CA638.eng: Just me and a katana and my chi. That’s enough to be a hero.
CardData/Data/finishword/1867820CA638.cht: 只要擁有武士刀和氣，你也能成為英雄。

CardData/Data/finishword/19115B1A110B.eng: We’re fighting for an ideal, and we'll never give it up.
CardData/Data/finishword/19115B1A110B.cht: 我們為了理想而戰，並且絕對不會放棄。

CardData/Data/finishword/1A0868C54011.eng: Too much talking. Action is what matters.
CardData/Data/finishword/1A0868C54011.cht: 不需要多說什麼，就讓我用行動來證明吧。

CardData/Data/finishword/1A1A12B1DD35.eng: For centuries I have trained the defenders of K’un-Lun, and destroyed its enemies.

CardData/Data/finishword/1C73ADF19AD4.eng: Your arrogance has summoned me! It is time I take back my powers.
CardData/Data/finishword/1C73ADF19AD4.cht: 你們的傲慢呼喚了我。我要找回力量！

CardData/Data/finishword/1CF7D34BA158.eng: I don’t care about good and evil. I’m just here to get paid. Are you…shocked?
CardData/Data/finishword/1CF7D34BA158.cht: 善惡有什麼意義呢？錢是最棒的！怎麼了？受到打擊了嗎？

CardData/Data/finishword/1D57044B33EE.eng: There is no mercy for you intruders!

CardData/Data/finishword/1D9B9744C32B.eng: I have ended more lives than the hairs in Odin’s beard, and I will end yours!
CardData/Data/finishword/1D9B9744C32B.cht: 我在戰場中喝了一輩子的血。沒想到會輸給一個小傢伙！

CardData/Data/finishword/20CA93FA5182.eng: Anything you can do, I can do better.
CardData/Data/finishword/20CA93FA5182.cht: 上次不是也落敗了嗎？真是一點都沒進步。

CardData/Data/finishword/211F971203C0.eng: We will unleash the powers of Svartalfheim!
CardData/Data/finishword/211F971203C0.cht: 放棄一切，投入黑暗的懷抱吧。

CardData/Data/finishword/233AE215B658.eng: This is what we trained for, people. Everyone do your job.
CardData/Data/finishword/233AE215B658.cht: 神盾局的特工們當然只會有完成任務的成果。

CardData/Data/finishword/266199AEBC21.eng: This world is fit only to be ruled…and I alone am fit to rule it.
CardData/Data/finishword/266199AEBC21.cht: 這世界需要被支配。而我將會是那唯一的支配者。

CardData/Data/finishword/29A290D7BC57.eng: The Beast will devour your soul…
CardData/Data/finishword/29A290D7BC57.cht: 地獄將會出現在你認為安全的地方。

CardData/Data/finishword/29D7D8BD2A50.eng: Don't get in my way, or it'll be the last thing you do.
CardData/Data/finishword/29D7D8BD2A50.cht: 我已看穿你的心思，所以你只能失敗！

CardData/Data/finishword/2A88F27F7D6A.eng: Time for us to take what’s rightfully ours.
CardData/Data/finishword/2A88F27F7D6A.cht: 是時候讓我們採取正確的做法。

CardData/Data/finishword/2AE73E03E825.eng: Heroes. So tiresome, so easily swept aside…
CardData/Data/finishword/2AE73E03E825.cht: 稱為英雄一類的群體，太容易被掃到一邊覺得真無趣。

CardData/Data/finishword/2B7FB037A09E.eng: The first time I killed a man, all I felt was…impatience to do it again.
CardData/Data/finishword/2B7FB037A09E.cht: 當我第一次殺了人時，我只想著…我想趕快再體驗一次。

CardData/Data/finishword/2B9A7F449CCE.eng: Someday you will die. Why should today not be that day?

CardData/Data/finishword/2E20A3527E3B.eng: Pitiful organics, your time is coming to an end. Now it is the age of the machine!
CardData/Data/finishword/2E20A3527E3B.cht: 人類完蛋了。現在是人工智能的時代。

CardData/Data/finishword/2F445215814F.eng: We’re here to do the things only we can do. That’s what makes us heroes.
CardData/Data/finishword/2F445215814F.cht: 只要持續進行該做的事情，總有一天就能成為超級英雄。

CardData/Data/finishword/2F529FAC1145.eng: Morality is weakness. I have let it go, and found true power.

CardData/Data/finishword/301C0A4F3A32.eng: In the end, I'll have everything.

CardData/Data/finishword/30E8EAF9A8EE.eng: Well, here we are. Protecting the innocent and saving the world. Whose teeth do I kick in?
CardData/Data/finishword/30E8EAF9A8EE.cht: 我是為了保護市民、拯救世界而來的。來吧，要從誰先開始解決呢?

CardData/Data/finishword/31841D4A9E2B.cht: 摧毀所有的一切吧!九頭蛇!

CardData/Data/finishword/3184C8C7340E.eng: Destroy them from within. Hail Hydra!
CardData/Data/finishword/3184C8C7340E.cht: 將會從內部開始崩塌。九頭蛇萬歲！

CardData/Data/finishword/322BB3838BCA.eng: I make an example out of you to all who looked down on me!

CardData/Data/finishword/3254B368FCF8.eng: We don’t have to get all emotional and messy. We just have to solve the problem.
CardData/Data/finishword/3254B368FCF8.cht: 不需要意氣用事。集中於解決問題吧。

CardData/Data/finishword/3350C1139B8D.eng: You picked a fight with the wrong person.
CardData/Data/finishword/3350C1139B8D.cht: 招惹到錯誤的戰鬥對象了呢。

CardData/Data/finishword/344FE9377C9A.cht: 所以說趁我說好話之前，交出來不是更好嗎!

CardData/Data/finishword/3514CC0090D5.eng: Is this reality, or illusion? You won’t know until it’s too late!
CardData/Data/finishword/3514CC0090D5.cht: 在太晚之前，無法知道是現實還是幻象。

CardData/Data/finishword/37B941EBB12C.eng: By my hand, you will learn your weakness.
CardData/Data/finishword/37B941EBB12C.cht: 重要的是明白你有多麼弱吧。

CardData/Data/finishword/37EDD8060451.eng: Assault team ready, Failure's not an option.

CardData/Data/finishword/387F8C12DC7E.eng: I don’t look to start fights, but you better believe I’ll finish them.

CardData/Data/finishword/38C61EBABA02.eng: You will meet my blade before you even see me coming.
CardData/Data/finishword/38C61EBABA02.cht: 在你看到我的樣貌之前，你將會先看到我的刀刃。

CardData/Data/finishword/38E72E79D2B8.eng: You're scared, take heart. It's going to be scarier than you imagine.
CardData/Data/finishword/38E72E79D2B8.cht: 你是害怕嗎？請覺悟吧。因為比想像中還要更可怕。

CardData/Data/finishword/393BB66DD22D.eng: I will fight for what I love.

CardData/Data/finishword/395A128BDF13.eng: I won't waste even a split second on losers!

CardData/Data/finishword/395FD07C85E8.eng: Since you're all dying together, you won't feel alone!
CardData/Data/finishword/395FD07C85E8.cht: 大家共同迎接的死亡大概不會太孤單。

CardData/Data/finishword/3AFC332AA654.eng: It is the finest satisfaction to break a brilliant enemy.
CardData/Data/finishword/3AFC332AA654.cht: 擊潰出色的敵人是最大的快樂。

CardData/Data/finishword/3BCD9BD223A4.eng: I will stand with the Sorcerer Supreme.
CardData/Data/finishword/3BCD9BD223A4.cht: 輔佐至尊魔法師是我的使命。

CardData/Data/finishword/3C4CBA620357.eng: I am surrounded by imbeciles. Time to take matters into my own hands!
CardData/Data/finishword/3C4CBA620357.cht: 周圍全都是傻子而已。如果我不出馬就找不到答案。

CardData/Data/finishword/3D510DEA0049.eng: Trying to compete with me is just going to make you look bad.
CardData/Data/finishword/3D510DEA0049.cht: 攻擊我不會有好下場的。

CardData/Data/finishword/3F728450FFA5.eng: Svartalfheim will rule all the realms!

CardData/Data/finishword/402B039F9317.eng: Accept the reality. From the very beginning till the end, your chance at winning was 0
CardData/Data/finishword/402B039F9317.cht: 你的勝率一開始就是0%。接受這個事實吧。

CardData/Data/finishword/416CE99AF8BB.eng: No need to thank me for not turning the whole place upside down.
CardData/Data/finishword/416CE99AF8BB.cht: 本來想一口氣全都殺光，但我忍住了，你們要覺得感激。

CardData/Data/finishword/41FED084A216.eng: You will serve Thanos best in your dying.

CardData/Data/finishword/4383E9812579.eng: Don't pathetically beg for your life, I'm not going to have mercy on you.

CardData/Data/finishword/447ECDD58A0A.eng: I might be a thief, but that doesn’t make me a bad kitty, does it?
CardData/Data/finishword/447ECDD58A0A.cht: 好，我承認我是小偷。但我對於惡行無法坐視不管。

CardData/Data/finishword/44F10C44041D.eng: The Nova Force flows through me, and gives me strength.
CardData/Data/finishword/44F10C44041D.cht: 你不知道新星之力是什麼？你很快就會知道。

CardData/Data/finishword/4580A826CA92.cht: 喂，想要扣板機的話，得先將你剩半截的手指黏起來吧？

CardData/Data/finishword/45E0096DFF00.eng: You know I’m the deadliest woman in the universe, right? Don’t say I didn’t warn you.
CardData/Data/finishword/45E0096DFF00.cht: 若是想要毫髮無傷前往地獄，那就安分一點！

CardData/Data/finishword/46921600D29D.eng: Big trouble comes in small packages, know what I mean?
CardData/Data/finishword/46921600D29D.cht: 直接闖進他的鼻孔大鬧一場吧？

CardData/Data/finishword/491E16ACD0CE.eng: We serve Thanos, and in death so will you.
CardData/Data/finishword/491E16ACD0CE.cht: 向唯一偉大的薩諾斯大人宣誓效忠吧。

CardData/Data/finishword/4DCD38222E9C.eng: I carry the names of my beloved on my shoulders. Do you realize the weight of these names?

CardData/Data/finishword/4E5498A02E5A.eng: The Wrecking Crew ain’t afraid of no one, friend.

CardData/Data/finishword/4ECB33AC2FBD.eng: Maybe this is what I've been waiting for. Maybe I'm finally part of something… bigger.
CardData/Data/finishword/4ECB33AC2FBD.cht: 抱歉，現在必須發動攻擊了。會有點痛喔！

CardData/Data/finishword/505EB1FB54A5.eng: If Thanos couldn’t break me, what chance do you have?
CardData/Data/finishword/505EB1FB54A5.cht: 連薩諾斯也阻擋不了我，像你這種角色簡直易如反掌。

CardData/Data/finishword/584EBF291FE0.eng: Wakanda will stand for what is right.
CardData/Data/finishword/584EBF291FE0.cht: 瓦干達站在正義的那一方。

CardData/Data/finishword/5885387F322C.eng: You can run if you want, but it's not going to make a difference.
CardData/Data/finishword/5885387F322C.cht: 想逃就儘管逃吧。如果你逃得掉的話。

CardData/Data/finishword/58DA485199E5.eng: Well, even if we’re not gonna get rich today, we might as well have some fun while we're here.
CardData/Data/finishword/58DA485199E5.cht: 沒啥看頭就早點說呀。太可惡了，讓我揍一拳吧！

CardData/Data/finishword/5941D0B4F7F7.eng: It's going to hurt, but you must endure it to grow stronger.
CardData/Data/finishword/5941D0B4F7F7.cht: 雖然會痛，但這都是為了讓你成長的必經之路。

CardData/Data/finishword/5A3B1F9EE5A6.eng: I watch over the realms. No enemy escapes my sight or my sword.
CardData/Data/finishword/5A3B1F9EE5A6.cht: 請別忘記。任何事情都無法避開海姆達爾的雙眼。

CardData/Data/finishword/5DBB058A66C7.eng: My sword is pledged to Asgard.

CardData/Data/finishword/5E49779262DE.eng: Just a little sting. Then you won’t feel anything until you wake up on the Raft.
CardData/Data/finishword/5E49779262DE.cht: 大概會有一點刺痛吧。你的神經很快就會麻痺，快點找地方躺吧。

CardData/Data/finishword/605087455213.eng: We are Jotun. We are Ymir’s legions!
CardData/Data/finishword/605087455213.cht: 我們是冰霜巨人。我們是尤彌爾的軍隊!

CardData/Data/finishword/6192875989E7.eng: Death comes to every mortal…and then they are mine forever.
CardData/Data/finishword/6192875989E7.cht: 活著的所有存在都將面臨死亡並永遠成為我的。

CardData/Data/finishword/61C273F77197.eng: Are we fighting bad guys again? How are there so many bad guys?
CardData/Data/finishword/61C273F77197.cht: 這些惡徒是從哪冒出來的呢？真是沒完沒了。

CardData/Data/finishword/6416CF1E2C6B.eng: I am ancient as darkness, and deadly as the fear of the dark.
CardData/Data/finishword/6416CF1E2C6B.cht: 我和黑暗一樣悠久，和黑暗的恐懼一樣致命。

CardData/Data/finishword/641CBE9652A8.eng: The sooner I get this situation taken care of, the sooner I get back into the lab.
CardData/Data/finishword/641CBE9652A8.cht: 解決完這個就要回研究室了，馬上就好。

CardData/Data/finishword/64ED7EE44578.eng: I will paint your demise with my blood!
CardData/Data/finishword/64ED7EE44578.cht: 我要用我的血來描繪你最後的下場！

CardData/Data/finishword/64F99DAFA2EE.eng: I came all the way here searching for injustice, and I'm not leaving empty handed.
CardData/Data/finishword/64F99DAFA2EE.cht: 我是專程前來懲罰邪惡之徒的！不能就這樣回去！

CardData/Data/finishword/652CD673E7AB.eng: Don't you ignore me! I'm going to be as powerful as Mephisto!
CardData/Data/finishword/652CD673E7AB.cht: 就來看看被我的攻擊命中後是否還能安然無恙！

CardData/Data/finishword/6614E49EADC9.eng: So, let me tell you how to feel…
CardData/Data/finishword/6614E49EADC9.cht: 即使用盡全力，也會在一句話就結束。

CardData/Data/finishword/6770BF97E7A1.cht: 要不要來一場煙火秀呢？

CardData/Data/finishword/699C9AB9A61E.eng: There’s blood in the water…time for me to have some fun.

CardData/Data/finishword/69A297CCBBA2.eng: The flames of Muspelheim engulf you!
CardData/Data/finishword/69A297CCBBA2.cht: 穆斯貝爾海姆的火花將會吞噬你。

CardData/Data/finishword/6A5D79D3492A.eng: Hey, don’t be scared. I’m the nice monster.
CardData/Data/finishword/6A5D79D3492A.cht: 喂，別害怕！我可是超級英雄。

CardData/Data/finishword/6AF740E64A0C.eng: It ain’t always worth doing the right thing.
CardData/Data/finishword/6AF740E64A0C.cht: 正確的事情並不是一直都存在著價值。

CardData/Data/finishword/6C9AAC14C779.eng: I'm Iron Man -- billionaire genius philanthropist -- but you already knew that.
CardData/Data/finishword/6C9AAC14C779.cht: 其實這場仗從一開始就是我會贏的仗。

CardData/Data/finishword/6D5C11B274EF.eng: Knuckle up, people. We got to protect our own.
CardData/Data/finishword/6D5C11B274EF.cht: 好了，各位，保護好我們自己吧。

CardData/Data/finishword/6DCB7501D86F.eng: When the galaxy is threatened, the Nova Corps is there to protect it.
CardData/Data/finishword/6DCB7501D86F.cht: 只要銀河系陷入危險，新星軍團就會出動!

CardData/Data/finishword/70290842CB38.eng: Who intrudes on K’un-Lun dies in fire and blood.

CardData/Data/finishword/7131782C909F.eng: Your existence in this world proves it's a failure.
CardData/Data/finishword/7131782C909F.cht: 你害這次的世界失敗了。

CardData/Data/finishword/71E65B3C032C.eng: If there’s a fight, I want in. What are we waiting for?
CardData/Data/finishword/71E65B3C032C.cht: 沒有辦法脫離戰場的。在猶豫什麼呢。

CardData/Data/finishword/7225C41BDF31.eng: I’ll do anything to protect the people I love.
CardData/Data/finishword/7225C41BDF31.cht: 為了守護心愛的人們，不管是什麼我都會去做。

CardData/Data/finishword/726CDBC137AF.eng: Break the law and justice is coming. No second chances, no shades of gray.
CardData/Data/finishword/726CDBC137AF.cht: 拋開法律實踐正義。沒有第二次機會也沒有灰色地帶。

CardData/Data/finishword/74B730947155.eng: Fly the victorious banners of Asgard!
CardData/Data/finishword/74B730947155.cht: 升起阿斯嘉的勝利旗幟吧！

CardData/Data/finishword/74E19CE9CE4A.eng: The pawns in this game are weak and feeble. About time for a new game.
CardData/Data/finishword/74E19CE9CE4A.cht: 遊戲的話語真是不實在。看來得前往下一場了。

CardData/Data/finishword/79262B91CBB3.eng: Some people can travel to other dimensions. I am another dimension.

CardData/Data/finishword/79F1D8B389F9.eng: Darkness overspreads the realms, and I rule the darkness.
CardData/Data/finishword/79F1D8B389F9.cht: 黑暗席捲世界，我支配黑暗！

CardData/Data/finishword/7A0EA7318915.eng: The thought of eliminating you thrills me greatly.
CardData/Data/finishword/7A0EA7318915.cht: 光是想到要如何消滅，就令人感到興奮。

CardData/Data/finishword/7C4C622AD773.eng: In fire I rise, and in my fire you fall.
CardData/Data/finishword/7C4C622AD773.cht: 全部燒掉。我會讓你感到後悔來到這個世界。

CardData/Data/finishword/7C5DEE53DA1D.eng: Time is on my side, I am the ruler of time!
CardData/Data/finishword/7C5DEE53DA1D.cht: 時間是我的戰友，我是控制時間的王！

CardData/Data/finishword/7D6363E4C3F2.eng: Look out. Cottonmouth’s about to strike.
CardData/Data/finishword/7D6363E4C3F2.cht: 我看你得打起精神才行。因為馬上就會進行攻擊了。

CardData/Data/finishword/7DFE10FF93B4.eng: Operation in progress. All personnel execute mission objectives.
CardData/Data/finishword/7DFE10FF93B4.cht: 作戰進行中。全體特工執行目標。

CardData/Data/finishword/81BE1033D009.eng: Good, I'll be sleeping soundly tonight.

CardData/Data/finishword/827E1A8F3B3A.eng: It's a big catch! Does it secure a promotion?
CardData/Data/finishword/827E1A8F3B3A.cht: 撈到一個龐然大物了！就這樣勝利了嗎？

CardData/Data/finishword/82DF3A06CBE9.eng: Well, sleep tight will I visit the neighbors!
CardData/Data/finishword/82DF3A06CBE9.cht: 在我去隔壁回來之前，您就慢慢的休息吧！

CardData/Data/finishword/8610E571CD2D.eng: The hammer doesn’t make the hero…but it sure does make an impression.
CardData/Data/finishword/8610E571CD2D.cht: 錘子雖然不可能成為英雄，但我會讓它具有英雄的感覺。

CardData/Data/finishword/87803EBF18A2.eng: I'd love to let you go... But, you caused too much trouble! Bye!
CardData/Data/finishword/87803EBF18A2.cht: 雖然我想讓你們走，但我無法再讓你們繼續肆意妄為了。再見了！

CardData/Data/finishword/8B8338945AC3.eng: Cutie vipers, today's dinners going to be most interesting.
CardData/Data/finishword/8B8338945AC3.cht: 要不要給你看看有趣的畫面？

CardData/Data/finishword/8E0CCE2E8690.eng: Man, you’re messing with the Wrecking Crew now!

CardData/Data/finishword/8FF583894C30.eng: When death comes for you, it’s going to look like someone you love.

CardData/Data/finishword/90024FF372CA.eng: You want to fight me, you b-b-better be ready to feel the Darkforce.
CardData/Data/finishword/90024FF372CA.cht: 若想和我戰鬥，就必須要有承受黑暗之力的覺悟。

CardData/Data/finishword/924F5A7B0227.eng: We fight for all that is good in the world. Should we not do it in style?
CardData/Data/finishword/924F5A7B0227.cht: 我們為善而戰，所以我們不應該做到最好嗎？

CardData/Data/finishword/946E5610BB49.eng: The spirits and the loas are the source of my powers.
CardData/Data/finishword/946E5610BB49.cht: 守護世界的並不是只有拳頭而已。

CardData/Data/finishword/980ED83160DD.eng: Oh, man, what are we getting ourselves into now?

CardData/Data/finishword/9A087CD85A8D.cht: 要不要體驗死亡的快感？

CardData/Data/finishword/9A3E70D36E84.eng: The touch of our blades is the chill of your doom.
CardData/Data/finishword/9A3E70D36E84.cht: 我們的武器是招致毀滅的寒冷!

CardData/Data/finishword/9BAD2970B323.eng: You crossed the wrong people. Now you gotta pay.
CardData/Data/finishword/9BAD2970B323.cht: 你惹錯人了。把錢交出來。

CardData/Data/finishword/9C6D782877C0.eng: This is your final nightmare, the one from which you will never awaken.
CardData/Data/finishword/9C6D782877C0.cht: 在無止盡的惡夢中因為懺悔而吶喊吧！

CardData/Data/finishword/9CE7815B2A26.eng: Thanos pronounces the sentence… I execute it.

CardData/Data/finishword/9DEDC78C5A82.eng: A word of advice: Don’t ever make the mistake of thinking you’re a step ahead of me.
CardData/Data/finishword/9DEDC78C5A82.cht: 給你一句忠告，別妄想能夠超越我。

CardData/Data/finishword/9E1F2EC5B910.eng: Succumb to death, I will grant you the position of my pawn!
CardData/Data/finishword/9E1F2EC5B910.cht: 迎接死亡吧，我將讓你成為我的手下。

CardData/Data/finishword/9FABB94CC511.eng: In the end, one man will rule. Who better than Baron Zemo?
CardData/Data/finishword/9FABB94CC511.cht: 結果還是會由一個人統治世界。有誰能比我做的更好呢?

CardData/Data/finishword/A0436C304A88.eng: I’m walking with the Darkforce, man. You don’t want to come at me.

CardData/Data/finishword/A04B47A5E05A.eng: I will have my revenge against Thanos no matter what it takes.
CardData/Data/finishword/A04B47A5E05A.cht: 把薩諾斯帶過來！來一千個人也無法阻止我！

CardData/Data/finishword/A26B574998DB.eng: Your weakness have been detected, farewell

CardData/Data/finishword/A271D9A32144.eng: You can't match my strength! Bring hulk now!
CardData/Data/finishword/A271D9A32144.cht: 想要對付我就帶浩克來吧！

CardData/Data/finishword/A2E6B2D74BF2.eng: Let’s get things moving here. I’m due in court.
CardData/Data/finishword/A2E6B2D74BF2.cht: 我會快點整理，畢竟我不能讓我的委託人在法庭等待。

CardData/Data/finishword/A3991136B6E3.eng: The weak have led Wakanda long enough. Now is the time for strength!
CardData/Data/finishword/A3991136B6E3.cht: 黑豹的時代結束了。向世界展現瓦干達的力量吧！

CardData/Data/finishword/A500544DA7D1.eng: By the time you see us coming, it is already too late.
CardData/Data/finishword/A500544DA7D1.cht: 等你看到我接近，就已經晚了。

CardData/Data/finishword/A846D858A597.eng: You get in my way, I’m gonna put you through the nearest wall.
CardData/Data/finishword/A846D858A597.cht: 若是妨礙我，我就立刻將你踢到牆上。

CardData/Data/finishword/A8F3A14B7817.eng: The only way to rule a rabble is through strength. Pity is weakness.
CardData/Data/finishword/A8F3A14B7817.cht: 力量是治理眾人的唯一辦法。憐憫只會成為弱點。

CardData/Data/finishword/AAB13787AFE8.eng: No enemy can long withstand the Odinforce.
CardData/Data/finishword/AAB13787AFE8.cht: 沒有人能夠避開奧丁之力!

CardData/Data/finishword/AB42D68E4E71.eng: I will melt all your bones with radioactive exposure!
CardData/Data/finishword/AB42D68E4E71.cht: 被放射線照到了，過不了多久骨頭就會融化！

CardData/Data/finishword/AECA395FD337.eng: I’m more of a healer than a fighter, but for you I’ll make an exception.
CardData/Data/finishword/AECA395FD337.cht: 我不是說過別碰患者的嗎？！

CardData/Data/finishword/AF2882A05751.eng: What outrageous thoughts in such moments, you just can't be helped!
CardData/Data/finishword/AF2882A05751.cht: 寄生在精神裡的寄生蟲立下了不小功勞。

CardData/Data/finishword/AF7A6132A0F8.eng: We have no life to surrender… but you do.
CardData/Data/finishword/AF7A6132A0F8.cht: 我們沒有可以奉獻的生命…獻出你的性命吧…

CardData/Data/finishword/B0DBC1AA6011.eng: So many wonders in the universe…I must have them all.
CardData/Data/finishword/B0DBC1AA6011.cht: 宇宙的無數寶物...全都屬於我的。

CardData/Data/finishword/B1425E0BC51E.eng: I don't care who stands in my way. I will take my vengeance.
CardData/Data/finishword/B1425E0BC51E.cht: 我不在乎搗亂分子，反正報仇會成功的。

CardData/Data/finishword/B2B42C7501F1.eng: You're a disappointment, compared to the guts you had to challenge me.
CardData/Data/finishword/B2B42C7501F1.cht: 這麼沒用竟敢對地球最強的我挑戰。

CardData/Data/finishword/B48107FDC1E1.eng: May the Supreme Intelligence guide my strike.

CardData/Data/finishword/B5A596CA83B9.eng: It won't be serious if you aren't one of them bad folks.
CardData/Data/finishword/B5A596CA83B9.cht: 如果不是壞人，很快就能結束，別害怕！

CardData/Data/finishword/B722BF09B3FC.cht: 已經確保視野了。準備好就走吧！

CardData/Data/finishword/B7DCB0BBB9D3.eng: Systems online and ready. Where’s the target?
CardData/Data/finishword/B7DCB0BBB9D3.cht: 系統啟動，填裝完畢。目標在哪裡呢？

CardData/Data/finishword/B89043B480A8.eng: If you stand between me and Spider-Man, that just means I'll have to end you first.
CardData/Data/finishword/B89043B480A8.cht: 我會把你和小蜘蛛一樣壓扁！

CardData/Data/finishword/BD436090B37C.eng: Continue with your loser whining after arriving in hell!
CardData/Data/finishword/BD436090B37C.cht: 失敗者的狡辯就去地獄好好的聽吧！

CardData/Data/finishword/BD47F56B2F96.eng: When you’ve seen the evil I’ve seen, you know why it matters to fight for good.
CardData/Data/finishword/BD47F56B2F96.cht: 為何要站在善良那一方戰鬥？因為我不想再見到我經歷過的煉獄。

CardData/Data/finishword/BDEEA6E56AEC.eng: Everyone has light within them, even if they don't know it yet.
CardData/Data/finishword/BDEEA6E56AEC.cht: 大家都在發光，但為何沒人知道呢？

CardData/Data/finishword/BE8779E6EAA7.eng: The world won't be dismayed over a death of a fool.
CardData/Data/finishword/BE8779E6EAA7.cht: 世界不會因為少了一個蠢蛋而顛覆。

CardData/Data/finishword/C45EA101D708.eng: I want Stark…but until I find him, you will do.
CardData/Data/finishword/C45EA101D708.cht: 把東尼‧史塔克帶過來…等找到那傢伙，就會輪到你了。

CardData/Data/finishword/C6DDFB1F837B.eng: Who battles the Hand ordains their own death.
CardData/Data/finishword/C6DDFB1F837B.cht: 和手合會戰鬥的人們，總是以死宣誓。

CardData/Data/finishword/C8E7D1F5B716.eng: Wrecking Crew is about to mess some people up.

CardData/Data/finishword/C98AE85424DA.eng: I alone bear the Eye of Agamotto — I am Sorcerer Supreme.
CardData/Data/finishword/C98AE85424DA.cht: 擁有阿迦莫多之眼的人就是至尊魔法師！

CardData/Data/finishword/CB62850EE350.eng: Looks like everything is coming together according to plan.
CardData/Data/finishword/CB62850EE350.cht: 一切都按照計畫進行著。

CardData/Data/finishword/CBF86A013975.eng: No personal feelings…but neither are real solutions ….
CardData/Data/finishword/CBF86A013975.cht: 我沒有惡意…只是因為沒有解決方法…

CardData/Data/finishword/CC72E611C691.eng: Nothing can hide you. Not from me.

CardData/Data/finishword/CDF2310D4B46.eng: Where should I break you first?

CardData/Data/finishword/CE1F96DC3175.eng: Step aside, I am to be crowned as the ruler of earth.
CardData/Data/finishword/CE1F96DC3175.cht: 不要妨礙！我將要登上支配地球的王座！

CardData/Data/finishword/CF59408D6108.eng: No man knows more of darkness and its powers than I!
CardData/Data/finishword/CF59408D6108.cht: 黑暗與力量的權威掌握在我手中。

CardData/Data/finishword/CFFFBEBE9C63.eng: You just ran out of chances.

CardData/Data/finishword/D119B5E6EE04.eng: We serve Surtur, and destroy whom he wills.

CardData/Data/finishword/D186AAB14B84.eng: I’ll grow back anything I lose. Will you?
CardData/Data/finishword/D186AAB14B84.cht: 倘若沒有了手腳，只要重新製造就行了。不過你的性命也是如此嗎？

CardData/Data/finishword/D1C9C9146F51.eng: Call me cocky if you want, but if I say I’m gonna take you down, you better believe I will.
CardData/Data/finishword/D1C9C9146F51.cht: 說我狂妄也無所謂。但我絕對能夠了結你。

CardData/Data/finishword/D24B4D96BD14.eng: I got some mayhem to attend to!

CardData/Data/finishword/D28339F1A11A.eng: Remember your training, and you are sure to win.
CardData/Data/finishword/D28339F1A11A.cht: 當身體記憶訓練時，就一定會勝利。

CardData/Data/finishword/D57465A3D86F.eng: I am your superior in every way!
CardData/Data/finishword/D57465A3D86F.cht: 長得像狒狒的傢伙們就該受支配！

CardData/Data/finishword/D6A364E507A7.eng: Enough standing around. Let's do this.

CardData/Data/finishword/D725BB1C4DEC.eng: I am Thor, son of Odin and god of thunder!

CardData/Data/finishword/D7521B103160.eng: You shall pay for summoning me!

CardData/Data/finishword/DC345A1C1A6E.eng: I don't believe this is right thing to do, but it's a necessary evil.
CardData/Data/finishword/DC345A1C1A6E.cht: 雖然不認為這是對的，但還是必須做。

CardData/Data/finishword/DD0A99F6D92B.eng: There are some things worse than death. Believe me, I’ve seen them.
CardData/Data/finishword/DD0A99F6D92B.cht: 有看過比死亡更可怕的景象嗎？

CardData/Data/finishword/DD43F4B54FC5.eng: Sandstorm’s coming… and I mean for you.
CardData/Data/finishword/DD43F4B54FC5.cht: 即將吞噬你的沙塵暴正在接近當中。

CardData/Data/finishword/DF259728138A.eng: Feel the chi and release the force. Sense yourself from within.
CardData/Data/finishword/DF259728138A.cht: 感覺到氣，散發力量。感受一下體內的自己吧。

CardData/Data/finishword/DF44346E8FF7.eng: Before you even know I’m here, you'll already be lost in the dark.
CardData/Data/finishword/DF44346E8FF7.cht: 你已經在黑暗中迷失了。

CardData/Data/finishword/DF8D652F7F7D.eng: World is at peace when everyone is where they should be!
CardData/Data/finishword/DF8D652F7F7D.cht: 當大家都在原位置時，世界就會趨向和平！

CardData/Data/finishword/E2332AA7F7F2.eng: The powers of the Vishanti are beyond any foe.
CardData/Data/finishword/E2332AA7F7F2.cht: 沒有任何存在可以超越維山帝的全能力量。

CardData/Data/finishword/E279D4EB2A42.eng: Let's eat nuts and kick butts!
CardData/Data/finishword/E279D4EB2A42.cht: 踹屁股後吃橡實的時間到了！

CardData/Data/finishword/E36175AA626A.eng: Who would topple Asgard must topple Volstagg first!
CardData/Data/finishword/E36175AA626A.cht: 想要攻擊阿斯嘉就得先打倒我。

CardData/Data/finishword/E42C5DB3B03F.eng: When Asgard burns, the fire will spread to all the realms, and Surtur will rule!
CardData/Data/finishword/E42C5DB3B03F.cht: 若阿斯嘉陷入火海，火焰世界將會被支配。

CardData/Data/finishword/E46C25467854.eng: I see you've come to your senses, but it's too late now.
CardData/Data/finishword/E46C25467854.cht: 現在才清醒，已經都太遲了。

CardData/Data/finishword/E57B6C9499CB.eng: Keep shooting until they surrender… and then shoot some more!

CardData/Data/finishword/E6BF91DAC863.eng: You stand accused. I will now pronounce your sentence.

CardData/Data/finishword/E75003F3947A.eng: I will keep supernatural threats at bay.
CardData/Data/finishword/E75003F3947A.cht: 超自然的威脅將由我來阻擋。

CardData/Data/finishword/E844AF5D2A3D.eng: If you wanna fight me, then you’re gonna ride the lightning.
CardData/Data/finishword/E844AF5D2A3D.cht: 想要跟我戰鬥?應該只會遭受到閃電的攻擊吧。

CardData/Data/finishword/E903E54F9958.eng: Let them come. I will end them.
CardData/Data/finishword/E903E54F9958.cht: 解決那些傢伙，就是我想做的事情。

CardData/Data/finishword/E9658ABE67E9.eng: Lay the foundation of world conquest!
CardData/Data/finishword/E9658ABE67E9.cht: 這將會成為征服世界的基礎！

CardData/Data/finishword/EACE2C339005.eng: I bring the endless shadow of the Dark Dimension.
CardData/Data/finishword/EACE2C339005.cht: 黑暗次元的影子在全世界蠢蠢欲動！

CardData/Data/finishword/EBB0296E1B0D.eng: I’ve been to Hell and back. Literally. What do I have to worry about now?
CardData/Data/finishword/EBB0296E1B0D.cht: 從地獄活著回來的我，還有什麼會害怕的?

CardData/Data/finishword/EBCC6E50C6FB.eng: Go big, go small, either is fine. Whatever gets the job done.
CardData/Data/finishword/EBCC6E50C6FB.cht: 不管是大是小都好，因為不管是哪個都可以。

CardData/Data/finishword/EBFC03556B7F.cht: 全體特工各就各位。準備射擊。

CardData/Data/finishword/EC00F5B9A14B.eng: They don't call me the Man Without Fear for nothing.
CardData/Data/finishword/EC00F5B9A14B.cht: 心跳很激烈啊。有那麼害怕嗎？

CardData/Data/finishword/EC156118B72A.eng: My fist and your head, don't you want to know which is harder?
CardData/Data/finishword/EC156118B72A.cht: 我的拳頭和你的腦袋哪一個比較堅硬呢？

CardData/Data/finishword/EC8796CC998B.eng: How can you defeat a being created to be perfect?
CardData/Data/finishword/EC8796CC998B.cht: 你要怎麼贏過完美存在的我呢?

CardData/Data/finishword/F329618344CF.eng: You’re on the wrong side of the law…

CardData/Data/finishword/F396842B0FA4.eng: You ready to face the Darkforce?

CardData/Data/finishword/F603BDCABEC9.eng: Don’t let the wrecking ball fool you. People used to say I was as smart as Bruce Banner, and they were right.
