CardData/Data/powers/E33DC50AB6F0.cht: 強化的力量與速度、多數手臂與觸手。

CardData/Data/powers/E6A45623EDB4.eng: Asgardian strength and endurance; particular skill with sword and spears
CardData/Data/powers/E6A45623EDB4.cht: 阿斯嘉人的力量與耐力、精通槍與劍的技術。

CardData/Data/powers/E971AB047AA7.eng: Virtually unlimited phyiscal strength, near invulnerability to most attacks
CardData/Data/powers/E971AB047AA7.cht: 實際上沒有任何限制的軀體力量、以及讓大部分攻擊變成無效的耐力。

CardData/Data/powers/E9D5EE6EFA12.eng: Enhanced sensory perception, unarmed and blade combat
CardData/Data/powers/E9D5EE6EFA12.cht: 強化的感知能力、格鬥術、劍術。

CardData/Data/powers/EE3332BA3F14.eng: Darkforce manipulation; travel through the Darkforce Dimension
CardData/Data/powers/EE3332BA3F14.cht: 控制黑暗次元，形成連接黑暗次元的傳送門。

CardData/Data/powers/F30EADEC3A1F.cht: 繼承大猩猩力量的怪力

CardData/Data/powers/F406CE9D0FC1.eng: Capable for carrying out joint operations with S.H.I.E.L.D. agents
CardData/Data/powers/F406CE9D0FC1.cht: 和神盾局特工之間的各種合作作戰執行能力。

CardData/Data/powers/F410704101D4.eng: Unarmed combat; psychic/mystic sensitivity; projection of mystical force field; artificial claws
CardData/Data/powers/F410704101D4.cht: 赤手空拳戰鬥、超自然且神祕的直覺、形成魔法能量場、人工爪。

CardData/Data/powers/F65FDE52156B.eng: Squirrel-like leaping and chewing abilities; increased strength; control over squirrels
CardData/Data/powers/F65FDE52156B.cht: 強大的力量。操控松鼠、跳躍與撕咬的能力。

CardData/Data/powers/F6F153F950F0.cht: 飛簷走壁、發射蜘蛛絲、靈敏的直覺。

CardData/Data/powers/F6F77F520AEF.eng: Experienced soldier, skilled with a wide variety of weapons
CardData/Data/powers/F6F77F520AEF.cht: 優秀的戰鬥力與武器使用能力

CardData/Data/powers/F6F7B9430AEF.cht: 優秀的領導能力、使用槍械的技巧、格鬥技術。

CardData/Data/powers/F7281A9A4E35.eng: Body composed of living sound; can project powerful sound waves; expert physicist and engineer

CardData/Data/powers/F9F05623F75B.eng: Magic of the Dark Elves, can summon the Wild Hunt
CardData/Data/powers/F9F05623F75B.cht: 精通利用黑暗的魔法、召喚幽靈獵人。

CardData/Data/powers/FA2E56231999.cht: 飛行。與鳥類進行心電感應交流、透視。

CardData/Data/powers/FA4BA4F9A942.eng: Police training, martial arts, cybernetic arm with various combat abilities
CardData/Data/powers/FA4BA4F9A942.cht: 訓練有素的警察、格鬥術、搭載各種尖端武器的人工手臂。

CardData/Data/powers/FE5CF0D9F605.eng: Fire breath, dragon teeth and claws

CardData/Data/realName/1FC81D1C9639.cht: 麥斯米蘭‧昆西‧庫羅里奇

CardData/Data/realName/205D53CD33FF.cht: 阿列克谢·米哈伊洛维奇·西斯艾维奇

CardData/Data/realName/4A7FC002448C.cht: 美杜莎利斯‧阿瑪奎琳‧波爾塔甘

CardData/Data/realName/D5F07D56EA7A.cht: 娜塔莉亞‧愛麗安諾芙娜‧羅曼諾娃

CardData/Data/summary/00127A8DD815.eng: The first Sorcerer Supreme on Earth, who later trained Stephen Strange to be his successor. The Ancient One watches over Kamar-Taj and protects it from magical threats.
CardData/Data/summary/00127A8DD815.cht: 地球最初的至尊魔法師，亦為奇異博士的導師。守護著卡瑪泰姬並使其免受魔法的威脅。

CardData/Data/summary/01B491A76CA1.eng: The leader of the Wrecking Crew wields a crowbar enchanted by the Norn sorceress Karnilla.

CardData/Data/summary/01E1737F48E6.eng: Lady Sif is one of the few Asgardians who will speak her mind to Thor. For this reason, and for her battlefield skill, he considers her one of his indispensible companions.
CardData/Data/summary/01E1737F48E6.cht: 阿斯嘉的勇猛戰士，也是雷神索爾的夥伴。雖然很信賴雷神索爾，也很尊敬他，但是卻非常藐視人類。只要雷神索爾一聲令下，就會拔劍奔向戰場。

CardData/Data/summary/02E24A78704A.eng: Rick Jones endured experiments with gamma radiation, and gained Hulk-like strength and endurance.
CardData/Data/summary/02E24A78704A.cht: 具備可加工破壞力的存在，變異的瑞克瓊斯。那股力量足以和浩克互相抗衡。

CardData/Data/summary/08CDD4D6D391.eng: Ruler of Hel, the Asgardian realm of the dead. Believing that death is the most powerful of all forces, Hela seeks to rule all of the Nine Realms with the help of the shards of the Cosmic Cube.
CardData/Data/summary/08CDD4D6D391.cht: 死者的世界，地獄的統治者。相信死亡是所有力量裡面最強大的。肖想利用連接地球和阿斯嘉的傳送門統治九個世界。

CardData/Data/summary/096CC8F547F0.eng: Daredevil's blindness caused his other senses to become superhumanly acute. He is a martial-arts master who patrols and defends the Hell's Kitchen neighborhood of New York. He is also a skilled lawyer.
CardData/Data/summary/096CC8F547F0.cht: 雙眼看不見，但其他感官非常靈敏。保護紐約的地獄廚房不受各種犯罪與惡徒影響。白天是優秀的律師，夜晚則是守護街道的英雄。

CardData/Data/summary/0AA6176CD1F5.eng: Shou-Lao the Undying is the immortal dragon guardian of the mystical city of K’un-Lun. Whoever would become Iron Fist must defeat him.

CardData/Data/summary/0B5FEAEE1B06.eng: After a blood transfusion from her cousin Bruce Banner, Jennifer Walters became She-Hulk. She's also a lawyer who sometimes represents her colleagues in the Avengers.
CardData/Data/summary/0B5FEAEE1B06.cht: 獲得堂兄弟布魯斯‧班納輸血後便獲得超能力。平常是復仇者聯盟的一員，擔任替同伴發言的律師，遇到危機時則會變身為女綠巨人給予援助。

CardData/Data/summary/0BC16DD61F05.eng: The original Ant-Man and a founding member of the Avengers, Hank Pym adopted the new identity of Yellowjacket after designing a new suit with different powers.
CardData/Data/summary/0BC16DD61F05.cht: 原祖蟻人兼復仇者聯盟的創始成員。漢克·皮姆創造並穿著使用和蟻人不同力量的套裝，並接受了所謂黃色夾克的新自我。

CardData/Data/summary/0CBC7983DC74.eng: Son of the original Baron Zemo and a HYDRA leader, Helmut seeks to avenge his father's death at the hands of Captain America. He searches for Cosmic Cube shards to use in a planned superweapon.
CardData/Data/summary/0CBC7983DC74.cht: 海因里希‧齊莫的兒子，也是九頭蛇的領導人。看見自己的父親死在美國隊長手中，於是便決定要復仇。尋找超級武器要使用的宇宙魔方碎片。

CardData/Data/summary/0FEA52445437.eng: A former pirate and mercenary, Nebula made the mistake of stealing Thanos' ship. He reclaimed it and she was later transformed into a cyborg while in prison. She has since partially reformed.
CardData/Data/summary/0FEA52445437.cht: 前職是海賊，同時也是傭兵。因為竊取薩諾斯的人造衛星，身體的一部分被火燒毀。使用人工眼睛與手臂，身體變成鋼骨。後來他將自己的身體升級，藉此提升戰鬥力。

CardData/Data/summary/107F9996F0F8.eng: Colonel Luther Manning suffered battlefield wounds that would have been fatal...if Harlan Ryker had not rebuilt him into the cyborg soldier known as Deathlok.
CardData/Data/summary/107F9996F0F8.cht: 在戰場上受到致命傷且瀕臨死亡的路德‧曼寧改造身體後，以鋼骨的狀態重生。

CardData/Data/summary/11DF84B5C718.eng: Brian Calusky met Dirk Garthwaite, better known as the Wrecker, in prison. The two men and another pair of inmates escaped and became the Wrecking Crew.

CardData/Data/summary/13069E39EE6E.eng: A former private investigator, Mac Gargan became the Scorpion after his initial curiosity about Spider-Man turned into an obsession.
CardData/Data/summary/13069E39EE6E.cht: 前職為私人偵探。由於沉迷於對蜘蛛人的好奇而變成了毒蠍。

CardData/Data/summary/15853686CC36.eng: Injection of an experimental serum turned Dr. Ted Sallis into the Man-Thing, a humanoid swamp monster who haunts the Everglades and guards the Nexus of All Realities.
CardData/Data/summary/15853686CC36.cht: 用血清變異的科學家。擁有植物的特性。充滿魄力的巨大身體與怪力，再生能力足以上對手感到恐懼。

CardData/Data/summary/17768CB5A7FB.eng: The awesomely powerful Thanos, the Mad Titan, has ruled many worlds and destroyed many others. Now he has set his sights on Earth again, intrigued by the potential of the Cosmic Cube shards.
CardData/Data/summary/17768CB5A7FB.cht: 強大的泰坦族，同時也是闇黑號令的首長，光憑人類的力量根本就難以對抗他。可自由操控各種能量，並且加工成武器。

CardData/Data/summary/191DC8148CB1.eng: Ulysses Klaw invaded Wakanda to steal Vibranium for his experimental  weapons. In the battle, he killed T’Challa’s father, T’Chaka, and lost his own right hand. He replaced his hand with a sonic gun that blasts enemies with crippling waves of sound.

CardData/Data/summary/1A1988D45DF1.eng: A member of the Inhuman royal family, Medusa married Black Bolt to form a powerful royal couple. She serves as his interpreter since he cannot speak, and works to keep family rivalries from endangering Attilan.
CardData/Data/summary/1A1988D45DF1.cht: 異人族的女王。和黑蝠王結婚並取得強大的王權。傳遞無法交談的黑蝠王的信息給異人族。為了不讓亞提蘭陷入危機，牽制著企圖推翻王位的王族。

CardData/Data/summary/1A304C8D6113.eng: Mordo studied magic under the Ancient One, then betrayed him. Doctor Strange thwarted his plot and Mordo has been Strange's mortal enemy ever since. He hunts for shards of the Cosmic Cube, hoping to create a gateway to demonic realms.
CardData/Data/summary/1A304C8D6113.cht: 雖然是上古尊者的弟子，但卻叛變了。奇異博士阻止莫度男爵的陰謀後，就被視為非消滅不可的宿敵。為了開啟通往惡魔世界的通道，企圖想要取得宇宙魔方碎片。

CardData/Data/summary/1AE2EAF36A30.eng: One of the Warriors Three, the self-styled "Lion of Asgard" would rather be telling stories and drinking than fighting -- but when the time for battle comes, he's as fearsome a warrior as can be found.
CardData/Data/summary/1AE2EAF36A30.cht: 戰士三人組當中的一名，自稱阿斯嘉的獅子。」比起戰鬥，我更喜歡吃東西和聊天。但是戰鬥開始後，就會展現難得一見的可怕模樣。

CardData/Data/summary/1C05A4B20AE7.eng: Ebony Maw is a member of Thanos’ Black Order, fighting with his nearly hypnotic skills of persuasion that prove deadlier than any weapon.

CardData/Data/summary/1C983950716A.eng: Lord of Muspelheim and ruler of its fire demons. Surtur wields the Twilight Sword, which can endanger even his old adversary Odin. He is an ally of Hela in her quest to rule all the Nine Realms.
CardData/Data/summary/1C983950716A.cht: 穆斯貝爾海姆的帝王，同時也是火焰惡魔的首領。揮舞能抑制宿敵奥丁之力的黎明之劍。以同盟的身分參加海拉掀起的侵略戰爭。

CardData/Data/summary/1CAEDC22DC71.eng: Android created to look like a teenage girl version of Vision, with Vision's appearance and powers.
CardData/Data/summary/1CAEDC22DC71.cht: 幻視的女兒，和父親一樣可調整身體的密度，擁有優秀的頭腦。

CardData/Data/summary/1DB202FD08FB.eng: Lei-Kung the Thunderer is an immortal resident of K’un Lun, whose task is to train every potential Iron Fist. He also rises to the city’s defense when it is under threat.

CardData/Data/summary/1E8A5F00989B.eng: Gamora is one of the galaxy's most feared assassins thanks to the brutal training Thanos put her through as a child. She now fights against him as a member of the Guardians of the Galaxy.
CardData/Data/summary/1E8A5F00989B.cht: 銀河系最危險的暗殺者。年紀輕輕卻能承受薩諾斯蠻橫與殘忍的訓練。目前是星際異攻隊的一員，共同對抗薩諾斯。

CardData/Data/summary/2253C75ABB07.eng: As a young girl, Doreen Green learned she could talk to squirrels, and had some qualities of a squirrel herself. She set out to become a super hero, and now splits her time between college and the Avengers.
CardData/Data/summary/2253C75ABB07.cht: 小時候便明白松鼠的特性、以及自己能和松鼠溝通的事實。決定當英雄後，他就邊讀大學邊參加復仇者的活動，表現非常活躍。

CardData/Data/summary/24160992B158.eng: The most powerful wizard on earth, the Sorcerer Supreme. Doctor Strange carries the sense of duty that he must defend mystical threats coming outside from Earth. He has wide knowledge of magic and holds the key to seal the Wand of Watoomb.
CardData/Data/summary/24160992B158.cht: 地球最強的魔法師-至尊魔法師。具備守護地球不受外部威脅的使命感。擁有淵博的魔法知識，知道能夠封印瓦圖姆之杖的重要線索。

CardData/Data/summary/27240CBFCC8E.eng: Mutation may have changed its color from black to white, but its power and aggressiveness was well kept.
CardData/Data/summary/27240CBFCC8E.cht: 身為猛毒的艾迪·布洛克拒絕了共生體。但共生體對他的免疫系統造成變異，治療癌症後變化為血清。

CardData/Data/summary/29A91BB22130.eng: Dishonorably discharged Army sergeant Henry Camp became a member of the Wrecking Crew after absorbing some of the power of the Wrecker’s enchanted crowbar.

CardData/Data/summary/2A954B7378F3.eng: Implanted with a cranial device that gave her psionic powers, Tanya Sealy became the deadly Black Mamba, who kills with projections of the Darkforce.

CardData/Data/summary/2BE681A47B2F.eng: Crusher Creel was endowed by Loki with the power to absorb the physical properties of anything he touches...including shards of the Cosmic Cube.
CardData/Data/summary/2BE681A47B2F.cht: 喝下邪神洛基給的魔藥後，獲得藉由接觸便能吸收事物特性的能力。具備驚人能力的他發現了宇宙魔方的碎片。

CardData/Data/summary/2D22F1166AE3.eng: A skilled thief and acrobat, Black Cat also possesses the ability to affect probabilities in her area, essentially inflicting bad luck on her enemies.
CardData/Data/summary/2D22F1166AE3.cht: 熟練的小偷，同時也是雜技師。擁有對機率造成影響的能力，對黑貓的敵人帶來不幸。

CardData/Data/summary/2DA4C2695A66.eng: Princess of Wakanda and sister of T'Challa. Leads Wakanda's scientific research and is skilled in martial arts.
CardData/Data/summary/2DA4C2695A66.cht: 是黑豹帝查拉的妹妹，也是瓦干達的公主。引領瓦干達的科學技術發展，對武術的造詣也很深。

CardData/Data/summary/2ED945E42929.eng: Able to transform his body into sand shapes--both solid and granular--Sandman is a long-time adversary of Spider-Man
CardData/Data/summary/2ED945E42929.cht: 蜘蛛人的宿敵。把身體的成分轉換成沙礫，並以各種型態攻擊。

CardData/Data/summary/344BE1C26F6E.eng: The Shroud has powers over darkness and the Darkforce, and uses them to fight crime and evil on his own terms.
CardData/Data/summary/344BE1C26F6E.cht: 舒勞德會利用黑暗與黑暗原力的力量對付敵人。

CardData/Data/summary/3A591E8CF398.eng: As Falcon, Sam Wilson flies with cybernetic wings and has a telepathic link with his pet hawk Redwing, and other birds as well.
CardData/Data/summary/3A591E8CF398.cht: 具備可高速飛行的一對翅膀，屬於義氣派的英雄。為了協助回收宇宙碎片而四處飛行。

CardData/Data/summary/3A883766757A.eng: One of the original New York street heroes, Luke Cage puts his unbreakable skin on the line to defend the helpless and fight evil--with the Defenders, the Avengers, or all on his own.
CardData/Data/summary/3A883766757A.cht: 守護紐約街頭的英雄之一。與捍衛者、復仇者、以及其他英雄一起保護市民。憑藉子彈也無法穿破的防彈軀體馳騁戰場。

CardData/Data/summary/3B0701A52D06.eng: Psychologist Jericho Drumm studied voodoo to avenge his brother's death. His brother's spirit joined him, enhancing his powers, and he became a powerful houngan.
CardData/Data/summary/3B0701A52D06.cht: 心理學家杰里科·德拉姆為了替死去的弟弟報仇，於是便加入巫毒教培養力量。依照他的期望結合了弟弟的靈魂，並且成為擁有強大力量的巫醫。

CardData/Data/summary/3BB799B0F56B.eng: The fifth spirit to become Ghost Rider is Robbie Reyes, who possesses the powers of the Penance Stare and control over hellfire.
CardData/Data/summary/3BB799B0F56B.cht: 狩獵犯罪靈魂的超自然生命。坐上被火覆蓋的摩托車，揮動著鐵鍊的模樣，真是可怕。

CardData/Data/summary/3EBBD7F45B23.eng: Created as a perfect artificial human, Adam Warlock rebelled against his creators and explored the universe seeking purpose. He controls the Soul Gem.
CardData/Data/summary/3EBBD7F45B23.cht: 擁有可操控能量及強力魔法能力的生命化身。為善的他，有時也會有墮落的時候。

CardData/Data/summary/3FF5FB7BEB6C.eng: Elektra is a skilled assassin who wields a pair of sai. She and Matt Murdock have had a long and troubled romance.
CardData/Data/summary/3FF5FB7BEB6C.cht: 揮舞一雙三叉槍的暗殺者。與馬修·梅鐸談了一場漫長艱辛的戀情。

CardData/Data/summary/403508B1B9AE.eng: Herman Schults built his first armored suit as an aid to safe-cracking. Then he saw great possibilities and became the Shocker.
CardData/Data/summary/403508B1B9AE.cht: 為竊取金庫而專門製成的震動手套，威力讓人實在太震驚了，後來便成為使用手套當作武器的惡徒-震盪者。

CardData/Data/summary/4159891A3A37.eng: Drax was created to battle Thanos, using the spirit of Arthur Douglas. His daughter, captured by Thanos, became Moondragon. He fights alongside his fellow Guardians of the Galaxy.
CardData/Data/summary/4159891A3A37.cht: 星際異攻隊的一員。注入被薩諾斯殺害的亞瑟·道格拉斯的靈魂，他是為了阻止薩諾斯而創造出來的存在。被薩諾斯抓走的女兒變成了月龍現身，而且憎恨達到了最高境界。

CardData/Data/summary/4400A3E29342.eng: Hero that can shrink into the size of an ant and control multitudes of real ants using a helmet designed by the Avengers' Hank Pym.
CardData/Data/summary/4400A3E29342.cht: 戴著復仇者漢克‧皮姆設計的頭盔，以蟻人的身分表現活躍。頭盔能讓他縮小成和螞蟻一樣大，並且對螞蟻下達命令。

CardData/Data/summary/4568718BBCF9.eng: Genetically enhanced by Russian scientists, the Rhino later added an armored suit with a distinctive horn. When he charges, opponents better get out of the way.
CardData/Data/summary/4568718BBCF9.cht: 由於俄羅斯科學家的關係而經歷過變形的人物。穿著擁有特別犄角的強化套裝。會利用具威脅性的突進對對方造成傷害。

CardData/Data/summary/492423411529.eng: Master of martial arts who bears the symbol of the immortal dragon Shou-Lao on his chest. As the Iron Fist, Rand can focus his chi into a devastating punch. He protects the mystical city of K'un L'un from dark forces using shards of the Cosmic Cube.
CardData/Data/summary/492423411529.cht: 胸口刻印有不滅之龍壽老圖案的格鬥大師，將「氣」凝聚在拳頭發揮深具破壞的威力。這就是鋼鐵拳！遵從守護神秘都市崑崙的使命，保護崑崙不受暗黑之力影響。

CardData/Data/summary/496C1109F456.eng: An original member of the Great Lakes Avengers, Doorman adopted his moniker because of his ability to manipulate the Darkforce and create portals to the Darkforce Dimension.

CardData/Data/summary/4BA50AABF356.eng: The cruel leader of Thanos’ Black Order, Corvus Glaive has overseen the ruin of countless planets.

CardData/Data/summary/4DF5C1882339.eng: A superior martial artist and former secret, Shang-Chi later joined the Avengers and was exposed to cosmic radiation that allows him to create copies of himself.
CardData/Data/summary/4DF5C1882339.cht: 功夫達人，前職是秘密特工。後來加入復仇者，因為被宇宙放射能照射到，讓他擁有能複製自己的能力。

CardData/Data/summary/5031D0BCFEC1.eng: Biologist Curt Connors used his own research to transform himself into the Lizard, with powers of regeneration and telepathic control over other reptiles.
CardData/Data/summary/5031D0BCFEC1.cht: 生物學家寇特‧康納斯透過研究擁有再生能力，並且變化為控制爬蟲類的蜥蜴。

CardData/Data/summary/5219AEF5D0FB.eng: Daughter of Umar and sometime lover of Doctor Strange, the magically empowered Clea is caught between two worlds but always sides with Earth in the end.
CardData/Data/summary/5219AEF5D0FB.cht: 奧瑪的女兒，也是奇異博士的情人。被賦予魔法能力的克莉，在地球與黑暗次元之間感到相當糾結，但最後還是選擇站在地球的一方。

CardData/Data/summary/52EC8A39FF35.eng: One of the demonic beings known as Fear Lords, Nox seeks to rule Earth by manipulating the fears of its people.
CardData/Data/summary/52EC8A39FF35.cht: 知名恐怖君王的惡魔之一。可隨心所欲讓他人感到恐懼，並且想支配地球。

CardData/Data/summary/5359A29443DC.eng: Leader of the Ravagers, a band of space pirates, Yondu takes in the stranded Peter Quill and later makes him a full member of the Ravagers...before Quill becomes Star-Lord.
CardData/Data/summary/5359A29443DC.cht: 領導太空海盜「破壞者」的隊長。用吹口哨的方式操控獨特的武器亞卡箭矢。

CardData/Data/summary/5510A7DB61C0.eng: A long-time friend (and occasional rival) of Tony Stark, Colonel James Rhodes has his own armored alter-ego, War Machine.
CardData/Data/summary/5510A7DB61C0.cht: 東尼史塔克的老朋友兼勁敵。詹姆士·羅德的另一人。

CardData/Data/summary/560756774EC5.eng: Thunder god of Asgard, son of Odin and brother of Loki, Thor grew to love Midgard during an exile there, and with his mortal friends fights to protect it and the rest of the realms.
CardData/Data/summary/560756774EC5.cht: 阿斯嘉天雷之神。奧丁之子，邪神洛基的兄弟。雖然有點固執，但是為了幫助人類會非常的努力。

CardData/Data/summary/575F7D4A7B25.eng: One of the founders of HYDRA, given super powers by a serum similar to the serum that transformed Steve Rogers into Captain America. He disappeared in the explosion of the Cosmic Cube.
CardData/Data/summary/575F7D4A7B25.cht: 夢想征服世界的團體-九頭蛇的首長。為了宇宙魔方而在宇宙和美國隊長發生衝突後就消失不見了。

CardData/Data/summary/5A4A5DFE6A12.eng: Nick Fury is the director of S.H.I.E.L.D. and the force behind the organization's global reach. In the aftermath of the explosion of the Cosmic Cube, he directs the defense of Earth and the search for Captain America.
CardData/Data/summary/5A4A5DFE6A12.cht: 神盾局的局長，讓神盾局對世界發揮影響力的人物。鞏固因宇宙魔方爆炸而不安的地球的安全，指揮搜尋失蹤的美國隊長。

CardData/Data/summary/5AD2B17DEE8C.eng: NYPD officer Mercedes Knight lost an arm in a bomb attack, and recieved a cybernetic replacement from Tony Stark. She started a private investigation firm with Colleen Wing and later joined the Defenders.
CardData/Data/summary/5AD2B17DEE8C.cht: 紐約警察梅塞德斯奈特因為爆炸事件而失去一隻手臂，但經由東尼史塔克的幫忙，成功移植了人工手臂。脫下警察制服的她與科琳溫一起經營偵探社，後來加入了捍衛者的行列。

CardData/Data/summary/618883288E63.eng: Veteran S.H.I.E.L.D. agent tasked with leading critical missions to recover stolen tech and monitor the activities of useful rogues including the Punisher and the Winter Soldier.
CardData/Data/summary/618883288E63.cht: 資深神盾局特工。主要負責恢復失竊的技術、以及監視制裁者、酷寒戰士等優秀的戰鬥員。

CardData/Data/summary/675B69EA7F7E.eng: Kidnapped by the Yakuza as a young girl, Maki saw Bullseye eliminate her captors and was inspired to follow his example. She became a ruthless ninja assassin for the Hand, but also maintains a civilian life as a lawyer.
CardData/Data/summary/675B69EA7F7E.cht: 小時候被黑道綁架後，瑪姬看到消滅綁匪的靶眼而深受影響，並決定要跟隨他。雖然她成了為手合會工作的忍者殺手，同時卻也維持著律師的民間生活。

CardData/Data/summary/67D5F34C026E.eng: A member of Thanos’ Black Order, Proxima Midnight is a feared combatant due to her unmatched strength and the devastating power of her spear.

CardData/Data/summary/67F1D800C81D.eng: An accident grafted 4 cybernetic tentacles onto Otto Octavius' back, after which he became Spider-Man's nemesis Doctor Octopus.
CardData/Data/summary/67F1D800C81D.cht: 發明能裝在背後的金屬手臂，是一個天賦異稟的科學家惡徒。可使用4個手臂沿著牆壁移動，也會使用相當程度的貫穿力攻擊對方。

CardData/Data/summary/6A10384E19C7.eng: Diamondback was a childhood friend of Luke Cage's who later turned to crime. He is an expert with knives, including many with trick effects.
CardData/Data/summary/6A10384E19C7.cht: 使用刀類武器能力相當優秀的紐約惡徒。特別是具備能相當準確擲中的能力。

CardData/Data/summary/6D1B4DBB5189.eng: Helplessly infatuated with the Enchantress, the Asgardian warrior Skurge wields the enchanted Bloodaxe, following her every command.
CardData/Data/summary/6D1B4DBB5189.cht: 喜愛魅惑魔女的阿斯嘉人。使用嗜血斧頭，比普通阿斯嘉人的力量還要大。為了實現魅惑魔女的慾望而前往地球。

CardData/Data/summary/6F07CA67585E.eng: Genetic experiments gave Olympic swimmer Todd Arliss aquatic powers, which he put to use with various villainous groups.

CardData/Data/summary/71441D3C782B.eng: Special-effects wizard Quentin Beck turned to a life of crime, using his expertise in stage magic and chemistry to baffle his opponents.
CardData/Data/summary/71441D3C782B.cht: 曾為電影特效師的昆汀·貝克成了利用擅於舞台效果和化學的專業知識的犯罪者。

CardData/Data/summary/7409EC681527.eng: As a member of the intergalactic police force known as the Nova Corps, Richard Rider wields the Nova Force against threats across known space -- paying particular attention to his home world of Earth.
CardData/Data/summary/7409EC681527.cht: 以新星軍團聞名的柴達星球的一員。具有含有柴達星球所有知識的「世界思維」。為了從覆蓋整個宇宙的威脅中守護宇宙和地球而使用新星之力。

CardData/Data/summary/748F0C78D9E8.eng: Cottonmouth controls much of the criminal underworld in Harlem, using his enhanced strength -- and gold-capped sharpened teeth -- to intimidate rivals.
CardData/Data/summary/748F0C78D9E8.cht: 各種犯罪的背後主謀，哈林區地下組織的首腦。使用強化的力量與尖銳的牙齒威脅對方。

CardData/Data/summary/761AE789F1E3.eng: Frost giant King of Jotunheim and sworn enemy of Asgard, Ymir jumped at the chance to join Hela's march to overthrow Asgard.
CardData/Data/summary/761AE789F1E3.cht: 約頓海姆的冰霜巨人之王，也是阿斯嘉的宿敵。為了擊垮阿斯嘉而加入了海拉的計畫。

CardData/Data/summary/77B9496A092D.eng: Bombarded with Darkforce energy as part of a misguided experiment, Marcus Daniels learned to control his powers and became the villainous Blackout.

CardData/Data/summary/790DB3DC8869.eng: An elite all-woman military guard tasked with protecting and fighting for Black Panther and Wakanda.

CardData/Data/summary/798596818B09.eng: Teenager Kamala Khan discovered she had Inhuman blood, and succeeded Carol Danves as Ms. Marvel. She is a core member of the Champions team of teenage heroes.
CardData/Data/summary/798596818B09.cht: 揮動變形的手臂，讓戰場焦土化的少女英雄。和一般的少女一樣充滿煩惱也愛聊天，但看見惡徒就會羞澀地握起拳頭擊倒對方，是一名相當機伶的英雄。

CardData/Data/summary/7B7E8AAEA197.eng: An ancient being, the Collector has gathered the universe's life forms for billions of years, and along the way has collected a huge number of artifacts as well.
CardData/Data/summary/7B7E8AAEA197.cht: 古代的存在，數十億年間收集宇宙生命體與珍貴遺物的收集狂。

CardData/Data/summary/81568EBD7CC7.eng: Green Goblin is a villain that fools his enemies with swift movements and various explosions. He's appearing all over New York to collect Cosmic Shards.
CardData/Data/summary/81568EBD7CC7.cht: 以飛快的速度與各種炸彈玩弄對手的惡徒。為了回收宇宙碎片而出現在紐約各個角落。

CardData/Data/summary/8246AACD2E44.eng: Dagger can create daggers of psionic light that sap the target's vitality -- and also feed her close friend Cloak's Darkforce hunger.
CardData/Data/summary/8246AACD2E44.cht: 創造能弱化生命力的靈能光線。使用光之力的匕首為了不被搭檔斗篷的黑暗之力影響，於是便補充光之力。

CardData/Data/summary/82946C6349F7.eng: A former drug dealer, Black Mariah has at times teamed up with the Heroes for Hire, but she always ends up on the wrong side of the law again. She sees shards of the Cosmic Cube as a way to control New York's underworld.
CardData/Data/summary/82946C6349F7.cht: 前毒販。有時會和哈林英雄們合作，但由於對於違反法律總是毫不在乎因此時常造成紛亂。他利用宇宙魔方的碎片計畫控制紐約的黑社會。

CardData/Data/summary/83B29D6812AC.eng: Ruler of the Dark Dimension and bitter enemy of Dr. Strange, Dormammu controls an army of alien Mindless Ones and has vast powers over time and space.
CardData/Data/summary/83B29D6812AC.cht: 黑暗次元的統治者，同時與奇異博士有不共戴天之仇。率領外星生物無心者部隊，具備超越時空間的龐大力量。為了得到在至聖之地發動的瓦圖姆之杖而展開行動。

CardData/Data/summary/858D5E09AABD.eng: Ultron is a fully sentient robot created by Hank Pym that later evolved to believe it should destroy humanity. Nearly impossible to destroy because its personality is transferable, Ultron is a constant danger to all living things.
CardData/Data/summary/858D5E09AABD.cht: 漢克·皮姆開發的人工智能機器人。進化後認為人類應該滅亡。可移動自己的人工智能，因此無法破壞它。會對所有活著的東西帶來威脅。

CardData/Data/summary/87EDAA439787.eng: Ava Ayala inherited the White Tiger amulet from her brother Hector and continues his work fighting crime with Heroes for Hire and the Avengers.
CardData/Data/summary/87EDAA439787.cht: 透過妹妹給的老虎項鍊得到老虎神之力的英雄。和僱傭英雄、復仇者共同對抗惡勢力。

CardData/Data/summary/89086468A55E.eng: Even though Clint doesn't have superpowers, he is known as one of the best archers on earth. With his concentration and athletic skills, he never misses his target.
CardData/Data/summary/89086468A55E.cht: 雖然沒有超能力，但卻是地表最強的弓箭手。擁有卓越的集中力與運動神經，絕對不會錯過目標。

CardData/Data/summary/8A7F9BE51E8E.eng: Alien symbiote that gives its host super strength and stamina. Shoots web-like projectiles owing to a complicated past with Spider-Man.
CardData/Data/summary/8A7F9BE51E8E.cht: 被視為是猛毒的外星生命共生體。共生體初次抵達地球時，企圖想以蜘蛛人為宿主，但卻失敗了。儘管後來和艾迪·布洛克結合，他依然對蜘蛛人非常執著。

CardData/Data/summary/8B70FAF3D6D5.eng: A nurse who has developed a specialty in caring for injured super heroes who can't risk going to a public hospital, notably Daredevil and Iron Fist.
CardData/Data/summary/8B70FAF3D6D5.cht: 治療負傷英雄的紐約白衣天使。

CardData/Data/summary/8CA6364E43E6.eng: An ordinary New Yorker who started working with S.H.I.E.L.D. after the Cosmic Cube's explosion gave them special powers.
CardData/Data/summary/8CA6364E43E6.cht: 紐約的平凡市民。透過宇宙魔方碎片的能量獲得特殊力量後，和神盾局一起解決爆炸相關的事件。

CardData/Data/summary/8E5300C2FC6C.eng: An alternate universe version of Gwen Stacy, with powers similar to Spider-Man.
CardData/Data/summary/8E5300C2FC6C.cht: 擁有與蜘蛛人相似之能力的另一個宇宙的關·史黛西

CardData/Data/summary/9142BBCDEC89.eng: Blaming Iron Man for his father's death, young scientist Anton Vanko set out to design his own set of armor and lethal weapons.
CardData/Data/summary/9142BBCDEC89.cht: 對鋼鐵人懷恨在心的惡徒。裝備以尖端科技武裝的套裝。發出的電流鞭子擁有足夠讓一座建築物批成兩半的強大威力。

CardData/Data/summary/97B5682B4072.eng: Daughter of Arthur Douglas, who would become Drax the Destroyer, Heather Douglas was raised by monks on Thanos' homeworld, Titan. She has become a powerful telepath and master martial artist, as well as a brilliant genetic engineer.
CardData/Data/summary/97B5682B4072.cht: 成為破壞者德克斯的亞瑟‧道格拉斯的女兒。由薩諾斯的行星，泰坦的僧侶撫養長大。後來成為優秀的遺傳工學者、強大的心電感應能力者、以及格鬥專家。

CardData/Data/summary/999467D137ED.eng: Ezekiel Stane is the son of the original Iron Monger, Obadiah Stane. He continues his father's vengeful crusade against Iron Man, using the latest in biotech augmentations to his own body.
CardData/Data/summary/999467D137ED.cht: 鐵霸王的兒子扎克·斯坦研究生命工學，並成功複製了自己。後來為了替父親復仇，便開始威脅鋼鐵人。

CardData/Data/summary/99C49E48A591.eng: A founding member of the Avengers (who she also named), Wasp has learned how to make devastating use of her Pym particle-created powers.
CardData/Data/summary/99C49E48A591.cht: 復仇者的創立成員。可將光束粒子的力量提升到最大，縮小身體的大小並發射光束。

CardData/Data/summary/9A0E11BB7172.eng: The sentinel of the Bifrost guards the bridge to Asgard, and uses his clairvoyant powers to see anything happening anywhere in the Nine Realms.
CardData/Data/summary/9A0E11BB7172.cht: 守護與地球連接的彩虹橋，阿斯嘉的守門將。使用千里眼，能預知即將來襲的威脅，是守護阿斯嘉的奧丁的忠臣。

CardData/Data/summary/9AC8BF35BD71.eng: When billionaire industrialist Tony Stark dons his sophisticated armor, he becomes a living high-tech weapon, primed for defending the greater good. As Iron Man, he is driven by a heart that is part machine, but all hero. He has thrown himself into the search for Captain America after the explosion of the Cosmic Cube.
CardData/Data/summary/9AC8BF35BD71.cht: 史塔克工業的CEO，也是鋼鐵人本人。以粗魯的禮儀而聞名。有時也會為新的能力者指引到神盾局，並協助他們控制能力。

CardData/Data/summary/9AC9DE5D300B.eng: Specialized agent that can carry on missions that includes assassination, infiltration and spying. Natasha solves any problem that she encounters with her strategical decision making.
CardData/Data/summary/9AC9DE5D300B.cht: 專門執行暗殺、滲透、情報任務的特工。以冷靜的判斷力為主，使用戰略性的方式解決碰到的問題。

CardData/Data/summary/9B6696C74F96.eng: Leader of the Valkyrior, the Choosers of the Slain, Valkyrie has become a powerful member of the Defenders on Earth while still guiding fallen warriors to Valhalla.
CardData/Data/summary/9B6696C74F96.cht: 意味著「選擇靈魂之人」的瓦爾基麗的領導。她將戰死的勇士們指引到瓦爾哈拉，同時也為守護地球而奉獻。

CardData/Data/summary/9B757D248143.eng: Ruler of Wakanda, rich land of the rare resource called Vibranium. Wears a Vibranium-made suit which is nearly impossible to penetrate, and has the speed and strength as a panther.
CardData/Data/summary/9B757D248143.cht: 生產稀有資源汎合金的肥沃土地，瓦干達的統治者。穿著無法輕易貫穿的汎合金裝甲，以黑豹般的速度與力量為傲。

CardData/Data/summary/9C78B84121D2.eng: One of the three Vishanti, extra-dimensional beings who give powers to the Sorcerer Supreme, Agamotto often appears in the form of a red-eyed tiger.
CardData/Data/summary/9C78B84121D2.cht: 和歐希特、霍格斯共同組成三位一體的維山帝。賦予至尊魔法師力量的超越性存在。經常會變身為赤眼老虎出現。

CardData/Data/summary/9E7E3A553F8C.eng: Radiation exposure granted teenage Jessica Jones superpowers, but also left her an orphan. This trauma, and her torment by the Purple Man, makes her distrustful and angry. Despite this, she has a child with Luke Cage.
CardData/Data/summary/9E7E3A553F8C.cht: 由於放射能的外洩，於10幾歲時獲得了超能力，但也因此成了孤兒。因為此事件的衝擊以及紫人帶給他的痛苦使他不信任他人並陷入憤怒。戰勝痛苦過去的潔西卡．瓊斯和盧克‧凱奇一起建立了家庭。

CardData/Data/summary/9F271C0DE7CF.eng: Electro has powers over electricity, which makes him a dangerous adversary -- but he's always trying to prove he belongs among the elite villains.
CardData/Data/summary/9F271C0DE7CF.cht: 控制電力的惡徒。即使擁有具有威力的能力，電光人卻還是不斷的想要證明自己是最頂端的惡徒。

CardData/Data/summary/9F7B28190EF5.eng: Strucker was one of HYDRA's earliest members and leaders. A true mastermind, he is also a dangerous combatant who wields the Satan Claw. His singular goal is to destroy Nick Fury and S.H.I.E.L.D..
CardData/Data/summary/9F7B28190EF5.cht: 九頭蛇的創始成員，也是領導者。出任務的時候會成為最危險的戰鬥員。他唯一的目標就是殺死尼克‧福瑞及消滅神盾局。

CardData/Data/summary/A6B104383122.eng: When billionaire industrialist Tony Stark dons his sophisticated armor, he becomes a living high-tech weapon, primed for defending the greater good. As Iron Man, he is driven by a heart that is part machine, but all hero. He has thrown himself into the search for Captain America after the explosion of the Cosmic Cube.
CardData/Data/summary/A6B104383122.cht: 親手製作具備各種功能的裝甲戰鬥的復仇者聯盟領導者。雖然個性傲慢且難搞，但卻深具義氣。宇宙魔方體爆炸後，為了尋找美國隊長而東奔西走。

CardData/Data/summary/A7CC32B8ADED.eng: A blast of gamma rays transformed Bruce Banner's physiology, enabling him to transform into the raging green giant known as the Hulk. At first a force of pure destruction, the Hulk has learned over the years to control his temper...sometimes.
CardData/Data/summary/A7CC32B8ADED.cht: 伽瑪射線爆炸導致布魯斯‧班納體內誕生了綠巨人浩克。起初浩克的力量只是不斷地渴望破壞而已。布魯斯‧班納付出數年的努力企圖調整情緒，控制浩克，卻一直無法成功。

CardData/Data/summary/AC0C49DD8777.eng: Asgardian sorceress whose unrequited passion for Thor drives her to extremes. She will do anything to win him, even if it means destroying Asgard -- or Midgard. She hunts the shards of the Cosmic Cube.
CardData/Data/summary/AC0C49DD8777.cht: 阿斯嘉的魔法師。對雷神索爾的無止盡執著讓她變得非常極端。只要能擊敗雷神索爾，任何事情她都願意做，同時破壞阿斯嘉與中庭。對瓦圖姆之杖虎視眈眈，和史克奇一起來到中庭。

CardData/Data/summary/ACFE17035F61.eng: Crimelord and entrepreneur with enormous wealth and power, particularly in his home neighborhood of Hell's Kitchen. Fisk sees the shards of the Cosmic Cube as an opportunity to consolidate his control over the entire city.
CardData/Data/summary/ACFE17035F61.cht: 擁有巨大力量與財富的犯罪組織的頭目，同時也是企業家。為了收集散落在紐約街頭的宇宙魔方，正在雇用各種惡徒。

CardData/Data/summary/AE5B8BC3FB39.eng: Kree warrior known as the Accuser, on a galactic crusade to root out and destroy all who stand accused of offenses against the Kree Empire.
CardData/Data/summary/AE5B8BC3FB39.cht: 比人類的力量更大的克里族頭目。擁有卓越的戰鬥力，以行動執行法律。

CardData/Data/summary/AF9826D79272.eng: A World War II hero and original Howling Commando, Dum Dum Dugan was replaced with an LMD who continues to serve as Nick Fury's advisor and conscience.
CardData/Data/summary/AF9826D79272.cht: 利用生化型機器人替代身體的神盾局特工。

CardData/Data/summary/AFE90CC8BB1A.eng: S.H.I.E.L.D. agent trained for gathering intel and spying. He's busy dealing with the hazards all over the world after the explosion of the Cosmic Cube.
CardData/Data/summary/AFE90CC8BB1A.cht: 接受過情報收集、間諜活動的神盾局特工。宇宙魔方爆炸後，正在與全世界的危險因素對應。

CardData/Data/summary/B10606A8B79D.eng: Fighter pilot Carol Danvers was infused with Kree DNA that bestowed astonishing powers. She became Captain Marvel and joined the Avengers, later leading Alpha Flight's mission to protect Earth against threats from space.
CardData/Data/summary/B10606A8B79D.cht: 曾為戰鬥機飛行員的卡蘿·丹弗斯，由於被注入克里族的DNA而獲得能力。之後成為驚奇隊長並加入復仇者聯盟。目前帶領著阿爾法飛行宇宙停靠站守護地球避免受宇宙中的威脅攻擊。

CardData/Data/summary/B1B2274A9A6C.eng: Alien symbiote hunting for a host. Though the host gets enormous strength, it slowly gets controlled over the symbiote, looking for new prey.
CardData/Data/summary/B1B2274A9A6C.cht: 四處尋找宿主的外星共生體。宿主雖然獲得超人類的力量，但精神卻被執著於獵物的共生體蠶食。

CardData/Data/summary/B1E93840E508.eng: A bright red Tyrannosaurus Rex with near-human intelligence, Devil Dinosaur trust few humans. One of them is child genius Lunella Lafayette, better known as Moon Girl.
CardData/Data/summary/B1E93840E508.cht: 具有和人類相似的智能的紅色霸王龍。不信任人類，唯一只對月亮女孩敞開心扉，並和她成為摯友。

CardData/Data/summary/B50397D38AD5.eng: One of the first humans Thor met during his exile, Jane Foster would later pick up Mjolnir and become Thor herself, filling his role with the Avengers.
CardData/Data/summary/B50397D38AD5.cht: 舉起雷神之鎚的另一個雷神索爾。為了阻止橫行九國的海拉，和雷神索爾一起行動。召喚雷電且在天空翱翔的銀色戰士。

CardData/Data/summary/B840C97DC75C.eng: A one-time government assassin, Bullseye became the Kingpin's favorite hitman, tangling with Daredevil and the Punisher. He has phenomenal and lethal accuracy with any thrown object.
CardData/Data/summary/B840C97DC75C.cht: 靶眼曾經是政府的暗殺者，和夜魔俠、制裁者都是金霸王寵愛的傭兵。可精準地將物體投擲出去擊中目標。

CardData/Data/summary/B91E37A633A6.eng: When Dr. Bruce Baner bravely rescued a teenager from a bomb test, a masive dose of radiation transformed the scientist's DNA. If Bruce loses his temper, the hidden adrenaline-fed hero in his genes awakens -- the Incredible Hulk!
CardData/Data/summary/B91E37A633A6.cht: 有才能的科學家布魯斯‧班納博士在拯救瑞克瓊斯時，被暴露在伽瑪射線上。被暴露在伽瑪射線上的班納博士，雖然獲得了可變身為浩克的能力，但是卻難以操控那個能力。

CardData/Data/summary/BDEE63A5A6E2.eng: A member of Thanos’ Black Order, Supergiant is characterized as a “psychic parasite” able to seize control of others’ minds.

CardData/Data/summary/C0D72E185CC9.eng: Doctor Strange's aide and a powerful sorcerer in his own right, who guards the Sanctum Sanctorum.
CardData/Data/summary/C0D72E185CC9.cht: 至尊魔法師奇異博士的管家。代代都是對至尊魔法師效忠的家族的一員。擅長格鬥，無論在哪都絕不欠人情。

CardData/Data/summary/C1D0D8BD5392.eng: Son of an alien father and a human mother, Star-Lord joined up with the space pirates known as the Ravagers and later formed the Guardians of the Galaxy.
CardData/Data/summary/C1D0D8BD5392.cht: 外星人父親與人類母親的結晶。以優秀舞姿為傲的星際異攻隊的隊長。不輸給舞姿的槍法也相當令人自豪。過去曾加入宇宙海賊團破壞者，後來組成星際異攻隊。

CardData/Data/summary/C4A4890710C4.eng: Small but pugnacious alien who resembles a raccoon -- though he doesn't know what a raccoon is. A skilled pilot and lover of every kind of gun.
CardData/Data/summary/C4A4890710C4.cht: 長得像浣熊，雖然嬌小但充滿魅力的外星人。他自己也不清楚浣熊長什麼樣子。他是一名熟練的操縱師，喜愛全部的槍械。

CardData/Data/summary/C56BFAB0C428.eng: A former member of Wakanda's Royal Militia, M'Baku became Man-Ape by performing the rituals of the banned White Gorilla Cult. He vies with T'Challa to rule Wakanda.
CardData/Data/summary/C56BFAB0C428.cht: 前瓦干達皇宮的防衛軍，也是黑豹的宿敵。進行了被禁止的白猩猩部落的儀式而成了人猿。為了瓦干達的統治權和黑豹戰鬥。

CardData/Data/summary/C585BB537E0C.eng: Secreting pheromones which give him mind-control powers, the Purple Man manipulates others into serving his schemes. He takes a special interest in Jessica Jones.
CardData/Data/summary/C585BB537E0C.cht: 全身都是紫色的精神操控能力者。可大規模的操控人們的精神，來製造混亂。弱點是一般人水準的體力。

CardData/Data/summary/C75B2B0E5101.eng: An assassin with multiple personalities, Typhoid Mary has worked with the hand and also the Kingpin, often hunting Daredevil.
CardData/Data/summary/C75B2B0E5101.cht: 多重人格的暗殺者。與手合會、金霸王攜手合作犯罪，並且狩獵夜魔俠。

CardData/Data/summary/CD306B01F733.eng: Able to repeat any move or gesture once he has seen it, Taskmaster has mastered nearly every weapon and fighting technique known to humanity. A criminal by temperament, he sometimes fights on the side of good.
CardData/Data/summary/CD306B01F733.cht: 擁有過目不忘且模仿的能力。擁有人類知道的一切武器資訊與戰鬥技術。具備犯罪者的性質，但偶爾也會與英雄站在同一陣線。

CardData/Data/summary/D0B4BDD3CE9B.eng: Cloak's body is infused with the Darkforce, allowing him to move through the Darkforce Dimension. He has a constant hunger for light, which his partner Dagger often provides.
CardData/Data/summary/D0B4BDD3CE9B.cht: 斗篷體內含有黑暗之力，能夠移動至暗能次元。作為使用黑暗之力的代價，他會不斷地渴望光。但藉由身為夥伴的匕首的光，讓他可以中和黑暗之力並保持鎮定。

CardData/Data/summary/D4EE3EF6E805.eng: The Star-Spangled Avenger is the group's heart and soul, known for his indomitable courage and idealism -- and also for his strength and skill with his vibranium-alloy shield. He has disappeared after a battle with the Red Skull.
CardData/Data/summary/D4EE3EF6E805.cht: 擁有超人般力量及速度的復仇者聯盟的隊長。為了守護正義，不惜粉身碎骨的衝向前方。為了宇宙魔方，在宇宙與紅骷髏發生衝突後消失。

CardData/Data/summary/D5A0026EEE55.eng: The being known as Nightmare rules the Dream Dimension, causing human nightmares and feeding on the psychic energies of dreaming people.
CardData/Data/summary/D5A0026EEE55.cht: 支配夢次元的君王。讓人類做惡夢，趁他們做夢時吸收其精神能量。

CardData/Data/summary/D8B74E323B8E.eng: A mysterious assassin who fights with twin kama, and seems to have enhanced senses and superb martial arts training similar to Daredevil's.
CardData/Data/summary/D8B74E323B8E.cht: 傭兵忍者。沒有已知的過去，基於敏銳的感覺有利於戰鬥戰術。被紐約的惡徒雇用，想取英雄們的性命。

CardData/Data/summary/DD2F9FDAA38D.eng: Synthezoid Avenger empowered by the Solar Jewel to project energy and control the density of physical objects, including himself.
CardData/Data/summary/DD2F9FDAA38D.cht: 利用寶石當作媒介將太陽能量作為動力，身體密度可調整為分子單位。

CardData/Data/summary/DD4E390F100D.eng: Born as the vampire Deacon Frost fed on his mother, Eric Brooks was granted some vampiric powers -- and after his mother's death, he devoted himself to hunting and killing vampires wherever he finds them.
CardData/Data/summary/DD4E390F100D.cht: 承受生產疼痛的母親被偽裝成醫生的吸血鬼咬，然後就生下了 艾瑞克。於是他便成為擁有吸血鬼能力的人類。母親死後，他便全心全意狩獵與消滅吸血鬼。

CardData/Data/summary/E1AFDBDCEB5D.eng: Descended from a line of samurai, Colleen Wing also learned K'un Lun chi techniques from Iron Fist. She often works with Heroes for Hire.
CardData/Data/summary/E1AFDBDCEB5D.cht: 武士傳授武術給他，向鐵拳俠學會操控氣的方法。組成英雄傭兵集團-僱傭英雄進行活動。

CardData/Data/summary/E2CF3DBB0BB4.eng: Trained in martial arts and possessing some psychic sensing abilities, Hellcat has also interacted with occult forces, marrying Daimon Hellstrom and fighting alongside Doctor Strange with the Defenders.
CardData/Data/summary/E2CF3DBB0BB4.cht: 擁有格鬥能力與靈魂感應能力。她擁有的超能力吸引地獄風暴，後來兩人便成為夫妻。與奇異博士、捍衛者一起活動。

CardData/Data/summary/E2D5DE86CDFE.eng: One of the Warriors Three, known as "the Grim" for his dour demeanor. Hogun is rarely found outside the company of Fandral and Volstagg, putting their swords to work on behalf of Asgard.
CardData/Data/summary/E2D5DE86CDFE.cht: 因為態度陰沉，被稱為「黃泉使者」的戰士三人組之一。平常都和潘德洛、佛勒斯泰格一起行動，為了阿斯嘉而拔出劍。

CardData/Data/summary/E31F694B7C8F.eng: Matt Murdock's law partner and friend is a valuably ally to Daredevil and New York's other heroes, providing advice and guidance...if not combat support.
CardData/Data/summary/E31F694B7C8F.cht: 馬修·梅鐸的法律公司同事。以夜魔俠為首的紐約英雄們的堅強協助者，不會吝惜給予建議...除了戰鬥以外。

CardData/Data/summary/E37DE47A72CD.eng: Thor's half-brother and constant rival, Loki is a trickster god constantly torn between his desire for power and his impulse to sow chaos just for the delight of seeing the results. But even he doesn't want to see Asgard fall under Hela's influence.
CardData/Data/summary/E37DE47A72CD.cht: 雷神索爾同父異母的兄弟兼永遠的勁敵。是在對權力的慾望及想散布混亂的衝動之間糾結不已的欺騙之神。阿斯嘉無法忍受敗在海拉手中而開始行動。

CardData/Data/summary/E49CFC72EFC4.eng: King of Asgard and Thor's father, who commands the respect of all other gods. In battle, he channels the nearly unstoppable Odinforce.
CardData/Data/summary/E49CFC72EFC4.cht: 阿斯嘉王國的統治者，同時也是雷神索爾的父親，備受眾神尊敬。戰場上沒有人能阻擋使用奧丁之力的他。

CardData/Data/summary/E50B33118CE6.eng: Ageless master of martial arts who trained Daniel Rand and fights to protect the mystical city of K'un Lun.
CardData/Data/summary/E50B33118CE6.cht: 本名與生世都是謎的格鬥術達人。雙眼看不見，但其他感官非常靈敏。夜魔俠的師父。

CardData/Data/summary/E5B9FC8C9732.eng: Malekith rules Svartalfheim, the realm of the Dark Elves, and always has an eye out for ways to extend his power to other realms. He has allied himself with Hela's war to rule Asgard.
CardData/Data/summary/E5B9FC8C9732.cht: 黑暗精靈王國的支配者，從光芒出現之前就存在了。向海拉屈服後便加入了她的征服戰。協助使用闇黑魔法破壞九個王國。

CardData/Data/summary/E602E25D02BB.eng: Financier Leland Owlsley spent millions researching technologies to grant himself superpowers, and used them to become the Owl, would-be villain king of New York.
CardData/Data/summary/E602E25D02BB.cht: 金融家利蘭奧瑟支付數百萬美金研究超能力。後來他獲得變身為灰林鴞的能力，於是便利用該能力企圖成為紐約惡徒首腦。

CardData/Data/summary/E666EFC0E409.eng: The King of the Inhumans of Attilan, Black Bolt rarely uses his signature power: His voice unleashed is a powerful destructive force.
CardData/Data/summary/E666EFC0E409.cht: 亞提蘭異人族之王。黑蝠王很少使用自己的力量。因為他張開嘴的瞬間，就會發生整個都市被吞噬的災難。

CardData/Data/summary/E976BEE99EF0.eng: S.H.I.E.L.D. agent with specialized training in martial arts as well as firearms, often working alongside Captain America. After his disappearance while battling the Red Skull, she is leading efforts to locate him.
CardData/Data/summary/E976BEE99EF0.cht: 擅長使用各種武器的神盾局特工。

CardData/Data/summary/EA980448AFBA.eng: Traumatized by the murder of his family, the Punisher lives in a black-and-white world. The guilty must be punished, and the only punishment is death.
CardData/Data/summary/EA980448AFBA.cht: 家人慘遭殺害後深受打擊，後來便一直生活在黑白世界中的英雄。犯罪者就該受懲罰，唯一的懲罰就是死亡。

CardData/Data/summary/EAC8D1337490.eng: Known as the Son of Satan for his demonic ancestry, Hellstorm has great magical powers and a deep knowledge of the demonic realms.
CardData/Data/summary/EAC8D1337490.cht: 依照他的惡魔血統來看，據說是撒旦之子。具備可琢磨的魔力，對於惡魔的次元有相當淵博的知識。

CardData/Data/summary/EBF7765D3ECD.eng: A scientist working for the Kingpin, Dr. Jonathan Ohnn attempted to replicate the energy readings given off by Cloak. The experiment left his body riddled with black spots, each a pocket dimensional warp.

CardData/Data/summary/EEAAE70BA664.eng: Childhood friend of Steve Rogers, presumed lost for years before reappearing as the brainwashed Winter Soldier. Once his programming was broken, he became a member of the Avengers.
CardData/Data/summary/EEAAE70BA664.cht: 史蒂芬‧羅傑斯的老友。被視為失蹤數年，但後來以酷寒戰士的身分現身且是被洗腦的狀態。清醒後便加入復仇者的行列。

CardData/Data/summary/F11605CDD75A.eng: Maria Hill is a veteran S.H.I.E.L.D. agent and Nick Fury's trusted aide. She often serves as S.H.I.E.L.D.'s de facto leader when Fury is absent, and has the trust of the Avengers.
CardData/Data/summary/F11605CDD75A.cht: 他是一名老練的神盾局特工，同時也是尼克‧福瑞的輔佐官。尼克‧福瑞不在時，他會扮演神盾局的領導，並且深受復仇者信賴。

CardData/Data/summary/F5043BD9B590.eng: One of Asgard's famed Warriors Three, Fandral is a dashing swordsman and courageous ally to Thor, protecting Asgard against Hela's newest threats.
CardData/Data/summary/F5043BD9B590.cht: 跟隨雷神索爾的戰士三人組之一。以卓越的劍術實力，橫掃戰場的豪氣戰士。守著漸漸崩塌的阿斯嘉，等待著雷神索爾的到來。

CardData/Data/summary/F67377C6A63E.eng: Also known as the Viper, Madame Hydra is a lifelong member of Hydra who has also pursued alliances with the Hand and anyone she believes useful to her ultimate goal of world domination.
CardData/Data/summary/F67377C6A63E.cht: 使用致命劇毒來壓制對手的智慧型惡徒。優秀的戰略家，同時也擁有鍛練過的格鬥能力。

CardData/Data/summary/F6ACF473FFC6.eng: A tree-like alien from a world known only as Planet X, Groot is a loyal member of the Guardians of the Galaxy and has a particularly close relationship with Rocket Raccoon.
CardData/Data/summary/F6ACF473FFC6.cht: 來自X行星的未知世界的樹木外星人。星際異攻隊的一員，和火箭浣熊是摯友。

CardData/Data/summary/F7FD38CA620B.eng: Once a physicist renowned for his expertise in gamma radiation, Dr. Eliot Franklin became Thunderball when he joined the Wrecking Crew.

CardData/Data/summary/F967C6B8FD1C.eng: Dormammu's sister, with immense mystical and cosmic powers that are nearly a match for his. She has taken control of the Dark Dimension from him several times, but can never hold it.
CardData/Data/summary/F967C6B8FD1C.cht: 多瑪暮的妹妹，具備和他不相上下的力量。奧瑪擁有巨大與神祕的宇宙之力，多次從多瑪暮手中奪走黑暗次元的統治權。

CardData/Data/summary/FA32E7BEA8A7.eng: Matt Murdock's on-again, off-again love interest who along with Foggy Nelson provides him invaluable advice and support.
CardData/Data/summary/FA32E7BEA8A7.cht: 經常和馬修·梅鐸分分合合的戀人關係。和佛吉‧尼爾森對於他的建議與支援都毫不吝惜。

CardData/Data/summary/FB19F778541F.eng: Bitten by a radioactive spider, Peter Parker acquired the powers of a spider and became Spider-Man.
CardData/Data/summary/FB19F778541F.cht: 擁有各種蜘蛛能力的英雄。發射蜘蛛絲穿梭都市叢林，具備能感應危險的蜘蛛感官。

CardData/Data/summary/FC654F96E852.eng: Gwenpool believes that she has entered a comic-book universe from the "real" reality. She established herself as a dangerous (though goofy) fighter, though her only real superpower seems to be belief that she's a superhero.
CardData/Data/summary/FC654F96E852.cht: 「深信自己是從真實世界來到漫畫中的英雄。認為自己是危險(同時也是笨蛋)的打手，但事實上她最強大的超級威力讓她深信自己是超級英雄。」

CardData/Data/summary/FCD63ACD93C5.eng: Villain with invulnerable skin and claws, who tries sometimes to stay on the right side of the law but never quite manages it. When he goes bad, he fights with HYDRA.
CardData/Data/summary/FCD63ACD93C5.cht: 擁有幾乎無法穿破的堅硬皮膚與爪子的惡徒。

CardData/Data/summary/FDC869DBA9E4.eng: The Destroyer is a sentient, indestructible suit of armor created and enchanted by Odin himself to defend Asgard. Hela has gotten control of it in her quest to conquer the Nine Realms.
CardData/Data/summary/FDC869DBA9E4.cht: 奧丁創造的鎧甲。用尚未發現的金屬製作，會賦予奧丁的魔法。被想要統治九個王國的海拉利用，阻擋著英雄們的去路。

CardData/Data/text/0050AF2712C2.eng: Remove the special abilities of all enemies on the battlefield until the end of this battle. Deal {0} damage to all enemies. Remove from this battle after use
CardData/Data/text/0050AF2712C2.cht: 使戰場上所有敵人的特殊能力無效。對所有敵人造成{0}傷害。使用後，從這次戰鬥中排除。

CardData/Data/text/01487FFD591E.eng: On every turn, add ATK {0}, HP {1} to self by enraging at the thought of Thanos
CardData/Data/text/01487FFD591E.cht: 每回合想起薩諾斯，憤怒後攻擊力+{0}、體力+{1}

CardData/Data/text/01BB9F432F48.eng: On every turn, entice the enemy leader to discard 1 card from their hand
CardData/Data/text/01BB9F432F48.cht: 每回合誘惑敵方隊長，使其捨棄手中的1張卡片。

CardData/Data/text/02D6100817FE.eng: When Nebula attacks in a diagonal Battle Line, Nebula attacks additional time
CardData/Data/text/02D6100817FE.cht: 包含在對角線方向的戰線攻擊內時額外攻擊

CardData/Data/text/02DB29E41BDB.eng: On every turn, attack and deal {0} damage to a nearby enemy with the highest ATK
CardData/Data/text/02DB29E41BDB.cht: 每回合對攻擊力最強且近處的敵人造成{0}傷害

CardData/Data/text/04ACB8077CB4.eng: After summoning, deal {0}~{1} damage and shuffle 3 enemies with explosive gravity bombs
CardData/Data/text/04ACB8077CB4.cht: 召喚後，投擲重力炸彈，讓3名敵人的位置互相交換，並個別造成{0}~{1} 的傷害。

CardData/Data/text/04E8D602E7A7.eng: Deal {0}~{1} damage to one enemy on the same vertical line with a swift staff strike
CardData/Data/text/04E8D602E7A7.cht: 使用棍棒攻擊縱向同一行的1名敵人造成{0}~{1} 傷害

CardData/Data/text/05242516B04B.eng: Deal {0} damage each to 2 enemies with missiles
CardData/Data/text/05242516B04B.cht: 對2名敵人發射飛彈，造成{0}傷害

CardData/Data/text/066208FD347D.eng: Deal {0} damage each to all enemies placed in the same horizontal line by stomping on them
CardData/Data/text/066208FD347D.cht: 使用腳踩橫向同一行的所有敵人造成{0}傷害

CardData/Data/text/069B28462510.eng: On every turn, if there are enemies nearby, earn {0} cosmic fragments
CardData/Data/text/069B28462510.cht: 每回合在近處有敵人時，宇宙碎片+{0}

CardData/Data/text/07DF6D9D686E.eng: Deal {0}~{1} damage each to all characters in a selected cross area with Dormammu conjured Flames of the Faltine
CardData/Data/text/07DF6D9D686E.cht: 多瑪暮對指定的十字範圍施展強力的火花，個別造成{0}~{1}傷害

CardData/Data/text/092136204ABC.eng: Use Wakandan technology to deflect damage back to the source
CardData/Data/text/092136204ABC.cht: 受到來自特殊卡片能力造成的傷害時，不會受到傷害並且反射一半的傷害給對方。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/18C5C.eng: This won’t hurt too much…ahhh, who am I kidding? It’s gonna be excruciating!
CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/18C5C.cht: 小心我讓你一輩子在戰場上清理嘔吐物!

CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/1D11F.eng: It is the finest satisfaction to break the hopes of a brilliant enemy.
CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/1D11F.cht: 擊潰傲慢英雄的希望時就會非常高興。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/2D58B.eng: A word of advice: Don’t ever make the mistake of thinking you’re a step ahead of me.
CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/2D58B.cht: 在你認為自己贏的瞬間，就得向我跪下臣服。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/34C95.eng: You should've gone all in if you wanted a chance at beating Tony Stark.
CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/34C95.cht: 想要打贏東尼史塔克，就要賭上人生的一切。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/3AE92.eng: No one can stop his majesty Thanos!
CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/3AE92.cht: 向唯一偉大的薩諾斯大人宣誓效忠吧。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/40EBF.eng: Systems online and ready. Where’s the target?
CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/40EBF.cht: 系統啟動，填裝完畢。目標在哪裡呢？

CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/AC0EB.eng: There are some things worse than death. Believe me, I’ve seen them.
CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/AC0EB.cht: 有看過比死亡更可怕的景象嗎？

CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/DE92B.eng: Just a little sting. Then you won’t feel anything until you wake up on the Raft.
CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/DE92B.cht: 大概會有一點刺痛吧。你的神經很快就會麻痺，快點找地方躺吧。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/DF443.eng: Before you even know I’m here, you'll already be lost in the dark.
CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/DF443.cht: 你已經在黑暗中迷失了。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/EC8FD.eng: You stand accused. I will now pronounce your sentence.

CardRenewalData/Rewards/finishword/F2105.eng: I bring death, the only true experience of the infinite.

CardRenewalData/Rewards/msg/00A69EE8823D.eng: {0} became tiny with Pym Particles, then taught the enemy a lesson!
CardRenewalData/Rewards/msg/00A69EE8823D.cht: {0}利用光束粒子縮小後教訓了敵人！

CardRenewalData/Rewards/msg/3385E0C50AAE.cht: {0}從倒下的敵人身上抽取了力量！

CardRenewalData/Rewards/msg/42A933658E1F.eng: {0} blasted gravity bomb and threw enemies into the air!

CardRenewalData/Rewards/msg/57E583BEC2DE.eng: {0} grabbed an enemy and flew away from the battlefield!

CardRenewalData/Rewards/msg/75CE2D9226FE.eng: Dormammu's Flames of the Faltine scorched all enemies' abilities!
CardRenewalData/Rewards/msg/75CE2D9226FE.cht: 多瑪暮的魔火燃燒所有敵人的能力！

CardRenewalData/Rewards/msg/B7BD24334141.eng: Furious hellfire rushed across the battle field!

CardRenewalData/Rewards/msg/BF662E885878.eng: Allies united their will to fight the enemy!!
CardRenewalData/Rewards/msg/BF662E885878.cht: 所有我軍的意志聚集在一起，攻擊力增加了！

CardRenewalData/Rewards/msg/CFFA4FB3CC32.eng: {0} blasted the opponent with a powerful burst of energy!

CardRenewalData/Rewards/msg/D885AC09DBAB.eng: An arrow flew in from nowhere and pierced the enemy!
CardRenewalData/Rewards/msg/D885AC09DBAB.cht: 在看不見的地方飛來了弓箭！

CardRenewalData/Rewards/msg/ECBC37502D5B.eng: {1} was infected with the Techno-Organic Virus, disabling {1}'s ability.

CardRenewalData/Rewards/powers/10FC9F439.eng: Virtually unlimited phyiscal strength, near invulnerability to most attacks

CardRenewalData/Rewards/powers/256CE7746.eng: Skilled pilot, wide experience with projectile weapons and explosives
CardRenewalData/Rewards/powers/256CE7746.cht: 熟練的操縱師。有關槍械和爆裂物的淵博知識。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/powers/33DF43E73.eng: Extrasensory perception, creation of solid forms from darkness, Darkforce travel
CardRenewalData/Rewards/powers/33DF43E73.cht: 超感知的人工智能、擁有將黑暗成形的能力及移動至暗能次元。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/powers/6B81C7941.eng: Chain weapon; psychic powers; can create portals to Hell
CardRenewalData/Rewards/powers/6B81C7941.cht: 鎖鏈武器與靈力。召喚地獄門。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/powers/83AA059B7.eng: Immense strength, force projection and manipulation, flight, super-genius intellect

CardRenewalData/Rewards/powers/BAF663FD4.cht: 調整身體大小、飛行、能量波。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/powers/C5089A1A6.eng: Cutting edge weapons and technology in armored suit, scientific and tactical brilliance
CardRenewalData/Rewards/powers/C5089A1A6.cht: 裝備最高科技武器和技術的鋼鐵裝。科學與戰略方面卓越。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/powers/DFB343F63.eng: Advanced flight-capable armored suit with high-technology weapons
CardRenewalData/Rewards/powers/DFB343F63.cht: 搭載最尖端武器、可飛行的輕量裝甲。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/powers/F76441FE5.eng: Kree strength and agility; high-tech armor; Cosmi-Rod
CardRenewalData/Rewards/powers/F76441FE5.cht: 克里族的力量與敏捷性、尖端技術的盔甲和宇宙能量的武器。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/realName/1FC81D1.cht: 麥斯米蘭‧昆西‧庫羅里奇

CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/25AEB494.eng: Kree warrior known as the Accuser, on a galactic crusade to root out and destroy all who stand accused of offenses against the Kree Empire.
CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/25AEB494.cht: 以銀河系劊子手聞名的克里帝國的戰士。以將不滿克里帝國者就地正法的名義行使暴力。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/4172CD89.eng: The leader of the Avengers who fights in a variety of different armored suits of his own design. Arrogant and prickly, Stark is also personally loyal. He has thrown himself into the search for Captain America after the explosion of the Cosmic Cube.
CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/4172CD89.cht: 親手製作具備各種功能的裝甲戰鬥，是復仇者聯盟的領導者。雖然個性傲慢且難搞，但卻深具義氣。宇宙魔方體爆炸後，為了尋找美國隊長而東奔西走。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/817E7D8F.eng: The awesomely powerful Thanos, the Mad Titan, has ruled many worlds and destroyed many others. Now he has set his sights on Earth again, intrigued by the potential of the Cosmic Cube shards.

CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/95FC7CD5.eng: Ezekiel Stane is the son of the original Iron Monger, Obadiah Stane. He continues his father's vengeful crusade against Iron Man, using the latest in biotech augmentations to his own body.
CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/95FC7CD5.cht: 鐵霸王的兒子扎克·斯坦研究生命工學，並成功複製了自己。後來為了替父親復仇，便開始威脅鋼鐵人。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/A6C14E81.eng: A long-time friend (and occasional rival) of Tony Stark, Colonel James Rhodes has his own armored alter-ego, War Machine.
CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/A6C14E81.cht: 東尼史塔克的老朋友兼勁敵。詹姆士·羅德的另一人。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/B319D7F6.eng: The fifth spirit to become Ghost Rider is Robbie Reyes, who possesses the powers of the Penance Stare and control over hellfire.
CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/B319D7F6.cht: 5大惡靈戰警羅比．雷伊斯。根據罪的程度用懺悔的眼光和地獄火審判惡徒。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/C23D009D.eng: A blast of gamma rays transformed Bruce Banner's physiology, enabling him to transform into the raging green giant known as the Hulk. At first a force of pure destruction, the Hulk has learned over the years to control his temper...sometimes.

CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/DB02E71B.eng: Thor's half-brother and constant rival, Loki is a trickster god constantly torn between his desire for power and his impulse to sow chaos just for the delight of seeing the results. But even he doesn't want to see Asgard fall under Hela's influence.
CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/DB02E71B.cht: 雷神索爾同父異母的兄弟兼永遠的勁敵。是在對權力的慾望及想散布混亂的衝動之間糾結不已的欺騙之神。阿斯嘉無法忍受敗在海拉手中而開始行動。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/E6D5EA47.eng: A founding member of the Avengers (who she also named), Wasp has learned how to make devastating use of her Pym particle-created powers.
CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/E6D5EA47.cht: 復仇者的創立成員。可將光束粒子的力量提升到最大，縮小身體的大小並發射光束。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/EEF146FD.eng: The Shroud has powers over darkness and the Darkforce, and uses them to fight crime and evil on his own terms.
CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/EEF146FD.cht: 利用黑暗與黑暗原力的力量對付惡徒。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/F9B6DEBC.eng: Small but pugnacious alien who resembles a raccoon -- though he doesn't know what a raccoon is. A skilled pilot and lover of every kind of gun.
CardRenewalData/Rewards/summary/F9B6DEBC.cht: 長得像浣熊，嬌小且充滿魅力的外星人。雖然他大概不清楚浣熊長什麼樣子。他是一名熟練的操縱師，喜愛全部的槍械。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/text/0050AF2712C.eng: Remove the special abilities of all enemies on the board until the end of this battle. Deal {0} damage to all enemies. Remove from this battle after use
CardRenewalData/Rewards/text/0050AF2712C.cht: 使戰場上所有敵人的特殊能力無效。對所有敵人造成{0}傷害。使用後，從這次戰鬥中排除。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/text/011900552EB.cht: 對2名敵人發射飛彈，造成{0}~{1}傷害

CardRenewalData/Rewards/text/05CD73AE2DE.cht: 讓身體縮小，對近處的1名敵人依照其體力{0}~{1}%造成傷害，並且返回原來的位置。

CardRenewalData/Rewards/text/0B5B1841C62.eng: Drain the HP of all characters below {0} HP to {1} and add half of amount drained to ATK by channeling the will of Lei Kung
