CardRenewalData/Rewards/text/E5B19B1D3B6.cht: 名射手對指定的敵人發射弓箭，造成{0}~{1}傷害。使用後，從這次戰鬥中排除。

CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.eng: The Guardians of the Galaxy, a ragtag group of cosmic adventurers, protect the universe from threats all across space. They've come to Earth's aid after hearing about the explosion of the Cosmic Cube.
CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.cht: 由宇宙冒險家組成的烏合之眾團體，星際異攻隊會遊走於全宇宙，並保護這個世界。

CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.eng: S.H.I.E.L.D., aka the Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division, is dealing with paranormal and superhuman threats.
CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.cht: 戰略危險干預與諜報後勤處S.H.I.E.L.D.是為了與超自然、超人類的威脅對抗而活動的組織。

CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.eng: Gods and inhabitants of Asgard, the highest of the Nine Realms. After Hela's attack on their city, they have joined the cause to protect the Universe from the chaos the shattered Cosmic Cube has wrought.
CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.cht: 九個王國中，位於最高處的阿斯嘉，眾神就住在那裡。都市遭受海拉的攻擊後，為了解決宇宙魔方帶來的混亂而引起的問題，投入了拯救世界的行列。

CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.eng: As the rules of the super-powered Inhuman race, the Royal Family’s priority is first and foremost the protection and survival of their people.
CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.cht: 根據強大的異人族紀律來看，異人族王室最重要的任務就是國民的生存與保護國民。

CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.eng: The Defenders protect the streets of New York, fending off villains attacking the city in their quest for Cosmic Cube shards.
CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.cht: 捍衛者聯盟阻止企圖取得宇宙碎片的惡徒，並且保護整個紐約。

CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.eng: The Masters of the Mystic Arts have control over magical and supernatural forces. Some use these forces for the protection of earth, while others have been seduced by darker, more sinister powers.
CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.cht: 可以控制魔法能量與超自然力量的魔法師們。部分魔法師受到黑暗與邪惡的力量支配時，另一群魔法師則為了守護地球而奉獻己力。

CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.eng: Earth's Mightiest Heroes! Led by Captain America, the Avengers were the first to arrive at the scene where Red Skull attempted to steal the Cosmic Cube.
CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.cht: 地球最強的英雄們！紅骷髏試圖搶奪宇宙魔方時，美國隊長所帶領的復仇者最先到達現場。

CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.eng: S.H.I.E.L.D., aka the Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division, is a law enforcement and counter-terrorism agency dedicated to dealing with paranormal and superhuman threats.
CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.cht: 戰略危險干預與諜報後勤處S.H.I.E.L.D.是為了與超自然、超人類的威脅對抗，執行法律及反恐行動的組織。

CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.eng: Protectors of Wakanda, a high-tech, vibrabium-rich African nation led by the Black Panther.
CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.cht: 在黑豹的統治下，守護擁有尖端技術與豐富汎合金資源的非洲國家瓦干達的戰士們。

CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.eng: Led by the Red Skull, Hydra is a subversive, clandestine organization dedicated dominating the world with the help of the Cosmic Cube.
CollectionData/Collection/TeamDescriptio.cht: 紅骷髏率領的九頭蛇利用宇宙魔方的力量顛覆體制，並且以支配世界為目標，是一個秘密組織。

EventModeStageData/Data/Comment/30E0816F.eng: Green goblin must be up to something… but what is this pumpkin doing here?
EventModeStageData/Data/Comment/30E0816F.cht: 綠惡魔用龐大的兵力威脅玩家！但他的弱點很快就暴露了…

EventModeStageData/Data/Comment/39775952.eng: Rhino must be up to something… but what is this pumpkin doing here?
EventModeStageData/Data/Comment/39775952.cht: 犀牛人用龐大的兵力威脅玩家！但他的弱點很快就暴露了…

EventModeStageData/Data/Comment/5341A258.eng: Sandman must be up to something… but what is this pumpkin doing here?
EventModeStageData/Data/Comment/5341A258.cht: 沙人用龐大兵力威脅玩家！但他的弱點很快就暴露了…

EventModeStageData/Data/Comment/5D945298.eng: Shocker must be up to something… but what is this pumpkin doing here?
EventModeStageData/Data/Comment/5D945298.cht: 震盪者用龐大的兵力威脅玩家！但他的弱點很快就暴露了…

EventModeStageData/Data/Comment/747AD969.eng: Dagger needs your help to infiltrate the Hydra Base.
EventModeStageData/Data/Comment/747AD969.cht: 必須需幫助匕首潛入九頭蛇的根據地。

EventModeStageData/Data/Comment/A380FED4.eng: Help Dagger's escape to complete the mission.
EventModeStageData/Data/Comment/A380FED4.cht: 幫助匕首逃脫完成任務！

EventModeStageData/Data/Comment/D4039919.eng: Dagger is still in need of your help.

EventModeStageGroupData/Data/Comment/3B2.eng: Massive amount of EMP explosives have entered New York. Stop Hydra with Dagger!
EventModeStageGroupData/Data/Comment/3B2.cht: 大量EMP爆裂物進入紐約了。和匕首一起阻止九頭蛇的陰謀吧！

EventModeStageGroupData/Data/Comment/C05.eng: Fight the foes to save the ally
EventModeStageGroupData/Data/Comment/C05.cht: 解救被敵軍包圍的我軍！

EventModeStageGroupData/Data/Comment/C70.eng: Get ready to befriend one of the most dangerous explosives

EventQuestData/Data/Desc/ECC98347C76B.eng: Level up to earn Card Packs!

EventQuestData/Data/Desc/FD34C872E311.eng: Complete the 7 Day Check-in/Attendance Challenge and receive a Spider-Man (Black Suit) Leader!
EventQuestData/Data/Desc/FD34C872E311.cht: 於活動時間內簽到時，將可獲得蜘蛛人(黑裝)隊長卡。

EventQuestMissionData/Data/Desc/947E54BF.eng: Receive your Card reward by reaching level 10. You will get three cards from the S.H.I.E.L.D. collection.
EventQuestMissionData/Data/Desc/947E54BF.cht: 達成等級10並獲得獎勵卡片。開啟後可獲得神盾局的卡片3張。

EventQuestMissionData/Data/Desc/953E54BF.eng: Receive your Card reward by reaching level 20. You will get three cards from the Guardians of The Galaxy collection.
EventQuestMissionData/Data/Desc/953E54BF.cht: 達成等級20並獲得獎勵卡片。開啟後可獲得星際異攻隊的卡片2張。

EventQuestMissionData/Data/Desc/CC45CC45.eng: Receive your Card reward by reaching level 30. You will get three cards from the Avengers collection.
EventQuestMissionData/Data/Desc/CC45CC45.cht: 達成等級30並獲得獎勵卡片。開啟後可獲得復仇者的卡片1張。

LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/01B7D0195977.eng: I will grind you under my heel, and move on./I will show you your weakness./Witness true power./The strength of a Titan will overpower you!/Now the battle has truly begun.
LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/01B7D0195977.cht: 我會狠狠把你踩在腳下。/我會讓你看見你的軟弱。/睜大眼睛見識真正的力量吧。/泰坦族的力量會將會壓倒你！/真正的戰鬥現在才開始！

LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/416393AC1112.eng: It's always the right time to go on offense./You think you're ready? Think again./I have to fight for what's right./Trust me, you're not ready for this./So many choices of how to put you down.
LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/416393AC1112.cht: 沒理由拖延攻擊。/以為準備好了嗎？再思考一下。/我是為了正確的事而戰。/你要相信我說的話，你還沒做好戰鬥準備。/我有太多能打敗你的方法，真傷腦筋。

LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/49E24DDEA8AF.eng: You're in for a shock./Can't hit what you can't catch./I might be small, but I pack a big punch./It's on./You looking for a fight? You got it.
LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/49E24DDEA8AF.cht: 你一定會非常吃驚！/抓不到的東西當然也打不著。/辣椒是越小越辣！/我要拿出真本事嘍！/你在找人戰鬥嗎？跟我打一場吧！

LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/5A6E43ABEBF7.eng: Even in attack, you show your weakness./If I do not land the first blow, I strike back all the harder./Attack with purpose, defend with resolve./Now I prove myself worthy of the mantle of Black Panther./There is nothing to fear. Stand strong.
LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/5A6E43ABEBF7.cht: 露出破綻了呢。/我對挑戰的反擊會更加劇烈。/利用意志攻擊，帶著決心防禦。/我會證明我擁有擔任黑豹的資格。/不需要害怕，放馬過來吧。

LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/5B571B5EFEBD.eng: Let's make it count./Yeah, bring it on!/Let’s see if you can put up a fight!/I'd rather throw a punch than take one./You want to dance? Check out my moves.
LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/5B571B5EFEBD.cht: 用得分來連接吧。/用這股氣勢趁勝追擊！/讓我見識你的能耐～/比起挨打，我的個性比較適合攻擊。/要不要跳支舞？好好欣賞我的舞姿。

LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/79081FA11EE6.eng: You're the fly… and you're in my web!/Ooh, it's getting real./This is where I swing into action./Someone's going to get punched out./I'm right here. Come at me!
LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/79081FA11EE6.cht: 怎麼辦呢?你似乎是被我的蜘蛛絲纏住的蒼蠅呢！/哇，真不簡單?/帥氣拉著蜘蛛絲登場的時刻到了！/今天某人應該昏倒吧!/在這邊呢！放馬過來吧！

LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/9DF37CD0E6FB.eng: Things are about to get up close and personal./You're used to scaring people, but you don't scare me./You can't hit me… but I can hit you./You wanted action, right? Well, here it is./I trained for this. You think you're ready?
LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/9DF37CD0E6FB.cht: 覺悟吧！因為這件事很快就會發生在你身上。/你似乎四處在嚇唬人，但我一點都不害怕。/你無法靠近我…但我卻把你掌握在手中。/你不是想看精彩的動作片嗎？你在做什麼？不是在這裡嗎？/這就是訓練的目的呀，準備好了嗎？

LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/B88CD04CE96D.eng: Battles are won in the attack. Not your attack--mine./I wield the Odinforce!/You would contest the power of Mjolnir?/Do you think yourself worthy to battle Thor Odinson?/For Asgard and glory!
LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/B88CD04CE96D.cht: 戰鬥不是靠防禦取勝而是靠攻擊。/奧丁之力與我同在！/竟敢和雷神之鎚的力量對抗？/你以為自己有資格和奥丁之子雷神索爾交手嗎？/為了阿斯嘉和榮耀！

LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/D3CAF553583B.eng: Yeah, let's see what you got./I'm ready to fight./Time for a little mayhem!/Here's where we find out who walks the walk./Looking for a fight? You're gonna get it.
LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/D3CAF553583B.cht: 好，讓我見識你的實力吧。/我已經做好戰鬥準備。/要不要大戰一場？/來看看是誰在耍嘴皮子！/你在尋找真正的戰鬥嗎？我帶來了。

LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/DE6E2F6C52BA.eng: Time to take a shot./Worried yet? You should be./I’m just getting started./Back to the punching and blasting./I'm powered up!
LeaderData/Data/AttackMove/DE6E2F6C52BA.cht: 好，一口氣擊飛對手！/你擔心嗎？你最好擔心一下吧！/我才剛開始。/再動一動身體吧。/充電完畢！

LeaderData/Data/Attackword/0A58203A7D38.eng: Share my distress! You will suffer tremendously!
LeaderData/Data/Attackword/0A58203A7D38.cht: 我要分享痛苦！一定會非常痛！

LeaderData/Data/Attackword/11EFD7086DA1.eng: Come! Suffer your share of pain!
LeaderData/Data/Attackword/11EFD7086DA1.cht: 你也該承受一下我受到的苦痛吧？

LeaderData/Data/Attackword/1401FB600901.eng: Sorry! This might sting a little!

LeaderData/Data/Attackword/26BBE4E5AF32.eng: This is your last warning, Leave!

LeaderData/Data/Attackword/32EF6EF79415.eng: The world will rise again under my power!
LeaderData/Data/Attackword/32EF6EF79415.cht: 我以女王的權利重新創造世界！

LeaderData/Data/Attackword/4B1C2687A710.eng: I give you credit for standing this one!
LeaderData/Data/Attackword/4B1C2687A710.cht: 如果能撐過，我就稍微認同你！

LeaderData/Data/Attackword/72A53C2626BA.eng: Hah! Come ‘n get me if you can! You need my address?
LeaderData/Data/Attackword/72A53C2626BA.cht: 哈！不服氣就來找我啊！要告訴你地址嗎？

LeaderData/Data/Attackword/901DA0ACD3DA.eng: Battles are won in the attack. Not your attack--mine.
LeaderData/Data/Attackword/901DA0ACD3DA.cht: 戰鬥要靠攻擊獲勝，不是靠防禦。

LeaderData/Data/Attackword/D99808ED05DA.eng: Feel the infinite force that balances the universe!
LeaderData/Data/Attackword/D99808ED05DA.cht: 用全身去感覺宇宙的無限力量吧！

LeaderData/Data/Attackword/FC4AFACF8554.eng: Cool right? Don't be impressed, You're really not my type.
LeaderData/Data/Attackword/FC4AFACF8554.cht: 很帥吧？別迷上我，你並不是我喜歡的類型。

LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/073B7FCDC376.eng: Hang on. What about…/Ooh, I have an idea./I bet there’s a better way./Let’s try this instead.
LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/073B7FCDC376.cht: 等一下，這個怎麼樣呢？/等等！我有好主意。/應該會有更好的方法。/試著用這個吧！

LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/087E531E937E.eng: Always keep ‘em guessing./Let’s spring a surprise./Here’s a new idea./This might work./Time to change things up a bit.
LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/087E531E937E.cht: 必須一直讓敵人抱持疑惑…/要不要嚇唬他們一下呢?/這是新的主意。/不知道這方法是否可行。/是改變狀況的時機。

LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/10AF08DD51A7.eng: I have a better idea./I'm going to try something else./Maybe this…/Going to Plan B.
LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/10AF08DD51A7.cht: 我有更好的方法。/我想試試其他的。/這個如何…/我們執行B計劃吧。

LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/2403ED90406C.eng: A different path forward…/There is always a better way./Yes, good…/Let us see…
LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/2403ED90406C.cht: 選擇稍微不同的路。/因為有更好的路。/嗯，很好…/我瞧瞧…

LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/2B59F28C5683.eng: Here’s a different idea./What if we try… this?/I think we need something new./Let’s change it up a little.
LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/2B59F28C5683.cht: 我有其他想法。/用它看看如何？/感覺需要來點新花樣。/要不要給點變化？

LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/5873698A5430.eng: A new plan of battle./Time to change tactics./I see another angle./This may be better.
LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/5873698A5430.cht: 這是新的戰略。/該是改變戰術的時候了。/看見其他方案了。/這樣會更好。

LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/73B0193F9241.eng: We're gonna try something else./Oh yeah, that’s good./Trading up./Let’s see…
LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/73B0193F9241.cht: 我們能試試別的嗎？/好，這樣很好。/交換中。/我瞧瞧…

LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/8272A5A0CDC6.eng: I see another way forward…/May Odin be with me./Forge a new path!/We shall see…
LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/8272A5A0CDC6.cht: 我看見另一條路…/願奥丁與我同在。/我要開拓新的道路！/我瞧瞧...

LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/CD62722C5D44.eng: Here’s another angle./What if…?/Hey, I have an idea./This’ll be better. Maybe.
LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/CD62722C5D44.cht: 好，從其他角度接近吧。/這個方法怎麼樣呢？/我有好主意。/這樣會比較好吧。大概吧？

LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/DECE0939D160.eng: I have a better idea!/New plan!/Let’s try something else./How about… this?
LeaderData/Data/CardSwitch/DECE0939D160.cht: 我有更好的辦法！/新的計劃！/試試其他的。/嗯… 這個如何？

LeaderData/Data/Desc/25C4D1A35B51.eng: {0} additional Leader HP. \nOn every turn, if owned cosmic fragments are {1} or more, increase value of a cosmic fragments on field by {2}
LeaderData/Data/Desc/25C4D1A35B51.cht: 開始體力增加{0}，\n每回合，保有的宇宙魔方為{1}個以上時，戰場的宇宙碎片將會成長{2}個。

LeaderData/Data/Desc/3D2E607539BA.eng: {0} additional Leader HP. \nAdd {1}~{2} HP to characters with 0 cost through S.H.I.E.L.D.'s training program
LeaderData/Data/Desc/3D2E607539BA.cht: 開始體力增加{0}，\n神盾局的訓練，可讓沒有費用的我軍角色的體力+{1}~{2}。

LeaderData/Data/Desc/4B95121DB282.cht: 開始體力增加200，\n每回合的體力在300以下時，對戰場的所有敵人造成 50 傷害

LeaderData/Data/Desc/6715C92C0EFF.eng: {0} additional Leader HP. \nOn every turn, consume {1} cosmic fragments to instantly knock out all enemies
LeaderData/Data/Desc/6715C92C0EFF.cht: 開始體力增加{0}，\n每回合，使用{1}個宇宙碎片，使所有敵人的角色暈眩。

LeaderData/Data/Desc/841A78573ACE.eng: {0} additional Leader HP. \nDeal {1}~{2} damage to an enemy after moving an ally
LeaderData/Data/Desc/841A78573ACE.cht: 開始體力增加{0}，\n我軍角色移動後，給予1名敵人{1}~{2}傷害

LeaderData/Data/Desc/841AFABE185A.eng: {0} additional Leader HP. \nAdd {1} ATK to all allies after a successful Battle Line Attack
LeaderData/Data/Desc/841AFABE185A.cht: 開始體力增加{0}，\n戰線攻擊成功時，我的所有角色的攻擊+ {1}

LeaderData/Data/Desc/90EEE4E408B9.eng: {0} additional Leader HP. \nOn every turn, if Leader HP is lower than {1}, deal {2} damage to all enemies on battlefield
LeaderData/Data/Desc/90EEE4E408B9.cht: 開始體力增加{0}，\n每回合，體力低於{1}以下時，對戰場的所有敵人造成{2}傷害。

LeaderData/Data/Desc/BB6775C268CA.eng: {0} additional Leader HP. \nAction cards that are removed from game after use may return to library at {1}% chance
LeaderData/Data/Desc/BB6775C268CA.cht: 開始體力增加{0}，\n使用後，使用會被排除的動作卡片時，有{1}%的機率不會被除外並返還至書庫。

LeaderData/Data/Desc/C5275727472D.eng: {0} additional Leader HP. \nOn every turn, if one or more enemies are recharging on battlefield, take {1} cosmic fragment from opponent
LeaderData/Data/Desc/C5275727472D.cht: 開始體力增加{0}，\n每回合，若有充電狀態的敵人，奪取敵人的宇宙碎片{1}個。

LeaderData/Data/Desc/D00F4628138D.eng: {0} additional Leader HP. \nAdd {2}~{3} HP to an ally after using a card with cost {1} or higher
LeaderData/Data/Desc/D00F4628138D.cht: 開始體力增加{0}，\n使用費用 {1}以上的卡片時，我的1名角色的體力增加{2}~{3}

LeaderData/Data/Desc/E1887E04607C.eng: Ally characters that are included within a horizontal/vertical/diagonal match with 3 or more slots receive a HP boost by 30%. At the point when the match is broken, reduce HP by 30%.
LeaderData/Data/Desc/E1887E04607C.cht: 製造橫向/縱向/對角線3格以上的我軍角色體力增加30%。若是無法維持3格以上，體力就會減少30%。

LeaderData/Data/Desc/F9284EC8D116.eng: On every turn, decrease own leader HP by {1}~{2}. Add {3} ATK to all allies with Symbiote Powers.
LeaderData/Data/Desc/F9284EC8D116.cht: 每回合體力減少{1}~{2}，以共生體的力量使我軍角色的攻擊力+ {3}

LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackword/01A0D4D.eng: WE are the guardians of the galaxy!
LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackword/01A0D4D.cht: 哇！就是為了這個而活啊！

LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackword/16E4E02.cht: 會為了瓦干達而被使用的！

LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackword/1B73234.eng: I'm the power in this city!
LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackword/1B73234.cht: 我是這座城市的掌權者金霸王！

LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackword/2BAFAE6.eng: Lost in the endless abyss, shadow of death shall devour your soul.
LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackword/2BAFAE6.cht: 吞噬死亡之影，陷入深淵的奈落吧！

LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackword/59BFC02.cht: 那股膽識就藏在心中吧！

LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackword/5FF756D.eng: Hey! You've left this spot unguarded!
LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackword/5FF756D.cht: 根本就看不見破綻。世界並沒有想像中的簡單！

LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackword/71566E5.cht: 真是放肆！化為宇宙的塵埃吧！

LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackWord/C4E8D6E.cht: 依照設計一樣完美的結局！

LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackWord/C4E8D6E.eng: The final blow of any battle is the sweetest.
LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackWord/C4E8D6E.cht: 不管是哪一種戰鬥，最後一擊總是最爽快的。

LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackWord/C4E8D6E.eng: Finally, filling up my stomach! Outrageous! Extraordinary … excitement!
LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackWord/C4E8D6E.cht: 現在終於能填飽肚子了！開心到快要發瘋了！

LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackWord/C4E8D6E.eng: See, this is how I take responsibility for my great power!
LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackWord/C4E8D6E.cht: 擁有多大的力量，就有多大的責任！

LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackword/C6B1957.cht: 結束了。收尾要乾淨俐落！

LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackword/D1696FD.eng: Cry and beg now! We'll kill you as mercifully as we can!
LeaderData/Data/FinishAttackword/D1696FD.cht: 樣子還真是難看！再來！再來！更加痛苦吧！

LeaderData/Data/FinishingAttack/1D1F74E3.eng: This is the moment of triumph!

LeaderData/Data/FinishingAttack/851318F1.cht: 有沒有聞到什麼味道？勝利的香味！

LeaderData/Data/FinishingAttack/A13BE604.eng: Oh, this is going to leave a mark.

LeaderData/Data/FinishingAttack/A52ED708.eng: The final blow is the sweetest!

LeaderData/Data/FinishingAttack/D3EF2B6E.eng: Get up so I can hit you again!
LeaderData/Data/FinishingAttack/D3EF2B6E.cht: 站起來！還得繼續挨打呀！

LeaderData/Data/FinishingAttack/DAB646F4.eng: Lost in the endless abyss, shadow of death shall devour your soul.
LeaderData/Data/FinishingAttack/DAB646F4.cht: 吞噬死亡之影，陷入深淵的奈落吧！

LeaderData/Data/FinishingAttack/DF45C785.eng: This is the end, right here!

LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/1B256DCDDF6B.eng: Better grab this before someone else does./Oh! That’s… powerful./What’s this?/Whoa, there’s a lot of power in these.
LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/1B256DCDDF6B.cht: 在落入他人之手之前必須先占為己有。/哦！這… 好強大/這是什麼？/哇，這股力量真驚人～

LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/24F8A963F63D.eng: Ahh… the first surge of mighty power./I must have more!/These will be quite useful./Now the power gathers in me…
LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/24F8A963F63D.cht: 啊…前所未有的巨大力量！/再多帶一點來！/應該非常好用。/力量不斷凝聚在我身上…

LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/2FE25BE248BD.eng: Better not let someone else get this./Oh, I think these will come in handy./Now I know how Thor feels all the time./Better grab these every chance I get.
LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/2FE25BE248BD.cht: 這個東西不能落入其他人手中。/噢，這看起來很有用處的樣子。/現在終於能夠了解雷神索爾是怎樣的狀態了。/有機會一定要全部收集。

LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/35BE2A28D293.eng: These are very powerful./I must keep these from the enemy./Are these what I think they are…? Ah. Yes./I can find a use for these.
LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/35BE2A28D293.cht: 這個非常強大。/看來得小心別被奪走才行。/是我想像的那樣嗎？啊，原來如此。/我知道關鍵的使用方法。

LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/3B98D60EE8A6.eng: I'm not gonna lie. I like this./Give me more!/I'm feeling something… intense!/Powered up!
LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/3B98D60EE8A6.cht: 我不會說謊。這些真的是最好的。/再多給我一點！再給我一些！/感覺到強大的力量！/力量提升！

LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/41E30BF2B242.eng: Well, looky here./Wow. These things pack a punch./Think I’m gonna start a collection…/Where can I get more of these?
LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/41E30BF2B242.cht: 嗯…這真是太神奇了。/噢，這真是太強了。/現在正式開始收集吧。/還能在哪取得呢？

LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/582302FB9D60.eng: Oh, now this is a feeling I could get used to./Power surge!/Wow. Where can I get more of those?/I feel tingly.
LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/582302FB9D60.cht: 哇，感覺真棒！/力量不斷湧入！/哇。這些東西，要去哪裡才能再取得？/好辣喔。

LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/9218E6A518F7.eng: Interesting… Such great power./I would have more of these./I feel a new strength coursing through me./What is this…?
LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/9218E6A518F7.cht: 真有意思…好驚人的力量。/真希望能擁有更多。/全新的力量滲入我的體內。/這是什麼…？

LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/A259BE3DD264.eng: Hey, check this out…/Whoa, this is… potent./Yow. Are there more of these things?/Yeah! I’m just getting started.
LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/A259BE3DD264.cht: 喂，快看看這個！/哇...這是真的耶？/哇，還有嗎？/太棒了！現在才開始。

LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/B3CF75B75C50.eng: Whoa. That’s…powerful./We want more./Oh, yeah. Where do we get more?/We like it.
LeaderData/Data/FirstShard/B3CF75B75C50.cht: 哇，好驚人的力量。/我們想擁有更多。/哦哦，很好。這東西哪裡還能取得？/我們非常喜歡。

LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/03245.eng: Patience./This power is almost mine./I must wait a little longer./I can’t… at least not yet.
LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/03245.cht: 必須等待。/再等一下，這力量就是我的了。/必須再忍一下。/至少現在還…不能使用。

LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/204C7.eng: Nope./No dice./Not gonna work./Can’t do it.
LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/204C7.cht: 不行。/現在不能使用。/不可能。/沒辦法使用。

LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/24917.eng: Almost…/Can’t do that yet./Hmm, not yet./Pretty soon.
LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/24917.cht: 再過一下子就能使用了。/還不能用。/嗯，還不行。/再忍一下。

LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/28BB3.eng: If only./Not quite yet./Biting off more than I can chew here./Save that one for later.
LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/28BB3.cht: 如果能使用那就太好了。/現在有點困難。/要使用這個還太勉強。/為了以後，先保留吧。

LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/28C79.eng: This power is yet beyond me./Even I cannot do this./I lack the power./I must gather more power.
LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/28C79.cht: 還難以招架這股力量。/連我都有困難。/我需要更多力量。/再收集一下力量吧。

LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/5691C.eng: Aw, man, I can’t./Power’s not great enough yet./Have to wait on that one./Another time.
LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/5691C.cht: 啊，那個現在還無法使用。/還沒有足夠的力量。/看來必須等一下。/之後再試試看吧。

LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/81CFC.eng: That’s a little too much./Not quite there yet./Need a little more power./Hmm. Almost but not quite.
LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/81CFC.cht: 那有點勉強。/力量還不夠。/必須有更多力量。/嗯。就快到了，但要再等一下。

LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/9B043.eng: This is beyond my grasp./I cannot./I must try something else./This is too much…for now.
LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/9B043.cht: 已經脫離可採取措施的範圍了。/沒辦法辦到。/嘗試其他方法吧。/這太棘手了...現在...

LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/9FD68.eng: No can do./That’s not going to work./Have to try something else./Can’t quite do it.
LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/9FD68.cht: 不可能！/不會那樣運作的！/看來得做些其他嘗試才行。/糟糕，不太順利嗎？

LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/AFB42.eng: Don’t think I can do that yet./Have to come back to this idea./Maybe later./Not yet.
LeaderData/Data/InsufficientShards/AFB42.cht: 似乎還不行的樣子。/這項計畫之後再試一次吧。/之後再試一次吧。/現在不可能。

LeaderData/Data/MatchingScene/49B4095F3F.eng: Ah. This ought to be interesting.

LeaderData/Data/MatchingScene/52D4F78FF7.eng: Buckle up. The show's about to start.
LeaderData/Data/MatchingScene/52D4F78FF7.cht: 安全帶扣緊一點。表演現在開始。

LeaderData/Data/MatchingScene/7CA9A9A280.eng: There's always a weakness. The trick is to find it.
LeaderData/Data/MatchingScene/7CA9A9A280.cht: 任何人都有弱點，找出該弱點就要憑實力。

LeaderData/Data/MatchingScene/8B83CE17C3.eng: These chumps? This one's in the bag.
LeaderData/Data/MatchingScene/8B83CE17C3.cht: 這些小毛頭？眼看就要贏了。

LeaderData/Data/MatchingScene/AFF54A4DD8.eng: Fight with honor and let the result fall where it may.
LeaderData/Data/MatchingScene/AFF54A4DD8.cht: 光榮地戰鬥，臣服於結果！

LeaderData/Data/MatchingScene/DB408F4C5B.eng: This'll be a piece of cake.
LeaderData/Data/MatchingScene/DB408F4C5B.cht: 這種事根本就易如反掌。

LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/0CEDE941B893.eng: The only good thing about losing is it teaches you how to win next time.
LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/0CEDE941B893.cht: 慘痛失敗的唯一的優點就是，它會告訴你將來該怎麼做才能贏。

LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/27705D22A9B7.eng: I'm speaking with the utmost sincerity when I say that sucked.
LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/27705D22A9B7.cht: 雖然不想承認，但老實說這真的很可疑。

LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/288AAF2BE8B4.eng: Forget it and move on. The only fight that matters is the next fight.
LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/288AAF2BE8B4.cht: 快點忘記並進入下一場戰鬥吧，真正重要的只有下一場戰鬥而已。

LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/3143353E9033.eng: Feel the rage of defeat, and transform it into the fuel of victory.
LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/3143353E9033.cht: 體驗落敗的憤怒吧。將那股憤怒化作動力取勝吧。

LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/63FBE196D0CD.eng: Next time they'll wish they'd never been born.
LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/63FBE196D0CD.cht: 下次見面時，我會讓你後悔自己的出生。

LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/68EC1AC2FE76.eng: Okay. Not the end of the world. Get stronger and get back to it.
LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/68EC1AC2FE76.cht: 沒關係，又不是世界末日。變得更強再戰就好。

LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/7B639469D8AC.eng: There's no teacher better than failure.
LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/7B639469D8AC.cht: 沒有比失敗更優秀的師父了。

LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/8649AFDAF1AF.eng: I did not see that coming.
LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/8649AFDAF1AF.cht: 我完全沒想到會變成這樣！

LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/911772996680.eng: Another day will come, and with it redemption.
LeaderData/Data/MatchLoss/911772996680.cht: 總有一天恢復名譽的日子會再次來臨。

LeaderData/Data/MatchWin/2E99C14BEA38.eng: Who loves a winner? I know I do.

LeaderData/Data/MatchWin/6FFD754C1550.eng: Not to brag or anything, but that was pretty sweet.
LeaderData/Data/MatchWin/6FFD754C1550.cht: 雖然沒什麼好炫耀的，但剛才還是挺帥氣的吧?

LeaderData/Data/MatchWin/7E24F070B309.eng: In victory we do our ancestors honor.
LeaderData/Data/MatchWin/7E24F070B309.cht: 用這份勝利提升祖先們的名譽吧!

LeaderData/Data/MatchWin/ABB8D5FC4F3B.eng: Rah rah, backslapping, et cetera. Put it in the win column.
LeaderData/Data/MatchWin/ABB8D5FC4F3B.cht: 好了好了，稱讚就免了，只需寫下是我贏了就好。

LeaderData/Data/MatchWin/B8B284B74732.eng: First rule is: I always win.
LeaderData/Data/MatchWin/B8B284B74732.cht: 交戰的第一項規則就是，我們永遠是獲勝的一方 。

LeaderData/Data/MatchWin/D44E003067F0.eng: I can't take all the credit for that win… but I'll take some of it.
LeaderData/Data/MatchWin/D44E003067F0.cht: 雖然不能說是我表現得好才獲勝，但我做得很好對吧？

LeaderData/Data/MatchWin/E4AC82C91736.eng: Who can withstand me? No one.
LeaderData/Data/MatchWin/E4AC82C91736.cht: 要和我交手的人是誰？空無一人。

LeaderData/Data/MatchWin/F387F6A76E92.eng: Victory is the true proof of valor.
LeaderData/Data/MatchWin/F387F6A76E92.cht: 勝利是真正的英勇的證據。

LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/03E8B4D071.eng: I cannot hold more power./I must absorb no more./This energy…it blazes within me!/I can barely contain this power.
LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/03E8B4D071.cht: 已經無法承受更強大的力量了。/無法再吸收了。/體內的力量不斷湧現。/已經無法控制了。

LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/5731E5F84A.eng: Any more would be too much./Max power. Time to cut loose./I’ve hit the limit./I don’t think I can get any stronger.
LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/5731E5F84A.cht: 再撿下去要滿出來了。/已經達到最大值了，必須先使用一部分。/達到極限了。/似乎沒辦法變得更強。

LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/5AB529CE84.eng: No more, thanks./I’ve got all I can handle./We need to use some of these first./Where would I put them?
LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/5AB529CE84.cht: 夠了，我拒絕。/這已經是我所能擁有的上限。/我得先從擁有的開始使用。/該放在哪裡呢？

LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/6A4749E562.eng: That’s all we can handle./Full up./Need to use some of these now./Now we’ll put some of these to work.
LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/6A4749E562.cht: 這是我們所能承擔的最大量。/已經滿了。/必須先用掉一些才行。/必須先使用我們所擁有的部分。

LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/92A09DAC80.eng: I feel… invincible./Even I can handle no more./Now, to unleash this maximum power!/No being in the universe could handle more.
LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/92A09DAC80.cht: 這就像…無敵的感覺。/連我都再也招架不住。/釋放爆炸力量的時間到了！/在這宇宙上，任誰都難以抵擋如此強大的力量。

LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/937EB782B8.eng: My thirst for power is quenched./This power would overwhelm a mortal./Only a fool would stand against me now!/I have never felt such strength!
LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/937EB782B8.cht: 我對力量的渴望已經得到滿足！/我的力量已經到達凡人無法承受的境界。/只有愚蠢的人敢與我為敵！/從未有過變得如此強大的感覺！

LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/9C2137808C.eng: Whoa. What a rush!/This is about all I can handle./Now what am I going to do with all this power?/Oh, baby, I am jacked!
LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/9C2137808C.cht: 唉，是不是太急了？/這已經是能承受的上限。/這麼多的力量該用在哪裡呢？/喂，我已經完全提升了！

LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/DC408E1107.eng: I'm topped off./Maximum capacity./This is all the power the armor can handle./Time to put these to work!
LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/DC408E1107.cht: 我似乎已經夠了。/最大值充電完畢。/已經達到裝甲內建最大數值了。/好，現在要來試一下才行!

LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/FB2E87A962.eng: This… is… unbelievable./I’ve never felt so powerful./You fight me now, you better watch out./Amazing! I feel like I could punch the moon out of orbit.
LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/FB2E87A962.cht: 剛剛進入體內的力量非同小可。/從未有過變得如此強大的感覺。/如果你現在想對付我，你得三思啊。/這力量不是開玩笑的！感覺能把月亮從運行的軌道上打飛。

LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/FF95179A71.eng: Man, I feel like I could somersault to the Moon./I'm gonna arm-wrestle the Hulk./Yo! Maximum rush!/Does Thor feel like this all the time? Cuz it’s amazing.
LeaderData/Data/MaximumShards/FF95179A71.cht: 開心到彷彿能飛到月亮上一樣。/說不定和浩克比腕力也能贏？/太棒了！狀況非常好！/雷神索爾每天都是這種狀態嗎？超棒的？

LeaderData/Data/msg/046F15BF971C.eng: {0} threw spider webs on enemy cosmic fragments!
LeaderData/Data/msg/046F15BF971C.cht: 朝敵人的宇宙碎片發射蜘蛛絲!

LeaderData/Data/msg/110A2D8F7C30.cht: 共生體讓{1}的腎上腺素暴發！

LeaderData/Data/msg/24D65791902B.eng: Cosmic cube's power is flowing into Hela!
LeaderData/Data/msg/24D65791902B.cht: [臨時]宇宙魔方的力量落入海拉手中。

LeaderData/Data/msg/32E38AB6DFDB.eng: {0} healed an ally with used cosmic fragments!
LeaderData/Data/msg/32E38AB6DFDB.cht: 已利用使用過的宇宙碎片治療我軍！

LeaderData/Data/msg/487BD436E393.eng: Yimir froze our ally into a pillar of ice!
LeaderData/Data/msg/487BD436E393.cht: 尤彌爾凍結了戰場上的我軍！

LeaderData/Data/msg/59206B7D4BF6.eng: Surtur set the battlefield on fire!

LeaderData/Data/msg/85AE884273C1.eng: {0} charged energy, then blasted shock waves!
LeaderData/Data/msg/85AE884273C1.cht: 用累積的能量引起衝擊波！

LeaderData/Data/msg/8D24E74C6636.cht: 海拉回復了自己的體力。

LeaderData/Data/msg/A51213057064.eng: Experiment yielded growth in cosmic fragments on battlefield
LeaderData/Data/msg/A51213057064.cht: 利用研究的成果使戰場的宇宙碎片成長吧!

LeaderData/Data/msg/B4C3BAC6C5CE.eng: {0} retrieved an action card back from the Quantum Realm
LeaderData/Data/msg/B4C3BAC6C5CE.cht: 已從量子領域再次取回黃蜂女使用的動作卡！

LeaderData/Data/msg/CEC0590D0447.eng: Allies were inspired by the heroic charge!
LeaderData/Data/msg/CEC0590D0447.cht: 你的英勇突擊讓我軍士氣提高了！

LeaderData/Data/msg/D3F2E4E56875.cht: 雷神之鎚的閃電重擊了戰場！

LeaderData/Data/OnLose/0FBBE36A8C84.eng: Oh, no. Oh, no… it's my bad!

LeaderData/Data/OnLose/22A06779362D.eng: Come on! The whole thing is miscalculated.
LeaderData/Data/OnLose/22A06779362D.cht: 怎麼會！跟預期的不一樣！

LeaderData/Data/OnLose/22A06779F6EC.eng: Arrrgh! Where did it get wrong?

LeaderData/Data/OnLose/22A06779F7AC.cht: 實在… 太空虛了！不、不行！

LeaderData/Data/OnLose/598D109C0CCD.eng: This one's been wasted… I'll find another host.
LeaderData/Data/OnLose/598D109C0CCD.cht: 沒用的東西…我要去找其他宿主！

LeaderData/Data/OnLose/5C5FE7DAA32B.eng: This can't be right…I'm still having hangovers…

LeaderData/Data/OnLose/78703327B029.eng: Bozhe moi! This can't be right.

LeaderData/Data/OnLose/7A648DE6104C.eng: Mistress Death! Is this your doing!

LeaderData/Data/OnLose/81E002B24D7B.eng: You… dare? wh..what have you done..!

LeaderData/Data/OnLose/D5706417914C.eng: I will not yield! Do not think this is your victory!

LeaderData/Data/OnMyTurn/4F5657F06C7B.eng: I will teach you a lesson.

LeaderData/Data/OnMyTurn/A1610F92A6D1.cht: 感受一下絕望的滋味吧。

LeaderData/Data/OnPvpEntrance/239B44403C.eng: Hi! I'm the Wasp! And you've just been STUNG!
LeaderData/Data/OnPvpEntrance/239B44403C.cht: 小鬼膽子還真大？好，放馬過來吧！

LeaderData/Data/OnPvpEntrance/46EA39A148.eng: Are you sure you can handle me?

LeaderData/Data/OnPvpEntrance/84F2F498FD.eng: Fools taking up arms against omnipotence.
LeaderData/Data/OnPvpEntrance/84F2F498FD.cht: 真是可笑。有本事就試試看。

LeaderData/Data/OnPvpEntrance/9A00CD019B.eng: Let the fear be forever engraved in your bones.
LeaderData/Data/OnPvpEntrance/9A00CD019B.cht: 我會讓你深刻體驗恐懼感。

LeaderData/Data/OnPvpEntrance/A1E0B0A67F.eng: Alright, let's get the show on the road!

LeaderData/Data/OnPvpEntrance/BD458887A1.eng: We've been waiting for this moment!

LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/1D96074B.eng: We've got you pinned down! Watch us as we beat you harder!
LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/1D96074B.cht: 明明就無法動彈，那樣盯著看又能怎樣呢？

LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/334C2DD0.eng: Stay, the black panther's hunt continues.
LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/334C2DD0.cht: 等一下。黑豹的時間並未結束。

LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/499A8403.eng: Hey! Hands off, my turn's not over yet.

LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/4B935D99.eng: Please! Step back. It's not your turn yet!
LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/4B935D99.cht: 等等，還沒輪到你，可以冷靜一點退後嗎？

LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/7BC1ECA5.eng: Still feeling uncomfortable? Good, keep it that way.
LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/7BC1ECA5.cht: 看來是害怕了？不過怎麼辦呢？又輪到我了耶。

LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/7EB296D0.eng: I’ve been waiting for this exact moment. How exciting!
LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/7EB296D0.cht: 我一直在等這一刻。已經開始感到興奮了！

LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/96D71F99.eng: You are out of options. Face your destiny.
LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/96D71F99.cht: 你沒有任何機會！對唯一的力量屈服吧！

LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/9D8BBD93.eng: I'm still not done with you… yet!
LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/9D8BBD93.cht: 剩下密藏的卡片。咬緊牙關。

LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/ADFF0864.eng: There is work yet to be done.

LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/C4B499B7.eng: Whoa, don't be too surprised! we're just starting here!
LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/C4B499B7.cht: 哈，這麼快就嚇一跳就太無趣了。現在才開始耶。

LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/F3E693A9.eng: Give me some time to think here, go doodle or something…
LeaderData/Data/OnUseActionCard/F3E693A9.cht: 休息一下吧。如果無聊，就去釣個魚！

LeaderData/Data/OnWin/319204150964.eng: You were pretty impressive back there too!

LeaderData/Data/OnWin/4AABC8ADECC0.cht: 你的蠻勇造就了我的勝利。

LeaderData/Data/OnWin/4FC6D3671BE5.eng: Death and I, can never be defeated.
LeaderData/Data/OnWin/4FC6D3671BE5.cht: 只要有絕對的力量與死亡女神，我就是無敵的！

LeaderData/Data/OnWin/558BEF9D86FE.eng: A touching ending. Brings tears to my eyes.
LeaderData/Data/OnWin/558BEF9D86FE.cht: 悲慘的馬洛內。眼淚都快流出來了。

LeaderData/Data/OnWin/6652694199A8.cht: 想都別想。想要解開我的怨恨，還早了呢。

LeaderData/Data/OnWin/81E3BE3364AE.cht: 祝你今天也有充實的一天！哼！

LeaderData/Data/OnWin/81E3BE3365EE.cht: 心情真是糟透了！哈哈哈哈哈！

LeaderData/Data/OnWin/81E3BE33662E.eng: Victory is the true proof of valor.
LeaderData/Data/OnWin/81E3BE33662E.cht: 勝利才是能證明價值的方法！

LeaderData/Data/OnWin/81E3BE33A46F.cht: 因為結果太顯而易見，讓人忍不住打哈欠。

LeaderData/Data/OnWin/A98026F90525.eng: Yeah, I guess that was generally ok.
LeaderData/Data/OnWin/A98026F90525.cht: 只是稍微玩了一下而已。

LeaderData/Data/OnWin/C2DEAE70821B.eng: I shall reign upon the nine realms. AHAHAHAHA!
LeaderData/Data/OnWin/C2DEAE70821B.cht: 我要成為統治九個世界的王！哈哈哈哈哈！

LeaderData/Data/OnWin/DD9ADD011934.eng: Awww! All is fair in love and war!
LeaderData/Data/OnWin/DD9ADD011934.cht: 強者勝利是理所當然的事情。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/121AB753A34.eng: Ooh, shiny./Mind if I take this? Thanks!
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/121AB753A34.cht: 哦！閃閃發亮。/我能把它帶走吧？謝謝！

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/60FFFF77242.eng: I feel charged up every time I touch one of these./There’s another one.
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/60FFFF77242.cht: 每次觸碰時力量會上升。/那邊還有一個呢。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/681EFAFA200.eng: More power./I will take what is mine.
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/681EFAFA200.cht: 更強大的力量！/這原本就是我的。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/72F06324645.eng: That’s ours./Ah, power… we want more.
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/72F06324645.cht: 是我們的。/啊，我想…擁有更多力量。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/7883F0F035C.eng: Don't mind me, just powering up over here./Add that to the collection…
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/7883F0F035C.cht: 不要在意我。我要多收集一點。/在收藏本當中追加1個!

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/8195A6C9C59.cht: 我慢慢變更強了。/抓住了。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/BC00E49620B.eng: I’ll take this./What do we have here?
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/BC00E49620B.cht: 這我拿走嘍，/咦，這是什麼？

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/D3D5F93B642.eng: Such tiny keys to unlock such great power./I will gather these as I find them.
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/D3D5F93B642.cht: 看來這是小巧且能開啟巨大力量的鑰匙！/我會盡可能收集。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/DF50FB1916F.eng: Every time I touch one of these I feel stronger./I should grab these every chance I get.
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainA/DF50FB1916F.cht: 每當碰觸到這些東西的時候就有變得更強的感覺。/只要有機會，我得把這些東西收集起來。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/09F47EDB583.eng: I'm starting to feel such powerful energy./The power just keeps increasing.
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/09F47EDB583.cht: 開始感覺到巨大的力量。/力量正持續增強。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/4B293DD14BB.eng: Whew! Getting stronger./Couldn’t pass this up, now, could I?
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/4B293DD14BB.cht: 呼，變更強了。/這種好事當然不能錯過呀。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/78254893668.eng: One is good. More is better./Give me those. What a feeling.
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/78254893668.cht: 多多益善。/給我吧!哇，心情真好。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/891347261AB.eng: Yeah, we'll take ‘em./Starting to feel real strong.
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/891347261AB.cht: 好，我們就帶走吧。/感覺真的在變強，很好。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/9E561F0114F.eng: Oh, I can find room for these./Ooh, gimme.
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/9E561F0114F.cht: 能保管的地方很夠。/哦哦，快到我這來！

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/A852F260CA6.eng: What have we here?/Don’t mind if I do.
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/A852F260CA6.cht: 哎呀，這是什麼？/我可以帶走吧？

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/B97654BD985.eng: I could get used to feeling like this./These things pack a punch… and now so do I.
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/B97654BD985.cht: 熟悉這種心情也不賴。/真是太強了...我也變強了。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/D67AFF2C2E6.eng: Good fortune… and great power!/I must take these whenever I find them.
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/D67AFF2C2E6.cht: 幸運和… 巨大的力量！/只要出現在我眼前，我就得把這些東西收集起來。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/E194680C9F2.eng: Bring this power to me!/Yes! I grow even stronger!
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/E194680C9F2.cht: 把力量給我！/很好！我變得更強了！

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/FD8DBDEC0D4.eng: There's a powerful surge of energy here./Handful by handful, the power grows…
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainB/FD8DBDEC0D4.cht: 感覺到強大能量的流動。/變得更強大了。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainC/0A5C6643045.eng: What a haul./Just what I was looking for!
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainC/0A5C6643045.cht: 數量真多呢，/正好是我一直在找的！

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainC/31EC952A47E.eng: Whoa. Intense./That’s almost too much to handle.
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainC/31EC952A47E.cht: 哇，太強了！/慢慢變成難以控制的程度了。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainC/3AD178A6962.eng: Indomitable might!/I control the power of the universe!
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainC/3AD178A6962.cht: 不屈的力量！/全宇宙的力量都到我這來吧！

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainC/45CD8A2939A.eng: I’ll take all I can get./Man, these things really charge you up!
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainC/45CD8A2939A.cht: 我要佔據觸手可及的一切。/力量源源不斷呢？

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainC/6E3FCEB1043.eng: I am infused with incredible power./Ancestors, help me to control this energy.
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainC/6E3FCEB1043.cht: 融入了一股令人難以置信的龐大力量。/先祖們，幫助我讓我能夠掌控這股力量吧。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainC/C394A20827E.eng: Such power as I have rarely felt…/Incredible power gathers…
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainC/C394A20827E.cht: 這是很難察覺的力量。/巨大的力量正在凝聚…

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainC/F233DEA9B4B.cht: 找到礦脈了！/全部都由我們帶走。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainC/F4FB21E7FE7.eng: This is going to unleash something incredible./That was a big rush.
LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainC/F4FB21E7FE7.cht: 感覺會有巨大的力量出現。/剛剛進入體內的力量非同小可。

LeaderData/Data/ShardObtainC/FD4B572850C.eng: Jackpot!/Whew. That’s going to my head a little.

LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/14C7543F026C.eng: I will not hesitate, but act./One must know when the time is right to strike./This is the time to act!/I fear no man, nor woman, nor creature of darkness./I have waited long enough.
LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/14C7543F026C.cht: 我不會拖延。/絕對不會讓敵人逃走。/該是行動的時候了!/不管出現怎樣的惡魔我都不會畏懼。/我已經等很久了。

LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/48D13E3205B9.eng: Someone's about to get destroyed./This is gonna get messy./You're not running away yet?/Is it dinner time already?/Been too long since I gave someone nightmares.
LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/48D13E3205B9.cht: 今天將會有一個人遭殃。/這裡即將陷入混亂。/還不快跑在磨蹭什麼？/晚餐時間這麼快就到啦？/我這才發現，我好久沒讓人陷入惡夢之中了。

LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/558EF38D597E.eng: I've been waiting…/This is where we get to the face-punching, right?/Spidey-Sense tingling…/I'm getting a little anxious to web someone up./Okay, here we go.
LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/558EF38D597E.cht: 我等很久了.../只要在臉上打一拳就行了吧？/蜘蛛感應在蠢蠢欲動了.../因為想要使用蜘蛛絲綁起來，全身忍不住發癢了。/太好了，走吧！

LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/7061069A7357.eng: Ready to go./Reporting for duty./Heads up./You had your chance. Now it's my turn./Let's go, let's go!
LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/7061069A7357.cht: 準備就緒。/等待任務中。/打起精神。/你的機會結束了。現在輪到我了。/好，去吧！

LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/AB9BD44F147C.eng: Time to act./This is the moment./Here I claim glory and valor!/I have been waiting for this…/For Asgard!
LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/AB9BD44F147C.cht: 該行動了。/時機成熟了。/我將會取得名譽和榮耀！/我一直在等…/為了阿斯嘉！

LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/AEB2B9E6FDA8.eng: Seize the moment!/Our time has come./You strive against the power of Death itself./Strike now!/Now. Choose the method of your destruction.
LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/AEB2B9E6FDA8.cht: 這是我的時刻！/我們的時刻到了。/你在死亡面前掙扎！/就是現在！/好，該怎麼破壞才好呢？挑挑看吧。

LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/C65DDB6BA4B4.eng: Dance-off!/I can't wait!/Time to get busy./Listen, I have a plan… well, most of a plan./Carpe freakin' diem.
LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/C65DDB6BA4B4.cht: 熱舞時刻！/受不了了！/來來，我們忙起來吧。/我有個計劃，雖然還沒完成...不過請仔細聽。/要及時行樂啊，小子！

LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/C897DAB4B397.eng: Sometimes you have to improvise./I might have a surprise in store…/I have an idea…/About time./Better make this one count.
LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/C897DAB4B397.cht: 有時候必須來個即興表演。/也許會大吃一驚…/我有個好辦法。/時間到了！/伺機使出決勝一擊吧。

LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/D2AFF3A4126D.eng: I've been waiting around long enough./About time I got to do something./Let's make something happen here./Okay. I think I know what to do./When we get a chance we have to take it.
LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/D2AFF3A4126D.cht: 已經等夠久了。/差不多該行動了吧？/在這裡大鬧一場吧！/好，我大概有頭緒了。/看見機會就要牢牢抓住。

LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/EBA95CDC828B.eng: I have to make every move count./Shall we?/Time to dance. How about I lead?/Ready to rock./Here we go.
LeaderData/Data/StartOfTurn/EBA95CDC828B.cht: 我的字典裡沒有失誤。/那麼繼續嗎？/來好好玩一下吧？好好看一下我是怎麼做的。/我已經準備好要享受了。/好，上吧。

LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/063E6015.eng: Am I forgetting something?/Oh, I know what to do now./Wait, I have another idea!
LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/063E6015.cht: 有沒有忘了什麼？/來，現在這麼做就行了。/等等，我還有個主意！

LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/13925AFF.eng: That was just the beginning./If you are not afraid yet, you will be./There is more to be done.
LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/13925AFF.cht: 這只不過是開始。/如果你還不害怕，那你得感到恐懼了。/該做的事還沒結束呢。

LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/1E418453.eng: The stage is set./It is time to put the plan into action./Now we will see if I have planned correctly.
LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/1E418453.cht: 舞台已經準備好了。/該是執行計畫的時候了。/看看計畫是否進行的順利。

LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/3CDCBBC6.eng: I can still do more./You think I'm done? Think again./I'm not done yet.
LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/3CDCBBC6.cht: 還沒結束。/你認為已經結束了嗎？要不要重新考慮一下呢？/還沒結束。

LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/65C318C9.eng: I love it when a plan comes together./Okay. Now for the big followup!/Set 'em up, knock 'em down.
LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/65C318C9.cht: 一切都依照計畫順利進行呢。/好，下一個！/準備好後就一口氣引爆吧！

LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/75B80914.eng: Wait'll you see the followup./I'm not done yet./What happens next, you ask? Let me show you.
LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/75B80914.cht: 接下來的攻擊你也要看清楚。/還沒結束。/接下來我想做什麼？好好看著吧。

LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/914205C5.eng: I'm just getting started./You think I'm done? Think again!/There's one more thing to do…
LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/914205C5.cht: 這只不過是剛開始而已。/以為已經結束了嗎？愚蠢！/該做的事還有一件…

LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/ACB4CEFB.eng: Pretty sure I'm forgetting something…/I'm just getting started./You want to see what happens next? Sure you do!
LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/ACB4CEFB.cht: 嗯…好像還有事要做的樣子。/這只是開始。/好，很想知道接下來會發生什麼事吧？很想知道吧！

LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/E60447E4.eng: There is work yet to be done./I have only just begun./What comes now? I think I know…
LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/E60447E4.cht: 還有事必須完成。/這只不過是開始。/接下來呢？我知道...

LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/EEC4F41B.eng: And now…/For my next trick…/Nobody ever sees this next move coming.
LeaderData/Data/UsingActionCard/EEC4F41B.cht: 好，現在.../下一步是.../沒有人能預料這種事吧…?

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401003/001_002.eng: The smoke is killing my senses.

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401003/001_004.eng: Keep as many as we can from escaping!
OriginalStoryStageScripts/401003/001_004.cht: 惡徒們正在逃獄，準備戰鬥吧！

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401003/006_001.eng: I came here to ask you to be a member of the new avengers.
OriginalStoryStageScripts/401003/006_001.cht: 一起創造新的復仇者吧！

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401003/006_005.eng: We are going to have a cool clubhouse though, right?

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401005/001_002.cht: 詢問到底發生什麼情況

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401005/001_003.eng: I infiltrated the yoshida fortress. I’m sorry I failed you.
OriginalStoryStageScripts/401005/001_003.cht: 被發現了，結果被手合會的忍者盯上。

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401005/003_002.eng: They were told to pull back.
OriginalStoryStageScripts/401005/003_002.cht: 他們是奉某人命令而來的。

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401005/003_003.cht: 一定是刻意想要引誘我們。

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401005/003_004.cht: 不過...蜘蛛女消失不見了。

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401009/001_002.eng: I admit, it was a dirty trick. You’re all under arrest.

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401009/001_004.eng: I think we made it pretty clear, tony...
OriginalStoryStageScripts/401009/001_004.cht: 東尼‧史塔克，快點交出隊長！

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401009/001_005.eng: The war is over. The law is the law.
OriginalStoryStageScripts/401009/001_005.cht: 適可而止吧。快點投降吧！

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401009/001_006.eng: The war is over when we say it’s over.

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401009/003_002.cht: 英雄之間的不信任逐漸加劇，讓人相當擔心。

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401009/003_004.eng: Let’s go back and gather ourselves together.
OriginalStoryStageScripts/401009/003_004.cht: 先回去本部整頓戰鬥隊伍吧。

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401011/001_001.eng: All illegal heroes are under arrest.

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401011/001_002.eng: Since when were you a hero?
OriginalStoryStageScripts/401011/001_002.cht: 你什麼時候開始當起英雄了呢？

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401011/001_003.eng: Let’s show them who the real avengers are.
OriginalStoryStageScripts/401011/001_003.cht: 趁這個機會消滅那個冒牌復仇者吧。

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401011/001_005.eng: There’s no need for that. Bring it on.
OriginalStoryStageScripts/401011/001_005.cht: 沒有那種必要。我們來對決吧！

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401011/003_001.eng: Avengers! Get your asses up and let’s go!
OriginalStoryStageScripts/401011/003_001.cht: 復仇者，快點搭乘昆式噴射機。

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401011/003_002.eng: That’s everyone! Get this bird in the air!

OriginalStoryStageScripts/401011/003_004.cht: 廢話少說，快點搭乘昆式噴射機。

RoguelikePowerUpData/Data/Description/17.eng: 저번 층에서 전투를 했다면 이번 층 전투 시작 시 자원을 {0} 추가로 가지고 시작한다.

RoguelikePowerUpData/Data/Description/1A.eng: 전투 시작 시 리더 체력을 {0} 회복시킨다.

RoguelikePowerUpData/Data/Description/64.eng: 카드 보상에서 언커먼 이상의 카드가 더 잘 나오게 된다.

RoguelikePowerUpData/Data/Description/7A.eng: 더 이상 덱의 카드를 교체할 수 없다. 획득 시 리더 체력을 최대로 회복한다.

RoguelikePowerUpData/Data/Description/95.eng: 전투 종료 후 리더 체력을 {0} 회복시킨다.

RoguelikePowerUpData/Data/Description/D7.eng: 카드를 3개 교체할 수 있다. 리더 체력을 회복할 수 없다.

RoguelikePowerUpData/Data/Description/F2.eng: 전투 종료 후 리더 체력을 {0} 회복시킨다. 파워업 0을 제거한다.

ScenarioScripts/100001/74aaa760.eng: Summon a character to the field. You can also make a battle line attack by forming an 'X' shape with five characters.
ScenarioScripts/100001/74aaa760.cht: 請召喚角色前往戰場，\n只要以X字形配置5名角色就能進行戰線攻擊。\r

ScenarioScripts/100001/8f6274b9.eng: You see the 3x4 grid? This is the battlefield.
ScenarioScripts/100001/8f6274b9.cht: 配置好3X4的欄位了吧？這裡是戰場！\r

ScenarioScripts/100001/b7e8fa51.eng: You can also form two lines at the same time.

ScenarioScripts/100001/b7f72251.eng: When you complete a straight line, you will be able to attack your opponent.
ScenarioScripts/100001/b7f72251.cht: 只要直線配置角色就能攻擊目標！\r

ScenarioScripts/100001/dc218b29.eng: The basic formations for a double-line attack will look like this. Variations in different directions or locations will still be applicable.
ScenarioScripts/100001/dc218b29.cht: 兩條戰線攻擊的基本型態大概就是這樣吧。那個方向或位置可進行多個變形。

ScenarioScripts/100001/ea8cfa0b.cht: 啊！攻擊我了耶？！這又是什麼？！

ScenarioScripts/100002/02a7aff3.eng: Let's do our trial run in this\r training room. It's designed to\r absorb hazardous energy. Mr. Stark\r\nwill join us.
ScenarioScripts/100002/02a7aff3.cht: 在能吸收危險能量的特殊訓練室中測試史派克吧。史塔克先生會一起參與測試。

ScenarioScripts/100002/04ecbc15.eng: There you go. As you've seen, some characters have special abilities\r that activate \nwhen they're\r visualized.
ScenarioScripts/100002/04ecbc15.cht: 如何？也是有變成實體後，能夠發揮強大能力的卡片。

ScenarioScripts/100002/09811d6a.eng: Collect cosmic fragments on the field and summon War Machine.
ScenarioScripts/100002/09811d6a.cht: 收集資源召喚戰爭機器吧。\r

ScenarioScripts/100002/1f5aecd8.eng: Action cards show a very high energy level. They have powerful effects, but you can only use them once per\r battle.
ScenarioScripts/100002/1f5aecd8.cht: 動作卡的能量等級相當高，所以相當不穩定。雖然可發揮強大的效果，但戰鬥時只能使用一次。

ScenarioScripts/100002/2223af6b.eng: We've got training drones online to\r help you in the simulation.\r
ScenarioScripts/100002/2223af6b.cht: 為了訓練，我已經準備好無人機了。

ScenarioScripts/100002/2dfc8222.eng: Action cards show a very high energy level. They have powerful effects, but you can only use them once per\r battle.
ScenarioScripts/100002/2dfc8222.cht: 動作卡的能量等級相當高，所以相當不穩定。雖然可發揮強大的效果，但戰鬥時只能使用一次。

ScenarioScripts/100002/3120dde9.eng: Here in training you can use cards\r as often as you want. That won't be\r the case in a real fight.
ScenarioScripts/100002/3120dde9.cht: 從基本開始吧。召喚卡片的時候，需要能量資源。當然，也有不需要資源的卡片。

ScenarioScripts/100002/44e2c63c.eng: The Avengers' skilled sharpshooter, Clint Barton. A.K.A. Hawkeye. This shard contains his powers.
ScenarioScripts/100002/44e2c63c.cht: 復仇者聯盟最強的名射手巴頓，也稱為鷹眼。要不要試著使用他的能力卡呢？

ScenarioScripts/100002/6dad0d2f.eng: The basic formations for a double-line attack will look like this. Variations in different directions or locations will still be applicable.
ScenarioScripts/100002/6dad0d2f.cht: 兩條戰線攻擊的基本型態大概就是這樣吧。那個方向或位置可進行多個變形。

ScenarioScripts/100002/70501e5f.eng: Collect cosmic fragments on the field and summon War Machine.
ScenarioScripts/100002/70501e5f.cht: 收集資源召喚戰爭機器吧。\r

ScenarioScripts/100002/78d826f5.eng: Gather cosmic fragments using a character that doesn't\r require resources to play.
ScenarioScripts/100002/78d826f5.cht: 就算沒有其他能量，也能先送走可召喚的其他隊員取得資源。

ScenarioScripts/100002/7c6d2c9d.eng: Let's wrap this up. Make a line!
ScenarioScripts/100002/7c6d2c9d.cht: 好了，那就來結束掉吧。先做一條線！

ScenarioScripts/100002/7df6891f.eng: Some cards don't summon\r characters. Instead they have other\r effects. We'll call them action\r\ncards.
ScenarioScripts/100002/7df6891f.cht: 有些卡片不會召喚角色。那些就叫動作卡。

ScenarioScripts/100002/95cc6a6d.eng: In the upper-left corner of a card, you can see how many resources are required to use it. Try to summon Hawkeye.
ScenarioScripts/100002/95cc6a6d.cht: 角色卡左上方顯示需要的資源數。請召喚鷹眼吧。

ScenarioScripts/100002/a52bb7f1.eng: Now you see how you can gain an\r advantage by using the right powers\r at the right time and place.
ScenarioScripts/100002/a52bb7f1.cht: 像這樣運用卡片擁有的能力，在戰鬥中可使自己變得更加有利。

ScenarioScripts/100002/dbc3c7bc.eng: You can still make another move after using an Action Card. Try summoning the Humanoid.
ScenarioScripts/100002/dbc3c7bc.cht: 使用動作卡後還能再行動一次。要不要召喚人形機器呢？

ScenarioScripts/100002/dfa27813.eng: We've got training drones online to\r help you in the simulation.\r
ScenarioScripts/100002/dfa27813.cht: 為了訓練，我已經準備好無人機了。

ScenarioScripts/100002/f83222d9.eng: See the cosmic fragments on the battlefield?\r Gather cosmic fragments using a character that doesn't\r require resources to play.
ScenarioScripts/100002/f83222d9.cht: 好，有看到戰場上出現宇宙碎片吧？

ScenarioScripts/100002/f9f3fe6f.eng: To activate a stronger card,\r you need more resources. In other\r words, with great power comes more\r\nshard-collecting.
ScenarioScripts/100002/f9f3fe6f.cht: 發動更大的力量就會使用更多的資源。龐大的力量往往需要龐大的資源。你曾聽過這番話嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100003/1dfc2920.eng: Director Fury hasn't handled the\r S.P.I.K.E. much. Since he's a busy\r man, let's give him an advantage.
ScenarioScripts/100003/1dfc2920.cht: 雖然局長無法掌控史派克，但畢竟已經歷過無數的戰鬥，我就提供一些障礙吧。

ScenarioScripts/100003/2ed548c7.eng: Surprise Nick Fury with awesome moves for 7 turns.
ScenarioScripts/100003/2ed548c7.cht: 7回合內向局長表現出最愉快的戰線遊戲經驗吧。

ScenarioScripts/100003/b4881bd6.eng: It's not my fault you don't know\r how to use the S.P.I.K.E., Nick.
ScenarioScripts/100003/b4881bd6.cht: 哦，是嗎？局長似乎還無法駕馭史派克？

ScenarioScripts/100004/0000b977.eng: Resources are required to use certain cards. You can obtain them by summoning a character on top of resources on the battlefield or by moving a character to their location.\nSummon a character on top of a cosmic fragment now to pick it up.
ScenarioScripts/100004/0000b977.cht: 想要召喚卡片需要資源。在戰場形成的資源上方召喚角色或移動角色就能獲得資源，\n請將角色卡片移至資源上方獲得資源。

ScenarioScripts/100004/181ebcbe.eng: Here in training you can use cards\r as often as you want. That won't be\r the case in a real fight.
ScenarioScripts/100004/181ebcbe.cht: 在實驗室裡雖然可以無限制的使用卡片，但在實際戰場卻不能那樣做。是使用電源線和使用電池之間的差異嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100004/2536a2bd.eng: A little more powerful than your\r other cards, isn't it? That's why\r it costs additional resources to\r\nplay.
ScenarioScripts/100004/2536a2bd.cht: 如何？很威吧？但是別忘了還需要資源。

ScenarioScripts/100004/41f5ef84.eng: Each turn, you can only summon one character—but you can use multiple action cards.\r
ScenarioScripts/100004/41f5ef84.cht: 角色卡一回合只能召喚一次，但是動作卡可以使用好幾個。

ScenarioScripts/100004/423b302b.eng: Let's try it again. This time,\r collect two cosmic fragments and use\r an even more powerful card.\r
ScenarioScripts/100004/423b302b.cht: 再試一次看看吧。這次收集2個資源，使用更強大一點的！

ScenarioScripts/100004/5ab267e5.eng: Some cards don't summon\r characters. Instead they have other\r effects. We'll call them action\r\ncards.
ScenarioScripts/100004/5ab267e5.cht: 有些卡片不會召喚角色。那些就叫動作卡。

ScenarioScripts/100004/63c31bfa.eng: There you go. As you've seen, some characters have special abilities\r that activate \nwhen they're\r visualized.
ScenarioScripts/100004/63c31bfa.cht: 如何？也是有變成實體後，能夠發揮強大能力的卡片。

ScenarioScripts/100004/7e8332dd.eng: You can drag an action card directly to a slot occupied by an enemy in order to target it.
ScenarioScripts/100004/7e8332dd.cht: 將動作卡移至敵軍所在的欄位，然後就能以該敵軍為目標使用。

ScenarioScripts/100004/993e86e2.eng: Summon allies to the battlefield accordingly to form a battleline.
ScenarioScripts/100004/993e86e2.cht: 有一處可以召喚角色後立即攻擊戰線。請在那裡召喚英雄。

ScenarioScripts/100004/9a8e7f36.eng: Now you see how you can gain an\r advantage by using the right powers\r at the right time and place.
ScenarioScripts/100004/9a8e7f36.cht: 像這樣運用卡片擁有的能力，在戰鬥中可使自己變得更加有利。

ScenarioScripts/100004/c0700a76.eng: To activate a stronger card,\r you need more resources. In other\r words, with great power comes more\r\nshard-collecting.
ScenarioScripts/100004/c0700a76.cht: 發動更大的力量就會使用更多的資源。龐大的力量往往需要龐大的資源。你曾聽過這番話嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100004/ccfdc1ac.eng: Let's wrap this up. Make a line!
ScenarioScripts/100004/ccfdc1ac.cht: 好了，那就來結束掉吧。先做一條線！

ScenarioScripts/100004/d62a2613.eng: Now you have one resource.\r Try to use a card that requires one resource to play.
ScenarioScripts/100004/d62a2613.cht: 資源變成了1，現在就來使用那張卡吧。

ScenarioScripts/100004/ee8fb0d2.eng: The turn goes to the opponent after you use a character card. However, when you're using an action card, it will still remain as your turn no matter how many of them you use.
ScenarioScripts/100004/ee8fb0d2.cht: 使用角色卡後就會立即變更為對方的回合，但就算使用多張動作卡也不會變更為對方的回合。

ScenarioScripts/100004/ef7ac611.eng: See the cosmic fragments on the battlefield?\r You can take them and use them as\r resources to play a card.
ScenarioScripts/100004/ef7ac611.cht: 好，有看到戰場上出現宇宙碎片吧？

ScenarioScripts/100004/f826a1e1.eng: Gather cosmic fragments using a character that doesn't\r require resources to play.
ScenarioScripts/100004/f826a1e1.cht: 就算沒有其他能量，也能先送走可召喚的其他隊員取得資源。

ScenarioScripts/100004/ff9095e7.eng: You have collected enough Cosmic fragments! Play War\r Machine now!
ScenarioScripts/100004/ff9095e7.cht: 好了，資源已經變成兩個了。放下戰爭機器！

ScenarioScripts/100005/13af3146.eng: See the box on the bottom right of\r the battlefield?
ScenarioScripts/100005/13af3146.cht: 來，看到右下方的箱子嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100005/34588a8a.eng: This isn't as easy as I thought.\r But I can still dish out more than\r I take.
ScenarioScripts/100005/34588a8a.cht: 真是有兩下子？呵呵...來，接招吧！

ScenarioScripts/100005/74ad3574.eng: Summon allies to the battlefield accordingly to form a battleline.
ScenarioScripts/100005/74ad3574.cht: 有一處可以召喚角色後立即攻擊戰線。請在那裡召喚英雄。

ScenarioScripts/100006/06eb903b.eng: S.H.I.E.L.D. agents refusing my orders? Well, that’s nothing new.
ScenarioScripts/100006/06eb903b.cht: 神盾局特工竟然不聽我的話。本來就不聽話的嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100006/0b678a38.eng: Good work. Now I'll see for myself\r whether the civilian is ready to\r take the next step.
ScenarioScripts/100006/0b678a38.cht: 辛苦你們了！但我要親自判斷他是否真的具備資格。

ScenarioScripts/100006/1730ee82.eng: You talk a big game, Stark. Let's\r see how you do.
ScenarioScripts/100006/1730ee82.cht: 東尼，你要不要也試著交手看看呢？

ScenarioScripts/100006/1fe0a5d5.eng: Stark, the A.I. you installed in\r S.P.I.K.E. Looks pretty good.
ScenarioScripts/100006/1fe0a5d5.cht: 史派克的人工智能並不壞。

ScenarioScripts/100006/2e362151.eng: You've got the great power\r now...time to shoulder the great\r responsibility. We know you can do\r\nit.
ScenarioScripts/100006/2e362151.cht: 是說力量伴隨著責任嗎？我會拭目以待。

ScenarioScripts/100006/31b63ba3.eng: We have an emergency situation!\r Intruder detected in the\r Helicarrier.
ScenarioScripts/100006/31b63ba3.cht: 緊急情況！飛行航母出現入侵者了。

ScenarioScripts/100006/34d81c4a.eng: I heard something was going on\r here...whatever the action is, I\r want a piece.
ScenarioScripts/100006/34d81c4a.cht: 從他們匆匆忙忙行動這一點來看，似乎有什麼隱情。喂，快去召集大家。

ScenarioScripts/100006/35d39b55.eng: So your mission objective is to\r defeat me. You planning to take\r over S.H.I.E.L.D.?
ScenarioScripts/100006/35d39b55.cht: 史派克把目標告訴我了。但是打倒我之後又要如何呢？神盾局解散？

ScenarioScripts/100006/395cfae8.eng: Stark, I'm starting to think you\r let this get personal.
ScenarioScripts/100006/395cfae8.cht: 感覺好像有很深的私人感情？東尼，你好像一直只在幫助那一邊耶？

ScenarioScripts/100006/40b5cc90.eng: I see S.H.I.E.L.D. Has been busy.\r Maybe I'll take one of these\r devices for myself!
ScenarioScripts/100006/40b5cc90.cht: 「呵呵呵，創造出很有趣的東西呢。我要帶一個走！」

ScenarioScripts/100006/46aab850.eng: We've drawn a lot of attention.\r Everyone wants the shards.
ScenarioScripts/100006/46aab850.cht: 看吧！到處都是對碎片虎視眈眈的惡徒。目前在紐約引起騷動。

ScenarioScripts/100006/47077f34.eng: You caught me by surprise last\r time, Stark. Won't happen again.
ScenarioScripts/100006/47077f34.cht: 剛剛我只是太大意了，這是可沒這麼好過！

ScenarioScripts/100006/606e22c3.eng: You handled the training. Time for\r you to show what you can do in a\r real fight. Go get 'em!
ScenarioScripts/100006/606e22c3.cht: 以目前為止的成果來看，你充分擁有接受擊敗敵人任務的能力。

ScenarioScripts/100006/6681118b.eng: Hey, new recruit. How about I give\r you a little something extra to\r show the Director what you can do?
ScenarioScripts/100006/6681118b.cht: 嘿，我的新朋友。我送你一張好卡片，去讓局長大吃一驚吧。

ScenarioScripts/100006/6f474ffc.eng: This is the last turn! I'm on my way.
ScenarioScripts/100006/6f474ffc.cht: 這回合就結束了！要來了。

ScenarioScripts/100006/73149026.eng: Director Fury hasn't handled the\r S.P.I.K.E. much. Since he's a busy\r man, let's give him an advantage.
ScenarioScripts/100006/73149026.cht: 雖然局長無法掌控史派克，但畢竟已經歷過無數的戰鬥，我就提供一些障礙吧。

ScenarioScripts/100006/7f2fa7cc.eng: Director Fury? Where are you? We're\r waiting on confirmation of new\r operational plans.
ScenarioScripts/100006/7f2fa7cc.cht: 局長！您在哪裡呢？您不是要批准新作戰嗎？！

ScenarioScripts/100006/8783bd75.eng: Director Fury, we've upgraded S.P.I.K.E. based on accumulated training data.
ScenarioScripts/100006/8783bd75.cht: 「已經以目前為止分析的資料升級史派克了，局長。」

ScenarioScripts/100006/88fabff8.eng: Don't worry. We'll be there to help\r you out. But it's time for you to\r take the fight to the real bad\r\nguys.
ScenarioScripts/100006/88fabff8.cht: 我們偶爾會幫忙，你就試著利用那股能力做好事吧，像我一樣。

ScenarioScripts/100006/99cb4653.eng: Understood, Agent Hill. Stark,\r let's make this quick.
ScenarioScripts/100006/99cb4653.cht: 啊，希爾探員。是啊...東尼，這裡待不了多久了。

ScenarioScripts/100006/9b775993.eng: What do you think? You ready to be\r a hero?
ScenarioScripts/100006/9b775993.cht: 如何？要不要利用碎片的力量，成為懲奸除惡，保護人們的英雄？

ScenarioScripts/100006/9fff514a.eng: I'm not going to lie. Seeing Fury\r get slapped around never gets old.
ScenarioScripts/100006/9fff514a.cht: 呵呵，看到尼克‧福瑞狼狽的模樣，真是痛快。

ScenarioScripts/100006/b0b455a4.eng: Hmm... The time... Why did I miss the appointment with Hill? That operation was important.
ScenarioScripts/100006/b0b455a4.cht: 唔...時間...為什麼我會錯過與希爾特工的行程？這是重要的作戰呢。

ScenarioScripts/100006/b902ce2c.eng: Okay. Here's your chance to show\r Fury what you've learned. Good\r luck!
ScenarioScripts/100006/b902ce2c.cht: 好了，那就運用靠你自己的力量所學的知識，去挫挫局長的銳氣吧！祝你好運。

ScenarioScripts/100006/b9f4809a.eng: Summon allies to the battlefield accordingly to form a battleline.
ScenarioScripts/100006/b9f4809a.cht: 有一處可以召喚角色後立即攻擊戰線。請在那裡召喚英雄。

ScenarioScripts/100006/bd72dde9.eng: Okay, we'll run a couple of turns\r just to show you the new functions\r we've installed in S.P.I.K.E.
ScenarioScripts/100006/bd72dde9.cht: 那就進行幾回合吧！這是展現史派克新功能的好時機。

ScenarioScripts/100006/c4ba5f63.eng: It's not my fault you don't know\r how to use the S.P.I.K.E., Nick.
ScenarioScripts/100006/c4ba5f63.cht: 哦，是嗎？局長似乎還無法駕馭史派克？

ScenarioScripts/100006/cc9a2b1a.eng: Surprise Nick Fury with awesome moves for 7 turns.
ScenarioScripts/100006/cc9a2b1a.cht: 7回合內向局長表現出最愉快的戰線遊戲經驗吧。

ScenarioScripts/100006/d4f881c0.eng: I hear you, Agent Hill. Be right\r there.
ScenarioScripts/100006/d4f881c0.cht: 啊，希爾探員。希爾探員...再給我幾分鐘。不會花太久的時間。

ScenarioScripts/100006/ddd140b9.eng: Director! We've made the necessary arrangements. When are you coming?
ScenarioScripts/100006/ddd140b9.cht: 局長！已經全都準備好了。您何時來呢？

ScenarioScripts/100006/de475a71.eng: Gather more shards, Creel! I'll\r tailor a S.P.I.K.E. For my own use.
ScenarioScripts/100006/de475a71.cht: 再收集一些碎片我也想要來做一個叫史派克的機器

ScenarioScripts/100006/f08e8d6d.eng: The visualization function isn't\r bad, but there's still room for\r improvement. Right, Stark?
ScenarioScripts/100006/f08e8d6d.cht: 實體化也很厲害...應該還有改善的餘地吧？如何，東尼。

ScenarioScripts/100006/fae4bb09.eng: I lost. Honestly, it's very impressive.
ScenarioScripts/100006/fae4bb09.cht: 我輸了。老實說相當令人印象深刻。這樣在現場大概也能奏效吧。

ScenarioScripts/100007/02412346.eng: Summon allies to the battlefield accordingly to form a battleline.
ScenarioScripts/100007/02412346.cht: 有一處可以召喚角色後立即攻擊戰線。請在那裡召喚英雄。

ScenarioScripts/100007/195b7d47.eng: Don't worry if you get lit up once\r in a while. You know more about\r S.P.I.K.E. Than just about anyone\r\nelse. Trust that.
ScenarioScripts/100007/195b7d47.cht: 被打一下也沒關係。那邊並不熟悉操控能量。我們這邊的體力更高，可以放心。

ScenarioScripts/100007/20952ed8.eng: Defeat the opposing leader with a Battle Line attack.

ScenarioScripts/100007/45e447db.eng: That's it. I'm out. This ain't\r worth it.

ScenarioScripts/100007/4afe86ab.eng: Hey, am I late? Show me the target.
ScenarioScripts/100007/4afe86ab.cht: 你好，我來的時間剛剛好吧？告訴我目標吧。

ScenarioScripts/100007/4fab88bc.eng: You've met the Absorbing Man.\r Remember, he's probably learned\r more about the shards, just like\r\nyou have.
ScenarioScripts/100007/4fab88bc.cht: 吸收人。你先前大概和他交過手，我認為那傢伙已經更加了解碎片的事情了。

ScenarioScripts/100007/5bfcb930.eng: I learned a lot watching that. Now I'm gonna put some of it to use.
ScenarioScripts/100007/5bfcb930.cht: 原來是那樣戰鬥的啊。好。

ScenarioScripts/100007/5d3b59a9.eng: Your first live mission. Good luck.\r You'll have these S.H.I.E.L.D.\r Agents as your backup.
ScenarioScripts/100007/5d3b59a9.cht: 好了，這是第一個任務吧？跟神盾局特工一起好好表現吧。

ScenarioScripts/100007/7a3f386c.eng: Defeat the opposing leader with a Battle Line Attack.

ScenarioScripts/100007/addc062e.eng: Still worried? How about I drop you\r a little backup.\r
ScenarioScripts/100007/addc062e.cht: 是不安嗎？那就派援軍吧！

ScenarioScripts/100007/de2bbc25.eng: I'll be thinking about you while I\r do my own bit to save the world.\r Good luck!
ScenarioScripts/100007/de2bbc25.cht: 好了，那我也有很多事要做，先走了。祝你好運。

ScenarioScripts/100007/df841f39.eng: Hey, you! You know me, right? This time things are gonna be different!
ScenarioScripts/100007/df841f39.cht: 「我們之前見過吧？你來得正好。這次不一樣了！」

ScenarioScripts/100007/e320b7f9.cht: 哦，過的好嗎？我有點好奇，於是便看了一下那邊的狀況…

ScenarioScripts/100008/067a91c6.eng: This isn't as easy as I thought.\r But I can still dish out more than\r I take.
ScenarioScripts/100008/067a91c6.cht: 真是有兩下子？呵呵...來，接招吧！

ScenarioScripts/100008/8311efbb.eng: You take this round, but it's gonna\r be a long fight. You ready?
ScenarioScripts/100008/8311efbb.cht: 呿，什麼啊...我不做了。真倒胃口。

ScenarioScripts/100008/98e51228.eng: It's quite hard to know what he's thinking, but I'm sure you can handle him if you play it right.
ScenarioScripts/100008/98e51228.cht: 讓人難以捉摸的陰險惡徒，你應該有充分的能力可以擊倒他。

ScenarioScripts/100008/98fe45f2.eng: Thought I heard a\r commotion...Cottonmouth! I'll\r handle this.
ScenarioScripts/100008/98fe45f2.cht: 因為聽見新的聲音，於是我便來了。那小子由我對付吧。

ScenarioScripts/100008/c4e89a6d.eng: If I can get the power of these\r shards figured out, the Kingpin\r better start looking over his\r\nshoulder.\r
ScenarioScripts/100008/c4e89a6d.cht: 呵呵呵，好好利用這股力量應該就能奪走金霸王的地盤。

ScenarioScripts/100008/cd6eafb4.eng: Agent Coulson here. Looks like Cottonmouth has been chasing\r shards.
ScenarioScripts/100008/cd6eafb4.cht: 我是考森。已經沈寂一陣子的柯敦摩斯又開始搗亂了。

ScenarioScripts/100009/005f1a84.eng: I got a feeling we’ll find out pretty soon...

ScenarioScripts/100009/233a2273.eng: We knew it wouldn't take long for\r Hydra to go after the Shards. I'll\r call in for backup.
ScenarioScripts/100009/233a2273.cht: 九頭蛇也來亂了。我會報告這個狀況，並且請求支援。

ScenarioScripts/100009/40b0bd9c.eng: Hey, Nick? I need to jump out of the Hydra hunt for a bit. Looks like a bit of a situation at home.

ScenarioScripts/100009/5cc14fa3.eng: Yeah. There’s some kind of portal on my roof.

ScenarioScripts/100009/7e2af2f0.eng: Should have known Hydra would make a play for the Shards.

ScenarioScripts/100009/acbf661d.eng: Been hearing good things about you,\r rookie.
ScenarioScripts/100009/acbf661d.cht: 啊，我的事做完了。打算回到甜蜜的家休息時，正好聽到你的冒險談。

ScenarioScripts/100009/adfc8ffd.eng: We’ll be mobilizing all S.H.I.E.L.D. assets immediately.

ScenarioScripts/100009/baa42ec1.eng: We now have better intel on the Shards. Redeploy and report to base. Hail Hydra!

ScenarioScripts/100009/c3562b4a.eng: Director Fury, we’re seeing a huge spike in extra-dimensional energies. Tracing the source...

ScenarioScripts/100009/db0bcb9b.eng: We need to step in hard before this situation gets any worse.

ScenarioScripts/100009/f27606bd.eng: You're doing so well, I have a\r special present...a little bit of\r me.
ScenarioScripts/100009/f27606bd.cht: 「你看起來相當厲害的樣子，不過我還是要送你一份特別的禮物，收下吧。」

ScenarioScripts/100200/34a1826e.eng: THE WAND OF WATOOMB WHICH HAS THE ABILITY TO OPEN PORTALS, HAS BEEN ACTIVATED BY THE ENERGY COMING OUT FROM THE COSMIC SHARDS.
ScenarioScripts/100200/34a1826e.cht: 擁有開啟傳送門能力的瓦圖姆之杖，被破碎的宇宙碎片能量啟動了。

ScenarioScripts/100200/813b3e44.eng: ON THE ROOFTOP OF THE AVENGERS TOWER, HEROES ARE GAZING UPON THE WIDE-OPENED PORTAL.
ScenarioScripts/100200/813b3e44.cht: 在復仇者大廈上，英雄們看著上空的傳送門。

ScenarioScripts/100200/e29a4d91.eng: A PORTAL LEADING TO ASGARD IS OPENED ABOVE THE AVENGERS TOWER WHERE THE WAND HAS BEEN STORED, AND HEROES ARE WATCHING THE ENEMY POURING OUT OF IT.
ScenarioScripts/100200/e29a4d91.cht: 保管著魔杖的復仇者大廈上空，開啟了與阿斯嘉連接的傳送門，復仇者與英雄們目睹了敵人來襲的畫面。

ScenarioScripts/100207/9f8516cd.cht: 毁滅者已經恢復了所有的體力！

ScenarioScripts/100300/3c593571.eng: AS THE WAND OF WATOOMB HAS BEEN REVEALED TO OPEN UP PORTALS LEADING TO OTHER DIMENSIONS, HEROES HEADED TO ASGARD ASKING FOR HELP.
ScenarioScripts/100300/3c593571.cht: 得知開啟其他次元的傳送門的物體為瓦圖姆之杖後，英雄們為了尋求協助便前往阿斯嘉。

ScenarioScripts/100300/89cb0e84.eng: TO SAVE ODIN, NOW THE HEROES MARCH TOWARD TO THE LAND OF THE FIRE LORD.
ScenarioScripts/100300/89cb0e84.cht: 為了拯救他，英雄們前往火焰君王的領地。

ScenarioScripts/100300/e591be9f.eng: THERE, THEY’VE FOUND ODIN THE ALL-FATHER OF ASGARDIANS HAS BEEN TRAPPED IN MUSPHELHEIM.
ScenarioScripts/100300/e591be9f.cht: 英雄們在那邊得知阿斯嘉眾神之父「奥丁」被囚禁在穆斯貝爾海姆的消息。

ScenarioScripts/100301/cdc821b6.cht: 謝謝你告訴我，我本來不知道。

ScenarioScripts/100303/27bd6113.eng: Now is the time for Odinforce!
ScenarioScripts/100303/27bd6113.cht: 現在就是使用奧丁之力的時候！

ScenarioScripts/100402/1a8816e7.eng: Begone, Nightmare. You cannot stand against all of us.
ScenarioScripts/100402/1a8816e7.cht: 消失吧，夢魘。要對付我們全部太困難了。

ScenarioScripts/100402/315c1779.eng: I felt Stephen’s power waver, and blink out. Is he...?
ScenarioScripts/100402/315c1779.cht: 我感覺到史蒂芬的力量正逐漸變弱且消失當中。難道他...？

ScenarioScripts/100402/3b8c26f1.eng: No, you and Wong and Hellstrom must guard this portal.
ScenarioScripts/100402/3b8c26f1.cht: 不。你和王、以及地獄風暴必須守護這個傳送門。

ScenarioScripts/100402/47a8bc5f.cht: 沒有取得我的允許，大概是很難辦到吧。

ScenarioScripts/100402/572118a3.eng: Strange, you need to wake up.

ScenarioScripts/100402/65a48d05.eng: Clea awakened me, but Nightmare’s curse has sapped my strength. Still, we must go after her.
ScenarioScripts/100402/65a48d05.cht: 多虧克莉的幫忙，我才好不容易恢復意識，但夢魘的詛咒依然讓我無法正常發揮力量。更重要的是，一定要救出克莉。

ScenarioScripts/100402/6862bad4.eng: You showed a little too much of yourself, when you tried to break my hold over Strange.
ScenarioScripts/100402/6862bad4.cht: 另外克莉...你在替奇異博士解詛咒的時候已經露出了破綻。

ScenarioScripts/100402/73db6d45.cht: 請在5回合前攻擊巫毒博士參與的戰線。如果失敗，您的體力將遭受嚴重傷害。

ScenarioScripts/100402/804982b9.eng: Yes...and soon so will be yours.
ScenarioScripts/100402/804982b9.cht: 沒錯...很快你們也會變成和他一樣。

ScenarioScripts/100402/861d0366.eng: His mind is shackled by terror.
ScenarioScripts/100402/861d0366.cht: 現在他的精神已經被恐懼支配了。

ScenarioScripts/100402/a10ee9f5.eng: Nightmare has her. We must follow.
ScenarioScripts/100402/a10ee9f5.cht: 夢魘帶走克莉了。得快點追上去。

ScenarioScripts/100402/b3d5d771.eng: Alive. But Nightmare has cursed him and he cannot break free.
ScenarioScripts/100402/b3d5d771.cht: 還活著。但夢魘對他施下了非常難解開的詛咒。

ScenarioScripts/100402/b718b499.eng: I do not ask your permission, Nightmare. I will break your powers and send you back whence you came.
ScenarioScripts/100402/b718b499.cht: 夢魘，我不需要你的允許。我會粉碎你的力量，並且將你送回去原本待的地方。

ScenarioScripts/100402/ba1a136f.eng: My mother has channeled Nightmare’s power into Stephen’s mind. It will be difficult, but yes. I can do it.
ScenarioScripts/100402/ba1a136f.cht: 我母親似乎在史蒂芬的精神中植入了夢魘的力量。雖然很困難，但我應該能解開。

ScenarioScripts/100402/d6585317.eng: Now I have a hold over you...

ScenarioScripts/100402/dbccde69.eng: I don’t need to. I will sweep this world with dread, and while you weep with fear Dormammu’s armies march.
ScenarioScripts/100402/dbccde69.cht: 沒有那種必要。在那之前，這個世界就會籠罩在恐懼當中。在多瑪暮的軍隊前往這個地方的期間，你們大概就會因為恐懼而顫抖與哭泣吧。

ScenarioScripts/100402/f03c3df2.cht: 糟糕。這樣就不能減少你這傢伙的體力了。

ScenarioScripts/100402/f5897347.eng: Into the Dark Dimension? That is more courage than I would have expected from you. But your...ability...will be useful. Let’s go.
ScenarioScripts/100402/f5897347.cht: 前往黑暗次元？比我預期的還要勇敢呢？而且你的能力...一定派得上用場。那就快點走吧！

ScenarioScripts/100404/8988af35.cht: 請在5回合內使用包含奇異博士的戰線攻擊。

ScenarioScripts/100406/52a50df2.eng: We’re the Guardians of the Galaxy!

ScenarioScripts/100500/17f2b5f4.eng: A portal appears. The heroes step through.

ScenarioScripts/100500/e057d793.eng: Strange. You have sensed the Wand.

ScenarioScripts/100503/3e1f0073.eng: Burn it. The ashes of the Tree will be a powerful ingredient to enhance the power of the shards.
ScenarioScripts/100503/3e1f0073.cht: 燃燒吧！這棵樹可以成為強化宇宙碎片的珍貴材料。

ScenarioScripts/100503/8cb357ab.eng: The world? Tomorrow, perhaps. Today we will only ravage K’un Lun.
ScenarioScripts/100503/8cb357ab.cht: 不需要急躁。明天就破壞世界吧。今天就先摧毀崑崙吧。

ScenarioScripts/100504/e5745d1b.eng: Shou-Lao, turn on he who made you his thrall.
ScenarioScripts/100504/e5745d1b.cht: 壽老，是誰讓你變成這樣的呢？

ScenarioScripts/100509/412d3c97.cht: 請以薩諾斯為對象進行3回合。

ScenarioScripts/401001/8ed53409.eng: Use up all the EMP bombs there are!

ScenarioScripts/401001/ceb540e3.eng: Both of you must have gone through a lot. We've found out where the bomb is hidden, so leave the rest of the mission to us.
ScenarioScripts/401001/ceb540e3.cht: 兩位都完成了大事。既然已經查出存放爆裂物的地方，其餘的事就由我們解決吧。

ScenarioScripts/401002/292db57a.eng: Defeat the opposing leader with a Battle Line Attack.

ScenarioScripts/401003/1bec3618.eng: 좋아!!! 적의 정보가 새고 있어! 휴머노이드가 쓰러지면 적 리더에게 대미지를 입히는 모양이야!
ScenarioScripts/401003/1bec3618.cht: 好！！！敵人的情報外洩！看來人形機器倒下後就能對敵方隊長造成傷害！

ScenarioScripts/401003/1d07e1b0.eng: Defeat the opposing leader with a Battle Line Attack.

Text/_workbench_kjk/Canvas/RewardsInfoPo.eng: Epic Particles can be used to upgrade a character card as card alternatives.\nThey are rarely obtained by disintegrating the cards that were nerfed from balance update.
Exp can be obtained from battles and daily quests.\nGain Exp to level up and increase leader HP.
Rare Particles can be used to upgrade a character card as card alternatives.\nThey are rarely obtained by disintegrating the cards that were nerfed from balance update.
Common Particles can be used to upgrade a character card as card alternatives.\nThey are rarely obtained by disintegrating the cards that were nerfed from balance update.
Instant Complete Ticket is used to clear the stage automatically and jump straight to stage rewards.\nIt can only be used in stages with all three stars achieved.
Gem can be used to purchase card pack or gold from the shop.
Special Ops Point can be used to purchase cards from the shop.\nPlay Special Ops stages to obtain Special Ops Points.
Trial Point can be used to purchase cards from the shop.\nPlay Trial Simulation to obtain Trial Points.
Uncommon Particles can be used to upgrade a character card as card alternatives.\r\nThey are rarely obtained by disintegrating the cards that were nerfed from balance update.
Gold can be used to upgrade or purchase cards from the shop.\r\nIt can be obtained from most of the battles.

Text/_workbench_nunocat2/Popup Canvas/No.eng: Get rewarded from the collections menu.

Text/_workbench_nunocat2/ProgressiveDown.eng: 820.00 MB download is required. You can play the game from the playable stage. Subsequent downloads are done in the background.\r\nWe recommend downloading in a stable WI-FI environment as data charges may occur.
Text/_workbench_nunocat2/ProgressiveDown.cht: 需要下載820.00MB。下載過程中可進行遊戲。\n可能會產生額外的數據費用，建議在穩定的WI-FI環境中進行下載。

Text/_workbench_nunocat2/ProgressiveDown.cht: 執行下載。全部下載完成之前也能享受遊戲。

Text/_workbench_nunocat2/ProgressiveDown.eng: 820.00 MB download is required.\r\nWe recommend downloading in a stable WI-FI environment as data charges may occur.
