Text/_workbench_nunocat2/UI_2018_AboutCh.eng: Super hero that swings between skyscrapers with spider webs. Fast and strong as a spider and able to sense danger with his “Spider-Sense”.
Text/_workbench_nunocat2/UI_2018_AboutCh.cht: 獲得蜘蛛之力擊退惡徒，但事實上是一個平凡無奇的平民英雄。發射蜘蛛絲穿梭都市叢林。利用感應危險的蜘蛛感官讓戰鬥變得更有利。

Text/_workbench_nunocat2/UI_2018_AboutCh.eng: Peter Parker was 15-years old when he was bitten on the hand by a spider that had been irradiated by a particle accelerator. After discovering his powers and witnessing the death of his beloved uncle, he decides to become a hero.  Peter bears the responsibility that he must look after his aunt May right after his uncle Ben got murdered by a thief that he let go. He has worked as a reporter at the 'Daily Bugle' during his hard economically hard days.  Peter Parker begins to guard the streets of New York, battling various villains such as the Green Goblin, Doctor Octopus and Venom.
Text/_workbench_nunocat2/UI_2018_AboutCh.cht: 彼得帕克被輻射污染的蜘蛛咬到而獲得能力。個性內向又怕生的他，把能力運用在對欺負自己的朋友報仇的小事。有一天，一個從他手中逃脫的強盜殺了班叔，從此讓彼得帕克的人生有了新的局面。要用盡各種力量與威脅世界的惡徒戰鬥。  蜘蛛人一直在英雄與現代人之間來回，與現在人一同煩惱著人生。在羞澀的告白後也曾談過一場粉色的戀愛，在被不當的解僱後便化身為一個平凡的鄰居。

Text/_workbench_nunocat2/UI_2018_AboutCh.eng: Strength and agility of a spider, sense powers so called “Spider-Sense”. Wall-Crawling. Web-Swinging.
Text/_workbench_nunocat2/UI_2018_AboutCh.cht: 可偵測危險的蜘蛛感官與蜘蛛絲發射器

Text/_workbench_nunocat2/UI_2018_RatingP.eng: Enjoying MARVEL BATTLE LINES? Please take a moment to rate it before saving the world.
Text/_workbench_nunocat2/UI_2018_RatingP.cht: 請留下遊戲的相關感想或意見， \n我們會努力讓遊戲變得更加完善。

Text/_workbench_ys37003_3/Canvas/CardLev.eng: Extra Particles can be used to upgrade a card without the required number of copies.
Text/_workbench_ys37003_3/Canvas/CardLev.cht: 即使卡片不足也能額外消耗粉末來進行強化。

Text/_workbench_ys37003_3/Canvas/InputCo.eng: Please enter the coupon code accurately.\nYou cannot reuse the coupon that has been redeemed already.
Text/_workbench_ys37003_3/Canvas/InputCo.cht: 請輸入正確的優惠券序號。\n輸入過的序號無法再使用。

Text/_workbench_ys37003_3/Canvas/Pointsi.eng: Purchased gem and gold will be used first. \r Bonus gem and bonus gold obtained at purchase are considered as free claims.
Text/_workbench_ys37003_3/Canvas/Pointsi.cht: 「寶石及金幣都從購買時開始消耗。\r購買時獲得的獎勵寶石、獎勵金幣包含在免費分配裡。」

Text/ArenaPreparationScene/Root/Canvas/N.eng: Ratings and Scores are displayed after participation in challenge.
Text/ArenaPreparationScene/Root/Canvas/N.cht: 參加挑戰賽後可瀏覽我的排名與分數。

Text/AssetBundle/Popup/CheckFreespaceFai.cht: 裝置剩餘的儲存空間不足。

Text/AssetBundle/Popup/DownloadFail.eng: Download failed. Please check the network status
Text/AssetBundle/Popup/DownloadFail.cht: 下載資源失敗，請確認網路狀況。

Text/Attend/Event/Comment.eng: Log in for {0} days to receive {1}!

Text/AutoDeck/noticeMessage.eng: Would you like to complete your deck automatically with your cards?
Text/AutoDeck/noticeMessage.cht: 要利用保有的卡片\n自動完成牌組嗎？

Text/BattleScene/Root/Canvas/ContentsLis.eng: Compete against another player's A.I. Win 5 consecutive games to receive a massive amount of Gold!
Text/BattleScene/Root/Canvas/ContentsLis.cht: 試著挑戰其他玩家的牌組，\n每天都會有滿滿的金幣！

Text/BattleScene/Root/Canvas/ContentsLis.eng: Fight against the S.H.I.E.L.D.-registered S.P.I.K.E. A.I.s. You'll be able to reach a higher tier and earn greater rewards the more times you win!
Text/BattleScene/Root/Canvas/ContentsLis.cht: 對付登錄在神盾局資料中的牌組，\n試著發揮實力創下連勝！

Text/BattleScene/Root/Canvas/ContentsLis.eng: Hone your skills and decks against A.I. opponents.
Text/BattleScene/Root/Canvas/ContentsLis.cht: 能以A.I.為對手估量實力，\r\n試著測試新卡片與牌組！

Text/BattleScene/Root/Canvas/ContentsLis.eng: Battle against a worthy opponent with a similar level.\r\nFeel free to compete with other players in this match which doesn't affect your ranking!
Text/BattleScene/Root/Canvas/ContentsLis.cht: 和等級相近的玩家即時進行對戰，\r\n沒有留下戰績，可以盡情地享受遊戲。

Text/BattleScene/Root/Canvas/ContentsLis.eng: Defeat strong opponents and achieve a higher rank each season. The higher your rank, the better the reward!
Text/BattleScene/Root/Canvas/ContentsLis.cht: 季營運的聯盟賽。\r\n打敗競爭對手，爭取高排名的獎勵吧！

Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.cht: 地球軌道。
所有人員迅速待命！
停靠站正受到攻擊！\r\r\n重複，停靠站正遭受攻擊！

Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.eng:
Coulson to Avengers!
HYDRA troops have
penetrated s.h.i.e.l.d.
station defenses!
Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.cht: 考森通知復仇者！\r\r\n九頭蛇士兵\n剛剛已突破神盾局基地的防禦牆！
確認完畢。\n目前正在迅速地\n往那邊移動。

Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.eng: Hope nobody’s \rscratched up the\r Cosmic Cube.\r Those things are \rexpensive to \rrestore.
Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.cht:
絕對不能讓他們
碰到宇宙魔方！
那是一個被奪走後
就難以找回來的物品。

Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.eng:
Red Skull knows
it’s here. He’s
breaking into
the containment
chamber!
Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.cht:
紅骷髏
知道魔方
在這裡。
目前正在
試圖闖入隔離室當中！

Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.eng:
Cap, iron man, black
widow. Keep the Red 
Skull away from
the Cube!
Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.cht: 隊長、鋼鐵人、黑寡婦。\r\r\n不能讓骷髏拿到\n魔方！

Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.eng: TECHNICIANS ABOARD THE ALPHA\r\nFLIGHT SPACE STATION SECURED\r\nIT AND ALERTED S.H.I.E.L.D...
Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.cht: 阿爾法飛行宇宙停靠站的技術者\n安全的回收了魔方後，向神盾局做了報告...

Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.eng: LOST SINCE THE END OF WORLD\r WAR II, THE COSMIC CUBE --A CONTAINED\r MATRIX OF REALITY-ALTERING POWER\r-- REAPPEARED IN EARTH ORBIT JUST A\r FEW HOURS AGO.
Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.cht: 第二次世界大戰後就消失了，\n具備扭曲事實能力的宇宙魔方\r\r\n在幾個小時前再次現身於宇宙空間。
...但紅骷髏\n早一步抵達了。

Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.eng: You are too late, captain!\nThe Cosmic Cube belongs\r\nto hydra!
Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.cht: 已經太遲了，隊長！\r\r\n宇宙魔方是\n九頭蛇的了！

Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.eng:
I was there
the last time 
you had a
Cosmic Cube,
Skull...
Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.cht:
你最後取得
宇宙魔方
時，
我當時也和你在一起吧！
骷髏....
那種事\n不會再發生了！

Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.eng: too many hydra\n\rgoons in the way...\r\nlet’s thin the herd!
Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.cht: 九頭蛇士兵\n太多了...要快點把他們\n消滅掉！
「東尼，\n有看到魔方嗎？」

Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.eng:
with the cube’s
power, hydra 
will be un-
stoppable!
Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.cht: 只要有\n魔方的力量，九頭蛇\n就會無敵！
有我在\n就不會發生\n那種事！
隊長在哪裡呢？
那魔方呢？
消失不見了，\n骷髏也是。
史蒂夫？
看一下外面吧。

Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.eng: What’s going to happen \nwhen people start\n\rpicking them up?
Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.cht: 如果人們開始拾起\n這些碎片，\n又會發生什麼事呢？

Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.eng:
A million shards of 
one of the most
powerful artifacts
in the universe, falling
all over the Earth.
Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.cht:
在這個宇宙中
最強大的物體之一
變成了無數的碎片
掉落在地球中。

Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.eng: Somebody better be\n\rdown there to find out!
Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.cht: 必須有人快點下去確認！
美國，紐約市。
不，等等。\n怎麼了？

Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.eng:
when will you
mooks learn
you can’t stop
the absorbing man?
Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.cht:
一群愚蠢之徒！
要何時才會明白你們
根本就無法
抵擋住吸收人呢？

Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.eng:
diamonds falling
from the sky?
must be my
lucky day!
Text/CampaignComics01/Root/ComicsCanvas/.cht: 天空掉下了鑽石\n不是嗎？\n看來今天運氣很好！
真厲害！\n要再\n試一次才行！
不，\n那可不行！

Text/Campain/BackToWorldMap.eng: Would you like to go back to stage selection page?
Text/Campain/BackToWorldMap.cht: 是否返回選擇關卡畫面？

Text/Comics/Popup/Comment/AskSkip.eng: Are you sure you want to skip?

Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page1/Can.eng: War against the leader\nof Hydra, Red Skull.
Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page1/Can.cht: 紅骷髏率領的九頭蛇\n讓整個世界血染成河。

Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page1/Can.eng: With this Cosmic Cube, There is no justice that will stand!
Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page1/Can.cht: 想跟擁有宇宙魔方的我對抗，只會有死路一條！

Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page1/Can.eng: A cube that contains the power of reality warping.
Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page1/Can.cht: 宇宙魔方是能夠扭曲現實力量的武器。

Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page1/Can.eng: Humanity was helpless against the mighty Cosmic Cube.
Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page1/Can.cht: 人類無力的倒在宇宙魔方的力量之下。

Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page1/Can.eng: The ultimate weapon! The ultimate source of power! Behold the world of Hydra!
Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page1/Can.cht: 看清楚了！終極武器！力量的泉源宇宙魔方！九頭蛇的世界即將來臨！

Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page2/Can.eng: But as Captain America joins\nthe war, things start to change.
Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page2/Can.cht: 不過美國隊長的活躍表現\n讓戰況改變了。

Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page2/Can.eng: We can't let Hydra shape the world as they want!
Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page2/Can.cht: 不能讓九頭蛇對世界為所欲為！

Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page2/Can.eng: Mission accomplished. The Cosmic Cube has been retaken.

Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page3/Can.cht: …在沒有被發現的狀態下\n就這樣過了數十年...

但是
運送宇宙魔方的
美國隊長的飛機
突如其來的爆炸。

Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page3/Can.eng: … once again, the cube leaves\n the hands of justice…
Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page3/Can.cht: ...美國隊長墜落後，\n宇宙魔方就這樣一起失去了下落....

Text/ComicsChapter1/ComicsBook/Page3/Can.eng: Mayday! Mayday! Secure the Cu… Cube!

Text/ComicsChapter1/Root/ComicsBook/Page.eng: With the collision of two inevitable forces, cosmic cube explodes and its shards are scattered across the globe. Containing an infinite power, the shard discovers individuals with new talents...
Text/ComicsChapter1/Root/ComicsBook/Page.cht: 一場無法避免的兩大勢力的衝突，使宇宙魔方的碎片掉落在地球各地。\r\n擁有無限力量的碎片，誕生了許多新的能力者…

Text/ComicsChapter2/Root/ComicsCanvas/Co.eng:
Our heroes look up to the sky from the Avengers Tower, eyes fixed on the portal. 

The fallen remnants of the shattered Cosmic Cube have caused yet another disaster.
The Wand of Watoomb, an artifact with the ability to open portals to other dimensions, has been activated by the energy of the Shards.

As a result, a portal to Asgard has opened above the Avengers Tower, where the Wand was stored.
The Avengers and other heroes can only watch as enemies flood through the portal.
Text/ComicsChapter2/Root/ComicsCanvas/Co.cht:
(這是研發中的關卡)

英雄們在復仇者大廈觀看上空的傳送門，
具備開啟傳送門能力的瓦圖姆之杖因為魔方碎片的能量而啟動，

保管魔杖的復仇者大廈上空出現了通往阿斯嘉的傳送門，
復仇者聯盟的英雄親眼目睹敵人不斷湧出。

Text/ComicsChapter3/Root/ComicsCanvas/Co.eng:
As the Wand of Watoomb has been revealed to open up portals leading to other dimensions, heroes headed to Asgard asking for help.

There, they’ve found Odin the All-Father of Asgardians has been trapped in Musphelheim.

To save Odin, now the heroes march toward to the land of the fire lord.
Text/ComicsChapter3/Root/ComicsCanvas/Co.cht:
得知開啟其他次元傳送門的物體為瓦圖姆之杖後，英雄們為了尋求協助便前往阿斯嘉。

英雄們在那邊得知阿斯嘉眾神之父奥丁被囚禁在穆斯貝爾海姆的消息。

為了拯救他，英雄們便前往火焰君王的領地。

Text/Coupon/Success.eng: Coupon has been registered successfully. Please check the mail box.
Text/Coupon/Success.cht: 優惠券已正常登錄。請查看信箱。

Text/CouponError/1101.cht: 請輸入正確的優惠券序號。

Text/CouponError/1102.cht: 使用優惠券時發生問題。若持續發生問題請諮詢客服中心。

Text/CouponError/1105.cht: 此優惠券已使用。請再次確認。

Text/CouponError/1106.cht: 此優惠券序號已全部使用。

Text/CouponError/1107.cht: 該優惠券使用期限已過。

Text/DeckEditor/DeckValidType/CharacterC.eng: There are not enough character cards in the deck. Please change some action cards to character cards
Text/DeckEditor/DeckValidType/CharacterC.cht: 角色卡數量不足。請把動作卡換成角色卡

Text/DeckEditor/DeckValidType/CostOver.eng: The sum of the card costs used for deck exceeds {0} maximum {1}. Please replace some cards with low cost cards.
Text/DeckEditor/DeckValidType/CostOver.cht: 牌組使用的卡片Cost合計最大值超過 {0}{1}。請將幾張更換為Cost較低的卡片。

Text/DeckEditor/DeckValidType/IsNotFull.eng: There are not enough cards in deck. Please fill in {0}.
Text/DeckEditor/DeckValidType/IsNotFull.cht: 牌組尚未完成，請再補充{0}張。

Text/DeckEditor/DeckValidType/Waring/Cha.eng: Not enough 0 cost characters in your deck to start a battle. Add more 0 cost characters, at least 3 are required.
Text/DeckEditor/DeckValidType/Waring/Cha.cht: 牌組中的0Cost角色不足，無法進行戰鬥。請放入0Cost角色3張以上。

Text/Deckeditor/Drag/AddToEmptySlot.eng: When you release it, the card enters the empty space.
Text/Deckeditor/Drag/AddToEmptySlot.cht: 放下後卡片就會移至空格。

Text/Deckeditor/Drag/AddToSelectedSlot.eng: When you release it, the card enters the empty space.
Text/Deckeditor/Drag/AddToSelectedSlot.cht: 放下後卡片就會移至選擇的格子。

Text/Deckeditor/Drag/ChangeCardInDeck.eng: Release the other card from the deck and enter the deck.
Text/Deckeditor/Drag/ChangeCardInDeck.cht: 放下後就會抽走其他卡片放入牌組。

Text/Deckeditor/Drag/RemoveFromDeck.eng: Release the card from the deck.
Text/Deckeditor/Drag/RemoveFromDeck.cht: 放下後卡片就會從牌組中抽走。

Text/Deckeditor/Drag/RetunToBinder.eng: Release the card to return it to its original position.
Text/Deckeditor/Drag/RetunToBinder.cht: 放下後卡片就會回到原來的位置。

Text/Deckeditor/Drag/RetunToDeck.eng: Release the card to return it to its original position in the deck.
Text/Deckeditor/Drag/RetunToDeck.cht: 放下後卡片就會返回原來的位置。

Text/DeckEditor/Root/DeckEditor Canvas/D.cht: 要回復為修改牌組前的狀態嗎？

Text/DeckEditor/Root/DeckEditor Canvas/D.eng: Incomplete decks are deleted upon exit. Are you sure you want to leave?
Text/DeckEditor/Root/DeckEditor Canvas/D.cht: 未完成的牌組已刪除。要離開編輯嗎？

Text/DeckEditor/Root/Popup Canvas/CardAd.eng: Please select the space to insert the card.\r\nThe selected card will be replaced.
Text/DeckEditor/Root/Popup Canvas/CardAd.cht: 請選擇要放入卡片的空格。\r\n會替換格子內的卡片。

Text/DeckEditor/Root/Popup Canvas/NotchS.eng: In Campaign mode, your avatar is automatically selected as your deck leader.
Text/DeckEditor/Root/Popup Canvas/NotchS.cht: 在劇情中，你的角色會自動成為牌組的隊長

Text/DeckEditor/UnSaveAndChange.eng: Changes hasn't been saved.\nWould you like to select a different deck?
Text/DeckEditor/UnSaveAndChange.cht: 修改事項並未儲存。要選擇其他牌組嗎？

Text/DeckEditor/UnSaveAndExit.eng: There has been changes to your deck.\nDo you want to leave the menu without saving?
Text/DeckEditor/UnSaveAndExit.cht: 修改事項並未儲存。要離開我的卡片嗎？

Text/DeckEditorDetailCardPopup_new/DeckI.eng: Empty space in your deck will be filled automatically.
Text/DeckEditorDetailCardPopup_new/DeckI.cht: 牌組中如果有空欄位就會自動填補。

Text/DeckEditorDetailCardPopup_new/IsInD.eng: This card is already included in the deck.
Text/DeckEditorDetailCardPopup_new/IsInD.cht: 已經包含在牌組的卡片。

Text/DecomposeScene/Root/DecomposeCanvas.eng: Only cards acquired before the balance changes can be Disintegrated.
Text/DecomposeScene/Root/DecomposeCanvas.cht: 只能分解變更卡片前獲得的卡片，\r最後1張無法分解。

Text/DecomposeScene/Root/DecomposeCanvas.eng: Select each card to view the changes before choosing to Disintegrate it.\r\n\rDisintegrated cards become Particles, which can be used to upgrade cards.
Text/DecomposeScene/Root/DecomposeCanvas.cht: 可選取各卡片查看變更點並分解。\n分解卡片後可獲得強化卡片用的粉末。

Text/DecomposeScene/Root/DecomposeCanvas.eng: You can select each card to view the updates and disintegrate it.\r\n\rParticles are obtained by disintegrating the card, and can be use to upgrade cards.
Text/DecomposeScene/Root/DecomposeCanvas.cht: 可選取各卡片查看變更點並分解。\r\n分解後可獲得強化卡片用的粉末。

Text/DecomposeScene/Root/DecomposeCanvas.eng: Some card abilities have been changed.
Text/DecomposeScene/Root/DecomposeCanvas.cht: 部分卡片的能力已變更。

Text/DecomposeScene/Root/DecomposeCanvas.eng: \r\rIf the new version of a card does not suit your taste, Disintegrate it to make Particles, which can be used to upgrade cards.
Text/DecomposeScene/Root/DecomposeCanvas.cht: \r\r若不滿意變更後的卡片能力，可將之分解換成能用來強化的粉末。

Text/DecomposeScene/Root/DecomposeCanvas.eng: Would you like to disintegrate this card for particles?
Text/DecomposeScene/Root/DecomposeCanvas.cht: 是否分解卡片換取粉末？

Text/Description/ChangeLanguage.eng: Language changes will be reflected after the app restarts.
Text/Description/ChangeLanguage.cht: 確定要選擇{0}嗎?重新啟動遊戲就會變更語言。

Text/Dialogue/Popup/Comment/AskSkip.eng: Are you sure you want to skip?

Text/Download/AddDownload/Description.eng: {0} of update is required. You may play and download when critical components have been downloaded. Further downloads will continue in the background.\nCellular charges may apply, please download under stable WIFI conditions.
Text/Download/AddDownload/Description.cht: 需要下載{0}。可從能執行的階段開始進行遊戲。之後會在背景中下載。\n可能會產生額外的數據費用，建議在穩定的WI-FI環境中進行下載。

Text/Download/AddDownload/Title.eng: Downloading update. You may play while the game is being downloaded.
Text/Download/AddDownload/Title.cht: 執行下載。全部下載完成之前也能享受遊戲。

Text/Download/AddDownload/Title_aos01.eng: Downloading update... It will start automatically when the download is complete.
Text/Download/AddDownload/Title_aos01.cht: 下載中。下載完成後將自動開始。請稍候。

Text/MainMenuScene/Canvas/MissionMenuPag.eng:
In the ISS where the missing Cosmic Cube was re-located,
a big conflict takes place.

Captain America, the pure good and
Red Skull the pure evil clashes.
Between them, the Cube explodes and scatters around the world.
Text/MainMenuScene/Canvas/MissionMenuPag.cht:
圍繞著失蹤已久的宇宙魔方，
ISS內發生了衝突。

在純粹之善的美國隊長與
純粹之惡的紅骷髏之間
爆炸的魔方，變成了細小的粒子，並分散到四處。

Text/SpecialMission/Intro/CH1/Page1/Cut1.eng:
After the Cosmic Cube was scattered around the world in an explosion, villains began to pour onto the streets to collect the Shards of the Cube.

After you’d proved your abilities in front of S.H.I.E.L.D., they decided to put you on several missions.

Before any other villains lay hands on the Shards, defeat them and gather as many as you can!
Text/SpecialMission/Intro/CH1/Page1/Cut1.cht:
爆炸發生後， 宇宙魔方變成了無數的碎片， 並散落在地球各地後，
許多惡徒為了得到它而開始湧入街道中。

神盾局對你能控制魔方能量的能力有高度的評價， 後來便派你進行各種任務。

你要在惡徒拿到宇宙碎片之前， 將他們全部打倒， 並收集碎片！

Text/Stage/InstantComplete/Locked.eng: You cannot use Auto Clear function yet.\nYou can unlock the function by clearing all sub objectives of the stage.
Text/Stage/InstantComplete/Locked.cht: 目前無法使用掃蕩。\n達成各關卡的附加目標，才可利用掃蕩。

Text/Stage/InstantComplete/Short.eng: You don't have enough Auto Clear Tickets.\nYou can receive Tickets through Daily Missions or by purchasing them in the SHOP.
Text/Stage/InstantComplete/Short.cht: 掃蕩需要的掃蕩券不足，\n透過每日任務或商店購買就能獲得掃蕩券。

TutorialMsg/4b1d7f2a.cht: 這是可獲得高等級卡片的高級卡片包。由5張卡片組成。\n請點擊[領取]。

TutorialMsg/4b90093c.cht: 請繼續劇情並點擊[劇情]鍵。

TutorialMsg/9b62c6f7.eng: Those are some amazing cards!\nLet's now create your very own deck.\nGo to [My Cards].
TutorialMsg/9b62c6f7.cht: 可用獲得的卡片建立牌組。\n點擊[我的卡片]。

TutorialMsg/a5520045.eng: Tutorial complete!\n Claim your rewards at Daily Mission!
TutorialMsg/a5520045.cht: 已完成所有新手教學！\n請到[每日任務]領取新手教學完成獎勵。

TutorialMsg/b00fc6b7.eng: Create a new deck to battle against real opponents!\nTouch a card to take a closer look.
TutorialMsg/b00fc6b7.cht: 可插入或抽取牌組的卡片。\n點擊卡片即可查看資訊。

TutorialMsg/ba2caa4c.eng: In [Arena] mode, you can use your own deck to compete against other players.
TutorialMsg/ba2caa4c.cht: 在[競技場]可與其他玩家較量實力。

TutorialMsg/c6e6c26c.eng:
S.H.I.E.L.D. prepared a card pack containing
cosmic cube shards - just for you!
Let’s open it to see what’s inside.
Move to [Shop]
TutorialMsg/c6e6c26c.cht:
神盾局準備的卡包送達。
可至商店領取卡包。

點擊[商店]鍵。

TutorialMsg/ce86e1be.eng:
S.H.I.E.L.D. prepared a card pack containing
cosmic cube shards - just for you!
Let’s open it to see what’s inside.
Move to [Shop]
TutorialMsg/ce86e1be.cht:
神盾局準備的卡包送達。
可至商店領取卡包。

點擊[商店]鍵。

TutorialMsg/d79b982c.eng: Those are some amazing cards!\nLet's now create your very own deck.\nGo to [My Cards]
TutorialMsg/d79b982c.cht: 用獲得的卡片建立牌組。\n點擊[我的卡片]。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/0224A61B5C66.eng: You can claim various rewards just by coming in every day.\nTap the [RECEIVE] button.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/0224A61B5C66.cht: 只要每天上線就能領取獎勵，請點擊[領取]鍵。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/14867C086A93.eng: Rewards include Gold, Gems, and Experience Points.\nTouch the [RECEIVE] button.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/14867C086A93.cht: 可獲得金幣、寶石、經驗值等各式各樣的獎勵，試著點擊\n[領取]鍵。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/177E8380EF16.eng: The (Target Locked) card has been added to your deck.

UITutorial/Data/Msg/19A6307808EC.eng: Let's test your new deck against an A.I. Tap the [PLAY A.I. SIMULATION] button.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/19A6307808EC.cht: 於A.I.對戰中以A.I.為對手進行對戰。請點擊[開始A.I.練習戰]鍵。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/1E07E00FBC46.eng: The [DAILY MISSION] resets every day. Don’t forget to claim the rewards!
UITutorial/Data/Msg/1E07E00FBC46.cht: 每天都會有新的每日任務。\n重置前請記得領取獎勵。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/21214C17837E.eng: You have received the (Daredevil) and (Target Locked) cards.\nEdit your deck at [MY CARDS] menu.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/21214C17837E.cht: 獲得(夜魔俠)與(精密瞄準)了，\n可在我的卡片中編輯牌組。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/43DA80115A52.eng: You have completed the S.H.I.E.L.D. training!!\nLet's claim S.H.I.E.L.D.'s Supply Pack at the shop and move on to real operations.\nTap the [SHOP] button.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/43DA80115A52.cht:
完成神盾局的訓練
進入實戰！
試著領取神盾局的補給包出擊吧！
神盾局補給包位於商店，請點擊[商店]鍵。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/4CB520F640B1.eng: A.I. Simulation is a good way to hone your skills and decks against A.I. opponents.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/4CB520F640B1.cht: 隨時可在A.I.對戰中，測試新的卡片與戰略。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/4EF8930212E4.eng: The (Hawkeye) card has been added to your deck.

UITutorial/Data/Msg/65D236355DBD.eng: The (Iron Man) and (Helicarrier Strike) cards have been added to your deck.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/65D236355DBD.cht: 追加(鋼鐵人)與(飛行航母空襲)。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/68615C5EB960.cht: 請點擊(飛行航母空襲)卡片。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/898C91A9AA8A.cht: 請點擊[領取]鍵領取獎勵。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/934B6F8E9DDC.eng: You have received the (Hawkeye) card.\nEdit your deck at MY CARDS menu.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/934B6F8E9DDC.cht: 獲得(鷹眼)了，\n可在我的卡片中編輯牌組。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/A4B190B6EC0D.eng: Let’s go back to Campaign Mode. Tap the [HOME] button.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/A4B190B6EC0D.cht: 繼續進行劇情吧，請點擊 [Home] 鍵。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/AD528851D139.eng: Here you can claim rewards for daily mission achievements.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/AD528851D139.cht: 每日任務中，每天會有新的任務。\n請完成任務後獲得獎勵吧。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/B565A4E57171.eng: Bigger Cosmic Shard boxes contain multiple unknown cards.\nLet’s open a box of Shards to expand your collection.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/B565A4E57171.cht: 宇宙魔方的碎片當中，較大的碎片會出好幾張卡片。\n打開來才會知道會出什麼樣的卡。\n開啟含有這個碎片的卡包來獲得卡片吧。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/BD9885789A3E.eng: You have received the (Iron Man) and (Helicarrier Strike) cards.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/BD9885789A3E.cht: 獲得(鋼鐵人)與(飛行航母空襲)了。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/C362804ECBEF.eng: Choose a card you want to replace with the (Hawkeye) card.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/C362804ECBEF.cht: 可選擇要和(鷹眼)交換的卡片。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/C39452934D45.eng: Add new cards to your deck using the [MY CARDS] menu.\nBuild a new deck and try the next stage!
UITutorial/Data/Msg/C39452934D45.cht: 新獲得的卡片可在[我的卡片]中確認，\n試著組成新牌組後挑戰下一個關卡吧！

UITutorial/Data/Msg/C54408DC35E3.eng: The [Advanced Card Pack] can be purchased with Gems.\nTap the [PURCHASE] button.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/C54408DC35E3.cht: 高級卡片包可使用寶石購買。\n請點擊[購買]鍵。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/C98E90728953.eng: Before returning to the Helicarrier, let’s check the daily mission.\nPress [DAILY MISSION] button.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/C98E90728953.cht: 返回神盾局之前，我要領取每日任務。\n試著點擊[每日任務]鍵。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/CE990715ADF4.eng: Let’s play with our new deck. Tap the [CLOSE] button.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/CE990715ADF4.cht: 繼續進行劇情吧，請點擊 [關閉] 鍵。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/D2F5530E12B8.eng: Touch the highlighted (Card) to replace it.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/D2F5530E12B8.cht: 請點擊要交換的[卡片]欄位。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/D7D2646943FC.eng: You have purchased an [Advanced Card Pack]!
UITutorial/Data/Msg/D7D2646943FC.cht: 已經購買[高級卡片包]了！

UITutorial/Data/Msg/E16CEC439085.eng: These Shards are already being exchanged. Tap the [GEM] button.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/E16CEC439085.cht: 宇宙魔方的碎片已經開始被交易了。\n請按[寶石商品]鍵。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/E9C8B9E532E2.eng: You have already received S.H.I.E.L.D.’s Supply Pack – and completed the mission!\nTap the [RECEIVE] button.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/E9C8B9E532E2.cht: 完成領取神盾局補給包任務後就會賦予獎勵，請點擊[領取]鍵。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/FA16804ECBEF.eng: Choose a card you want to replace with the (Iron Man) card.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/FA16804ECBEF.cht: 可選擇要和(鋼鐵人)交換的卡片。

UITutorial/Data/Msg/FDA475D53E0C.eng: Choose a card you want to replace with the (Daredevil) card.
UITutorial/Data/Msg/FDA475D53E0C.cht: 可選擇要和(夜魔俠)交換的卡片。

UnlockData/Data/Notice/075A3023DBAE.cht: 特殊任務-章節4：難度：困難已經開啟了。\n難度：困難雖然較艱難，但卻能獲得更好的獎勵。

ScenarioScripts/Registration/23b90e6a.eng: Welcome aboard the Helicarrier. let's get you\r registered in our personnel\r database.
ScenarioScripts/Registration/23b90e6a.cht: 歡迎來到飛行航母。必須在神盾局的資料庫登錄你的名字。

ScenarioScripts/Registration/ca5422db.eng: _USER_NAME,\nsuccessfully registered with this name. Your activities will be recored into the S.H.I.E.L.D. database.
ScenarioScripts/Registration/ca5422db.cht: _USER_NAME，已經使用此一名稱登錄了。你的一切活動都會以此一名稱登錄在神盾局的資料庫。

CampaignScenarioScripts/RegistrationAfte.eng: You're vouching for this civilian,\r Stark?
CampaignScenarioScripts/RegistrationAfte.cht: 東尼，你親自挖角來的，所以一定有兩下吧？

CampaignScenarioScripts/RegistrationAfte.eng: If someone can control the shards,\r we can use them, Nick.
CampaignScenarioScripts/RegistrationAfte.cht: 如果是能控制魔方碎片力量的能力者，應該可以試著相信他。尼克。

CampaignScenarioScripts/RegistrationAfte.eng: All right. Agent Coulson, get this\r civilian to the training room.\r Let's see whether we've got\r\nanything useful here.
CampaignScenarioScripts/RegistrationAfte.cht: 好。考森探員，把他帶去訓練場吧。確認一下你有何能耐吧。_USER_NAME。

ScenarioScripts/100000/b131fca5.eng: Make a Battle Line Attack by summoning Captain America.
ScenarioScripts/100000/b131fca5.cht: 請召喚美國隊長進行戰線攻擊。

ScenarioScripts/100000/9dd5c215.eng: This time, the Cube is mine!

ScenarioScripts/100000/895de840.eng: Your plans will fail, Skull. Like always.
ScenarioScripts/100000/895de840.cht: 這次你的計畫同樣也會失敗。

ScenarioScripts/100000/c91f5e83.eng: Summon Captain America and beat Red Skull with a battle line attack!
ScenarioScripts/100000/c91f5e83.cht: 請召喚美國隊長進行戰線攻擊打倒紅骷髏。

ScenarioScripts/100001/f0e2319f.eng: So what’s the big bad Absorbing Man doing out\r here with no adult supervision?\r
ScenarioScripts/100001/f0e2319f.cht: 吸收人，卡爾·克裏爾。不要胡思亂想，退下吧。

ScenarioScripts/100001/aefe2714.eng: You're just in time, Stark. I need a target for all this\r energy I just absorbed!\r
ScenarioScripts/100001/aefe2714.cht: 我吸收了大量的能量，應該可以把你消滅了呢，東尼史塔克！

ScenarioScripts/100001/574c3326.eng: Those shards come from the Cosmic\r Cube. Maybe you've heard of it?
ScenarioScripts/100001/574c3326.cht: 那股能量源自宇宙魔方。想必你也聽說過宇宙魔方有多麼危險吧？

ScenarioScripts/100001/02cceb8b.eng: Iron Man...and the Absorbing Man!\r This could be trouble. What's\r this...?
ScenarioScripts/100001/02cceb8b.cht: 鋼鐵人，吸收人?哦…這碎片是什麼?

ScenarioScripts/100001/6aa1e6b4.cht: 你在那邊做什麼呢？危險，快讓開！

ScenarioScripts/100001/3e3cbefa.eng: Whoa, some kind of energy\r just...flowed into me!
ScenarioScripts/100001/3e3cbefa.cht: 能量…大量的能量湧入體內!

ScenarioScripts/100001/2da9b5ec.eng: What is this odd power? Whatever it is, take this!
ScenarioScripts/100001/2da9b5ec.cht: 雖然是奇怪的力量，不管是什麼我都能夠利用，開始吧!

ScenarioScripts/100001/a5eb7529.eng: Ouch...! Can someone explain what's going\r on? What happened to me?
ScenarioScripts/100001/a5eb7529.cht: 呃呃...！鋼鐵人，到底發生了什麼事?

ScenarioScripts/100001/bc80e125.eng: The Cube's powerful energy is out of control. Hey, try to stabilize it with this S.P.I.K.E. device!
ScenarioScripts/100001/bc80e125.cht: 無法控制身體裡的宇宙能量，使用這個吧！

ScenarioScripts/100001/8053a934.eng: S.P.I.K.E. is a device that helps you visualize the energy of the Cosmic Cube into a form of a card.
ScenarioScripts/100001/8053a934.cht: 史派克是能讓宇宙魔方的能量變成卡片狀態的裝置。

ScenarioScripts/100001/047f1efe.eng: This box full of energy is called the 'Library.' It can contain the energy of twelve cards.
ScenarioScripts/100001/047f1efe.cht: 蘊含能量的此一箱子稱為「書庫」。最多可保管12張。

ScenarioScripts/100001/f6390db2.eng: You can hold up to four cards from the library. Let's call this your "Hand".
ScenarioScripts/100001/f6390db2.cht: 在書庫中可取得4張份量的能量。在這裡稱為「手牌」。

ScenarioScripts/100001/68f52551.eng: Place a S.H.I.E.L.D. Agent on the field!
ScenarioScripts/100001/68f52551.cht: 試著將任何一名神盾局的好友放入戰場！

ScenarioScripts/100001/bdb78560.eng: Drag one of your cards down into an empty slot to summon a character.
ScenarioScripts/100001/bdb78560.cht: 請將想要的卡片放置欄位召喚角色。\r

ScenarioScripts/100001/705c2c28.eng: And he's gone. Let's head to the S.H.I.E.L.D. base to improve S.P.I.K.E.
ScenarioScripts/100001/705c2c28.cht: 逃跑了呢。我們也悄悄地前往神盾局吧。史派克看起來需要強化。

ScenarioScripts/100002/b7ea63aa.eng: Let's do our trial run in this\r training room. It's designed to\r absorb hazardous energy. Mr. Stark\r\nwill join us.
ScenarioScripts/100002/b7ea63aa.cht: 預計在能吸收各種能量的特殊訓練室中，測試史派克的功能。史塔克先生將會負責訓練。

ScenarioScripts/100002/7c53c4e7.eng: Let's start with the basics. When summoning a card, you need energy source. There are few cards that doesn't - which can be handy at times.
ScenarioScripts/100002/7c53c4e7.cht: 先從基本的開始吧，召喚卡片時需要資源。當然也有不需要資源的卡片。

ScenarioScripts/100002/081d847b.eng: See the cosmic fragments on the battlefield?\r Gather these using a character that doesn't\r require resources to play.
ScenarioScripts/100002/081d847b.cht: 有看到出現在戰場上的資源嗎？請在該位置上召喚不需要的卡片來取得資源。

ScenarioScripts/100002/fb69b79f.eng: Resources are required to use certain cards. You can obtain them by summoning a character on top of resources on the battlefield or by moving a character to their location.\nSummon a character on top of a cosmic fragment now to pick it up.
ScenarioScripts/100002/fb69b79f.cht: 想要召喚卡片需要資源。在戰場形成的資源上方召喚角色或移動角色就能獲得資源，\n請將角色卡片移至資源上方獲得資源。

ScenarioScripts/100002/7f011e3f.eng: Now you have one resource.\r Try to use a card that requires one resource to play.
ScenarioScripts/100002/7f011e3f.cht: 有發現資源變成了1了嗎?現在就來使用消耗同一程度能量的卡吧。

ScenarioScripts/100002/db1a19a6.eng: The Avengers' skilled sharpshooter, Clint Barton. A.K.A. Hawkeye. This shard contains his powers.
ScenarioScripts/100002/db1a19a6.cht: 復仇者聯盟最強的名射手鷹眼。要不要試著使用他的能力卡呢?

ScenarioScripts/100002/cf516e34.eng: In the upper-left corner of a card, you can see how many resources are required to use it. Try to summon Hawkeye.
ScenarioScripts/100002/cf516e34.cht: 角色卡左上方顯示需要的資源數。請召喚鷹眼吧。

ScenarioScripts/100002/bd4514b8.eng: A little more powerful than your\r other cards, isn't it? That's why\r it costs additional resources to\r\nplay.
ScenarioScripts/100002/bd4514b8.cht: 如何?很厲害吧?但也別忘了使用強力卡片時需要資源。

ScenarioScripts/100002/9753c0fc.eng: There are also "Action Cards" which you can use against enemy characters directly.
ScenarioScripts/100002/9753c0fc.cht: 也有能直接對戰場敵人使用的「動作卡」。

ScenarioScripts/100002/98458e59.eng: You can drag an action card directly to a slot occupied by an enemy in order to target it.
ScenarioScripts/100002/98458e59.cht: 將動作卡移至敵軍所在的欄位，然後就能以該敵軍為目標使用。

ScenarioScripts/100002/b7e3c89e.eng: You can still make another move after using an Action Card. Try summoning the Humanoid.
ScenarioScripts/100002/b7e3c89e.cht: 使用動作卡後可以再攻擊一次。要試試從手牌中召喚神盾局訓練用人形機器嗎?

ScenarioScripts/100002/4c7e7c26.eng: The turn goes to the opponent after you use a character card. However, when you're using an action card, it will still remain as your turn no matter how many of them you use.
ScenarioScripts/100002/4c7e7c26.cht: 使用角色卡後就會立即變更為對方的回合，但就算使用多張動作卡也不會變更為對方的回合。

ScenarioScripts/100002/6c615375.eng: Each turn, you can only summon one character—but you can use multiple action cards.\r
ScenarioScripts/100002/6c615375.cht: 角色卡一回合只能召喚一次，但是動作卡可以使用好幾次。

ScenarioScripts/100003/d90c601d.eng: Director Fury, we've upgraded S.P.I.K.E. based on accumulated training data.
ScenarioScripts/100003/d90c601d.cht: 「已經以目前為止分析的資料升級史派克了，局長。」

ScenarioScripts/100003/2bf72107.eng: Good work. Now I'll see for myself\r whether the civilian is ready to\r take the next step.
ScenarioScripts/100003/2bf72107.cht: 辛苦你們了！但我要親自判斷他是否真的具備資格。

ScenarioScripts/100003/525ce6ff.eng: Okay. Here's your chance to show\r Fury what you've learned. Good\r luck!
ScenarioScripts/100003/525ce6ff.cht: 來吧，運用到目前為止所學的知識，去挫挫局長的銳氣吧！

ScenarioScripts/100003/734e0b2a.eng: Director Fury? Where are you? We're\r waiting on confirmation of new\r operational plans.
ScenarioScripts/100003/734e0b2a.cht: 局長！您在哪裡呢？您不是要批准新作戰嗎？！

ScenarioScripts/100003/4e44ff55.eng: Understood, Agent Hill. Stark,\r let's make this quick.
ScenarioScripts/100003/4e44ff55.cht: 啊，希爾探員。是啊...東尼，這裡待不了多久了。

ScenarioScripts/100003/17269408.eng: Okay, we'll run a couple of turns\r just to show you the new functions\r we've installed in S.P.I.K.E.
ScenarioScripts/100003/17269408.cht: 那就進行幾回合吧！需要向局長展現新的史派克。

ScenarioScripts/100003/656704f4.eng: Time to test the upgraded S.P.I.K.E.
ScenarioScripts/100003/656704f4.cht: 很適合測試史派克的新功能。

ScenarioScripts/100003/520caa34.eng: You're in an upper-hand when it's about a battle, director. Why don't you give some advantage to the new face?
ScenarioScripts/100003/520caa34.cht: 局長身經百戰，退讓一步再開始沒有意見吧？

ScenarioScripts/100003/76d02bd6.eng: Oh, Tony! You’ve come to ask for help and now this?
ScenarioScripts/100003/76d02bd6.cht: 真是的，東尼！你叫我幫忙研究，這算什麼！

ScenarioScripts/100003/7df558b5.eng: Exactly Bruce. You can get as angry as you want.
ScenarioScripts/100003/7df558b5.cht: 就是這樣，布魯斯。放心的試一次吧。

ScenarioScripts/100003/957a69e0.eng: Looking good! Just one short to make a Battle Line Attack. I guess four characters forming a vertical line will attack all together.
ScenarioScripts/100003/957a69e0.cht: 進入佳境了。只要把一個角色放在戰場上即可形成戰線，既然是縱向，四個角色應該會發動攻擊吧？

ScenarioScripts/100003/5e35ccfc.eng: So your mission objective is to\r defeat me. You planning to take\r over S.H.I.E.L.D.?
ScenarioScripts/100003/5e35ccfc.cht: 史派克把目標告訴我了。但是為什麼那麼想要贏過我呢?如果只是單純的測試那也太認真了吧。

ScenarioScripts/100003/5a5bfb9a.eng: Play a match with Nick Fury, Director of S.H.I.E.L.D. for 7 turns.
ScenarioScripts/100003/5a5bfb9a.cht: 請以神盾局的局長尼克‧福瑞為對象，進行7回合戰線。

ScenarioScripts/100003/edbc8508.eng: Stark, the A.I. you installed in\r S.P.I.K.E. Looks pretty good.
ScenarioScripts/100003/edbc8508.cht: 要給史派克的人工智能合格了呢。

ScenarioScripts/100003/9cd99595.eng: The visualization function isn't\r bad, but there's still room for\r improvement. Right, Stark?
ScenarioScripts/100003/9cd99595.cht: 整體還不錯，但我看不出任何可以改進的餘地，東尼?

ScenarioScripts/100003/40dc7fda.eng: Hey, new recruit. How about I give\r you a little something extra to\r show the Director what you can do?
ScenarioScripts/100003/40dc7fda.cht: 嘿，新來的。我送你一張好卡片，去讓局長大吃一驚吧。

ScenarioScripts/100003/ed86c821.eng: Stark, I'm starting to think you\r let this get personal.
ScenarioScripts/100003/ed86c821.cht: 感覺好像有很深的私人感情?東尼，你似乎太偏袒那邊了吧?

ScenarioScripts/100003/bd952298.eng: Well, Nick. Perhaps you're not used to cutting edge technology, huh?
ScenarioScripts/100003/bd952298.cht: 這個嘛！應該是老氣的局長不太會用尖端技術史派克吧。

ScenarioScripts/100003/b9da9f9f.eng: I hear you, Agent Hill. Be right\r there.
ScenarioScripts/100003/b9da9f9f.cht: 啊，希爾探員。希爾探員...再給我幾分鐘。不會花太久的時間。

ScenarioScripts/100003/555ff786.eng: S.H.I.E.L.D. agents refusing my orders? Well, that’s nothing new.
ScenarioScripts/100003/555ff786.cht: 神盾局特工竟然不聽我的話。本來就不聽話的嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100003/7852abb4.eng: Hmm... The time... Why did I miss the appointment with Hill? That operation was important.
ScenarioScripts/100003/7852abb4.cht: 嗯…時間…已經這個時候了呢。必須建立與希爾特工一起的重要作戰計畫，小心翼翼地了結吧。

ScenarioScripts/100003/37a8a4c1.eng: Director! We've made the necessary arrangements. When are you coming?
ScenarioScripts/100003/37a8a4c1.cht: 局長！已經全都準備好了。您何時來呢？

ScenarioScripts/100003/be2073a9.eng: This is the last turn! I'm on my way.
ScenarioScripts/100003/be2073a9.cht: 這回合就結束了！要來了。

ScenarioScripts/100003/f2f19464.eng: I lost. Honestly, it's very impressive.
ScenarioScripts/100003/f2f19464.cht: 我輸了。老實說相當令人印象深刻。這樣在現場大概也能奏效吧。

ScenarioScripts/100003/1adffb18.eng: I'm not going to lie. Seeing Fury\r get slapped around never gets old.
ScenarioScripts/100003/1adffb18.cht: 呵呵，看到神盾局的局長尼克‧福瑞狼狽的模樣，真是痛快。

ScenarioScripts/100003/5ec095e8.eng: You talk a big game, Stark. Let's\r see how you do.
ScenarioScripts/100003/5ec095e8.cht: 東尼，你要不要也試著交手看看呢？

ScenarioScripts/100003/6f61af70.eng: We have an emergency situation!\r Intruder detected in the\r Helicarrier.
ScenarioScripts/100003/6f61af70.cht: 緊急情況！飛行航母出現入侵者了。

ScenarioScripts/100003/89dc280f.eng: I see S.H.I.E.L.D. Has been busy.\r Maybe I'll take one of these\r devices for myself!
ScenarioScripts/100003/89dc280f.cht: 在把玩有趣的東西呢!帶一個走吧!

ScenarioScripts/100003/f1da1a37.eng: Gather more shards, Creel! I'll\r tailor a S.P.I.K.E. For my own use.
ScenarioScripts/100003/f1da1a37.cht: 要再多收集些碎片呢，克裏爾。

ScenarioScripts/100003/b1fb8a00.eng: You caught me by surprise last\r time, Stark. Won't happen again.

ScenarioScripts/100003/e7ca44f9.eng: I heard something was going on\r here...whatever the action is, I\r want a piece.
ScenarioScripts/100003/e7ca44f9.cht: 從神盾局的傢伙們匆忙行動的這一點來看，似乎有什麼隱情。快去召集大家。

ScenarioScripts/100003/d49c8944.eng: We've drawn a lot of attention.\r Everyone wants the shards.
ScenarioScripts/100003/d49c8944.cht: 對碎片虎視眈眈的惡徒們，在紐約各處引起騷動。

ScenarioScripts/100003/537a70bb.eng: You handled the training. Time for\r you to show what you can do in a\r real fight. Go get 'em!
ScenarioScripts/100003/537a70bb.cht: 以目前為止的成果來看，你充分擁有能力能夠擊退惡黨。

ScenarioScripts/100003/bfaa26f5.eng: What do you think? You ready to be\r a hero?
ScenarioScripts/100003/bfaa26f5.cht: 要不要利用能夠操控碎片力量的你的能力，成為英雄?

ScenarioScripts/100003/354cc0aa.eng: Don't worry. We'll be there to help\r you out. But it's time for you to\r take the fight to the real bad\r\nguys.
ScenarioScripts/100003/354cc0aa.cht: 我們會幫助你，你就試著利用那股能力做好事吧，就像我一樣。

ScenarioScripts/100003/77a3ef0b.eng: You've got the great power\r now...time to shoulder the great\r responsibility. We know you can do\r\nit.
ScenarioScripts/100003/77a3ef0b.cht: 是說力量伴隨著責任嗎？我會拭目以待。

ScenarioScripts/100004/43bf524e.eng: Your first live mission. Good luck.\r You'll have these S.H.I.E.L.D.\r Agents as your backup.
ScenarioScripts/100004/43bf524e.cht: 好了，這是第一個任務吧？跟神盾局特工一起好好表現吧。

ScenarioScripts/100004/6344587d.eng: You've met the Absorbing Man.\r Remember, he's probably learned\r more about the shards, just like\r\nyou have.
ScenarioScripts/100004/6344587d.cht: 吸收人。你先前大概和他交過手，我認為那傢伙已經更加了解碎片的事情了。

ScenarioScripts/100004/11f224a4.eng: I'll be thinking about you while I\r do my own bit to save the world.\r Good luck!
ScenarioScripts/100004/11f224a4.cht: 好了，那我也有很多事要做，先走了。祝你好運。

ScenarioScripts/100004/8b548a50.eng: Hey, you! You know me, right? This time things are gonna be different!
ScenarioScripts/100004/8b548a50.cht: 我們之前見過吧？你來得正好。這次不一樣了！

ScenarioScripts/100004/92c1222d.eng: Defeat the opposing leader with a Battle Line attack.

ScenarioScripts/100004/561e48d1.cht: 哦，過的好嗎？我有點好奇，於是便看了一下那邊的狀況…

ScenarioScripts/100004/f9cd1ef3.eng: Don't worry if you get lit up once\r in a while. You know more about\r S.P.I.K.E. Than just about anyone\r\nelse. Trust that.
ScenarioScripts/100004/f9cd1ef3.cht: 被打一下也沒關係。那邊並不熟悉操控能量。我們這邊的體力更高，可以放心。

ScenarioScripts/100004/8de88dff.eng: Still worried? How about I drop you\r a little backup.\r
ScenarioScripts/100004/8de88dff.cht: 是不安嗎？那就派援軍吧！

ScenarioScripts/100004/9df8542e.eng: Hey, am I late? Show me the target.
ScenarioScripts/100004/9df8542e.cht: 你好，我來的時間剛剛好吧？告訴我目標吧。

ScenarioScripts/100004/91f91067.eng: That's it. I'm out. This ain't\r worth it.

ScenarioScripts/100004/61c96494.eng: I learned a lot watching that. Now I'm gonna put some of it to use.
ScenarioScripts/100004/61c96494.cht: 原來是那樣戰鬥的啊。好，我也來試一次吧。

ScenarioScripts/100005/83affbef.eng: Agent Coulson here. Looks like Cottonmouth has been chasing\r shards.
ScenarioScripts/100005/83affbef.cht: 我是考森。已經沈寂一陣子的柯敦摩斯又開始搗亂了。

ScenarioScripts/100005/be66c164.eng: It's quite hard to know what he's thinking, but I'm sure you can handle him if you play it right.
ScenarioScripts/100005/be66c164.cht: 讓人難以捉摸的陰險惡徒，你應該有充分的能力可以擊倒他。

ScenarioScripts/100005/a585ac29.eng: If I can get the power of these\r shards figured out, the Kingpin\r better start looking over his\r\nshoulder.\r
ScenarioScripts/100005/a585ac29.cht: 呵呵呵，好好利用這股力量應該就能奪走金霸王的地盤。

ScenarioScripts/100005/3bcfcb4e.eng: Defeat the opposing leader with a Battle Line attack.

ScenarioScripts/100005/8d157cb5.eng: Thought I heard a\r commotion...Cottonmouth! I'll\r handle this.
ScenarioScripts/100005/8d157cb5.cht: 因為聽見新的聲音，於是我便來了。那小子由我對付吧。

ScenarioScripts/100005/332b0e59.eng: You take this round, but it's gonna\r be a long fight. You ready?
ScenarioScripts/100005/332b0e59.cht: 不要因為贏了就過分驕傲，這將會是一場長期的戰鬥，需要隨時做好準備。

ScenarioScripts/100006/b730f776.eng: Defeat the opposing leader with a Battle Line attack.

ScenarioScripts/100006/99fd5080.eng: We knew it wouldn't take long for\r Hydra to go after the Shards. I'll\r call in for backup.
ScenarioScripts/100006/99fd5080.cht: 九頭蛇也來亂了。我會向上級報告這個狀況，並且請求支援。

ScenarioScripts/100006/64c2b6b7.eng: Been hearing good things about you,\r rookie.
ScenarioScripts/100006/64c2b6b7.cht: 我聽到許多好消息呢，新人。

ScenarioScripts/100006/1bf5b4a3.eng: You're doing so well, I have a\r special present...a little bit of\r me.
ScenarioScripts/100006/1bf5b4a3.cht: 你表現得很好，我送你一個禮物吧。

ScenarioScripts/100006/73ba06c7.eng: We now have better intel on Shards. Redeploy and report to base. Hail HYDRA!
ScenarioScripts/100006/73ba06c7.cht: 已經蒐集到一些關於宇宙碎片的情報了，快點回去本部報告吧。九頭蛇萬歲！

ScenarioScripts/100006/5a87ad97.eng: Just after a couple of successful missions, an emergency situation breaks out in S.H.I.E.L.D.
ScenarioScripts/100006/5a87ad97.cht: 當我們為勝利而歡樂時，神盾局發生了緊急狀況。

ScenarioScripts/100006/b6209513.eng: Director Fury, we’re seeing a huge spike in other-dimensional energies. Tracing the source...
ScenarioScripts/100006/b6209513.cht: 福瑞局長。探測到來自其他次元的大量能量了。正在追蹤根源地。

ScenarioScripts/100006/4d407cfb.eng: Yeah. There’s some kind of portal on my roof.
ScenarioScripts/100006/4d407cfb.cht: 嗯，正在從我家屋頂上開啟的傳送門內出來。

ScenarioScripts/100006/a33e9544.cht: 太荒謬了。是通往哪裡呢？

ScenarioScripts/100006/14c29c6d.eng: I got a feeling we’ll find out pretty soon...

ScenarioScripts/100200/44840ef8.eng: On the rooftop of the Avengers Tower. We see the members of the Avengers including Hawkeye and Black Widow.
ScenarioScripts/100200/44840ef8.cht: 復仇者大廈的頂樓。聚集了僵著臉的超級英雄們。

ScenarioScripts/100200/a6ccdfc1.eng: Wand of Watoomb, blazing with arcane energy, hovers near the tower's landing pad.
ScenarioScripts/100200/a6ccdfc1.cht: 瓦圖姆之杖散發的魔法能量噴湧至空中，在紐約上空開啟著傳送門。

ScenarioScripts/100200/8125ad8a.eng: The… what do you call it?
ScenarioScripts/100200/8125ad8a.cht: 那個長得很奇怪的權杖的名字是什麼?

ScenarioScripts/100200/d33fa0be.cht: 沒錯沒錯，說了瓦圖姆之杖對吧。\r

ScenarioScripts/100200/a432336c.eng: The group looks up at the hole in the sky by the Wand of Watoomb. It's hard to tell exactly how far up in the sky the hole really is. Space around it seems slightly deformed.
ScenarioScripts/100200/a432336c.cht: 由於英雄們的沉思，頓時陷入了沉默狀態。

ScenarioScripts/100200/68ef8fbd.eng: It just ripped right out of the vault and… well, you can see.
ScenarioScripts/100200/68ef8fbd.cht: 原本位於保管所的權杖突然貫通復仇者大廈到那上方…\r就如同各位所看見的這個狀態。

ScenarioScripts/100200/b396af29.eng: Through the portal is a little distorted view of Asgard. Golden Towers, maybe a section of the Bifrost.
ScenarioScripts/100200/b396af29.cht: 天空洞口的另一端依稀可看見阿斯嘉的黃金塔、彩虹橋。

ScenarioScripts/100200/1d7409c6.eng: You see what I see up there, Tony?
ScenarioScripts/100200/1d7409c6.cht: 感覺完全不能相信呢。你正在看著嗎，東尼？

ScenarioScripts/100200/7e5fb8dd.cht: 如果是在說在出現缺口的天空中，阿斯嘉隱約地在晃動，我正在仔細地留意著。

ScenarioScripts/100200/a0937627.eng: Which is weird, because the Wands of Watoomb aren't Asgardian. More of a Dr. Strange thing.
ScenarioScripts/100200/a0937627.cht: 太奇怪了。瓦圖姆之杖們和阿斯嘉沒有任何關聯呀，\r\r反而和奇異博士比較有關係吧？！

ScenarioScripts/100200/70282682.eng: Yeah, there are six of them. I only have one.
ScenarioScripts/100200/70282682.cht: 對，總共有六個。我擁有的就是目前引起騷動的那一個。

ScenarioScripts/100200/e2d68b3a.eng: So… what about the other five?
ScenarioScripts/100200/e2d68b3a.cht: 所以...其他五個的位置呢？

ScenarioScripts/100200/a180755a.eng: Suddenly we see Loki standing next to the Wand, grinning and gloating.
ScenarioScripts/100200/a180755a.cht: 「這時，傳來了忍住笑容的邪神洛基的聲音。」

ScenarioScripts/100200/e2b28fe1.cht: 真是銳利的提問，班納博士！

ScenarioScripts/100200/8948b5d9.eng: The portal isn't just a pathway to Asgard. The wall of space itself has fallen down, and your enemies are everywhere.
ScenarioScripts/100200/8948b5d9.cht: 權杖有6個，傳送門有可能只有1個嗎!\r \r空間之牆倒下，你們的敵人散佈在四處。

ScenarioScripts/100200/73d4fa56.eng: I shall be very, very interested to observe what comes next…
ScenarioScripts/100200/73d4fa56.cht: 了不起的超級英雄們會怎麼度過這危機，真是令人期待呀。

ScenarioScripts/100200/1d055a6d.cht: 那個真的是邪神洛基嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100200/fac39d9c.eng: Come on, Tony. Weird lights in the sky, all this happening on Avengers Tower… you think I'd miss this?
ScenarioScripts/100200/fac39d9c.cht: 喂，史塔克。是異常的光芒，是天空出現了大洞，陷入了混亂局面，該不會沒看到吧？

ScenarioScripts/100200/faa8fea8.eng: Black widow gazes upon the giant hole in the sky.
ScenarioScripts/100200/faa8fea8.cht: 黑寡婦仰望著天空的傳送門。

ScenarioScripts/100200/b113253e.eng: Pretty soon, you might wish you had.

ScenarioScripts/100200/ee1e3623.eng: From the portal in the sky, an army of skeletal undead pours out, dropping toward the Avengers Tower.
ScenarioScripts/100200/ee1e3623.cht: 在傳送門骷髏軍隊正進行著空襲。

ScenarioScripts/100201/fb920ae6.eng: Nordic undead in my house? I don't think so. Let's roll.
ScenarioScripts/100201/fb920ae6.cht: 我可沒有辦法想像骷髏軍團在我家搗亂的模樣。趕緊行動吧!

ScenarioScripts/100201/5b009433.eng: Why are we bringing the civilian?
ScenarioScripts/100201/5b009433.cht: 不過為何要帶著平民一起行動呢?這個人是誰?

ScenarioScripts/100201/0d714adf.eng: None of us know how to use the shards. If the Cube caused this, maybe using the shards can shut the portal down. We need the civilian to find out.
ScenarioScripts/100201/0d714adf.cht: 很簡單。因為我們當中沒有人能控制宇宙碎片。如果魔方就是主因，那或許宇宙碎片就是關閉傳送門的鑰匙也說不定?為了知道詳細的內容，我們需要平民的能力。

ScenarioScripts/100201/526df24a.eng: Where's Thor? Seems like he ought to be here.
ScenarioScripts/100201/526df24a.cht: 雷神索爾在哪裡？應該在這裡的人是雷神索爾才對吧。

ScenarioScripts/100201/7a9ef41b.eng: If Hela is invading New York, who knows what's happening in Asgard?
ScenarioScripts/100201/7a9ef41b.cht: 海拉正在破壞紐約，阿斯嘉人和雷神索爾不可能會沒事吧。

ScenarioScripts/100201/1e8a296a.eng: Hela? Is she the one with the big spiky black helmet?
ScenarioScripts/100201/1e8a296a.cht: 海拉?你是說戴著黑色尖角頭盔的女人?

ScenarioScripts/100201/4964b27a.cht: 沒錯，不過你是怎麼知道的?

ScenarioScripts/100201/95f4a2a1.cht: 嗯…什麼怎麼去?不就在那邊嗎?

ScenarioScripts/100201/02057d5a.eng: Midgard... So many lives to consume. Hel will spread across this entire realm.
ScenarioScripts/100201/02057d5a.cht: 飢餓的我的身軀渴望著生命啊。在中庭就連小小的呼吸聲也無法聽到。

ScenarioScripts/100201/890acd29.eng: Too many skeletons in the way. She's gone.
ScenarioScripts/100201/890acd29.cht: 太晚了，只留下大量的骷髏並如同鬼般地消失了。

ScenarioScripts/100201/4e2251ad.cht: 可惡，沒有一件事是順利的。

ScenarioScripts/100201/9d2675cb.cht: 住手!為什麼造成這種紛亂呢?

ScenarioScripts/100201/974ed383.eng: You'd have to ask Our Lady of Perpetual Terror over there.
ScenarioScripts/100201/974ed383.cht: 我不認為那是應該在這裡說的事情，應該要去問製造恐懼感的永恆的恐懼女神呀。

ScenarioScripts/100201/ca153f11.eng: I mean why have you come to blows so quickly? Parley! Why must there be blood?
ScenarioScripts/100201/ca153f11.cht: 數十萬的市民很有可能會失去生命。為什麼不考慮和海拉協商呢!到底是因為什麼要魯莽地展開戰爭呢?

ScenarioScripts/100201/bc5ae66f.cht: 什麼?我聽錯了嗎…娜塔莎…?

ScenarioScripts/100201/61b9a7e0.eng: No. Thor is suggesting we went off half-cocked.
ScenarioScripts/100201/61b9a7e0.cht: 你沒有聽錯。他說我們太急躁了。

ScenarioScripts/100201/779bf017.eng: Hela is no zealot. She will listen if you would only speak.
ScenarioScripts/100201/779bf017.cht: 海拉具備常識以及理性。如果你們主動嘗試與她對話，她會聽的。

ScenarioScripts/100201/7e328933.eng: Seriously, you're suggesting we negotiate? What do we offer? New Jersey? She can have it as a new underworld and we'll all walk away?
ScenarioScripts/100201/7e328933.cht: 認真的嗎？要我們協議？那我們要提出什麼誘因？賓夕法尼亞？叫我們眼睜睜看著海拉將地球作為她的新地下世界?

ScenarioScripts/100201/ebed753f.eng: That's because it's a dumb idea.
ScenarioScripts/100201/ebed753f.cht: 這感覺是個很愚蠢的想法。

ScenarioScripts/100201/efca358a.eng: We can argue about it later. Right now Hela's on the loose in New York City.
ScenarioScripts/100201/efca358a.cht: 到此為止吧。紐約現在已陷入焦土化，將那個女人處理掉才是目前的首要任務。

ScenarioScripts/100202/30d7f26c.eng: Team, I've got a visual on Hela.

ScenarioScripts/100202/d4ef3dea.eng: Hela. The realms are in turmoil. Midgard is only one of nine. Surely we should speak instead of fight?
ScenarioScripts/100202/d4ef3dea.cht: 海拉，沒有必要在只是9個王國中的一個中庭傾注力量。停止戰鬥並要求對話!

ScenarioScripts/100202/a23bd800.eng: Hey, Goldilocks. Whose side are you on here?
ScenarioScripts/100202/a23bd800.cht: 金髮的笨蛋在說什麼?你到底跟誰一國？

ScenarioScripts/100202/5522093d.eng: We will have leisure to speak once your souls have joined my legions...
ScenarioScripts/100202/5522093d.cht: 等你們的靈魂加入我的軍團，到那時候我們再來好好暢談一番吧！

ScenarioScripts/100202/f06703ef.eng: Do we go after her or try to close the portal?
ScenarioScripts/100202/f06703ef.cht: 看是要追海拉還是先把傳送門關掉，必須做出決定。

ScenarioScripts/100202/a5e1fea9.eng: Can we close the portal? Where's Doctor Strange?
ScenarioScripts/100202/a5e1fea9.cht: 奇異博士不是能關閉傳送門嗎?那麼只要追趕海拉就可以了呀。

ScenarioScripts/100202/332f2786.eng: We can't count on Strange. The problem is here. We're here. What do we do?
ScenarioScripts/100202/332f2786.cht: 沒有將迫在眉睫的事情全部只推給奇異博士的想法。集合大家的意見想想該怎麼做吧。

ScenarioScripts/100202/4900ee77.eng: If we are going to battle Hela, we must have support from the other realms.
ScenarioScripts/100202/4900ee77.cht: 利用瓦圖姆之杖具有的無限力量就能夠阻止海拉。

ScenarioScripts/100202/81e1a2b7.eng: The answer to our problem lies in Asgard. The Wand of Watoomb is a mighty power, and I cannot plumb its secrets without the wisdom of the gods.
ScenarioScripts/100202/81e1a2b7.cht: 獲得阿斯嘉眾神的智慧查明瓦圖姆之杖所持有的力量的秘密。

ScenarioScripts/100202/ef4bd492.eng: I shall save you that task, Odinson -- by taking the Wand for myself!
ScenarioScripts/100202/ef4bd492.cht: 我來減輕你的辛勞吧，奥丁森。權杖就由我帶走了！

ScenarioScripts/100202/d59498d0.cht: 阿莫拉！你竟然會來到這裡！

ScenarioScripts/100203/02f6baf0.eng: Amora! Master your greed and withdraw. Worlds are at stake!
ScenarioScripts/100203/02f6baf0.cht: 「退下吧，魅惑魔女。世界正處於危機！」

ScenarioScripts/100203/f2f550c5.eng: I care not for this world. Skurge the Executioner will destroy it if I command, and you with it!
ScenarioScripts/100203/f2f550c5.cht: 我對於你們世界的生死不感興趣。史克奇，處置那些傢伙吧!

ScenarioScripts/100203/c9c451e3.eng: Aye, my lady. Whose blood would you have me spill?
ScenarioScripts/100203/c9c451e3.cht: 會按照您的指示去做的，我的女士。

ScenarioScripts/100203/2c33e3c0.eng: Taste the edge of the Bloodaxe!
ScenarioScripts/100203/2c33e3c0.cht: 體驗一下血腥之斧的威力吧！

ScenarioScripts/100203/5db36763.cht: 嗯，雖然很感謝，但我拒絕。因為我不餓。

ScenarioScripts/100203/829cae55.eng: I lend you my powers, Skurge. Now you may seize the shards and destroy these mortals!
ScenarioScripts/100203/829cae55.cht: 我會借你我的力量，史克奇。趕緊取得碎片並擊倒那些傢伙吧！

ScenarioScripts/100203/5406ca5a.eng: Aye, my lady! The Asgardian Healing Chalice will give me the strength I need.
ScenarioScripts/100203/5406ca5a.cht: 知道了，我的女士。我會利用阿斯嘉的藥水，將勝利帶來給你!

ScenarioScripts/100203/71535e98.eng: Toy with them no longer, Skurge. Why do you hesitate?
ScenarioScripts/100203/71535e98.cht: 史克奇，在猶豫什麼?還不趕緊去贏得勝利!

ScenarioScripts/100203/d26be281.eng: I strike with all my strength, my lady…
ScenarioScripts/100203/d26be281.cht: 我的女士，雖然我已經在使盡全力…

ScenarioScripts/100203/d4503951.eng: The shards...extraordinary! And used by one so ordinary in every other respect.
ScenarioScripts/100203/d4503951.cht: 真是特別的碎片!誰能想到竟然是這麼平凡的人類在操控這股力量。

ScenarioScripts/100203/f3b4ee4d.eng: Ordinary? Who took down the guy with the axe?
ScenarioScripts/100203/f3b4ee4d.cht: 平凡？看來沒看到是誰打倒了拿著斧頭的男人呢。

ScenarioScripts/100203/e67a35dd.eng: Saucy, aren't you? Well, let us put your shard-magic to a sterner test.
ScenarioScripts/100203/e67a35dd.cht: 「真是放肆！那就來看看這次是否也能大聲吆喝吧！」

ScenarioScripts/100204/a8c8922a.eng: So, Thor. You and the Enchantress, this is like a lover's quarrel, right?
ScenarioScripts/100204/a8c8922a.cht: 雷神索爾，你和魅惑魔女吵吵鬧鬧的模樣，就如同愛情之戰呢。

ScenarioScripts/100204/9ad57418.cht: 尊重一下個人取向吧。因為是有魅力的女人，才會想長久地留在身邊吧。

ScenarioScripts/100204/062f2de6.eng: She is driven mad by jealousy and lust for power. That is all.
ScenarioScripts/100204/062f2de6.cht: 在被對力量的慾望蒙蔽雙眼的女子之前，不要胡說。

ScenarioScripts/100204/59b263f2.cht: 為你派遣神盾局支援軍。

ScenarioScripts/100204/8b8354fa.cht: 史克奇，這次絕對不要讓我失望。

ScenarioScripts/100204/fc6ae975.eng: I raise the Bloodaxe at your command!

ScenarioScripts/100204/6b1455c1.eng: Each shard contains the power and essence of a living being? Is there one of me, I wonder?
ScenarioScripts/100204/6b1455c1.cht: 小小碎片竟然擁有生命的力量與精髓…我，魅惑魔女的碎片也存在嗎?

ScenarioScripts/100204/ccb3ff96.eng: Jeez, everything's about her. I know the type.
ScenarioScripts/100204/ccb3ff96.cht: 哇，完全以自我為中心呢。我看過許多那樣的人。那也是種病。

ScenarioScripts/100204/faf7e9da.eng: The Wand of Watoomb is but a toy next to this power. I will learn more...and we will meet again.
ScenarioScripts/100204/faf7e9da.cht: 好啊，你就盡情嘲笑吧。我一定會查明瓦圖姆之杖的隱藏力量並占有的。

ScenarioScripts/100204/ea9264ac.eng: Executioner, I have need of you again.
ScenarioScripts/100204/ea9264ac.cht: 史克奇，看來你得再次出馬才行。

ScenarioScripts/100204/aa59cf01.eng: And I answer, my lady. To the last of my strength I will fight for you.
ScenarioScripts/100204/aa59cf01.cht: 「那是自然，我的女士。為了妳我願意戰鬥到最後一刻!」

ScenarioScripts/100204/176ac5a6.eng: Man, he never seems to slow down. How do I get some of that?
ScenarioScripts/100204/176ac5a6.cht: 看來是擁有不會疲倦的能力。是怎麼獲得的呢?

ScenarioScripts/100204/7260744f.eng: He’s slowing down all right. But still dangerous.

ScenarioScripts/100204/d20c57a5.eng: Skurge, our enemies are yet before us.
ScenarioScripts/100204/d20c57a5.cht: 史克奇，敵人尚未全部消滅。

ScenarioScripts/100204/e348cd57.eng: Until I can no longer raise my arm…the Bloodaxe will lay waste to them…
ScenarioScripts/100204/e348cd57.cht: 雖然很疲憊，但我願意為了你而戰。咳咳...

ScenarioScripts/100204/943af823.eng: If he wasn’t such a homicidal maniac, this would be sad.

ScenarioScripts/100204/338f42c1.cht: 我好像無法再繼續了…我的女士。

ScenarioScripts/100204/9d8d942f.eng: You have failed me? Then I must find another.
ScenarioScripts/100204/9d8d942f.cht: 竟然讓我失望!再去找別的方法!

ScenarioScripts/100204/c43ecc85.eng: If we do not pursue her, Amora will continue her plot to recover the Wand of Watoomb.
ScenarioScripts/100204/c43ecc85.cht: 必須去追趕魅惑魔女。她是能夠為了奪取尋找瓦圖姆之杖，什麼事情都做得出來的女人。

ScenarioScripts/100204/8838b57b.eng: We must consult the gods and understand how best to proceed.
ScenarioScripts/100204/8838b57b.cht: 應該尋求眾神的建議並找到最好的方法。

ScenarioScripts/100204/4f13b1d0.eng: We can't go after Hela and also go to Asgard.
ScenarioScripts/100204/4f13b1d0.cht: 去阿斯嘉的話，搗亂紐約的海拉呢?不能放任不管。

ScenarioScripts/100204/bb577d92.eng: Have to pick one. What's it going to be?
ScenarioScripts/100204/bb577d92.cht: 必須快點決定，沒有時間了。

ScenarioScripts/100204/adc9b467.eng: I say we follow Thor. Head for Asgard, come back fast. We'll leave the Wand under guard.
ScenarioScripts/100204/adc9b467.cht: 我支持雷神索爾的建議。前往阿斯嘉後，快速返回。這段期間就徹底監視權杖即可。

ScenarioScripts/100204/4e9ecf26.eng: Do we need to? What's anyone going to do with it?
ScenarioScripts/100204/4e9ecf26.cht: 有必要監視嗎?世界上有誰會去動那個權杖呢?

ScenarioScripts/100204/ef12c3e4.eng: Let's get there and back before we have a chance to find out.
ScenarioScripts/100204/ef12c3e4.cht: 在發生那種不好的事情之前回來就可以。

ScenarioScripts/100204/66011cee.eng: Not until we have some reinforcements in place to watch the Wand. I'll make a call.
ScenarioScripts/100204/66011cee.cht: 如果不加強魔杖周圍的警衛，我是不會去任何地方的。必須要呼喚支援軍。

ScenarioScripts/100205/8e4f332f.eng: Or maybe everyone just wants to tour my luxurious living quarters.
ScenarioScripts/100205/8e4f332f.cht: 還是要來參觀我華麗的家?

ScenarioScripts/100205/d46e8fdc.eng: While we dally, Asgard is in danger.
ScenarioScripts/100205/d46e8fdc.cht: 我們越是拖下去，阿斯嘉就會越來越危險。

ScenarioScripts/100205/430475d1.eng: I know. I get it. But we have to hold on until backup gets here.
ScenarioScripts/100205/430475d1.cht: 我知道，我都知道。但是在支援軍抵達之前，我們必須守住權杖。

ScenarioScripts/100205/b776b71f.eng: Fights like this make me wish Cap was here.
ScenarioScripts/100205/b776b71f.cht: 越是戰鬥越能感覺到隊長的空缺。

ScenarioScripts/100205/e4ed415b.eng: Yeah. Me too. But we'll find him.
ScenarioScripts/100205/e4ed415b.cht: 沒錯，我也認同。我們要祈禱不會花太多時間去找到才行。

ScenarioScripts/100205/e584cc79.eng: Got here as quick as we could.
ScenarioScripts/100205/e584cc79.cht: 沒辦法再快了，已經是最快的速度了。

ScenarioScripts/100205/ce08aa2e.eng: Geez, I hope you guys weren't in a hurry.
ScenarioScripts/100205/ce08aa2e.cht: 支援軍現在才啟程。戴著翅膀的蟬是徒步而來嗎?

ScenarioScripts/100205/eb8e266b.eng: You seemed to be doing all right. What's the plan?
ScenarioScripts/100205/eb8e266b.cht: 狀況意外地好呢。所以計畫是？

ScenarioScripts/100205/5f202e5e.eng: Simple. We're going to Asgard to chase after an immortal sorceress.
ScenarioScripts/100205/5f202e5e.cht: 很簡單!我們會緊跟著魅惑魔女前往阿斯嘉。

ScenarioScripts/100205/52530101.eng: Meanwhile you guys are going to stop Hela and other nefarious forces from fooling around with the Wand of Watoomb.
ScenarioScripts/100205/52530101.cht: 這段期間你們只要防止權杖落入海拉和其他惡徒手中即可，知道了嗎?

ScenarioScripts/100205/a86c4e05.cht: 那種基礎的問題去問奇異博士吧。

ScenarioScripts/100205/43681942.eng: Don't be a downer, Clint. Listen, we have to get moving.
ScenarioScripts/100205/43681942.cht: 克林特，不用太悲觀。奇異博士會來，我們現在該走了。

ScenarioScripts/100206/00bd685c.eng: How are we supposed to get to Asgard?
ScenarioScripts/100206/00bd685c.cht: 好，就前往阿斯嘉吧，但是要怎麼去呢 ?

ScenarioScripts/100206/46fd6407.eng: Not through the portal, that's for sure. They're still coming through.
ScenarioScripts/100206/46fd6407.cht: 是啊，骷髏軍團們仍不斷地從傳送門中湧出來。沒有好的辦法嗎?

ScenarioScripts/100206/fa9523de.eng: Then we shall use the Bifrost.

ScenarioScripts/100206/664a388b.eng: And how do we do that?

ScenarioScripts/100206/c1d1afc4.eng: Mjolnir is more than just a hammer, Wasp.
ScenarioScripts/100206/c1d1afc4.cht: 雷神之鎚可不是一般的鐵鎚，黃蜂女。

ScenarioScripts/100206/dfa8586c.eng: As long as you can still smash things with it...'Cause here comes another bunch of demons that need smashing!
ScenarioScripts/100206/dfa8586c.cht: 也可以平凡地揮舞吧?必須擊倒的惡魔不斷湧來！

ScenarioScripts/100206/e6c4913c.cht: 請擊倒黑暗精靈魔法師。

ScenarioScripts/100206/5af56adb.eng: You guys go ahead to Asgard if you want. We've got this under control.
ScenarioScripts/100206/5af56adb.cht: 不是說刻不容緩嗎，你們先去阿斯嘉!這裡交給我們。

ScenarioScripts/100206/d0dc5f5e.eng: Nah, wouldn't want you to have all the fun.

ScenarioScripts/100206/b7fa237e.eng: They just keep coming. Sure wish we knew where Dr. Strange was.
ScenarioScripts/100206/b7fa237e.cht: 繼續不斷地湧入。儘管只有奇異博士的話也好...

ScenarioScripts/100206/383ec32a.eng: It matters not. We will traverse the Bifrost and return with the answers we seek.
ScenarioScripts/100206/383ec32a.cht: 沒關係。我們會搭乘彩虹橋前往阿斯嘉並且取得想要的答案。

ScenarioScripts/100206/b20f69b8.eng: Um, was anyone expecting a welcoming committee?
ScenarioScripts/100206/b20f69b8.cht: 嗯，原本是誰要來迎接我們呢？

ScenarioScripts/100206/fcda88df.cht: 你明知道不行，已經太遲了。

ScenarioScripts/100207/0ee2ab42.eng: The Destroyer? A little on the nose, right?
ScenarioScripts/100207/0ee2ab42.cht: 毁滅者？真是可怕的名字。

ScenarioScripts/100207/e156f4c5.eng: It is enchanted with invulnerable magic, designed to be an invincible weapon in defense of Asgard.
ScenarioScripts/100207/e156f4c5.cht: 毁滅者沒有被破壞。作為防禦阿斯嘉的武器，被設計成可以無視所有衝擊。

ScenarioScripts/100207/8b91a3a7.eng: Doesn't really look like it's defending right now, if you know what I mean.
ScenarioScripts/100207/8b91a3a7.cht: 這是保衛?到底從哪裡看出來是保衛呢?

ScenarioScripts/100207/e5783e76.eng: I fear the Enchantress has given it a new mission.
ScenarioScripts/100207/e5783e76.cht: 魅惑魔女好像對毁滅者下達了殺傷命令，而不是守護。

ScenarioScripts/100207/d287a8c5.eng: So by invincible, you don't really mean...like, invincible, right?
ScenarioScripts/100207/d287a8c5.cht: 所以所謂的無敵...其實...並不是真的無敵吧？

ScenarioScripts/100207/0f905397.eng: Because I'm not sure I'm up to fighting something that's invincible.
ScenarioScripts/100207/0f905397.cht: 不，若真的是無敵，就沒有必要去對付。因為是無敵怎麼樣都不會倒下，要拿什麼對付?

ScenarioScripts/100207/7d3d626e.eng: Not sure we have a choice.
ScenarioScripts/100207/7d3d626e.cht: 看來沒有選擇。無論是否無敵，那邊沒有要退後的想法。只能戰鬥了。

ScenarioScripts/100207/630566a4.eng: I thought you said it was invincible.

ScenarioScripts/100207/5f6a3f11.eng: And yet there it is lying on the floor not moving.
ScenarioScripts/100207/5f6a3f11.cht: 因為倒下還無法移動吧?

ScenarioScripts/100207/1341ac15.eng: This will not last. We must reach Asgard and return before it rises again.
ScenarioScripts/100207/1341ac15.cht: 這只是暫時而已。要趁毁滅者清醒之前，前往阿斯嘉並帶回解決方法。

ScenarioScripts/100207/6fb09371.eng: We'll keep an eye on it. You go ahead.
ScenarioScripts/100207/6fb09371.cht: 我會負責監視。趕緊前往阿斯嘉吧。

ScenarioScripts/100207/7a7621de.eng: That thing is self-recovering? Whoa! But what about us?
ScenarioScripts/100207/7a7621de.cht: 哇，體力全部恢復了!真是厲害!但是這樣的話我們該怎麼辦…?

ScenarioScripts/100207/33f4f638.eng: We have to pull that thing down at once. A Battle Line Attack that would blow his life with a single strike. That will at least make him lay down.
ScenarioScripts/100207/33f4f638.cht: 分析後發現，如果能一口氣降低那小子的體力，就能讓他陷入無法恢復的狀態。就算不能完全擊敗，也能使他暈眩。

ScenarioScripts/100207/724a4b64.eng: Then so be it! Join us, mortal!
ScenarioScripts/100207/724a4b64.cht: 是我目前聽過最好的消息呢。凡人們，凝聚力量吧!

ScenarioScripts/100207/37e53858.eng: Defeat the Destroyer with a Battle Line Attack dealing more than 1000 damage.
ScenarioScripts/100207/37e53858.cht: 請使用傷害1000以上的戰線攻擊擊退毁滅者。

ScenarioScripts/100207/43fb6001.eng: Defeat Destroyer with a Battle Line Attack of 1000+ damage.
ScenarioScripts/100207/43fb6001.cht: 請使用攻擊1000以上的戰線攻擊擊退毁滅者。

ScenarioScripts/100208/11687f88.eng: It really is a rainbow. That's so cool.

ScenarioScripts/100208/098fc458.eng: Be cooler if it wasn't jam-packed with skeleton monsters. Or maybe that's just my particular taste.
ScenarioScripts/100208/098fc458.cht: 如果沒有滿滿的骷髏怪物，應該會更帥吧。也可能只是我的興趣而已。

ScenarioScripts/100208/435e3a9e.eng: Whoa! What's going on with the S.P.I.K.E.?
ScenarioScripts/100208/435e3a9e.cht: 哇…史派克為什麼那樣?故障了嗎?他很珍貴的呢…

ScenarioScripts/100208/a9057656.cht: 不是那樣…那是錯誤的啟動!

ScenarioScripts/100208/49eeab21.eng: Perils of early adoption. Immature tech.
ScenarioScripts/100208/49eeab21.cht: 不要大驚小怪。那就是新產品的宿命。未完成的技術由於伴隨著危險，才更加吸引人。

ScenarioScripts/100208/328f399d.eng: Well, Avengers, looks like we're going to have to finish this one off the old-fashioned way.
ScenarioScripts/100208/328f399d.cht: 真是的，在這種時候還不動作嗎?照我們的方式早就直接毀掉了!

ScenarioScripts/100208/c3d820d4.eng: Now that's a lot cleaner than fooling around with that S.P.I.K.E. toy, isn't it?
ScenarioScripts/100208/c3d820d4.cht: 比故障的玩具還要乾淨俐落地處理了吧?

ScenarioScripts/100208/620f0adb.eng: First we must speak to Heimdall. Only he may grant us passage...but what is this?
ScenarioScripts/100208/620f0adb.cht: 在那之前必須和海姆達爾見一面。唯有海姆達爾才會允許我們通行…

ScenarioScripts/100208/ced730ce.cht: 感覺是不祥之兆。那麼沒有能夠前往阿斯嘉的方法嗎?

ScenarioScripts/100208/50dbd026.eng: Fine with me. Means we can simply walk into Asgard.
ScenarioScripts/100208/50dbd026.cht: 我無所謂。只要徒步前往就行了，不是嗎?

ScenarioScripts/100208/1d877851.eng: Ohhhhh, man. Why didn't I think of that one?
ScenarioScripts/100208/1d877851.cht: 是啊!我怎麼沒想到呢？快走吧!

ScenarioScripts/100208/61e4cbe7.eng: Odd that Heimdall left his position. Something is wrong.
ScenarioScripts/100208/61e4cbe7.cht: 真不吉利。保護望樓是海姆達爾的使命...

ScenarioScripts/100209/33835e5d.eng: The gates of Asgard are broken. This bodes ill.
ScenarioScripts/100209/33835e5d.cht: 阿斯嘉的關口倒塌了。沒辦法安靜地回去了。

ScenarioScripts/100209/2fb3a15e.eng: Odinson! You arrive late to our martial festivities!
ScenarioScripts/100209/2fb3a15e.cht: 奧丁森!武術慶典為什麼來這麼晚呢!

ScenarioScripts/100209/1ff1eb78.eng: We are heartened by your presence.

ScenarioScripts/100209/37575558.eng: Who is within? We may be able to end this with little bloodshed.
ScenarioScripts/100209/37575558.cht: 誰說要站出來面對海拉的軍隊!武力必須要是最後的堡壘。尋找和平的解決辦法吧!

ScenarioScripts/100209/13832ca7.eng: Oh, I doubt that. Few are there who can reason with the monstrosities of other realms.
ScenarioScripts/100209/13832ca7.cht: 太荒謬了!能有什麼辦法說服那些怪物們呢?

ScenarioScripts/100209/9f69141e.cht: 請擊退黑暗精靈領導者。

ScenarioScripts/100209/48147174.eng: A peaceful way? That's not the Thor I know.
ScenarioScripts/100209/48147174.cht: 和平的解決方式…是哪裡不舒服嗎?

ScenarioScripts/100209/a495ab7b.eng: The Odinson must know something we do not. Trust him.
ScenarioScripts/100209/a495ab7b.cht: 放肆!范達爾。殿下有他自己的想法，不可懷疑。

ScenarioScripts/100209/29a98c8b.eng: What matters is we have Asgard's mightiest protector with us now.
ScenarioScripts/100209/29a98c8b.cht: 當然，重要的是阿斯嘉的最強之神與我們並肩作戰。

ScenarioScripts/100209/aece09bd.eng: Aye, there is naught to fear! To battle!
ScenarioScripts/100209/aece09bd.cht: 那當然，就算那些傢伙以群體的方式出現也無法傷我一根寒毛。藉由戰鬥!

ScenarioScripts/100209/cc2bda34.eng: The S.P.I.K.E. is still malfunctioning. I can't predict what it will do. I just tried to use the Loki shard --
ScenarioScripts/100209/cc2bda34.cht: 史派克到現在還很無知。只是想用用邪神洛基的宇宙碎片而已…

ScenarioScripts/100209/95143583.eng: I'm gonna get rid of it.
ScenarioScripts/100209/95143583.cht: 不知為什麼，感覺會因為這個使得所有一切泡湯。在想著是否要直接銷毀呢。

ScenarioScripts/100209/2ae429c3.eng: What need have we of mortal gadgets when the Odinson is among us?
ScenarioScripts/100209/2ae429c3.cht: 既然雷神索爾和我們一起，就不需要凡人的裝備。

ScenarioScripts/100209/61bafc02.eng: I fear I have a confession to make.
ScenarioScripts/100209/61bafc02.cht: 很遺憾，因為我無法看到我的碎片破碎。

ScenarioScripts/100209/ee1435bd.eng: Loki! What mischief do you bring?
ScenarioScripts/100209/ee1435bd.cht: 邪神洛基!又是惡作劇嗎!

ScenarioScripts/100209/6282cb40.cht: 哇，簡直是在戲劇裡面都沒辦法看到的精彩片段呢!

ScenarioScripts/100209/81390c94.eng: I'm starting to put two and two together here, and I don't like the answer. You suckered us out here. Why?
ScenarioScripts/100209/81390c94.cht: 不管怎麼想都無法理解。邪神洛基你到底為什麼把我們拉到這裡來了?

ScenarioScripts/100209/a1464ae4.cht: 真正的雷神索爾在哪裡呢？

ScenarioScripts/100209/d4516dd5.eng: When the Cosmic Cube disintegrated, it created new pathways among the realms.
ScenarioScripts/100209/d4516dd5.cht: 如同你們所知道的，被破壞的宇宙魔方碎片和瓦圖姆之杖相互作用，產生了一條連接王國的通道。

ScenarioScripts/100209/fb198dec.eng: Surtur gathered a horde and led it against Asgard. The gods of this realm struck back, but now the All-father is trapped in Muspelheim.
ScenarioScripts/100209/fb198dec.cht: 透過那個通道，蘇爾特爾攻進阿斯嘉了。雖然眾神反擊了，但力量不夠。結果被逮住並被帶到穆斯貝爾海姆。

ScenarioScripts/100209/e6d37787.eng: Then we must go there at once.
ScenarioScripts/100209/e6d37787.cht: 為什麼不早點說?沒有時間了，趕緊前往穆斯貝爾海姆吧。

ScenarioScripts/100209/623b32a5.eng: Indeed we must. Oh, and I have another confession. The mortal's device for controlling the shards. I took control of it.
ScenarioScripts/100209/623b32a5.cht: 當然要那樣。啊，是史派克嗎?使那個裝備故障的人其實是我。

ScenarioScripts/100209/01730818.eng: Why? You nearly got me killed!
ScenarioScripts/100209/01730818.cht: 什麼?因為史派克的誤啟動差點死去!

ScenarioScripts/100209/9b2dde78.eng: I couldn't resist, I'm afraid. But fear not, I have returned it to your control.
ScenarioScripts/100209/9b2dde78.cht: 曾是欺騙海拉的最新方法。畢竟她是多疑的人…我很抱歉。

ScenarioScripts/100210/8f8c5c7e.eng: While I'm in a confessional mode, I should add one more thing. I pretended to be my brother to draw out the enemies of Asgard.
ScenarioScripts/100210/8f8c5c7e.cht: 揭露阿斯嘉的敵人也是偽裝成雷神索爾的理由之一。

ScenarioScripts/100210/837ff8f5.eng: And I might have promised Hela that I would draw the Avengers away from Midgard as well.
ScenarioScripts/100210/837ff8f5.cht: 說不定為了不讓你們妨礙海拉佔領中庭，還收到了將你們從中庭甩開的命令。

ScenarioScripts/100210/bacd4899.eng: Stay your hand, archer. I was what you call a double agent. Under the guise of drawing out the Asgardian gods, my true goal was to unite the enemies of Asgard so we could destroy them.
ScenarioScripts/100210/bacd4899.cht: 鎮定，鷹眼。我知道你很生氣，多虧了你阿斯嘉的敵人們才集中在一處。將敵人一網打盡的劇本終於完成了第一章。

ScenarioScripts/100210/465292e3.eng: And now Hela will be aware of my misdirection. Soon she will --
ScenarioScripts/100210/465292e3.cht: 海拉很快就會知道我的本意。她很快就...

ScenarioScripts/100210/91b39dac.eng: Loki! Hela is not amused at your jest.
ScenarioScripts/100210/91b39dac.cht: 邪神洛基!惡作劇太過火了!海拉的憤怒已經足以震撼天地了!

ScenarioScripts/100210/17477fb1.eng: It is the jester's peril to suffer when his audience does not laugh.
ScenarioScripts/100210/17477fb1.cht: 忘記本分而爬上去的傢伙應該受到懲罰!

ScenarioScripts/100210/087b22dd.eng: Attack Malekith once with a Battle Line Attack.
ScenarioScripts/100210/087b22dd.cht: 使用戰線攻擊，攻擊魔雷基1次。

ScenarioScripts/100210/6a35089e.eng: I hear my brother has been up to his tricks again.

ScenarioScripts/100210/cf1caf17.eng: Thor! Wow! Wait...are you really Thor?
ScenarioScripts/100210/cf1caf17.cht: 哇，是雷神索爾！等…等等，是真的雷神索爾嗎?真是的…沒有能夠證實的方法呢。

ScenarioScripts/100210/9ab70724.eng: He is. And so am I.

ScenarioScripts/100210/1b11dfbd.cht: 除了雷神索爾，還有誰能夠舉起雷神之鎚呢?

ScenarioScripts/100210/6e999611.eng: None. So it will lie where it falls when both of you are dead.
ScenarioScripts/100210/6e999611.cht: 我認同那句話。但是可憐的雷神之鎚將會失去主人並被拋棄!

ScenarioScripts/100210/e1259d57.eng: My brother has told the truth...or most of it.
ScenarioScripts/100210/e1259d57.cht: 我的弟弟，洛基，說出真相了。

ScenarioScripts/100210/b1011c6f.eng: Odin is trapped in Muspelheim. We must free him to defend the realm...and we require my father's wisdom to understand how we may defeat Hela.
ScenarioScripts/100210/b1011c6f.cht: 救援被困在穆斯貝爾海姆的阿斯嘉眾神，並借助奧丁的智慧和力量保護阿斯嘉，將海拉擊退。

ScenarioScripts/100210/397f7d13.eng: Quickly, to Muspelheim. I fear he battles Surtur alone.
ScenarioScripts/100210/397f7d13.cht: 擔心奧丁會面臨更大的災禍，加緊腳步吧。

ScenarioScripts/100210/df72702d.eng: The Bifrost will show us the way to my father.

ScenarioScripts/100210/a55edf8a.eng: Thor strikes Mojlnir against the base of the Bifrost.
ScenarioScripts/100210/a55edf8a.cht: 雷神索爾使用雷神之鎚攻擊彩虹橋。

ScenarioScripts/100210/0bf695f1.eng: A PORTAL opens, with the fiery hells-cape of Muspelheim on the other side.
ScenarioScripts/100210/0bf695f1.cht: 雷神之鎚擊中的位置出現了通往火焰的王國，穆斯貝爾海姆的傳送門。

ScenarioScripts/100210/48bb96a3.eng: Hellish? That the word you’re looking for?

ScenarioScripts/100210/036db842.eng: We go in there, we’re gonna be crispy fried.
ScenarioScripts/100210/036db842.cht: 過去那邊大概會被烤焦吧。

ScenarioScripts/100210/c971849c.eng: The Warriors Three, along with Valkyrie and Sif, plunge through with weapons drawn.
ScenarioScripts/100210/c971849c.cht: 阿斯嘉人們和復仇者做好戰鬥的準備站到傳送門之前。

ScenarioScripts/100210/7c66b481.eng: ’Tis perhaps no place for a mortal.
ScenarioScripts/100210/7c66b481.cht: 穆斯貝爾海姆為凡人難以堅持的地方。

ScenarioScripts/100210/ba2858b0.eng: But we Asgardinas must fight to the last when the All-father needs us.
ScenarioScripts/100210/ba2858b0.cht: 但是只要阿斯嘉人們的眾神之父奥丁一聲令下，我們必定戰鬥到最後。

ScenarioScripts/100210/4a94f3a5.eng: Fear not, mortals! A grand adventure awaits!
ScenarioScripts/100210/4a94f3a5.cht: 凡人們，不用害怕！偉大的冒險正在等著各位！

ScenarioScripts/100210/e50afe20.eng: Well, if they’re gonna do it...cowabunga!
ScenarioScripts/100210/e50afe20.cht: 好，既然如此...向前突擊吧！

ScenarioScripts/100210/2b22b325.cht: 準備好要接受酷熱的洗禮了嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100210/3856bd77.eng: Hell yeah. I mean, I guess.
ScenarioScripts/100210/3856bd77.cht: 是準備好了…走吧，去看看吧。

ScenarioScripts/100210/b3e0f925.eng: We’ll be right there with you.

ScenarioScripts/100210/35361a36.eng: We go through, and are surrounded by fire…
ScenarioScripts/100210/35361a36.cht: 一行人進入了充滿火焰熱氣的傳送門。

ScenarioScripts/100300/e359ebb2.eng: Our father is embattled. Surtur's legions surround him!
ScenarioScripts/100300/e359ebb2.cht: 奧丁被蘇爾特爾的軍團包圍住了。

ScenarioScripts/100300/23536a09.eng: The heroes charge, Asgardians in the lead. The battle is on!
ScenarioScripts/100300/23536a09.cht: 阿斯嘉的眾神擔任先鋒，超級英雄們發動了突擊。戰鬥開始了！

ScenarioScripts/100301/a7e205c8.eng: So, we’re here. Uh…where is this place again?
ScenarioScripts/100301/a7e205c8.cht: 結果還是來了。這裡是哪裡呢？

ScenarioScripts/100301/385b89b4.eng: It is the land of the fire lord, Surtur, old foe of the Asgardians. The one who brings Ragnarok.
ScenarioScripts/100301/385b89b4.cht: 是阿斯嘉人長久以來的宿敵，亦是火神蘇爾特爾的王國，穆斯貝爾海姆。蘇爾特爾引領著諸神黃昏，將阿斯嘉引向破滅。

ScenarioScripts/100301/2be6ca04.eng: Well that’s quite motivating. Let’s go find your dad before that creepy thing does. Or maybe we’re already late.
ScenarioScripts/100301/2be6ca04.cht: 趁此機會咬緊牙復仇吧。在你父親發生不好的事之前，先找到他吧。

ScenarioScripts/100301/551bc84e.eng: Uh, but don’t you think we must first introduce ourselves to those burning creatures?
ScenarioScripts/100301/551bc84e.cht: 咦…但是在那之前，那邊正在燃燒的惡魔們，是不是該跟我們報上名來?

ScenarioScripts/100302/f2a4d763.eng: Do you see, brother? Our father is embattled. Surtur's legions surround him!
ScenarioScripts/100302/f2a4d763.cht: 兄弟啊，有看見那個嗎?奧丁被蘇爾特爾的部下們包圍住了!

ScenarioScripts/100302/f0278440.eng: You brought mortals to this battle?
ScenarioScripts/100302/f0278440.cht: 兒子阿，為什麼把凡人帶來了呢?

ScenarioScripts/100302/fb82e72c.eng: Stalwart warriors, though they be mortal. We must stand together!
ScenarioScripts/100302/fb82e72c.cht: 是一群可靠的戰士們，父親。阿斯嘉需要幫助，他們也是如此。我們必須結合力量！

ScenarioScripts/100302/f301a192.eng: Defeat Fire Demon.\nProtect Odin from being knocked out to win the stage.
ScenarioScripts/100302/f301a192.cht: 請打倒火焰魔鬼。\n請保護奥丁。如果奥丁暈倒，這關將以失敗收場。

ScenarioScripts/100302/e3188331.cht: 兒子阿，阿斯嘉就拜託你了…

ScenarioScripts/100302/ff06b909.eng: The All-father is freed! Now we wield the full force of Asgardian might.
ScenarioScripts/100302/ff06b909.cht: 平安地將眾人之父救出了!讓他們看看從那些傢伙的魔掌中逃出的可以阿斯嘉人力量吧!

ScenarioScripts/100302/dd9fa68e.eng: I feel a shard that contains amazing power!
ScenarioScripts/100302/dd9fa68e.cht: 我感受到碎片裡有一股龐大的力量！

ScenarioScripts/100302/76cc1f85.eng: Oh, mighty Odinforce. That, I will keep  for you my friend. An overwhelming power for a mortal to wield. The time to use it will come at a most desperate moment.
ScenarioScripts/100302/76cc1f85.cht: 凡人無法承受奧丁之力。在緊急狀況時，將會需要奧丁之力，因此在那之前還是由我保管吧。

ScenarioScripts/100302/a662875d.eng: Listen, Hela prepares a ritual, to take place in many locations at once.
ScenarioScripts/100302/a662875d.cht: 兒子阿，海拉準備的無數意識將會讓世界在一瞬間面臨死亡。

ScenarioScripts/100302/1ed9711d.eng: We must find Heimdall. Only his vision can encompass her plan...and only by striking everywhere at once can we dilute her power enough to stop it.
ScenarioScripts/100302/1ed9711d.cht: 只有海姆達爾的眼睛能夠看破海拉的計畫。找到海姆達爾吧!

ScenarioScripts/100302/9105657e.cht: 聽到了吧?現在以追擊海姆達爾為優先。

ScenarioScripts/100303/632e44f4.eng: Fire all over the place. How inconvenient.

ScenarioScripts/100303/392ec8fc.cht: 靠近那個等於是自殺行為。我要找找其他的路。

ScenarioScripts/100303/ce3222be.eng: No. You will die here, and feed the eternal fires of Muspelheim.
ScenarioScripts/100303/ce3222be.cht: 不需要那樣。因為這邊將會成為你們的墳墓。我將會用你們被燻黑的身軀作為永恆之火的木柴。

ScenarioScripts/100303/a79f46ec.eng: Burn them into ashes, my children!
ScenarioScripts/100303/a79f46ec.cht: 手下們，將他們全都化為灰燼吧！

ScenarioScripts/100303/baef7ec7.eng: All of a sudden things don't look so good. How are we supposed to fight on a lava field?
ScenarioScripts/100303/baef7ec7.cht: 情況突然變得相當糟糕。你打算怎麼在這個熔岩戰場上戰鬥呢？

ScenarioScripts/100303/295400ca.eng: We need to do something or we're going to burn.
ScenarioScripts/100303/295400ca.cht: 如果不做些什麼，就會被燒死或是打死。

ScenarioScripts/100303/bbc3ad68.eng: All who stand with me, I grant you the power!
ScenarioScripts/100303/bbc3ad68.cht: 與我同行者能獲得力量！

ScenarioScripts/100303/cc0dd3f3.eng: You need two shards to use Odinforce!
ScenarioScripts/100303/cc0dd3f3.cht: 若要使用奧丁之力，需要2個資源。先收集資源吧!

ScenarioScripts/100303/50e66017.eng: The Odinforce has extinguished Surtur's fire!
ScenarioScripts/100303/50e66017.cht: 奧丁之力將熔岩消滅了!

ScenarioScripts/100303/820934cc.eng: You hear that my friends? It’s Surtur time.
ScenarioScripts/100303/820934cc.cht: 聽得到聲音嗎，朋友？看來蘇爾特爾本人要親自出馬了。

ScenarioScripts/100303/cb8c8156.eng: Your souls will remain here in ashes!
ScenarioScripts/100303/cb8c8156.cht: 你們的靈魂將會化為灰燼並漂泊在穆斯貝爾海姆!

ScenarioScripts/100304/704f8984.eng: No shard will save you. Muspelheim is my realm. Here I reign, and decide who lives and who dies.
ScenarioScripts/100304/704f8984.cht: 什麼都救不了你。身為穆斯貝爾海姆的君主的我，蘇爾特，可以決定生存和死亡。

ScenarioScripts/100304/ceb11e41.eng: You forget yourself, demon. I am the All-father, and these are my chosen host!
ScenarioScripts/100304/ceb11e41.cht: 惡魔，看來你忘了自己的斤兩。我是眾人之父，他們都是要與我同在的被選之人。

ScenarioScripts/100304/994cae92.eng: All our ages of strife end here, Odin. Muspelheim will be your funeral pyre.
ScenarioScripts/100304/994cae92.cht: 長久以來的戰鬥，即將要結束了呢，奧丁。我將會在你的墳墓上灑下它。

ScenarioScripts/100304/7a224836.eng: Next turn, I will summon  two of my pet fire dragons to destroy you.
ScenarioScripts/100304/7a224836.cht: 在下一回合，兩隻火龍將會橫掃戰場!

ScenarioScripts/100304/7b88e742.eng: Fire dragons are not much left. You, you are good at holding on!
ScenarioScripts/100304/7b88e742.cht: 這傢伙還真能撐…最後的火龍，準備好出擊吧!

ScenarioScripts/100304/3cd24a51.eng: A mighty power to wield, mortal. Let me hold to it. We must use it wisely.
ScenarioScripts/100304/3cd24a51.cht: 凡人，你得到巨大的力量了啊。利用智慧使用它吧。

ScenarioScripts/100304/39420a8e.eng: Ah. I do not have Heimdall's gift, perhaps, but I see enough. He has gone to Jotunheim.
ScenarioScripts/100304/39420a8e.cht: 海姆達爾在約頓海姆。不必懷疑，雖然我沒有到海姆達爾的程度，但還是能看到很遠的。

ScenarioScripts/100304/4853b510.eng: Then we will follow. This way.
ScenarioScripts/100304/4853b510.cht: 這裡是通往約頓海姆的路。好好準備吧。

ScenarioScripts/100305/307e9518.eng: I remain unamused by Loki's jest. If you remain his allies, you will pay for his slight.
ScenarioScripts/100305/307e9518.cht: 邪神洛基的惡作劇依然讓人覺得枯燥乏味。如果繼續當他的同伴，你們將會付出代價。

ScenarioScripts/100305/468a84bc.eng: Let it never be said of the gods that they could take a joke.
ScenarioScripts/100305/468a84bc.cht: 黑暗精靈玩笑的水準真是不敢恭維。付出代價的並不是這邊。

ScenarioScripts/100305/d57ccd82.eng: Let the host of Dark Elves join the Jotun!
ScenarioScripts/100305/d57ccd82.cht: 黑暗精靈的勇猛戰士們，給冰霜巨人們補充力量吧！

ScenarioScripts/100305/2452279b.eng: Malekith and Ymir, in alliance...this is a dangerous moment for the realms.
ScenarioScripts/100305/2452279b.cht: 魔雷基與尤彌爾聯手…怎麼會發生這樣的事情呢!

ScenarioScripts/100305/3df5b684.eng: More dangerous than you know, brother, for both are following Hela's orders.
ScenarioScripts/100305/3df5b684.cht: 更糟的是，或許他們兩個都聽從海拉的命令呢，兄弟。

ScenarioScripts/100305/25ff97b3.eng: They may, yes...but Hela is in another realm and we may only destroy the enemy in front of us!
ScenarioScripts/100305/25ff97b3.cht: 是啊，敵人的氣勢正在變強。但是海拉並不在這裡，我們只需先消滅眼前的敵人就行了吧！

ScenarioScripts/100305/de0d4127.eng: Your worthless weaklings won't do it!
ScenarioScripts/100305/de0d4127.cht: 又想要派小嘍囉對付我嗎?那就試試看吧!

ScenarioScripts/100305/2de62312.eng: The cold here gets into your bones,\r doesn't it? How about you come warm me up?
ScenarioScripts/100305/2de62312.cht: 這裡真是寒風刺骨啊。娜塔莎，沒有能夠保暖的東西嗎?

ScenarioScripts/100305/2991e3f1.eng: Easy, Romeo. Warm yourself with\r thoughts of home. We'll be back\r soon.
ScenarioScripts/100305/2991e3f1.cht: 當然有簡單的方法。一邊想家一邊感受溫暖吧。很快就能回去了。

ScenarioScripts/100305/061d9244.eng: Optimism...the curse of mortals. You will soon learn this, but too late for the lesson to matter.
ScenarioScripts/100305/061d9244.cht: 希望是降臨在人類身上的詛咒。但是…太晚領悟了。

ScenarioScripts/100306/607dd416.eng: Jotun! Strike these interlopers down, mortal and Asgardian alike!
ScenarioScripts/100306/607dd416.cht: 冰霜巨人!懲治所有凡人、阿斯嘉人入侵者吧!

ScenarioScripts/100306/e30a50e9.eng: May their bones turn to ice. I will leave them standing, as a warning to those who would follow.
ScenarioScripts/100306/e30a50e9.cht: 你們的血肉將會被冰凍！我要給你們看看挑戰約頓海姆之王，尤彌爾，是多麼愚蠢的事。

ScenarioScripts/100306/40f10fb3.eng: Do you fear to face us, Ymir? We cut through your legions and still\r you do not appear.\r
ScenarioScripts/100306/40f10fb3.cht: 尤彌爾，看你只在後面嘟嚷著沒有現身，是害怕我們了嗎?

ScenarioScripts/100306/94362845.eng: Maybe not quite so much taunting. I'll feel fine if we find Heimdall and get out of here without ever fighting Ymir.
ScenarioScripts/100306/94362845.cht: 可以停止挑釁了吧？可以不和尤彌爾正面交鋒，找到海姆達爾就離開就好了不是嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100306/6298a80a.cht: 尤彌爾?似乎只是個小角色。

ScenarioScripts/100306/81a5166c.eng: He is the king of this realm, and an opponent not to be taken lightly.
ScenarioScripts/100306/81a5166c.cht: 號令冰霜巨人的約頓海姆之王。也是不容小覷的對手。

ScenarioScripts/100306/ce0f4241.eng: Yeah, that much we had figured out.
ScenarioScripts/100306/ce0f4241.cht: 哇，一下子就能知道是怎樣的存在。

ScenarioScripts/100306/2e0cda3e.eng: The Jotun have fled. We must get our bearings here, or be lost in the trackless wastes of Jotunheim forever.
ScenarioScripts/100306/2e0cda3e.cht: 冰霜巨人們撤退了。如果不在這裡做個了結的話，約頓海姆可能會永遠徘徊在暴風雪當中。

ScenarioScripts/100307/bde6976c.eng: Wait! Is this the form of Heimdall I see within this pillar of ice?
ScenarioScripts/100307/bde6976c.cht: 等等！那個冰柱裡面好像有什麼東西。是海姆達爾嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100307/9de1b2e9.eng: Yes, this is Heimdall. Dead? No, struck down but still breathing.
ScenarioScripts/100307/9de1b2e9.cht: 是海姆達爾!他還保有氣息在。

ScenarioScripts/100307/09361c0d.eng: Here is a shard in a pillar of ice.\r Perhaps it is Heimdall's.
ScenarioScripts/100307/09361c0d.cht: 冰柱內，也有宇宙碎片。是海姆達爾的吧。

ScenarioScripts/100307/3cc66400.eng: He cannot. I have enchanted it with a strength beyond even Mjolnir...and now you face not Jotun only, but Ymir!
ScenarioScripts/100307/3cc66400.cht: 再怎麼拼命掙扎也無法破壞冰柱。因為它被創造為無法被任何東西粉碎，即使是雷神之鎚!

ScenarioScripts/100307/2f40a83b.eng: Defeat Ymir.\nProtect Heimdall from being knocked out to win the stage.
ScenarioScripts/100307/2f40a83b.cht: 請打倒尤彌爾\n保護海姆達爾。如果海姆達爾暈倒，這關將以失敗收場。

ScenarioScripts/100307/7ba1fa4b.eng: Use The Eternal Flame, mortal! Without it, we cannot strike at Ymir.
ScenarioScripts/100307/7ba1fa4b.cht: 利用永恆之火吧，凡人！以現在的狀態無法進行任何攻擊。

ScenarioScripts/100307/a452c6c3.eng: The Eternal Flame has melted the ice of Jotunheim. Now, protect Heimdall and strike them down!
