ScenarioScripts/100307/a452c6c3.cht: 永恆的火花融化了約頓海姆的冰!保護海姆達爾，並且擊倒冰霜巨人吧!

ScenarioScripts/100307/d3e92cd5.eng: Ymir has withdrawn, but we are not safe in his realm.
ScenarioScripts/100307/d3e92cd5.cht: 雖然尤彌爾撤退了，我們也不能滯留要趕緊移動。這裡絕對不安全。

ScenarioScripts/100307/2e26ffa1.eng: Thank you, mortal. Looks like you found a shard that contains my powers. It will help you stand against Hela.
ScenarioScripts/100307/2e26ffa1.cht: 凡人啊，謝謝你。你獲得了我的宇宙碎片了呀。在與海拉對抗時它將能派上用場。

ScenarioScripts/100307/046c02e7.eng: Avengers! And Asgardians. I bring dire news.
ScenarioScripts/100307/046c02e7.cht: 復仇者！以及阿斯嘉人們，有個壞消息。

ScenarioScripts/100307/78c64d77.eng: I have sensed the energies of Hel at work here on Earth, but I cannot discern what she plans.
ScenarioScripts/100307/78c64d77.cht: 在地球上各處探測到死亡的氣息，但卻沒辦法知道海拉到底在計畫著什麼陰謀。

ScenarioScripts/100307/6dfa41d2.eng: You must hasten back to Earth. Only our united strength can resist such power.
ScenarioScripts/100307/6dfa41d2.cht: 快點回到地球吧。若想掌握海拉內心的黑暗需要你們。

ScenarioScripts/100307/63ff4993.eng: Do not attempt the Bifrost. It is blocked. I will conduct you back to Earth instead...now!
ScenarioScripts/100307/63ff4993.cht: 不能再給你們時間了。地球即將面臨最差的狀況，現在要直接讓你們瞬移!

ScenarioScripts/100308/7c245f8c.eng: You guys are just in time.

ScenarioScripts/100308/31ec661b.eng: Defeat Destroyer with a Battle Line Attack of 1200+ damage.
ScenarioScripts/100308/31ec661b.cht: 請使用攻擊力1200以上的戰線攻擊擊退毁滅者。

ScenarioScripts/100308/0eef0dbe.eng: I told you, the Destroyer is never permanently struck down.
ScenarioScripts/100308/0eef0dbe.cht: 毁滅者無法被擊倒的事實大家都知道嗎?

ScenarioScripts/100308/105bb8da.cht: 是真的啊?我還以為你誇張了!

ScenarioScripts/100308/c28484e1.eng: Let's do it again. A Battle Line Attack that would blow his life with a single strike.
ScenarioScripts/100308/c28484e1.cht: 必須給予強力的一擊才能使其無法再站起來。

ScenarioScripts/100308/830bda45.eng: I don't know about you, but I think we should just leave this thing lying around until it wakes up again.
ScenarioScripts/100308/830bda45.cht: 雖然我不知道這傢伙的真面目，但再次發生之前最好還是別採取任何行動比較好吧?啊!並不是因為害怕才那樣…

ScenarioScripts/100308/3a1c52f5.eng: Can you and Valkyrie return the Destroyer to its cell before it reawakens?
ScenarioScripts/100308/3a1c52f5.cht: 趁毁滅者醒來之前，可以送去監牢嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100308/05b1ec7f.eng: If we do it now, yes.
ScenarioScripts/100308/05b1ec7f.cht: 現在開始進行的話，是可行的。

ScenarioScripts/100308/d8abfb70.eng: Yeah, now is a good time. Because we're about to be occupied with another undead army.
ScenarioScripts/100308/d8abfb70.cht: 嗯，必須立刻行動。有其他骷髏軍團正在聚集。

ScenarioScripts/100309/995af2c1.eng: Still with the undead in my house.
ScenarioScripts/100309/995af2c1.cht: 我家怎麼還有骷髏軍團?

ScenarioScripts/100309/51dfed5e.cht: 海拉的手下。是狠毒的傢伙們。

ScenarioScripts/100309/e8d3482b.eng: From their resting places, the dead will rise and march. New York will be the capital of my New Hel!
ScenarioScripts/100309/e8d3482b.cht: 他們將會在死者們的歇息處再度站起來並行進。\r紐約將會變成新的地獄之都！

ScenarioScripts/100309/edd4d73f.eng: This is not  the end. We'll face each other again soon!
ScenarioScripts/100309/edd4d73f.cht: 還沒結束，所以不用太難過。我們很快會再見面的...

ScenarioScripts/100309/55f4e750.eng: Cemeteries. Hela has sent her minions with charms to awaken the dead. And you have yet another threat to meet...
ScenarioScripts/100309/55f4e750.cht: 海拉企圖喚醒亡者。但是總覺得遺漏了一項重要的事情…

ScenarioScripts/100309/f4af0f47.cht: 奇異博士，將傳送門關閉的事情，必須加快速度。

ScenarioScripts/100310/cbf6a2e6.eng: Do you feel fear, Odinson? You will. Burn them!
ScenarioScripts/100310/cbf6a2e6.cht: 害怕了嗎，奧丁森？盡情地恐懼吧。黑暗的火焰將會把你的靈魂推入地獄！

ScenarioScripts/100310/674b9cbf.eng: I can see… In this battle, Hela will make a special attack every five turns.
ScenarioScripts/100310/674b9cbf.cht: 海拉會在每5回合發動讓戰場上的所有人倒下的攻擊。讓我利用千里眼來事先提醒你吧。

ScenarioScripts/100310/61d91d42.eng: Hela is weakening! Her power is stretched too thin. Strike her now!
ScenarioScripts/100310/61d91d42.cht: 海拉的力量正在減弱!趁現在攻擊吧!

ScenarioScripts/100310/c9c3659a.eng: Strange! We can’t hold them off forever. Close the portal!
ScenarioScripts/100310/c9c3659a.cht: 奇異博士!要到極限了!快要擋不住了!快點把傳送門關掉!

ScenarioScripts/100310/16882927.eng: After three turns, Hela will strike the entire battlefield!

ScenarioScripts/100310/1d6f0b53.eng: Destruction at the end of this turn!
ScenarioScripts/100310/1d6f0b53.cht: 這回合結束後，戰場上的所有人都會倒下！

ScenarioScripts/100310/334da0f7.eng: Wrath of Hel comes the next turn! Everyone on the battlefield will be destroyed!
ScenarioScripts/100310/334da0f7.cht: 在下一回合，將有地獄的憤怒襲來!戰場上的所有人都將免不了死亡。

ScenarioScripts/100310/3b71675d.eng: Destruction at the end of this turn!
ScenarioScripts/100310/3b71675d.cht: 這次是最後一次！能撐到現在已經很厲害了。

ScenarioScripts/100310/d7d06368.eng: Hela has fled to her realm. We do not have the strength to pursue her there.
ScenarioScripts/100310/d7d06368.cht: 海拉逃回她的王國了。但由於我們也負傷慘重，並沒有餘力追上去，真是令人氣憤。

ScenarioScripts/100310/fb2423e5.eng: No. We must return to Asgard. This will not be the final assault on the realm.
ScenarioScripts/100310/fb2423e5.cht: 不能追上去。必須要回到阿斯嘉加強防備。海拉一定會再次進行攻擊。

ScenarioScripts/100310/a9d2fab2.eng: You do that. Meanwhile we’ll be closing the portal...right? Strange?
ScenarioScripts/100310/a9d2fab2.cht: 就那樣辦吧。反正這段期間我們會關閉傳送門。奇異博士，辦得到吧?

ScenarioScripts/100310/d043a469.eng: I cannot. The Wand of Watoomb resonates too powerfully with the energies of the Cosmic Cube.
ScenarioScripts/100310/d043a469.cht: 光憑我的力量還不夠。瓦圖姆之杖和宇宙魔方所產生反應太過強烈。

ScenarioScripts/100310/7ea502c7.eng: The shattering of the Cube has activated all six of the Wands.
ScenarioScripts/100310/7ea502c7.cht: 雖然難以置信，但是魔方爆炸時，使六個權杖全部啟動了。

ScenarioScripts/100310/4af41d13.cht: 什麼?那麼剩下的5個在哪裡?

ScenarioScripts/100310/8132456a.eng: The dimensional energies of the Cosmic Cube are obscuring their locations...save one.
ScenarioScripts/100310/8132456a.cht: 宇宙魔方的次元能量正在追蹤位置。幸好我們至少保有一個。

ScenarioScripts/100310/bfb38fec.eng: Spit it out, Strange. Where’s that one?
ScenarioScripts/100310/bfb38fec.cht: 快說，奇異博士。還有一個在哪裡？

ScenarioScripts/100310/3dc3a92b.eng: At the rooftop of the Avenger’s Tower,\r\r Doctor Strange creates a magical barrier, sealing the portal.
ScenarioScripts/100310/3dc3a92b.cht: 在復仇者大廈的頂樓，奇異博士使盡全力試圖封印傳送門。

ScenarioScripts/100310/4e944400.eng: I still see the towers of Asgard.
ScenarioScripts/100310/4e944400.cht: 現在仍然能夠隱約看見阿斯嘉。不能再關起來些嗎?

ScenarioScripts/100310/fe8c495b.eng: As I said, I cannot close the portal as long as the Wand are active… but I have blocked it.
ScenarioScripts/100310/fe8c495b.cht: 如同之前說過的，只要瓦圖姆之杖被啟用，傳送門就無法完全封印...但還是可以暫時抵擋一下。

ScenarioScripts/100310/66d24a80.eng: Portal is sealed but not closing it. We can still see the towers of Asgard through it, distorted by the arcane energy of the barrier.
ScenarioScripts/100310/66d24a80.cht: 沒有完全封印的傳送門以模糊的型態出現在紐約上空。

ScenarioScripts/100310/182eef9d.eng: Now we must move quickly to the Sanctum Sanctorum.
ScenarioScripts/100310/182eef9d.cht: 這邊就先這樣…要趕緊前往至聖所了。

ScenarioScripts/100310/ce5b897d.eng: I need you and the other Avengers here to guard the Wand and the portal. The Enchantress or Malekith may yet strike at the barrier.
ScenarioScripts/100310/ce5b897d.cht: 你和其他復仇者必須在這裡守護權杖與傳送門。魅惑魔女和魔雷基隨時都有可能再次發動攻擊。

ScenarioScripts/100310/c12e4066.eng: Strange opens own portal connected to the Sanctum Sanctorum.
ScenarioScripts/100310/c12e4066.cht: 奇異博士背誦咒語並開啟通往至聖所的傳送門。

ScenarioScripts/100310/297d870b.eng: But your power over the shards will be useful in the \rcoming battle. Accompany me.
ScenarioScripts/100310/297d870b.cht: 這麼看來…你是使用宇宙碎片的人呢。要不要利用那個力量幫助我呢?

ScenarioScripts/100310/eb25e61e.eng: You don’t need Iron Man, but you need me?

ScenarioScripts/100310/73a753d1.eng: I’ll be honest, I’m a little hurt.
ScenarioScripts/100310/73a753d1.cht: 老實說吧。剛才我的內心受傷了。

ScenarioScripts/100310/26f95bf8.cht: 我也是。不覺得我們被無視了嗎?

ScenarioScripts/100310/2b11971b.eng: Fear not, Stark. We have not seen the last of each other.
ScenarioScripts/100310/2b11971b.cht: 不要講廢話，史塔克。你應該知道這並不是全部，現在只是開始。

ScenarioScripts/100310/34567aa1.eng: And no needs to be afraid, my friend. There is no time to waste.
ScenarioScripts/100310/34567aa1.cht: 朋友，不要畏懼，快走吧，沒時間浪費了。

ScenarioScripts/100400/c0710b4b.eng: Dr. Strange regards the second Wand\r of Watoomb, crackling with power. Beyond it, a portal.\r\nThrough the portal, We can see the blasted landscape of the Dark Dimension.
ScenarioScripts/100400/c0710b4b.cht: 至聖所。奇異博士凝視著散發能量的第二個瓦圖姆之杖。傳送門另一端出現了和廢墟沒兩樣的黑暗次元。

ScenarioScripts/100400/78a91a6d.eng: Even here...in the Sanctum\r Sanctorum...the power of the Cosmic Cube overwhelms my protections.
ScenarioScripts/100400/78a91a6d.cht: 連這個至聖所也...宇宙魔方的力量已經慢慢超出我能承擔的範圍了。

ScenarioScripts/100400/f8b0f2c9.eng: Closer on the portal. A mass of Mindless Ones gathers.
ScenarioScripts/100400/f8b0f2c9.cht: 傳送門附近集結了眾多的無心者。

ScenarioScripts/100400/522e5176.cht: 而且我們的敵人正聚集當中。

ScenarioScripts/100400/877e9884.cht: 快準備！多瑪暮派遣了軍隊。

ScenarioScripts/100400/cc4b6a99.eng: Mindless Ones burst out into the Sanctum. Strange and I fight them.
ScenarioScripts/100400/cc4b6a99.cht: 無心者突擊了至聖所。奇異博士和我交手。

ScenarioScripts/100400/59c4eca1.eng: ...but we will stand against them\r even if we must stand alone!
ScenarioScripts/100400/59c4eca1.cht: 「...雖然只有我們而已，就戰鬥到最後一刻吧！」

ScenarioScripts/100400/29b1e221.eng: Hellstrom spikes a Mindless One with his trident.
ScenarioScripts/100400/29b1e221.cht: 地獄風暴利用自己的三叉槍擊倒了一個無心者。

ScenarioScripts/100400/ee06fb8c.eng: Hellstrom spikes a Mindless One with his trident. Clea, Wong\r and Doctor Voodoo strike down others.
ScenarioScripts/100400/ee06fb8c.cht: 克莉，王和巫毒博士同樣也在對付其他敵人。

ScenarioScripts/100400/372b4228.eng: Strange and the I rally. Doctor Voodoo is looking toward the portal.
ScenarioScripts/100400/372b4228.cht: 奇異博士與我也會和他們同行。巫毒博士凝視著傳送門。

ScenarioScripts/100400/285a9262.eng: I sense the dreams of other\r dimensions.
ScenarioScripts/100400/285a9262.cht: 看見其他次元的夢與噩夢了。

ScenarioScripts/100400/defbb9ec.eng: Go, Nightmare. Gorge yourself on\r their dreams.
ScenarioScripts/100400/defbb9ec.cht: 去吧，夢魘。去擾亂他們的夢吧！

ScenarioScripts/100400/20c5ee4b.eng: Nightmare bursts into the Sanctum Sanctorum, streaking past\r the heroes.
ScenarioScripts/100400/20c5ee4b.cht: 夢魘出現在至聖所阻擋住英雄們。

ScenarioScripts/100400/4c03068e.eng: The Heros reel away from Nightmare, expressions of terror\r on their faces.
ScenarioScripts/100400/4c03068e.cht: 英雄們露出一臉恐懼的表情，並且嘗試保持距離。\r

ScenarioScripts/100400/d1bb6156.eng: And while you feed, I will rule.
ScenarioScripts/100400/d1bb6156.cht: 夢魘，你吞噬他們的這段期間，我會支配這個地方。

ScenarioScripts/100401/607744dd.cht: 夢魘讓奇異博士呈現無法施展力量的狀態。

ScenarioScripts/100401/70afae5d.eng: Strange. Do you wake...or do you dream?

ScenarioScripts/100401/211dd0a4.eng: Now, Nightmare. Fill them all with your terror.
ScenarioScripts/100401/211dd0a4.cht: 好，夢魘。利用恐懼讓大家沉睡吧！

ScenarioScripts/100401/7fe64c14.cht: 利用4人以上的角色進行戰線攻擊吧。

ScenarioScripts/100401/90de61c1.cht: 好久不見了呢，女婿。婚禮的時候也只短暫見了一面…你我的世界是沒辦法融合在一起的。

ScenarioScripts/100401/3d86b037.cht: 婚禮的時候也只短暫見了一面…你我的世界是沒辦法融合在一起的。

ScenarioScripts/100401/14421183.cht: 「現在，我將和我的哥哥多瑪暮一起試圖支配世界!」

ScenarioScripts/100401/3d67c541.eng: Why are you doing your brother’s work for him, Umar?
ScenarioScripts/100401/3d67c541.cht: 奧瑪，為什麼你在做你哥哥多瑪暮的工作呢？

ScenarioScripts/100401/d016f8d2.eng: What Dormammu wants is his to want. I have unleashed Nightmare, and I will watch him work.
ScenarioScripts/100401/d016f8d2.cht: 多瑪暮想要的就是我想要的。我已經放了夢魘，就來看看是怎麼一回事吧。

ScenarioScripts/100401/e76a5287.eng: Umar has withdrawn into the Dark Dimension.

ScenarioScripts/100401/c2ea1ed5.eng: See what I have done to your Sorcerer Supreme. How can you master your fear?
ScenarioScripts/100401/c2ea1ed5.cht: 你們應該有看見我剛才對你們的至尊魔法師做了什麼吧...你們能承受這股恐懼嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100402/9997cc3d.eng: Strange, you need to wake up.

ScenarioScripts/100402/c879da6d.eng: His mind is shackled by terror.
ScenarioScripts/100402/c879da6d.cht: 現在他的精神已經被恐懼支配了。

ScenarioScripts/100402/e3c8eecf.eng: Yes...and soon so will be yours.
ScenarioScripts/100402/e3c8eecf.cht: 沒錯...很快你們也會變成和他一樣。

ScenarioScripts/100402/fd974a8e.cht: 請在5回合前攻擊巫毒博士參與的戰線。如果失敗，您的體力將遭受嚴重傷害。

ScenarioScripts/100402/e311e37e.eng: I felt Stephen’s power waver, and blink out. Is he...?
ScenarioScripts/100402/e311e37e.cht: 我感覺到史蒂芬的力量正逐漸變弱且消失當中。難道他...？

ScenarioScripts/100402/cfe2a8a6.eng: Alive. But Nightmare has cursed him and he cannot break free.
ScenarioScripts/100402/cfe2a8a6.cht: 還活著。但夢魘對他施下了非常難解開的詛咒。

ScenarioScripts/100402/72bf2e28.eng: My mother Umar has channeled Nightmare’s power into Stephen’s mind. It will be difficult, but yes. I can do it.
ScenarioScripts/100402/72bf2e28.cht: 奧瑪...我母親似乎在史蒂芬的精神中植入了夢魘的力量。雖然很困難，但我應該能解開。

ScenarioScripts/100402/687bf685.cht: 沒有取得我的允許，大概是很難辦到吧。

ScenarioScripts/100402/b4e757ba.eng: I do not ask your permission, Nightmare. I will break your powers and send you back whence you came.
ScenarioScripts/100402/b4e757ba.cht: 夢魘，我不需要你的允許。我會粉碎你的力量，並且將你送回原來的地方。

ScenarioScripts/100402/d805993e.eng: Begone, Nightmare. You cannot stand against all of us.
ScenarioScripts/100402/d805993e.cht: 消失吧，夢魘。要對付我們全部太困難了。

ScenarioScripts/100402/62af6464.eng: I don’t need to. I will sweep this world with dread, and while you weep with fear Dormammu’s armies march.
ScenarioScripts/100402/62af6464.cht: 沒有那種必要。在那之前，這個世界就會籠罩在恐懼當中。在多瑪暮的軍隊前往這個地方的期間，你們大概就會因為恐懼而顫抖與哭泣吧。

ScenarioScripts/100402/a93f2f5b.eng: You showed a little too much of yourself, when you tried to break my hold over Strange.
ScenarioScripts/100402/a93f2f5b.cht: 另外克莉...你在替奇異博士解詛咒的時候已經露出了破綻。

ScenarioScripts/100402/23feac1c.eng: Now I have a hold over you...

ScenarioScripts/100402/a9fa6f45.eng: Nightmare has her. We must follow.
ScenarioScripts/100402/a9fa6f45.cht: 夢魘帶走克莉了。得快點追上去。

ScenarioScripts/100402/08dc8513.eng: Clea awakened me, but Nightmare’s curse has sapped my strength. Still, we must go after her.
ScenarioScripts/100402/08dc8513.cht: 多虧克莉的幫忙，我才勉強恢復意識，但夢魘的詛咒依然讓我無法正常發揮力量。更重要的是，一定要救出克莉。

ScenarioScripts/100402/99cf8181.eng: No, you and Wong and Hellstrom must guard this portal.
ScenarioScripts/100402/99cf8181.cht: 不。你和王、以及地獄風暴必須守護這個傳送門。

ScenarioScripts/100402/06463d25.eng: Into the Dark Dimension? That is more courage than I would have expected from you. But your...ability...will be useful. Let’s go.
ScenarioScripts/100402/06463d25.cht: 前往黑暗次元？比我預期的還要勇敢呢？而且你的能力...一定派得上用場。那就快點走吧！

ScenarioScripts/100403/ef938c43.eng: There. Umar waits for news of Nightmare’s triumph.
ScenarioScripts/100403/ef938c43.cht: 喂。我的岳母奧瑪正在等待夢魘。

ScenarioScripts/100403/1d457f3c.cht: 奇異博士！看來光憑夢魘的詛咒還不夠的樣子？

ScenarioScripts/100403/70dc64c4.cht: 請進行2次奇異博士參與的戰線攻擊。若奇異博士被暈眩即為失敗。

ScenarioScripts/100403/aea83458.cht: 我休息一下再幫忙。幾回合後我就能加入戰場，猜猜我會出現在哪裡，並將同伴送到戰場上。

ScenarioScripts/100403/b152d520.eng: You fight as if you just learned of magic yesterday.
ScenarioScripts/100403/b152d520.cht: 剛學會魔法的人戰鬥的樣子還真是可笑，奇異博士！

ScenarioScripts/100403/33536097.eng: Yes. My powers still suffer from Nightmare’s curse.
ScenarioScripts/100403/33536097.cht: 那當然囉，岳母。因為他還沒完全解除夢魘的詛咒。

ScenarioScripts/100403/a7337ef1.eng: Then you have started a battle you cannot possibly win. Why do you tell me this?
ScenarioScripts/100403/a7337ef1.cht: 這終究是一場無法取得勝利的戰鬥。執意這麼做的理由是什麼呢？

ScenarioScripts/100403/349eac1c.eng: I am not here to win. I am here to find Clea.
ScenarioScripts/100403/349eac1c.cht: 我並不是為了勝利而來的。我是來找克莉的。

ScenarioScripts/100403/3927663d.cht: 看來妳不知道夢魘綁架她的事情。

ScenarioScripts/100403/23d198ad.eng: No. You can sense I am telling the truth.
ScenarioScripts/100403/23d198ad.cht: 岳母妳應該也很清楚我說的是事實吧？

ScenarioScripts/100403/0b5f5be1.eng: This much I will do, Strange. You are free of Nightmare’s curse. Your powers are restored. Now go, and find my daughter.
ScenarioScripts/100403/0b5f5be1.cht: 夠了，奇異博士。好，我幫你解開夢魘的詛咒，讓你恢復力量。快點去把我女兒帶回來吧！

ScenarioScripts/100404/d2049fef.eng: We approach Dormammu’s fortress. Nightmare will be here...and so will Clea.
ScenarioScripts/100404/d2049fef.cht: 多瑪暮的要塞很近。夢魘和克莉應該也在附近。

ScenarioScripts/100404/298c5cbd.eng: Nightmare! I am restored, and now you will feel the wrath of the sorcerer Supreme!
ScenarioScripts/100404/298c5cbd.cht: 夢魘！既然我的力量恢復了，那接下來你就得體驗一下至尊魔法師的憤怒！

ScenarioScripts/100404/f7e4100e.cht: 請在5回合內使用包含奇異博士的戰線攻擊。

ScenarioScripts/100402/eaaa66dd.cht: 糟糕。這樣就不能減少你這傢伙的體力了。

ScenarioScripts/100404/d2833d44.eng: I will see you all in your dreams.

ScenarioScripts/100404/84623870.cht: 沒錯。你從惡夢中醒來了。

ScenarioScripts/100404/22012845.eng: And we must stand together against Dormammu.
ScenarioScripts/100404/22012845.cht: 而且接下來我們會一起對抗多瑪暮。

ScenarioScripts/100404/9acba294.eng: We must prepare. He is coming.
ScenarioScripts/100404/9acba294.cht: 看來得準備了。他就快來了。

ScenarioScripts/100405/04b5e420.eng: You have marched bravely to your death, Strange.
ScenarioScripts/100405/04b5e420.cht: 看來你專程前來送死呢，奇異博士。

ScenarioScripts/100405/1c7d3b3f.eng: And foolishly. Daughter, come away from him.
ScenarioScripts/100405/1c7d3b3f.cht: 真是愚蠢。女兒，快遠離他，過來這邊吧！

ScenarioScripts/100405/df807ba3.eng: No! If we must die, we will die together.
ScenarioScripts/100405/df807ba3.cht: 不要！如果必須死的話，我寧願和他一起死。

ScenarioScripts/100405/29c3aff5.cht: X回合內，利用超過一定程度以上的總攻擊力攻擊夢魘。

ScenarioScripts/100405/d3b5e2ff.eng: Mother, think. If you did not order Nightmare to take me...who did?
ScenarioScripts/100405/d3b5e2ff.cht: 媽，妳想想看呀！倘若不是媽指使夢魘綁架我...那還會有誰做這種事呢？

ScenarioScripts/100405/1c7fd74c.eng: Who can predict the actions of a nightmare?
ScenarioScripts/100405/1c7fd74c.cht: 夢魘本來就是難以捉摸的人物不是嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100405/2293c52f.eng: You lie! Now I see. You had Nightmare seize Clea to force me to do your bidding.
ScenarioScripts/100405/2293c52f.cht: 騙人！我大概知道了。你為了自己的計畫而命令夢魘綁架克莉。

ScenarioScripts/100405/86230fb2.eng: But as always, you underestimate me, Dormammu.
ScenarioScripts/100405/86230fb2.cht: 但你一直以來都太低估我了，多瑪暮。

ScenarioScripts/100405/ae112656.eng: And me. Strange, we are allies until Dormammu is exiled from the Dark Dimension...or destroyed forever.
ScenarioScripts/100405/ae112656.cht: 這次還包括了我。奇異博士，多瑪暮被驅離黑暗次元或被擊倒之前，我們都是同一陣線。

ScenarioScripts/100405/37b84acb.eng: No matter. I do not need you, sister. You may keep the Dark Dimension -- I will rule Earth instead!
ScenarioScripts/100405/37b84acb.cht: 無所謂，妹妹。我不需要你的幫忙。你要獨自支配黑暗次元也與我無關！我要佔領地球！

ScenarioScripts/100405/da167e6f.eng: Did he run away? Did we win?
ScenarioScripts/100405/da167e6f.cht: 多瑪暮逃跑了嗎？我們贏了嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100405/6c79814c.eng: No. He leads a force of Mindless Ones toward the portal. Stephen, your friends will never survive this.
ScenarioScripts/100405/6c79814c.cht: 不。他目前大概正率領無心者軍團前往傳送門當中。史蒂芬，真是遺憾，你的朋友們大概很難在這場戰鬥中安然存活下去。

ScenarioScripts/100405/d844f833.eng: I will warn them of what is coming...Wong! You must close the portal.
ScenarioScripts/100405/d844f833.cht: 得通知其他人有某個東西正在接近當中...王！你必須關閉傳送門！

ScenarioScripts/100405/36a80307.eng: You’ll be trapped in the Dark Dimension!
ScenarioScripts/100405/36a80307.cht: 這樣你也會被關在黑暗次元當中！

ScenarioScripts/100405/02f77317.eng: That doesn’t matter compared to what will happen if Dormammu marches through that portal into the Sanctum Sanctorum.
ScenarioScripts/100405/02f77317.cht: 跟多瑪暮穿越傳送門抵達至聖所這件事比較起來根本就微不足道。

ScenarioScripts/100405/1ce3eb62.eng: Trust me, Wong. This is the only way.
ScenarioScripts/100405/1ce3eb62.cht: 王，相信我。只剩下這個方法而已！

ScenarioScripts/100405/c795daf3.eng: Very well. Drumm, Hellstrom. We must gather our energies...
ScenarioScripts/100405/c795daf3.cht: 沒辦法了。好，那麼德拉姆、地獄風暴！我們必須齊心協力…

ScenarioScripts/100405/411d35e3.eng: They are gone. The portal is sealed...for now.
ScenarioScripts/100405/411d35e3.cht: 消失不見了。傳送門關閉了...至少目前是這樣...

ScenarioScripts/100405/572ec196.eng: Okay, um...so how do we get out of here?
ScenarioScripts/100405/572ec196.cht: 好，嗯...不過我們該如何脫離這裡呢？

ScenarioScripts/100405/3b3b8a62.eng: Heard some people needed a ride out of here.
ScenarioScripts/100405/3b3b8a62.cht: 聽說你需要幫忙，於是我就來了。

ScenarioScripts/100405/5656f5a3.eng: Who -- ah. I understand. You are Tyrone Johnson.
ScenarioScripts/100405/5656f5a3.cht: 誰...？啊，我想起來了。你是泰隆強森吧？

ScenarioScripts/100405/eb604776.cht: 請稱我為斗篷。好，該是離開這裡的時候了。

ScenarioScripts/100406/8b20dd3d.eng: It’s not every day I get to teleport the Sorcerer Supreme.
ScenarioScripts/100406/8b20dd3d.cht: 傳送至尊魔法師並非時常可以做的事情。

ScenarioScripts/100406/55bc9f42.eng: All right. So here we are in the Darkforce Dimension. How do we get out?
ScenarioScripts/100406/55bc9f42.cht: 所以已經抵達暗能次元了耶。不過我們該如何脫離這裡呢？

ScenarioScripts/100406/8a4a8f04.eng: I got you in, I can get you out.
ScenarioScripts/100406/8a4a8f04.cht: 既然輕輕鬆鬆進來了，那應該隨時都能出去吧。

ScenarioScripts/100406/43acfa77.eng: Hey, did you see that? There are people over there.

ScenarioScripts/100406/e6b2f300.cht: 這些長得像小丑的人是誰呢？

ScenarioScripts/100406/4a4a5919.eng: I might ask you the same thing.

ScenarioScripts/100406/ede6b833.eng: We’re the Guardians of the Galaxy!

ScenarioScripts/100406/c248ede5.eng: Will you stop yelling that out all the time? It’s embarrassing.
ScenarioScripts/100406/c248ede5.cht: 不要再大喊那個名字了。不覺得丟臉嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100406/0a1eac2a.eng: You’re a bunch of thieves, is what you are!
ScenarioScripts/100406/0a1eac2a.cht: 你們只是一群竊賊罷了！

ScenarioScripts/100406/6afa54f8.eng: Aw, crap. He followed us here?
ScenarioScripts/100406/6afa54f8.cht: 啊，糟糕！那小子跟過來了嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100406/4ef4bb85.eng: Quill! You shoulda known you can’t steal from the Ravagers. We’re the ones that do the stealing!
ScenarioScripts/100406/4ef4bb85.cht: 奎爾！你必須知道，破壞者的物品絕對不能偷！只有我們破壞者才能偷盜！

ScenarioScripts/100406/723a7450.eng: His name is Yondu. We have a little misunderstanding about this.
ScenarioScripts/100406/723a7450.cht: 他的名字是勇度，為此我們發生了一點誤會。

ScenarioScripts/100406/d4430fa6.eng: You carry a Wand of Watoomb!?
ScenarioScripts/100406/d4430fa6.cht: 慢著，你手上的是瓦圖姆之杖嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100406/aa11d0ff.eng: Is that what you call it?

ScenarioScripts/100406/256b3a17.eng: Yeah, Watoomb. That is kind of goofy.

ScenarioScripts/100406/66e7d9fa.eng: Anyway, Yondu thinks it’s his. So he and his Ravagers are after us trying to get it back.
ScenarioScripts/100406/66e7d9fa.cht: 總之勇度大概是認為那個權杖是自已的。所以才會率領破壞者來追我們。

ScenarioScripts/100406/e4df1325.cht: 「嘿，副隊長。我會偶爾用亞卡箭幫忙，你好好表現吧。」

ScenarioScripts/100406/f5c65743.cht: 這我親自出面比較好嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100406/dd1f12c0.cht: 「請用星爵、葛摩菈、格魯特、火箭浣熊參與的4人戰線攻擊勇度。」

ScenarioScripts/100406/abbf8b0e.eng: Yondu! This will be your only warning. I am about to seal the portal through which you entered the Darkforce.
ScenarioScripts/100406/abbf8b0e.cht: 勇度！我只警告一次。你前往暗能次元使用的傳送門將要關閉了。想要回去只能趁現在。

ScenarioScripts/100406/b3fd82f1.eng: This ain’t gonna stop until you see what happens when you mess up with the Ravagers!
ScenarioScripts/100406/b3fd82f1.cht: 惹惱破壞者會是怎樣的下場，在你完全了解之前將會繼續!

ScenarioScripts/100406/bc2e6b44.eng: There’s another portal. I can feel it in the Darkforce. Right over here...
ScenarioScripts/100406/bc2e6b44.cht: 傳送門還有一個！暗能深處的某個地方...就在那邊....

ScenarioScripts/100406/4182de99.eng: I do not recognize that place. But if there is a portal, there must be a Wand there.
ScenarioScripts/100406/4182de99.cht: 是陌生的地方。總之只要有傳送門，就一定會有瓦圖姆之杖。

ScenarioScripts/100406/69a5ecb4.eng: What!? We’re gonna get a lot of credits for that thing!
ScenarioScripts/100406/69a5ecb4.cht: 什麼？光憑這麼一個東西就能大撈一筆耶！

ScenarioScripts/100406/0653efff.eng: Get rich later. Right now, we struggle to save Earth from utter annihilation.
ScenarioScripts/100406/0653efff.cht: 之後再成為大富豪吧！當務之急是從絕望當中守護地球。

ScenarioScripts/100406/36b5a3ed.eng: All right. Fine. But promise me we’ll come back and get it.
ScenarioScripts/100406/36b5a3ed.cht: 嘖嘖，好吧。但你必須保證之後會再回來拿。

ScenarioScripts/100406/7565bae9.eng: If we can. Now we must leave it sealed away in the Darkforce Dimension, and confront this next peril.
ScenarioScripts/100406/7565bae9.cht: 如果能回來的話。現在要將它封印在暗能次元，並且應對下一次的威脅。

ScenarioScripts/100407/67325fed.eng: Wakanda is under siege by Hydra forces, and the Darkforce is leaking through in various places.
ScenarioScripts/100407/67325fed.cht: 瓦干達遭受九頭蛇攻擊，到處都瀰漫著暗黑能量。

ScenarioScripts/100407/7867555f.eng: Black Panther is angry that his country has become one focus of the battle. He demands that someone block the portal.
ScenarioScripts/100407/7867555f.cht: 得知瓦干達遭受攻擊後，黑豹相當憤怒，並且指示立即關閉傳送門。

ScenarioScripts/100407/42ccd38c.eng: Wakanda. And I am T’Challa, ruler of this nation.
ScenarioScripts/100407/42ccd38c.cht: 瓦干達。我的名字是帝查拉，是這個地方的領導者。

ScenarioScripts/100407/f33a49b9.eng: Doctor Strange. Who have you brought into my kingdom?
ScenarioScripts/100407/f33a49b9.cht: 奇異博士。是誰帶你來瓦干達的呢？

ScenarioScripts/100407/b9842b3d.eng: Oh, we’re the Guardians of the Galaxy.

ScenarioScripts/100407/a326e58f.eng: There are people shooting at us!

ScenarioScripts/100407/066ed3f0.eng: Soldiers of Hydra. Global terrorist group bent on world domination.
ScenarioScripts/100407/066ed3f0.cht: 是九頭蛇的軍人。他們是企圖征服世界的國際恐怖組織。

ScenarioScripts/100407/afaefb73.eng: Terrorists? Hell, no! We’re the Wrecking Crew!
ScenarioScripts/100407/afaefb73.cht: 恐怖份子？啊，真是遺憾！我們是拆遷隊！

ScenarioScripts/100407/c35d553d.cht: 「我是摧毀者，我們就是拆遷隊！」

ScenarioScripts/100407/9fb4ebc2.cht: 搞什麼？說了大話卻只帶著資源逃跑？

ScenarioScripts/100407/f4c3217f.eng: Ulysses Klaw and Baron Strucker are also in Wakanda. Perhaps nearby. We cannot let these thugs delay our pursuit.
ScenarioScripts/100407/f4c3217f.cht: 尤里西斯·克勞與史特拉克男爵也來到瓦干達了。大概就在附近的某處吧。不能放任這些人阻擋我們。

ScenarioScripts/100407/46429fc0.cht: 我想要那小子的撬棍，可以拿嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100407/823356da.eng: We gotta catch up with Klaw. Let’s go.
ScenarioScripts/100407/823356da.cht: 去找克勞哥哥吧。快點行動吧。

ScenarioScripts/100407/9d033109.eng: We should pursue and destroy them.

ScenarioScripts/100407/118e03e7.eng: Wait. You five. Who are you again?
ScenarioScripts/100407/118e03e7.cht: 慢著，你們五個！再說一次是誰？

ScenarioScripts/100407/24390ca3.eng: No, we don’t need another name. People need better memories.
ScenarioScripts/100407/24390ca3.cht: 不對，格魯特，我們不需要更簡單的名字。那是他們記性差而已。

ScenarioScripts/100407/f9b37197.eng: Guardians of the Galaxy. Why have you come to Wakanda?
ScenarioScripts/100407/f9b37197.cht: 星際異攻隊。來瓦干達有什麼事呢？

ScenarioScripts/100407/7de68a27.eng: Yes. The portal has caused an eruption of Darkforce energy all over Wakanda, and drawn Hydra to us. It must be blocked.
ScenarioScripts/100407/7de68a27.cht: 我已經知道了。整個瓦干達都因為傳送門而散發暗黑能量。所以九頭蛇才會來到這裡。必須盡快關閉傳送門才行。

ScenarioScripts/100407/447cf894.cht: 是你造成的嗎，奇異博士？

ScenarioScripts/100407/687ffa28.eng: No. But I know how it happened, and I know how to stop it.
ScenarioScripts/100407/687ffa28.cht: 不。但我知道整件事是如何發生的，也知道該怎麼做才能停止。

ScenarioScripts/100407/a5032b6c.eng: Then let us do that. Our adversaries are on the move. We must catch them.
ScenarioScripts/100407/a5032b6c.cht: 那就解決這個問題吧。敵人已經開始行動了，得快點追上去。

ScenarioScripts/100408/ba5d01fb.eng: T’Challa. Wakanda really is the land of miracles and wonders.
ScenarioScripts/100408/ba5d01fb.cht: 啊，帝查拉。瓦干達真的是充滿奇蹟與神祕的地方。

ScenarioScripts/100408/78517433.eng: All that Vibranium, and now this Darkforce breach? It’s very useful to someone with the correct scientific knowledge.
ScenarioScripts/100408/78517433.cht: 加上數量龐大的汎合金與暗黑能量？這裡充滿經由擁有正確科學知識者之手，就會非常有用的資源。

ScenarioScripts/100408/985669be.eng: We can contain it. Harness the energy. Then when we let it go...
ScenarioScripts/100408/985669be.cht: 儲存暗能將其當作動力來源使用。只要稍微釋出一點能量....

ScenarioScripts/100408/e03262fa.eng: And there ain’t a thing you can do about it.
ScenarioScripts/100408/e03262fa.cht: 大概來不及做出任何反應吧。

ScenarioScripts/100408/fe64748c.eng: Why are we doing this again?
ScenarioScripts/100408/fe64748c.cht: 喂，誰可以再說一次我們在這裡的原因呢？

ScenarioScripts/100408/117507f7.eng: You say that like you know what it is.
ScenarioScripts/100408/117507f7.cht: 一副自己非常了解的樣子呢。

ScenarioScripts/100408/269a715c.eng: Maybe I just like saying it.
ScenarioScripts/100408/269a715c.cht: 我早就想這樣說說看了。

ScenarioScripts/100408/5c5640e8.cht: 什麼？那些傢伙還有其他同伴嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100408/0c03a97b.eng: You just had to steal the wand, didn’t you? Now look what you got us into.
ScenarioScripts/100408/0c03a97b.cht: 就是說呀，非得偷瓦圖姆之杖嗎？看清楚你幹的好事。

ScenarioScripts/100408/1d20eb47.eng: We are saving this world! Aren’t we?
ScenarioScripts/100408/1d20eb47.cht: 我不是已經在拯救地球了嗎？不是嗎....？

ScenarioScripts/100408/643a4fbb.eng: I guess we’ll find out pretty soon.

ScenarioScripts/100408/febc820a.eng: Everyone’s clear of the portal. Time to move!
ScenarioScripts/100408/febc820a.cht: 好，我軍全都離開傳送門周圍了。快點移動吧！

ScenarioScripts/100408/6ca2270d.eng: Aw, I was just getting warmed up.
ScenarioScripts/100408/6ca2270d.cht: 我才剛熱完身耶，真是可惜。

ScenarioScripts/100408/43d31b78.eng: They’ve gone to another place in Wakanda. Come on. I can take you there.
ScenarioScripts/100408/43d31b78.cht: 敵人已經移動到瓦干達的其他地方了。快點行動吧。我帶路。

ScenarioScripts/100409/49b303f4.eng: Cloak brings everyone to the Great Mound.
ScenarioScripts/100409/49b303f4.cht: 斗篷俠帶英雄們前往神聖丘陵。

ScenarioScripts/100409/cf207359.cht: 這裡是被稱為神聖丘陵的地方。

ScenarioScripts/100409/9c940272.eng: The Masters of Evil are here too, brother. They have--
ScenarioScripts/100409/9c940272.cht: 哥哥，邪惡大師也來了。他們…

ScenarioScripts/100409/700810b9.eng: Your sister is correct, Your Majesty. You arrive too late to prevent the inevitable, I’m afraid.
ScenarioScripts/100409/700810b9.cht: 您妹妹說的沒錯，國王。很遺憾，針對接下來發生的事情，你根本就什麼都做不了。

ScenarioScripts/100409/f24fd443.eng: HYDRA has tapped the secrets of the Darkforce, and soon we will unite it with the shards of the Cosmic Cube to create an unstoppable weapon.
ScenarioScripts/100409/f24fd443.cht: 九頭蛇已經調查出黑暗之力的秘密，他們打算之後將那股力量和宇宙碎片結合在一起。那樣就會創造出任何人都無法阻止的武器吧。

ScenarioScripts/100409/05280f2c.eng: I tell you this only because you will not live to see this endeavor completed.
ScenarioScripts/100409/05280f2c.cht: 其實我之所以會說出這一切，理由只有一個。因為大概很難生存到這項計畫成功的那一刻。

ScenarioScripts/100409/77a6001a.cht: 拆遷隊，解決這些小鬼吧！

ScenarioScripts/100409/36e5dbdd.eng: I’m telling you, Drax, you should really dump the knives for that guy’s crowbar.
ScenarioScripts/100409/36e5dbdd.cht: 德克斯，我重複說很多次了吧。把身上的刀子扔掉，然後去搶那小子的撬棍。

ScenarioScripts/100409/ae7bf7e3.eng: Baron Zemo. I see all of HYDRA’s underlings are looking to seize power in the Red Skull’s absence.
ScenarioScripts/100409/ae7bf7e3.cht: 齊莫男爵因為紅骷髏不在，九頭蛇的小嘍囉就對那個位子虎視眈眈。

ScenarioScripts/100409/ab7f2242.eng: One must be ready when opportunity presents itself, T’Challa. And then one must act.
ScenarioScripts/100409/ab7f2242.cht: 帝查拉，準備好的人就能抓住機會。之後只要行動就可以了。

ScenarioScripts/100409/35ce419e.eng: Your Vibranium is the perfect material to contain the powers of the Darkforce. Pity you never tried it yourself.
ScenarioScripts/100409/35ce419e.cht: 你的汎合金是能夠完美儲存黑暗之力的資源。沒能親自嘗試應該很可惜吧。

ScenarioScripts/100409/2f1c4f1d.cht: 請對齊莫男爵進行有黑豹和舒莉加入的戰線攻擊。

ScenarioScripts/100409/99beda9e.eng: Hold them here! We will extract the Vibranium we need.
ScenarioScripts/100409/99beda9e.cht: 將他們綁在這裡吧！趁這段時間去採集需要的汎合金吧。

ScenarioScripts/100409/13af11f4.eng: Blackout, stick around so we have a ride out of here.
ScenarioScripts/100409/13af11f4.cht: 黑視，快待機吧。準備好就離開這裡吧。

ScenarioScripts/100409/5ab65ab3.eng: We are outnumbered, and while we fight, Hydra is stealing Vibranium. If they get it through into the Darkforce Dimension...
ScenarioScripts/100409/5ab65ab3.cht: 數量上處於劣勢呢。九頭蛇於戰鬥期間不斷地萃取汎合金。而且企圖將那些資源帶回暗能次元。

ScenarioScripts/100409/6f5c0c7c.eng: Understood, T’Challa. We’ll stop them. But to do that, we must seal the portal. Where is the Wand of Watoomb you keep?
ScenarioScripts/100409/6f5c0c7c.cht: 我能理解，帝查拉。一定要阻止他們。但前提是必須封印傳送門。你有一支瓦圖姆之杖吧？

ScenarioScripts/100410/529e82c6.eng: So the wizard and the king took off to get another magic wand, and we’re fighting all the bad guys?
ScenarioScripts/100410/529e82c6.cht: 所以魔法師和國王去找其他魔法權杖了，惡徒由我們對付嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100410/877c5dce.eng: They’re gonna get one hell of a bill for this.
ScenarioScripts/100410/877c5dce.cht: 我收的費用可是非常昂貴的呦！

ScenarioScripts/100410/a35ff066.eng: Absurd. We expected to face the mighty Dora Milaje -- but instead we are confronted by a talking rodent.
ScenarioScripts/100410/a35ff066.cht: 太奇怪了。我還以為有朵拉親衛隊保護呢。竟然有會說話的松鼠？！

ScenarioScripts/100410/896626dc.eng: That sounded insulting. I’m gonna shoot that guy.
ScenarioScripts/100410/896626dc.cht: 他剛在罵我吧？我要把那小子打飛！

ScenarioScripts/100410/07430635.cht: 請對齊莫男爵進行戰線攻擊。

ScenarioScripts/100410/8e03f41a.eng: I see T’Challa’s young protege there is able to put the shards to use. Fascinating.
ScenarioScripts/100410/8e03f41a.cht: 看來帝查拉的徒弟懂得如何使用宇宙碎片。真是令人印象深刻。

ScenarioScripts/100410/e46217a3.eng: We will learn much from you when we have leisure to study.
ScenarioScripts/100410/e46217a3.cht: 等有空時，我要調查一下你的能力與那個裝備的性能。

ScenarioScripts/100410/77679d47.eng: Don’t worry. The only person who’s going to study that rig is me.
ScenarioScripts/100410/77679d47.cht: 別擔心！會仔細觀看那個裝備的人大概只有我而已吧。

ScenarioScripts/100410/aa28ec27.cht: 慢著，那是昆式噴射機嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100410/c586814c.eng: Shuri, you called these guys and not us? I’m wounded.
ScenarioScripts/100410/c586814c.cht: 舒莉，竟然只叫他們，而漏掉了我。我的內心嚴重受創了。

ScenarioScripts/100410/c7f54f0f.eng: We have what we need! Blackout, remove us from this pitiful place!
ScenarioScripts/100410/c7f54f0f.cht: 需要的物品全都取得了。黑視，快點離開這個令人憐憫的地方吧。

ScenarioScripts/100410/ad5af8a7.eng: Glad you arrived when you did, Stark.
ScenarioScripts/100410/ad5af8a7.cht: 謝謝你及時到來，史塔克。

ScenarioScripts/100410/42911e61.eng: The wizard and the king looking for the wand.
ScenarioScripts/100410/42911e61.cht: 魔法師和國王去尋找權杖了。

ScenarioScripts/100410/a62dfeff.eng: The...ohhh, I get it. Strange and T’Challa. Man, for a second it sounded like...
ScenarioScripts/100410/a62dfeff.cht: 魔法師和國王...？啊，看來是指奇異博士和帝查拉。我還以為是什麼…

ScenarioScripts/100410/fa37d87b.eng: I have blocked this portal. The Darkforce eruption here in Wakanda should lessen now.
ScenarioScripts/100410/fa37d87b.cht: 已經封印傳送門了。瓦干達的暗黑能量大概已經減少了。

ScenarioScripts/100410/cbe93a74.cht: 大概是吧。嗯，沒錯。是好消息！！

ScenarioScripts/100410/de776848.eng: While we fought, Hydra forces ransacked a laboratory. One of the batteries is missing.
ScenarioScripts/100410/de776848.cht: 不過，九頭蛇趁我們戰鬥的時候襲擊了一個研究室。而且有一個電池不見了。

ScenarioScripts/100410/5bab85ae.eng: I fear that is part of the new weapon Strucker spoke of.
ScenarioScripts/100410/5bab85ae.cht: 就像史特拉克所說的，很擔心那個電池會當新武器的零件使用。

ScenarioScripts/100410/740ecda8.cht: 大概是吧。嗯，沒錯。是壞消息。

ScenarioScripts/100410/5fa44102.eng: If they are able to store and channel the energy of the Darkforce Dimension...
ScenarioScripts/100410/5fa44102.cht: 假設哪一天敵人知道儲存暗黑能量使用的方法...

ScenarioScripts/100410/0f26df4b.cht: 我大概知道會是什麼樣的情況。

ScenarioScripts/100410/9952a4d9.eng: So what do we do about it?

ScenarioScripts/100410/afc9c107.eng: Find that battery before they finish learning how to put it to use.
ScenarioScripts/100410/afc9c107.cht: 得趁敵人發現使用那個電池的方法之前快點找到。

ScenarioScripts/100410/6c75d208.eng: A Quinjet swoops in and lands. Our heroes emerge: Several Avengers, along with the\r\nGuardians of the Galaxy.
ScenarioScripts/100410/6c75d208.cht: 星際異攻隊與復仇者成員從昆式噴射機下來了。

ScenarioScripts/100410/b4da3655.eng: That ship was nice. Don’t you think\r so?
ScenarioScripts/100410/b4da3655.cht: 好帥的戰鬥機。不覺得嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100410/afe66758.eng: Eh. Not really the same class as\r the Milano...I mean, sure, it was\r fine.
ScenarioScripts/100410/afe66758.cht: 嗯，和米蘭相比雖然等級差很多...不過還可以。

ScenarioScripts/100410/2ec4ec3a.eng: Stark is the last to come out. Fury addresses him.
ScenarioScripts/100410/2ec4ec3a.cht: 最後史塔克從昆式噴射機下後，福瑞指著他說。

ScenarioScripts/100410/48226ecc.eng: T’Challa’s holding it all together. We need to find that battery.
ScenarioScripts/100410/48226ecc.cht: 帝查拉緊緊抓著。必須找到他說的電池。

ScenarioScripts/100410/c1714c7c.eng: First we need to get to Kamar-Taj.\r Strange, you tell it.
ScenarioScripts/100410/c1714c7c.cht: 在那之前要先去找卡瑪泰姬。奇異博士，你來說明吧。

ScenarioScripts/100410/ff8ceb1e.eng: Strange makes a mystical gesture, and a vision appears: The Ancient One’s monastery in Kamar-Taj. In the view, another portal is visible, with K’un Lun glimmering beyond it.
ScenarioScripts/100410/ff8ceb1e.cht: 奇異博士使用魔法展現幻影：又看見一道通往卡瑪泰姬上古尊者的修道院及崑崙的傳送門。

ScenarioScripts/100410/5c98bfa6.eng: There was another Wand in the\r Ancient One’s monastery. It has created a portal into K’un\r\nLun...and perhaps beyond.
ScenarioScripts/100410/5c98bfa6.cht: 崑崙「龍穴」中有下一個瓦圖姆之杖。由於這把權杖，位於其他次元的崑崙和地球的卡瑪泰姬連結起來了。

ScenarioScripts/100410/5c786d47.cht: 卡瑪泰姬？聽起來像是不錯的地方耶？

ScenarioScripts/100410/9ea530b9.eng: But another Wand? We had enough trouble with the first one.
ScenarioScripts/100410/9ea530b9.cht: 等一下，一個就已經很辛苦了！還有其他的權杖嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100410/76e384b3.eng: I will go ahead to Kamar-Taj.

ScenarioScripts/100410/dded7cdf.eng: Strange expands the portal to Kamar-Taj and draws it in\r around himself. He disappears.
ScenarioScripts/100410/dded7cdf.cht: 奇異博士打開通往卡瑪泰姬的傳送門後進去了。他消失了。

ScenarioScripts/100410/b4b50e7b.eng: We PULL BACK out of the hangar to see the Helicarrier making a turn and accelerating away from Wakanda.
ScenarioScripts/100410/b4b50e7b.cht: 我們走出格納庫，看到了飛行航母正加速離開瓦干達。

ScenarioScripts/100500/5ebc3754.eng: The Helicarrier looms in the sky over Kamar-Taj.\r
ScenarioScripts/100500/5ebc3754.cht: 飛行航母抵達卡瑪泰姬上空。

ScenarioScripts/100410/4ad915d4.eng: I’ll save you the trouble of trying to land a Quinjet in the city, Fury.
ScenarioScripts/100410/4ad915d4.cht: 福瑞，就連搭乘昆式噴射機降落也會嫌麻煩，還是我來幫助你吧。

ScenarioScripts/100500/05214e90.eng: On the bridge, Doctor Strange creates a portal.\r\n
ScenarioScripts/100500/05214e90.cht: 地面上的奇異博士在飛行航母艦橋製造傳送門。

ScenarioScripts/100500/23ed9f04.eng: we are now INSIDE THE ANCIENT ONE’S MONASTERY.
ScenarioScripts/100500/23ed9f04.cht: 我們已經移動到上古尊者的修道院\r內部。

ScenarioScripts/100500/dd97837b.eng: Strange. You have sensed the Wand.
ScenarioScripts/100500/dd97837b.cht: 奇異博士。感應到權杖了。

ScenarioScripts/100500/5d32e0a7.eng: I have. Ancient One. Has it--?

ScenarioScripts/100500/6be3ae68.eng: The Wand is in K’un Lun. It has opened a portal from that realm... and, I suspect, another leading elsewhere.
ScenarioScripts/100500/6be3ae68.cht: 權杖在崑崙，所以通往這裡的傳送門才會開啟...不只這樣，我認為那個權杖又開啟了另一個通往其他地方的傳送門。

ScenarioScripts/100500/bfe5b987.eng: Two portals? How is that possible?
ScenarioScripts/100500/bfe5b987.cht: 兩個傳送門？怎麼辦到的呢？

ScenarioScripts/100500/388fe5da.eng: That I do not know, but it has happened. I know this because I have had a visitor from a distant dimension...
ScenarioScripts/100500/388fe5da.cht: 我也不知道，就變這樣了。因為從遠方其他次元來的客人，才得知這個事實…

ScenarioScripts/100500/88090c63.eng: Cap! About time you decided to join the party...
ScenarioScripts/100500/88090c63.cht: 隊長！看來你終於決定加入隊伍...

ScenarioScripts/100500/95c804ab.eng: There are villains crashing through the monastery’s windows.
ScenarioScripts/100500/95c804ab.cht: 惡徒越過修道院窗口入侵。

ScenarioScripts/100500/7573c90f.eng: They’re fighting with Daredevil and Elektra.
ScenarioScripts/100500/7573c90f.cht: 他們正和夜魔俠、幻影殺手戰鬥。

ScenarioScripts/100500/e3160ba5.cht: 「力量人、鐵拳俠和白虎將會跟隨你加入戰鬥。」

ScenarioScripts/100501/135fe623.eng: The heroes square off to protect the Ancient One’s monastery.
ScenarioScripts/100501/135fe623.cht: 為了守護第五個瓦圖姆之杖所在的上古尊者的修道院，英雄們齊聚一堂。

ScenarioScripts/100501/6b227a01.eng: I got to thank you, Daredevil. For a blind guy, you did a great job leading us right to the Wand.
ScenarioScripts/100501/6b227a01.cht: 夜魔俠，看來得感謝你才行。儘管雙眼看不見，卻能順利引導我們前往權杖所在的地方呢。謝謝！

ScenarioScripts/100501/4d98243c.eng: Your lack of respect makes you unworthy to set foot in this sacred place.
ScenarioScripts/100501/4d98243c.cht: 態度如此輕蔑的人不被允許踏入這個神聖的地方。

ScenarioScripts/100501/e238a3b7.eng: You heard the man. Hit the bricks.
ScenarioScripts/100501/e238a3b7.cht: 聽見了吧？最好快點消失吧。

ScenarioScripts/100501/33f0afa0.eng: Try to kick me out, then, old man. Go ahead. Show me what you got.
ScenarioScripts/100501/33f0afa0.cht: 你就試著趕人呀，老傢伙。快點展現一下實力吧。

ScenarioScripts/100501/e3dfa2e3.eng: The Hand believe they can control the Wands using the powers of the shards.
ScenarioScripts/100501/e3dfa2e3.cht: 手合會深信利用權杖的力量可提升宇宙碎片的威力。

ScenarioScripts/100501/37b2e89c.eng: We cannot let them find out.
ScenarioScripts/100501/37b2e89c.cht: 絕對不能對他們放任不管。

ScenarioScripts/100501/f2855810.eng: So, Cap. Glad you made it back.
ScenarioScripts/100501/f2855810.cht: 隊長，再次見到你真是高興。

ScenarioScripts/100501/38cd7c70.cht: 對，那是一個...非常奇妙的經驗。

ScenarioScripts/100501/3d35a1dc.eng: Any idea where the Red Skull is?
ScenarioScripts/100501/3d35a1dc.cht: 關於紅骷髏的行蹤有任何線索嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100501/c782510c.eng: No, but I know he’s out there. He has the last Wand, somewhere in another dimension.
ScenarioScripts/100501/c782510c.cht: 不，但一定就在外面的某處。帶著最後一個瓦圖姆之杖前往其他次元的某處。

ScenarioScripts/100501/052723c0.eng: He will make his presence known soon enough. Right now, we face a more immediate threat.
ScenarioScripts/100501/052723c0.cht: 時機到自然就會現身吧。但眼下我們有急需先對付的敵人。

ScenarioScripts/100501/deeb1208.eng: The dragon Shou-Lao has emerged from his cave in K’un Lun, blind with rage and burning everything in his path.
ScenarioScripts/100501/deeb1208.cht: 壽老出現在崑崙的龍穴。因為被憤怒與破滅蒙蔽雙眼，所以正在將眼前的一切燃燒殆盡。

ScenarioScripts/100501/1f22454b.eng: You must stop Shou-Lao in his madness from destroying K'un Lun.
ScenarioScripts/100501/1f22454b.cht: 必須快點阻擋瘋狂的壽老，藉此守護崑崙。

ScenarioScripts/100501/1ca157af.eng: I suspect Baron Mordo has enchanted Shou-Lao. Find Mordo and you may break the spell. You will also likely find the Wand.
ScenarioScripts/100501/1ca157af.cht: 我懷疑莫度男爵對壽老施下魔法。必須找到莫度男爵且解除那個魔法。說不定可以找到權杖。

ScenarioScripts/100501/face53fb.eng: I thought as much. Is Mordo in Kamar-Taj?
ScenarioScripts/100501/face53fb.cht: 我也這麼認為。莫度男爵在卡瑪泰姬嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100501/a38dcc11.eng: No. You must seek him in K'un Lun. And so is the fifth Wand of Watoomb.
ScenarioScripts/100501/a38dcc11.cht: 不。得在崑崙找找看才行。和第五個瓦圖姆之杖一起。

ScenarioScripts/100501/d175739c.eng: Then to K’un Lun we go...
ScenarioScripts/100501/d175739c.cht: 那我們的目的地是崑崙。

ScenarioScripts/100502/f932171c.cht: 那是一隻非常巨大的龍。

ScenarioScripts/100502/b018a15a.eng: You ever seen a small one?

ScenarioScripts/100502/c79059cb.eng: Lei Kung can't fight Shou-Lao alone.
ScenarioScripts/100502/c79059cb.cht: 雷公無法獨自對付壽老。

ScenarioScripts/100502/37771acc.cht: 對壽老造成傷害1200以上的戰線攻擊。\n壽老每2回合對縱向一行的全體進行攻擊。

ScenarioScripts/100502/f34a46fc.eng: I am the Undying. I am the Heart of K'un L'un.
ScenarioScripts/100502/f34a46fc.cht: 我是不滅之身，而且是崑崙的心臟。

ScenarioScripts/100502/cdd8e2de.eng: I will burn it if I wish, and burn you with it.
ScenarioScripts/100502/cdd8e2de.cht: 只要我願意，要消滅這座城市也不是難事。你也想一起被燒嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100502/1025d861.eng: And what will be left for you then?
ScenarioScripts/100502/1025d861.cht: 這麼做對你有何好處呢？

ScenarioScripts/100502/69c90ea1.eng: I will live in the ashes and be at peace.
ScenarioScripts/100502/69c90ea1.cht: 將一切都燃燒殆盡後，當然就該在灰燼上好好享受悠閒的時間呀。

ScenarioScripts/100502/7e5d74a5.eng: We're not going to let that happen.

ScenarioScripts/100502/2be60f92.eng: That's right. I took you out once, and we'll do it again.
ScenarioScripts/100502/2be60f92.cht: 沒錯。已經擊敗過你一次了，第二次會更容易吧。

ScenarioScripts/100502/46dddf9f.eng: Shou-Lao has withdrawn into the Cave of the Dragon.

ScenarioScripts/100502/98c68734.eng: The Hand has been gathering shards in Kamar-Taj. They might be the source of the spell.
ScenarioScripts/100502/98c68734.cht: 手合會正在卡瑪泰姬收集宇宙碎片。說不定這就是他們使用的魔法來源。

ScenarioScripts/100502/03830205.eng: No, I can feel the traces of Mordo’s power...and also another mind is at work.
ScenarioScripts/100502/03830205.cht: 不，我反而感覺到莫度男爵的力量...而且他似乎在策畫另一個陰謀。

ScenarioScripts/100502/ac81abb3.eng: I will stand sentinel near the Cave of the Dragon. As long as Shou-Lao stays inside, he is no threat.
ScenarioScripts/100502/ac81abb3.cht: 我在監視龍的洞穴附近。只要壽老待在洞穴，就不會造成太大的威脅。

ScenarioScripts/100502/afaedde7.eng: What if he comes out? I'll stay with you.
ScenarioScripts/100502/afaedde7.cht: 如果他又衝出來呢？為了以防萬一，我陪你吧。

ScenarioScripts/100502/5d562958.eng: Now I see! He attacks the Tree of Immortality!
ScenarioScripts/100502/5d562958.cht: 我大概知道了！他想要攻擊不滅之樹。

ScenarioScripts/100503/b9010971.eng: You would destroy the world itself to feed your hunger for power.
ScenarioScripts/100503/b9010971.cht: 一副為了培養你的力量，就算破壞整個世界也在所不惜的氣勢呢。

ScenarioScripts/100503/c9049936.eng: The world? Tomorrow, perhaps. Today we will only ravage K’un Lun.
ScenarioScripts/100503/c9049936.cht: 不需要急躁。明天再破壞世界吧。今天就先摧毀崑崙吧。

ScenarioScripts/100503/e8c78215.eng: Even if you save K’un Lun today, what is happening inside the Cave of the Dragon, Strange? Can you be two places at once?
ScenarioScripts/100503/e8c78215.cht: 就算今天拯救了崑崙，你知道龍穴會發生什麼事嗎？可以同時抵禦兩個地方嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100503/595dfd3c.eng: You have done well to protect the city. But this diversion has given Mordo time.
ScenarioScripts/100503/595dfd3c.cht: 為了守護崑崙，真是辛苦了。但他的聲東擊西作戰佔用了我們相當多時間。

ScenarioScripts/100503/149c3e68.eng: He is in the Cave of the Dragon, under Shou-Lao's protection as he works to open a gateway to other realms.
ScenarioScripts/100503/149c3e68.cht: 莫度男爵在龍穴開啟通往其他世界的通道時，壽老會負責保護他。

ScenarioScripts/100503/cd9b976d.eng: A back door into our world.
ScenarioScripts/100503/cd9b976d.cht: 看來有通往我們居住的世界的後門。

ScenarioScripts/100503/2b13e6d1.eng: Yes. The Wand you seek is within the Cave of the Dragon as well. As long as the portal to Kamar-Taj is open, Mordo will use K'un L'un as a passage for demonic forces.
ScenarioScripts/100503/2b13e6d1.cht: 沒錯。你尋找的權杖大概就在龍穴中吧。通往卡瑪泰姬的傳送門開啟的期間，莫度男爵會繼續透過崑崙召喚如惡魔般的敵人。

ScenarioScripts/100504/ed82c8fa.eng: All who enter the Cave of the Dragon must be willing to battle Shou-Lao.
ScenarioScripts/100504/ed82c8fa.cht: 進入龍穴的人就必須做好對付壽老的覺悟。

ScenarioScripts/100504/61e44a64.eng: There is no shame in remaining behind.
ScenarioScripts/100504/61e44a64.cht: 就算留在後方也不會有人說話，所以最好做出明智的選擇。

ScenarioScripts/100504/47f5f684.eng: Okay, I see the dragon. Who’s the woman?
ScenarioScripts/100504/47f5f684.cht: 好，看見龍了。那個女人是誰呢？

ScenarioScripts/100504/a98cb485.eng: Black Mamba, of the Serpent Society.

ScenarioScripts/100504/686b383d.eng: Makes sense. Mordo’s probably enhancing her telepathic abilities, and she can also use the Darkforce.
ScenarioScripts/100504/686b383d.cht: 我知道了。莫度男爵似乎是增強她的心電感應能力後進行操控。她也是能操控暗黑能量的能力者。

ScenarioScripts/100504/5987a3bd.eng: So she can help him control Shou-Lao and also be his Darkforce Dimension tour guide.
ScenarioScripts/100504/5987a3bd.cht: 黑曼巴可以操控壽老，也能引導人們前往暗能次元參觀呢？

ScenarioScripts/100504/83d6473e.eng: Who enters the Cave of the Dragon?

ScenarioScripts/100504/db73b394.cht: 壽老，將這些入侵者全都燃燒殆盡吧！

ScenarioScripts/100504/cf033d1a.eng: Mordo is here, in the chamber beyond Shou-Lao. See! There is the Wand!
ScenarioScripts/100504/cf033d1a.cht: 莫度男爵在壽老另一邊的房間內。喂！而且他身上有瓦圖姆之杖。

ScenarioScripts/100504/2c9c91fa.eng: Black Mamba, hold the dragon! The portal is not yet stable!
ScenarioScripts/100504/2c9c91fa.cht: 黑曼巴，好好抓住龍吧！傳送門目前還不穩定！

ScenarioScripts/100504/775e3498.eng: Lei Kung, you and I can keep Shou-Lao occupied. Strange? Cage? Baron Mordo's all yours.
ScenarioScripts/100504/775e3498.cht: 雷公，你和我聯手的話，應該就能吸引壽老的視線。奇異博士？盧克·凱奇？莫度男爵就拜託你了！

ScenarioScripts/100504/8e52d187.eng: That leaves Black Mamba to me.

ScenarioScripts/100504/4cd5bf64.eng: Let us see if Mordo can hold sway over a dragon with one hand and create new pathways between worlds with the other.
ScenarioScripts/100504/4cd5bf64.cht: 我倒要看看莫度男爵是否能單手操控龍，同時使用另一隻手創造出連結兩個世界的通道。

ScenarioScripts/100504/460ebecd.eng: You have freed the dragon...but you have not yet freed K’un Lun. There are other doors, other portals...
ScenarioScripts/100504/460ebecd.cht: 看來對龍施下的魔法解除了...但崑崙的危機還沒解除。還有其他的傳送門…

ScenarioScripts/100504/c56e9f93.eng: My madness has passed. What interest has Baron Mordo in K'un L'un?
ScenarioScripts/100504/c56e9f93.cht: 我身上的狂暴魔法全都解除了。莫度男爵為何會來崑崙呢？

ScenarioScripts/100504/f0f72c9d.eng: He sought to create a passage between the demonic realms and our world, using K'un L'un as his pathway.
ScenarioScripts/100504/f0f72c9d.cht: 他企圖創造出連接惡魔世界與我們世界的通道。崑崙差一點就淪落成那種地方。

ScenarioScripts/100504/66ccc112.eng: He has escaped for the moment.

ScenarioScripts/100504/e6ca431d.eng: You. Mortal. You possess power over the shards.
ScenarioScripts/100504/e6ca431d.cht: 你！人類！看來你擁有操控宇宙碎片的能力。

ScenarioScripts/100504/79a031c8.eng: Take this. It contains a fragment of Agamotto's power. Convey it to the Ancient One.
ScenarioScripts/100504/79a031c8.cht: 收下這個吧。它蘊含著阿迦莫多的力量。希望你能交給上古尊者。

ScenarioScripts/100505/38eadeda.eng: Ancient One! We have need of your powers.
ScenarioScripts/100505/38eadeda.cht: 上古尊者！我需要您的幫忙！

ScenarioScripts/100505/62651588.eng: Ancient One. Shou-Lao has given you a gift.
ScenarioScripts/100505/62651588.cht: 上古尊者。原來是壽老在要求禮物呢。

ScenarioScripts/100505/e0c46161.eng: Ah. With this shard, I can serve as a conduit for the powers of Agamotto, and block the portal.
ScenarioScripts/100505/e0c46161.cht: 啊。看來利用這個宇宙碎片就能發揮阿迦莫多的威力封鎖傳送門。

ScenarioScripts/100505/71155456.eng: Look out! Baron Mordo is in the portal!
ScenarioScripts/100505/71155456.cht: 小心！莫度男爵在傳送門裡！

ScenarioScripts/100505/906453c1.eng: Destroy them all. I will feed on the dragon myself.
ScenarioScripts/100505/906453c1.cht: 全都破壞吧！由我來親自對付龍。

ScenarioScripts/100505/df99ac85.eng: A shard of Agamotto's power? I will take it.
ScenarioScripts/100505/df99ac85.cht: 蘊含阿迦莫多力量的碎片？由我帶走了。

ScenarioScripts/100505/4c94c28c.eng: You will have to. Certainly I will not give it.
ScenarioScripts/100505/4c94c28c.cht: 你試試看吧。我不會乖乖交出去的。

ScenarioScripts/100505/37e3bb21.eng: I will find another way into this world. Mordo, remember our bargain.
ScenarioScripts/100505/37e3bb21.cht: 試著尋找通往這個世界的其他路線吧。莫度男爵，別忘記我們之間的交易。

ScenarioScripts/100505/8fc9453a.eng: Mordo, you toy with powers that are beyond you.
ScenarioScripts/100505/8fc9453a.cht: 莫度男爵，你在玩超過你能力範圍的力量呢。

ScenarioScripts/100505/83aed683.eng: No power is beyond me now, Strange.
ScenarioScripts/100505/83aed683.cht: 現在任何力量都在我的能力範圍之內，奇異博士。

ScenarioScripts/100505/252d1d89.eng: We have not seen the last of Mordo. He will strike at this barrier again.
ScenarioScripts/100505/252d1d89.cht: 沒能確認莫度男爵是否已經完蛋了。他們一定會再來攻擊封鎖傳送門的屏障。

ScenarioScripts/100505/e72fdb5c.eng: Mordo grows more powerful using the energies of the shards. If he returns, can you...?
ScenarioScripts/100505/e72fdb5c.cht: 莫度男爵正利用宇宙碎片能量慢慢變得更強當中。不過等他回來後...真的能阻止得了他嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100505/cf849828.eng: The day I cannot defeat Karl Mordo is the day I join my ancestors.
ScenarioScripts/100505/cf849828.cht: 我輸給莫度男爵的那一天，就代表是我要去祖先身邊的日子。

ScenarioScripts/100505/c320f44f.eng: Agamotto’s power will hold this barrier. Return to Kamar-Taj. There is yet one more Wand to find.
ScenarioScripts/100505/c320f44f.cht: 阿迦莫多的力量會守護這個屏障。而且我們還得再找一個權杖。

ScenarioScripts/100506/f068c0ec.eng: It’s a Darkforce vortex. HYDRA turned on their battery, and now these are popping up all over the place.
ScenarioScripts/100506/f068c0ec.cht: 是暗能漩渦！九頭蛇開啟電池後，現在到處都會看見這些東西。

ScenarioScripts/100506/ef7eb950.cht: 九頭蛇來了嗎？這裡是卡瑪泰姬？

ScenarioScripts/100506/86db8d61.eng: No, they’re in Wakanda. But there’s something coming through the Darkforce.
ScenarioScripts/100506/86db8d61.cht: 不，九頭蛇在瓦干達。但可以感覺到暗能另一端有某個東西正接近當中。

ScenarioScripts/100506/75bdabd6.eng: Yeah, I’m reading all kinds of inter-dimensional resonance. Seems to be getting more intense...
ScenarioScripts/100506/75bdabd6.cht: 嗯，沒錯，目前全部的資源都產生了共鳴。大概會慢慢變嚴重吧…

ScenarioScripts/100506/52e9a97c.cht: 那個像漩渦的東西。似乎慢慢變大了。

ScenarioScripts/100506/d4ebba8e.eng: We need to get out of here!

ScenarioScripts/100506/347da197.cht: 這裡到底是什麼地方呢？

ScenarioScripts/100506/a33f2af5.eng: A lot of people go in...

ScenarioScripts/100506/a4e9d39f.eng: Wait. I sense the last Wand of Watoomb. It is near.
ScenarioScripts/100506/a4e9d39f.cht: 等一下。我感覺到最後一支瓦圖姆之杖了。而且是在非常近的地方。

ScenarioScripts/100506/407f5616.eng: Wait. Is that... another Red Skull over there?
ScenarioScripts/100506/407f5616.cht: 等等，看哪邊…似乎還有一名紅骷髏?

ScenarioScripts/100506/9a5b8140.eng: Now you begin to understand the consequences of the Cosmic Cube's destruction!
ScenarioScripts/100506/9a5b8140.cht: 現在才感覺到宇宙魔方的爆發招來的災禍嗎!

ScenarioScripts/100507/7cab7bfe.eng: The explosion of the Cosmic Cube catapulted me through dimensions beyond number.
ScenarioScripts/100507/7cab7bfe.cht: 宇宙魔方的爆炸將我彈飛到無數次元的另一端。

ScenarioScripts/100507/1044ca81.eng: As it did you, Captain Rogers.
ScenarioScripts/100507/1044ca81.cht: 你大概也是一樣吧，美國隊長。

ScenarioScripts/100507/52c32857.eng: But only I found a Wand of Watoomb in one of those distant dimensions...
ScenarioScripts/100507/52c32857.cht: 但既然在遙遠次元的某處發現了瓦圖姆之杖...

ScenarioScripts/100507/0628e111.eng: And only I gathered each version of myself from each dimension I traversed.
ScenarioScripts/100507/0628e111.cht: 而且在我四處徘徊的這段期間，都和各個次元的你在一起。

ScenarioScripts/100507/53ecdd5d.cht: ...該是面對紅骷髏軍團的時候了！

ScenarioScripts/100507/32fe2802.eng: Hey, Cap. Did you see a bunch of versions of yourself too?
ScenarioScripts/100507/32fe2802.cht: 喂，隊長。你消失的這段期間是否有發現其他版本的隊長呢？

ScenarioScripts/100507/cf1df246.eng: I wasn’t looking. I was just trying to get home.
ScenarioScripts/100507/cf1df246.cht: 我根本就沒有嘗試去尋找。因為我只是一心想要回家而已。

ScenarioScripts/100507/86d692c5.eng: That is the difference between you and I, Captain Rogers. You think only of your friends...where I think only of conquest!
ScenarioScripts/100507/86d692c5.cht: 這就是你和我之間的差異，美國隊長。你掛念同伴的這段期間...我則夢想征服世界！

ScenarioScripts/100507/0f03d30a.eng: This is like some kind of nightmare!

ScenarioScripts/100507/3f33e984.eng: Don’t lose track of the original.
ScenarioScripts/100507/3f33e984.cht: 千萬不能讓他的本體逃走。

ScenarioScripts/100507/c8b7f3f0.eng: He’s the one with the Wand. Don’t let him out of our sight.
ScenarioScripts/100507/c8b7f3f0.cht: 那傢伙手上有權杖。好好觀察，別讓他脫離視線範圍。

ScenarioScripts/100507/eb03252b.eng: Where is he? I don’t see the Wand.

ScenarioScripts/100507/7cfebd99.eng: I can still sense its presence. It is here in the Darkforce Dimension...at least for now.
ScenarioScripts/100507/7cfebd99.cht: 還感受得到他的氣息。在這個暗能次元....至少現在是....

ScenarioScripts/100508/df6c6e66.eng: Never thought I’d see us outnumbered by Red Skulls.
ScenarioScripts/100508/df6c6e66.cht: 沒想到我們的人數會輸給紅骷髏。根本就難以想像。

ScenarioScripts/100508/32bd1fb6.eng: Not getting scared, are you, Cap? Because if you’re scared, I’m gonna get scared.
ScenarioScripts/100508/32bd1fb6.cht: 你該不會是害怕吧，隊長？隊長害怕的話，那我怎能不害怕呢？

ScenarioScripts/100508/306f143f.eng: Only an idiot is never scared, Clint. But we’re going to fight them, no matter how many of them there are.
ScenarioScripts/100508/306f143f.cht: 克林特，膽大不知畏懼是愚蠢之徒的行為。但無論敵人的數量多少，我們都要勇敢對抗。

ScenarioScripts/100508/23b8c7fc.eng: Fitting words to be engraved on your tombstone, Rogers. I will see to it!
ScenarioScripts/100508/23b8c7fc.cht: 羅傑斯，你是在尋找你墓碑上要寫的句子嗎？我會拭目以待的！

ScenarioScripts/100508/82e79c65.eng: Hold them! Let the Darkforce sap their strength and destroy them...while I make the final strike against Wakanda!
ScenarioScripts/100508/82e79c65.cht: 抓住他們！暗能會讓他們的力量慢慢瓦解，這段期間得對瓦干達發動最後的攻擊！

ScenarioScripts/100508/6567a0dd.eng: I don’t know! There are Red Skulls everywhere!
ScenarioScripts/100508/6567a0dd.cht: 完全沒有頭緒！四面八方都是紅骷髏！

ScenarioScripts/100508/1504d183.eng: Yes! Now to Wakanda, where the ultimate triumph of HYDRA awaits!
ScenarioScripts/100508/1504d183.cht: 好！現在前往瓦干達替我們九頭蛇取得勝利吧！

ScenarioScripts/100508/2d7c12df.eng: I will hold the portal open! After them!
ScenarioScripts/100508/2d7c12df.cht: 我會開啟傳送門！快點追上去！

ScenarioScripts/100509/42b64da9.eng: I was wondering if you guys were ever coming back. Who’s the guy with the red skull?
ScenarioScripts/100509/42b64da9.cht: 我還以為你們永遠無法都回來了。紅色骷髏大叔是誰呢？

ScenarioScripts/100509/da8472f2.eng: Yeesh. And people make fun of me for being called Star-Lord.
ScenarioScripts/100509/da8472f2.cht: 原來如此...連這種名字都有了，那大家為何要嘲笑我的名字星爵呢？

ScenarioScripts/100509/f1146ee2.eng: Are they all the same Red Skull?

ScenarioScripts/100509/872eb490.eng: Kind of. It’s a long story.
ScenarioScripts/100509/872eb490.cht: 差不多。這件事說來話長。

ScenarioScripts/100509/d7aebfb9.eng: You have returned. HYDRA is now united.
ScenarioScripts/100509/d7aebfb9.cht: 回來了呀。九頭蛇終於成為完全體了。

ScenarioScripts/100509/ab413a5c.eng: I hate it when they say that.
ScenarioScripts/100509/ab413a5c.cht: 每次看到他們那副德性就覺得很討厭。

ScenarioScripts/100509/ba3e7a43.eng: Thanos! My knives are meant for you.\r
ScenarioScripts/100509/ba3e7a43.cht: 薩諾斯！我的刀是為了消滅你而製作的。

ScenarioScripts/100509/ab23fe07.eng: We’ll play your vendetta games another day, Drax. Today I’m here for that Wand.
ScenarioScripts/100509/ab23fe07.cht: 復仇戲碼之後再進行吧，德克斯。我今天之所以會來，是因為權杖的關係。

ScenarioScripts/100509/0e2ab111.cht: 那你大概會敗興而歸吧。

ScenarioScripts/100509/4121b076.eng: Proxima. You and the Order take care of the locals.
ScenarioScripts/100509/4121b076.cht: 暗夜比鄰星。你和闇黑號令一起解決小嘍囉吧。

ScenarioScripts/100509/50c1ec13.eng: This is going to sound crazy, but I think we ought to take sides with the Red Skull.
ScenarioScripts/100509/50c1ec13.cht: 雖然聽起來很瘋狂，但目前似乎得和紅骷髏攜手合作才行。

ScenarioScripts/100509/f26e6fdc.eng: Red Skull, right? I just need that Wand.
ScenarioScripts/100509/f26e6fdc.cht: 你的名字是紅骷髏嗎？我只要有那把權杖就行了。

ScenarioScripts/100509/a4615785.cht: 可惡。薩諾斯取得權杖了。

ScenarioScripts/100509/760db944.eng: How is that worse than the Red Skull having it?
ScenarioScripts/100509/760db944.cht: 還有比紅骷髏取得權杖更糟糕的情況嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100509/35ea70cd.eng: Trust me. Everything is worse when Thanos does it.
ScenarioScripts/100509/35ea70cd.cht: 相信我。薩諾斯會讓情況更加惡化。

ScenarioScripts/100509/634faeb6.eng: So this is the Wand of Watoomb. I have searched a long time to hold it in my hands...
ScenarioScripts/100509/634faeb6.cht: 原來這就是瓦圖姆之杖。為了取得權杖，我長時間在四處尋找。

ScenarioScripts/100509/4dbce046.eng: Is there something weird in the sky?

ScenarioScripts/100509/0babd022.eng: Weirder than what was already there? Hard to tell.
ScenarioScripts/100509/0babd022.cht: 已經夠異常了，現在又怎麼樣了？

ScenarioScripts/100509/bfb1f63f.eng: No, I’m serious. Look up there.

ScenarioScripts/100510/234b8508.eng: Something is definitely weird in the sky.

ScenarioScripts/100510/f9bcc3ab.eng: I understand. While it was in another dimension, it did not resonate with the shattered Cosmic Cube. But now that it does...
ScenarioScripts/100510/f9bcc3ab.cht: 我知道了。在其他次元沒有和其他宇宙魔方產生共鳴，但現在發生反應了。

ScenarioScripts/100510/d9997005.eng: All of the Wands are awake. They are intensifying each other...
ScenarioScripts/100510/d9997005.cht: 權杖全都啟用了。而且在互相增幅彼此的力量。

ScenarioScripts/100510/162ed29f.eng: Now you begin to see, don’t you, Strange? This is what I sensed when the Cosmic Cube exploded.
ScenarioScripts/100510/162ed29f.cht: 終於看得見了嗎，奇異博士？我在宇宙魔方破裂的瞬間就預見這一切了。

ScenarioScripts/100510/e4ea1612.eng: I’m sick of all this yammering. Can we just shoot people some more?
ScenarioScripts/100510/e4ea1612.cht: 我已經厭倦抱怨與不滿了。可以戰鬥一下嗎？

ScenarioScripts/100510/99fcf3bf.eng: All realities, permanently conjoined. All realities laid open for me to rule.
ScenarioScripts/100510/99fcf3bf.cht: 所有的現實已經永遠結合在一起了。所有的現實開啟且等著被我支配！

ScenarioScripts/100510/58c860c8.eng: This is what I will bring to pass.
ScenarioScripts/100510/58c860c8.cht: 這是我期盼已久的事情！

ScenarioScripts/100510/7e613e65.eng: You heard the man. He’s telling us to kick his butt and take the Wand.
ScenarioScripts/100510/7e613e65.cht: 聽見了吧？他的意思是拜託我們快點狠狠踹他的屁股一腳，然後搶走權杖。

ScenarioScripts/100510/60ca0920.eng: Yes. Too late. It is happening...
ScenarioScripts/100510/60ca0920.cht: 對，太遲了。事情已經發生了...

ScenarioScripts/100510/8756cd40.eng: Sparkles flicker and grow until each is visibly a tiny portal. Filaments of light appear between them, linking them into a fantastically complex matrix of portals.
ScenarioScripts/100510/8756cd40.cht: 看見火花了，各自閃爍後漸漸變大，然後各自變成小傳送門。它們發出淡淡的光之後，彼此開始相連，形成了一個完整的傳送門基礎。\r

ScenarioScripts/100510/9b7495f8.eng: This is the NEXUS OF ALL REALITIES.

ScenarioScripts/100510/cafe135c.cht: 我就是為了這一刻而生。

ScenarioScripts/100510/599b58fb.eng: Our heroes, Guardians and Avengers and others, stand together against the backdrop of the Great Mound of Wakanda, looking up at the Nexus blazing in the sky.
ScenarioScripts/100510/599b58fb.cht: 我們的英雄們、星際異攻隊星際異攻隊等，以瓦干達神聖丘陵為背景，望著天空閃閃發亮的中心。

ScenarioScripts/200001/38ae03d1.cht: 使用戰線攻擊擊退敵人的隊長吧。

ScenarioScripts/100210/68487215.eng: Your worthless weaklings won't do it!
ScenarioScripts/100210/68487215.cht: 光憑小嘍囉是無法擊倒我的！
