ScenarioScripts/401001/cba28af8.eng: _USER_NAME. Your mission is to support Dagger to successfully infiltrate Hydra base. Defeat opponent leader while protecting Dagger from being knocked out from the battlefield.
ScenarioScripts/401001/cba28af8.cht: _USER_NAME，這次的任務是支援匕首潛入。請保護匕首別讓他被打倒，並且擊敗對方的隊長。

ScenarioScripts/401001/0864e7d2.eng: Defeat Hydra Espionage Agent in 9 turns. He will use Hydra EMP Bomb every 4 turns. Mission will fail if dagger is knocked out.
ScenarioScripts/401001/0864e7d2.cht: 請在第9回合之前打倒九頭蛇潛伏探員。\n對方每隔4回合使用九頭蛇EMP炸彈。\n如果匕首陷入暈眩，任務就算失敗。

ScenarioScripts/401001/b494f3a0.eng: Dagger has successfully infilterated the place. Good job, _USER_NAME.
ScenarioScripts/401001/b494f3a0.cht: 匕首已成功潛入。辛苦了，_USER_NAME。

ScenarioScripts/401002/923ffa86.eng: 지금 상황은 불리해 보인다. 스파이크가 정상 작동을 하고 있지 않아. 왜 핸드가 비어있지? 엇 잠깐만... 통신이...
ScenarioScripts/401002/923ffa86.cht: 現在狀況看起來很不利。史派克沒正常啟動。為什麼手上空空的？哦，等等...通訊...

ScenarioScripts/401002/3e44fac7.eng: 스파이크를 내 맘대로 사용할 수 있으니 너무 좋군! 자 받아랏!
ScenarioScripts/401002/3e44fac7.cht: 能隨意使用史派克，太棒了！來，接招吧！

ScenarioScripts/401002/3a694252.eng: 이럴수가! 그린 고블린이 몇몇 아군의 시스템을 해킹했나봐!
ScenarioScripts/401002/3a694252.cht: 怎麼會！看來綠惡魔入侵了少數我軍的系統！

ScenarioScripts/401002/d2a5e429.eng: 잠깐... 혼란한 틈을 타 이쪽에서도 해킹에 성공한 모양이야! 그린 고블린의 정보를 몰래 빼내오자.
ScenarioScripts/401002/d2a5e429.cht: 等等…趁著混亂，這裡好像也成功入侵了！請偷偷把綠惡魔的情報帶回來。

ScenarioScripts/401002/af81f9b5.eng: 호오, 빼낸 정보가 호박 폭탄 배달이라니, 시작부터 성적이 좋은데? 이대로 밀어붙히자.
ScenarioScripts/401002/af81f9b5.cht: 哦哦，竊取到的情報是運送南瓜炸彈啊，從一開始就有不錯的結果呢。繼續趁勝追擊吧。

ScenarioScripts/401002/0d62cf54.eng: 해킹으로 얻은 그린 고블린의 정보를 이용해 그린 고블린을 처치하세요.
ScenarioScripts/401002/0d62cf54.cht: 請利用駭到的綠惡魔的情報，擊敗綠惡魔。

ScenarioScripts/401002/cfcce5ba.eng: 적을 쓰러뜨리니 그린 고블린이 그동안 상대한 우리 아군들의 정보를 토해내는 모양이야! 좋았어.
ScenarioScripts/401002/cfcce5ba.cht: 既然已經打倒敵人，綠惡魔應該會吐出這段時間交戰過的我軍的情報！很好，

ScenarioScripts/401002/6980f470.eng: 적을 1명 이상 처치하면 더 강력한 아군의 정보를 얻을 수 있는 모양이야!
ScenarioScripts/401002/6980f470.cht: 看來打倒敵人1名以上就能取得更強大的我軍的情報！

ScenarioScripts/401002/7ca3741a.cht: 居然連這點程度都擋不住。真沒出息！

ScenarioScripts/401003/d76f32fc.eng: Communication error has been detected. Looks like our enemy has hacked into few of our humanoid's system.
ScenarioScripts/401003/d76f32fc.cht: 發現通訊錯誤。看來我方人形機器被敵人入侵了。

ScenarioScripts/401003/2f1e866b.eng: We gained access to enemy's card information. Pumpking Bomb Delivery is a powerful card. It is highly recommended that you use it this turn.
ScenarioScripts/401003/2f1e866b.cht: 看來能存取敵人的卡片情報。運送南瓜炸彈是非常強大的卡片，能讓戰況對我方有利。建議在這回合使用。

ScenarioScripts/401003/69c233c0.eng: Communication error has also been detected from the enemy's side. Any humanoid knocked out from the battlefield will deal damage to enemy leader.
ScenarioScripts/401003/69c233c0.cht: 敵人的通訊網發生錯誤。看來如果人形機器陷入暈眩，就能對敵方隊長造成重創。

ScenarioScripts/401003/8d823d7a.cht: 照這樣進行下去，預測戰況對我方有利。

ScenarioScripts/401004/ecaf1eff.eng: Communication error has not been resolved yet. Enemy humanoid must be taken down.
ScenarioScripts/401004/ecaf1eff.cht: 看來通訊還沒修復。最好擊暈敵方的人形機器。

ScenarioScripts/401004/af943ac9.eng: Using Pumpkin Bomb Delivery will increase the odds of winning this battle.
ScenarioScripts/401004/af943ac9.cht: 若使用運送南瓜炸彈，預測這場戰鬥也能輕鬆解決。

ScenarioScripts/401004/394b3680.eng: Ouch! Why are these humanoids on to me? You got the wrong person you idiots!
ScenarioScripts/401004/394b3680.cht: 唉呀！為什麼打我？你們要攻擊的人不是我而是那裡，這些蠢蛋！

ScenarioScripts/401004/1aa98e05.eng: Communication error on enemy's side has not been resolved as well. Fast victory is expected.
ScenarioScripts/401004/1aa98e05.cht: 看來敵人的通訊網也還沒修復。預計能快速取勝。

ScenarioScripts/401004/a7751f83.eng: Hold it! This battle isn't a fair game. Let's retreat for now.
ScenarioScripts/401004/a7751f83.cht: 等等！這樣下去很不利。暫時撤退。

ScenarioScripts/401003/86eba4e1.eng: Pumpkin Bomb Delivery will be added to your hand every 3 turns.\nK.O. enemy humanoids on the battlefield to deal damage to enemy leader directly. \nMix with battle line attacks to defeat opponent leader.
ScenarioScripts/401003/86eba4e1.cht: 每三回合南瓜炸彈會回到手牌。擊敗敵人人形機器時，可以對敵人隊長造成傷害。請打敗敵人的隊長。

ScenarioScripts/401003/7e56fcbf.eng: Using Pumpking Bomb Delivery is recommended.
ScenarioScripts/401003/7e56fcbf.cht: 建議在這回合使用運送南瓜炸彈。

ScenarioScripts/401003/1adae5c3.eng: Arrrgghh! What is going on? What is all this damage I'm getting...!
ScenarioScripts/401003/1adae5c3.cht: 呃呃！這是怎麼回事？我怎麼會受到損傷...！

ScenarioScripts/401007/dee1b6ee.eng: Looks like we will have to go in a bit further to get more information. Could you help me out once more?
ScenarioScripts/401007/dee1b6ee.cht: 需要再更深入才能得知情報。能再幫忙一次嗎？

ScenarioScripts/401007/3ca32574.eng: Defeat Hydra Squad Leader in 7 turns. He will use Hydra EMP Bomb every 3 turns. Mission will fail if dagger is knocked out.
ScenarioScripts/401007/3ca32574.cht: 請在第8回合之前打倒九頭蛇副隊長。\n對方每隔3回合使用九頭蛇EMP炸彈。\n如果匕首陷入暈眩，任務就算失敗。

ScenarioScripts/401007/2ada3bcf.eng: Thanks, _USER_NAME. This information is exactly what I've been looking for!
ScenarioScripts/401007/2ada3bcf.cht: 謝謝你，_USER_NAME。啊，這好像是我在找的資料！

ScenarioScripts/401008/346f1572.eng: Hydra won't free me that easily. Please do me a favor, _USER_NAME, and help me one more time.
ScenarioScripts/401008/346f1572.cht: 九頭蛇不會輕易放我走。_USER_NAME，抱歉，再麻煩你一下。

ScenarioScripts/401008/d6b189c8.eng: Defeat Madame Hydra in 7 turns. She will use Hydra EMP Bomb every 3 turns. Mission will fail if dagger is knocked out.
ScenarioScripts/401008/d6b189c8.cht: 請在第8回合之前打倒九頭蛇夫人。\n對方每隔3回合使用九頭蛇EMP炸彈。\n如果匕首陷入暈眩，任務就算失敗。

ScenarioScripts/401001/5d202be7.eng: The enemy will be using the bomb this next turn. Be careful!
ScenarioScripts/401001/5d202be7.cht: 敵方下一回合九頭蛇炸彈將會爆炸。小心！

ScenarioScripts/401001/f223335a.eng: Hydra EMP bomb is expected this turn!
ScenarioScripts/401001/f223335a.cht: 這回合九頭蛇EMP炸彈將會爆炸！

ScenarioScripts/401008/a16f85fd.eng: Both of you must have gone through a lot. We've found out where the bomb is hidden, so leave the rest of the mission to us.
ScenarioScripts/401008/a16f85fd.cht: 兩位都完成了大事。既然已經查出存放爆裂物的地方，其餘的事就由我們解決吧。

ScenarioScripts/401001/1d828b3c.eng: Use every single EMP bomb we have to sweep out everything on the battlefield!!
ScenarioScripts/401001/1d828b3c.cht: 就算用光所有EMP炸彈也要消滅敵人！

Me.name: Me
Me.summary: An ordinary New Yorker who started working with S.H.I.E.L.D. after the Cosmic Cube's explosion gave them special powers.

PlayerMale01.name: PlayerMale01
PlayerMale01.summary: An ordinary New Yorker who started working with S.H.I.E.L.D. after the Cosmic Cube's explosion gave them special powers.

PlayerMale02.name: PlayerMale02
PlayerMale02.summary: An ordinary New Yorker who started working with S.H.I.E.L.D. after the Cosmic Cube's explosion gave them special powers.

PlayerMale03.name: PlayerMale03
PlayerMale03.summary: An ordinary New Yorker who started working with S.H.I.E.L.D. after the Cosmic Cube's explosion gave them special powers.

PlayerFemale01.name: PlayerFemale01
PlayerFemale01.summary: An ordinary New Yorker who started working with S.H.I.E.L.D. after the Cosmic Cube's explosion gave them special powers.

PlayerFemale02.name: PlayerFemale02
PlayerFemale02.summary: An ordinary New Yorker who started working with S.H.I.E.L.D. after the Cosmic Cube's explosion gave them special powers.

PlayerFemale03.name: PlayerFemale03
PlayerFemale03.summary: An ordinary New Yorker who started working with S.H.I.E.L.D. after the Cosmic Cube's explosion gave them special powers.

DumDumDuganTimothyDugan.name: DumDumDuganTimothyDugan
DumDumDuganTimothyDugan.finishword: If there’s a fight, I want in. What are we waiting for?
DumDumDuganTimothyDugan.summary: A World War II hero and original Howling Commando, Dum Dum Dugan was replaced with an LMD who continues to serve as Nick Fury's advisor and conscience.
DumDumDuganTimothyDugan.powers: Experienced soldier, skilled with a wide variety of weapons

NickFuryNicholasFuryJr.name: NickFuryNicholasFuryJr
NickFuryNicholasFuryJr.text: After summoning, add {0} ATK to distant allies
NickFuryNicholasFuryJr.finishword: This is what we trained for, people. Everyone do your job.
NickFuryNicholasFuryJr.summary: Nick Fury is the director of S.H.I.E.L.D. and the force behind the organization's global reach. In the aftermath of the explosion of the Cosmic Cube, he directs the defense of Earth and the search for Captain America.

CarnageCletusKasady.name: CarnageCletusKasady
CarnageCletusKasady.text: After summoning, drain nearby enemies' HP by {0} with Symbiote Powers, then add drained HP to own ATK
CarnageCletusKasady.finishword: I got some mayhem to attend to!
CarnageCletusKasady.msg: {0} drained life from others to become stronger!
CarnageCletusKasady.summary: Alien symbiote hunting for a host. Though the host gets enormous strength, it slowly gets controlled over the symbiote, looking for new prey.
CarnageCletusKasady.powers: Strength beyond ordinary human and tentacle-like symbiotic matters

PunisherFrankCastle.name: PunisherFrankCastle
PunisherFrankCastle.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage to the enemy with the highest HP. If the enemy is distant and alone deal {1} damage instead
PunisherFrankCastle.finishword: Break the law and justice is coming. No second chances, no shades of gray.
PunisherFrankCastle.msg: {0} carefully aimed and fired a shot!
PunisherFrankCastle.summary: Traumatized by the murder of his family, the Punisher lives in a black-and-white world. The guilty must be punished, and the only punishment is death.

IronManModel25TonyStark.name: IronManModel25TonyStark
IronManModel25TonyStark.finishword: I'm Iron Man -- billionaire genius philanthropist -- but you already knew that.
IronManModel25TonyStark.summary: When billionaire industrialist Tony Stark dons his sophisticated armor, he becomes a living high-tech weapon, primed for defending the greater good. As Iron Man, he is driven by a heart that is part machine, but all hero. He has thrown himself into the search for Captain America after the explosion of the Cosmic Cube.
IronManModel25TonyStark.powers: Creates cutting-edge technology and weapons; uses a high-tech armored suit; posesses scientific and tactical brilliance

IronManModel38TonyStark.name: IronManModel38TonyStark
IronManModel38TonyStark.text: After summoning, deal {0}~{1} damage each to {2} enemies with smart missiles
IronManModel38TonyStark.finishword: You just ran out of chances.
IronManModel38TonyStark.summary: When billionaire industrialist Tony Stark dons his sophisticated armor, he becomes a living high-tech weapon, primed for defending the greater good. As Iron Man, he is driven by a heart that is part machine, but all hero. He has thrown himself into the search for Captain America after the explosion of the Cosmic Cube.
IronManModel38TonyStark.powers: Creates cutting-edge technology and weapons; uses a high-tech armored suit; posesses scientific and tactical brilliance

IronManModel38TonyStarkFaceOpen.name: IronManModel38TonyStarkFaceOpen
IronManModel38TonyStarkFaceOpen.summary: When billionaire industrialist Tony Stark dons his sophisticated armor, he becomes a living high-tech weapon, primed for defending the greater good. As Iron Man, he is driven by a heart that is part machine, but all hero. He has thrown himself into the search for Captain America after the explosion of the Cosmic Cube.
IronManModel38TonyStarkFaceOpen.powers: Creates cutting-edge technology and weapons; uses a high-tech armored suit; posesses scientific and tactical brilliance

IronManWithoutSuitTonyStark.name: IronManWithoutSuitTonyStark
IronManWithoutSuitTonyStark.text: On every turn, absorb all cosmic fragments to the left and right. If fragments were absorbed {0} times, gear up to Iron-Man model 25
IronManWithoutSuitTonyStark.finishword: Trying to compete with me is just going to make you look bad.
IronManWithoutSuitTonyStark.msg: Tony used Cosmic Fragments to make his suit
IronManWithoutSuitTonyStark.summary: When billionaire industrialist Tony Stark dons his sophisticated armor, he becomes a living high-tech weapon, primed for defending the greater good. As Iron Man, he is driven by a heart that is part machine, but all hero. He has thrown himself into the search for Captain America after the explosion of the Cosmic Cube.
IronManWithoutSuitTonyStark.powers: Creates cutting-edge technology and weapons; uses a high-tech armored suit; posesses scientific and tactical brilliance

IronFistDannyRand.name: IronFistDannyRand
IronFistDannyRand.text: After summoning, destroy {0} nearby cosmic fragment
IronFistDannyRand.finishword: You might shoot lasers out of your eyes or whatever, but I’ve got the chi of an immortal dragon, so I’m good.
IronFistDannyRand.msg: {0} charged his chi and smashed cosmic fragments!
IronFistDannyRand.summary: Master of martial arts who bears the symbol of the immortal dragon Shou-Lao on his chest. As the Iron Fist, Rand can focus his chi into a devastating punch. He protects the mystical city of K'un L'un from dark forces using shards of the Cosmic Cube.
IronFistDannyRand.powers: Martial artist that can focus chi into fist for destructive power

BlackPantherTChalla.name: BlackPantherTChalla
BlackPantherTChalla.text: When damage is dealt to Black Panther through an enemy's special ability, reflect 50% damage back to the source through the use of Wakandan technology
BlackPantherTChalla.finishword: Wakanda will stand for what is right.
BlackPantherTChalla.msg: {0}'s vibranium suit received damage, but reflected some of it back to the enemy!
BlackPantherTChalla.summary: Ruler of Wakanda, rich land of the rare resource called Vibranium. Wears a Vibranium-made suit which is nearly impossible to penetrate, and has the speed and strength as a panther.
BlackPantherTChalla.powers: Vibranium suit, superhuman strength, stamina and speed

SpiderManPeterParker.name: SpiderManPeterParker
SpiderManPeterParker.text: After summoning, tie up a card in the opponent's hand and make them unusable until next turn
SpiderManPeterParker.msg: {0} used his web to tie up an enemy card!
SpiderManPeterParker.summary: Bitten by a radioactive spider, Peter Parker acquired the powers of a spider and became Spider-Man.

SpiderManBlackSuitPeterParker.name: SpiderManBlackSuitPeterParker
SpiderManBlackSuitPeterParker.finishword: I'd love to let you go... But, you caused too much trouble! Bye!
SpiderManBlackSuitPeterParker.summary: Bitten by a radioactive spider, Peter Parker acquired the powers of a spider and became Spider-Man.

DeathlokLutherManning.name: DeathlokLutherManning
DeathlokLutherManning.text: After summoning, deal {0}~{1} damage to a diagonally placed enemy through rocket fire
DeathlokLutherManning.finishword: All I’ve been through doesn’t change one thing. I’m a soldier.
DeathlokLutherManning.summary: Colonel Luther Manning suffered battlefield wounds that would have been fatal...if Harlan Ryker had not rebuilt him into the cyborg soldier known as Deathlok.
DeathlokLutherManning.powers: Cybernetically enhanced physiology; advanced weaponry; strategic brilliance

ThorThorOdinson.name: ThorThorOdinson
ThorThorOdinson.text: On every turn, deal {0}~{1} damage to the enemy with the highest HP through a lightning bolt strike
ThorThorOdinson.finishword: I am Thor, son of Odin and god of thunder!
ThorThorOdinson.msg: {0} toasted an enemy with his lightning!
ThorThorOdinson.summary: Thunder god of Asgard, son of Odin and brother of Loki, Thor grew to love Midgard during an exile there, and with his mortal friends fights to protect it and the rest of the realms.
ThorThorOdinson.powers: Flight, control of lightning, enchanted hammer Mjolnir

CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.name: CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.text: After moving, double current ATK. This ability is used once per summon
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.finishword: We’re here to do the things only we can do. That’s what makes us heroes.
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.msg: {0} has channeled her energy! Her ATK was fully powered up!
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.summary: Fighter pilot Carol Danvers was infused with Kree DNA that bestowed astonishing powers. She became Captain Marvel and joined the Avengers, later leading Alpha Flight's mission to protect Earth against threats from space.
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.powers: Flight, super strength and endurance, energy absorption and projection; skilled pilot

RocketRaccoon.name: RocketRaccoon
RocketRaccoon.text: After summoning, deal {0}~{1} damage and shuffle 3 enemies with explosive gravity bombs
RocketRaccoon.finishword: This won’t hurt too much… ahhh, who am I kidding?
RocketRaccoon.msg: {0} used gravity bombs to blast the enemies into the air.
RocketRaccoon.summary: Small but pugnacious alien who resembles a raccoon -- though he doesn't know what a raccoon is. A skilled pilot and lover of every kind of gun.
RocketRaccoon.powers: Skilled pilot, wide experience with projectile weapons and explosives

DaredevilMatthewMurdock.name: DaredevilMatthewMurdock
DaredevilMatthewMurdock.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage to one enemy on the same vertical line by striking them with billy clubs
DaredevilMatthewMurdock.finishword: They don't call me the Man Without Fear for nothing.
DaredevilMatthewMurdock.msg: {0} smacked an enemy with his billy clubs!
DaredevilMatthewMurdock.summary: Daredevil's blindness caused his other senses to become superhumanly acute. He is a martial-arts master who patrols and defends the Hell's Kitchen neighborhood of New York. He is also a skilled lawyer.

Agent13SharonCarter.name: Agent13SharonCarter
Agent13SharonCarter.summary: S.H.I.E.L.D. agent with specialized training in martial arts as well as firearms, often working alongside Captain America. After his disappearance while battling the Red Skull, she is leading efforts to locate him.

KingpinWilsonFisk.name: KingpinWilsonFisk
KingpinWilsonFisk.text: After summoning, destroy {0} nearby empty slot by smashing it
KingpinWilsonFisk.finishword: The only way to rule a rabble is through strength. Pity is weakness.
KingpinWilsonFisk.summary: Crimelord and entrepreneur with enormous wealth and power, particularly in his home neighborhood of Hell's Kitchen. Fisk sees the shards of the Cosmic Cube as an opportunity to consolidate his control over the entire city.
KingpinWilsonFisk.powers: Physical strength, army of hired goons

LukeCage.name: LukeCage
LukeCage.text: When damaged and not knocked out, add {0} HP
LukeCage.finishword: Knuckle up, people. We got to protect our own.
LukeCage.summary: One of the original New York street heroes, Luke Cage puts his unbreakable skin on the line to defend the helpless and fight evil--with the Defenders, the Avengers, or all on his own.

VenomEdwardBrock.name: VenomEdwardBrock
VenomEdwardBrock.text: After summoning, drain nearby enemies' HP by {0} with Symbiote Powers, then add drained HP to own HP
VenomEdwardBrock.finishword: We know your weakness. We will teach you fear.
VenomEdwardBrock.msg: {0} drained life from enemies to become stronger!
VenomEdwardBrock.summary: Alien symbiote that gives its host super strength and stamina. Shoots web-like projectiles owing to a complicated past with Spider-Man.
VenomEdwardBrock.powers: Deadly force and tentacle-like symbiotic matters

Gamora.name: Gamora
Gamora.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage each to enemies on her right and left through slashes with her Godslayer
Gamora.finishword: You know I’m the deadliest woman in the universe, right? Don’t say I didn’t warn you.
Gamora.summary: Gamora is one of the galaxy's most feared assassins thanks to the brutal training Thanos put her through as a child. She now fights against him as a member of the Guardians of the Galaxy.
Gamora.powers: Able to fight with most weapons, preferring blades; martial arts; enhanced speed and strength

HawkeyeClintonBarton.name: HawkeyeClintonBarton
HawkeyeClintonBarton.text: After summoning, deal {0}~{1} damage to the enemy with the lowest HP with an arrow shot
HawkeyeClintonBarton.msg: {0} let loose an arrow towards his enemy!
HawkeyeClintonBarton.summary: Even though Clint doesn't have superpowers, he is known as one of the best archers on earth. With his concentration and athletic skills, he never misses his target.

MistyKnightMercedesKnight.name: MistyKnightMercedesKnight
MistyKnightMercedesKnight.text: On every turn, if there are enemies nearby, earn {0} cosmic fragments
MistyKnightMercedesKnight.finishword: I'll show you some real strength.
MistyKnightMercedesKnight.msg: {0} searched the nearby perimeters for fragments!
MistyKnightMercedesKnight.summary: NYPD officer Mercedes Knight lost an arm in a bomb attack, and recieved a cybernetic replacement from Tony Stark. She started a private investigation firm with Colleen Wing and later joined the Defenders.
MistyKnightMercedesKnight.powers: Police training, martial arts, cybernetic arm with various combat abilities

DraxArtherDouglas.name: DraxArtherDouglas
DraxArtherDouglas.text: On every turn, add ATK {0}, HP {1} to self by enraging at the thought of Thanos
DraxArtherDouglas.finishword: I will have my revenge against Thanos no matter what it takes.
DraxArtherDouglas.msg: {0} is now furious! Anger drove {0} stronger!
DraxArtherDouglas.summary: Drax was created to battle Thanos, using the spirit of Arthur Douglas. His daughter, captured by Thanos, became Moondragon. He fights alongside his fellow Guardians of the Galaxy.
DraxArtherDouglas.powers: Superhuman strength and endurance, enhanced senses, peerless skill with knives

HulkBruceBanner.name: HulkBruceBanner
HulkBruceBanner.text: On every turn, attack and deal {0} damage to a nearby enemy with the highest ATK
HulkBruceBanner.summary: A blast of gamma rays transformed Bruce Banner's physiology, enabling him to transform into the raging green giant known as the Hulk. At first a force of pure destruction, the Hulk has learned over the years to control his temper...sometimes.
HulkBruceBanner.powers: Virtually unlimited phyiscal strength, near invulnerability to most attacks

BruceBanner.name: BruceBanner
BruceBanner.text: When knocked out, use {0} cosmic fragments to transform into the Hulk
BruceBanner.finishword: The sooner I get this situation taken care of, the sooner I get back into the lab.
BruceBanner.msg: {0} was knocked out, but HULK's awake!!!
BruceBanner.summary: When Dr. Bruce Baner bravely rescued a teenager from a bomb test, a masive dose of radiation transformed the scientist's DNA. If Bruce loses his temper, the hidden adrenaline-fed hero in his genes awakens -- the Incredible Hulk!
BruceBanner.powers: Posesses brilliant scientific intellect; can transform into the powerful Hulk

BruceBannerTransformedHulk.name: BruceBannerTransformedHulk
BruceBannerTransformedHulk.summary: A blast of gamma rays transformed Bruce Banner's physiology, enabling him to transform into the raging green giant known as the Hulk. At first a force of pure destruction, the Hulk has learned over the years to control his temper...sometimes.
BruceBannerTransformedHulk.powers: Virtually unlimited phyiscal strength, near invulnerability to most attacks

Ronan.name: Ronan
Ronan.text: When a character is knocked out, Ronan gains {0} ATK / HP
Ronan.finishword: You stand accused. I will now pronounce your sentence.
Ronan.summary: Kree warrior known as the Accuser, on a galactic crusade to root out and destroy all who stand accused of offenses against the Kree Empire.
Ronan.powers: Kree strength and agility; high-tech armor; Cosmi-Rod

WarMachineJamesRhodes.name: WarMachineJamesRhodes
WarMachineJamesRhodes.text: After summoning, deal {0}~{1} damage to 1 enemy with Smart Missiles
WarMachineJamesRhodes.finishword: Systems online and ready. Where’s the target?
WarMachineJamesRhodes.summary: A long-time friend (and occasional rival) of Tony Stark, Colonel James Rhodes has his own armored alter-ego, War Machine.
WarMachineJamesRhodes.powers: Advanced flight-capable armored suit with high-technology weapons

FalconSamuelWilson.name: FalconSamuelWilson
FalconSamuelWilson.text: After summoning, capture a nearby enemy whose HP is below {0} and vanish from the battlefield with that enemy
FalconSamuelWilson.finishword: Redwing and I, we’re your eyes in the sky.
FalconSamuelWilson.msg: {0} snatched an enemy and flew off into the sky!
FalconSamuelWilson.summary: As Falcon, Sam Wilson flies with cybernetic wings and has a telepathic link with his pet hawk Redwing, and other birds as well.

AgentCoulsonPhillipCoulson.name: AgentCoulsonPhillipCoulson
AgentCoulsonPhillipCoulson.text: When summoned, if allies do not occupy the battlefield, summon a shield agent with ATK / HP {0} on a nearby slot
AgentCoulsonPhillipCoulson.finishword: Assets are in position. Let’s move.
AgentCoulsonPhillipCoulson.msg: {0} summoned a S.H.I.E.L.D. agent for backup!
AgentCoulsonPhillipCoulson.summary: S.H.I.E.L.D. agent trained for gathering intel and spying. He's busy dealing with the hazards all over the world after the explosion of the Cosmic Cube.
AgentCoulsonPhillipCoulson.powers: Capable for carrying out joint operations with S.H.I.E.L.D. agents

AntManScottLang.name: AntManScottLang
AntManScottLang.text: After summoning, deal {0}~{1} damage each to all nearby enemies by dealing a massive attack
AntManScottLang.finishword: Big trouble comes in small packages, know what I mean?
AntManScottLang.summary: Hero that can shrink into the size of an ant and control multitudes of real ants using a helmet designed by the Avengers' Hank Pym.
AntManScottLang.powers: Shrinking, telepathic control of ants, electronics expertise

BlackMariahMariahDillard.name: BlackMariahMariahDillard
BlackMariahMariahDillard.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage with a strong kick to one enemy on the same vertical line
BlackMariahMariahDillard.finishword: I don’t look to start fights, but you better believe I’ll finish them.
BlackMariahMariahDillard.summary: A former drug dealer, Black Mariah has at times teamed up with the Heroes for Hire, but she always ends up on the wrong side of the law again. She sees shards of the Cosmic Cube as a way to control New York's underworld.

Vision.name: Vision
Vision.text: Can move two slots at a time. Phases through characters to destination
Vision.summary: Synthezoid Avenger empowered by the Solar Jewel to project energy and control the density of physical objects, including himself.

LokiLaufeyson.name: LokiLaufeyson
LokiLaufeyson.text: After summoning, magically disguise one distant ally as Loki, change their appearance and add {0} ATK {1} HP
LokiLaufeyson.finishword: A word of advice: Don’t ever make the mistake of thinking you’re a step ahead of me.
LokiLaufeyson.summary: Thor's half-brother and constant rival, Loki is a trickster god constantly torn between his desire for power and his impulse to sow chaos just for the delight of seeing the results. But even he doesn't want to see Asgard fall under Hela's influence.

RedSkullJohannShmidt.name: RedSkullJohannShmidt
RedSkullJohannShmidt.text: After moving, summon a Hydra soldier with {0} ATK/HP at the previous position
RedSkullJohannShmidt.finishword: This world is fit only to be ruled…and I alone am fit to rule it.
RedSkullJohannShmidt.msg: Hail Hydra! {0} summoned a Hydra Agent!
RedSkullJohannShmidt.summary: One of the founders of HYDRA, given super powers by a serum similar to the serum that transformed Steve Rogers into Captain America. He disappeared in the explosion of the Cosmic Cube.

HydraSoldierBob.name: HydraSoldierBob
HydraSoldierBob.finishword: Lay the foundation of world conquest!

StarLordPeterQuill.name: StarLordPeterQuill
StarLordPeterQuill.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage to a distant enemy with an elemental gun
StarLordPeterQuill.finishword: Are we fighting bad guys again? How are there so many bad guys?
StarLordPeterQuill.summary: Son of an alien father and a human mother, Star-Lord joined up with the space pirates known as the Ravagers and later formed the Guardians of the Galaxy.
StarLordPeterQuill.powers: Kree battle helmet and Element Gun; strategic mastery

JessicaJonesJessicaJones.name: JessicaJonesJessicaJones
JessicaJonesJessicaJones.text: After summoning, gain 1 cosmic fragment on the field by thoroughly searching the perimeter. This has a {0}% success rate

JessicaJonesJessicaJones.summary: Radiation exposure granted teenage Jessica Jones superpowers, but also left her an orphan. This trauma, and her torment by the Purple Man, makes her distrustful and angry. Despite this, she has a child with Luke Cage.

AgentSitwellJasperSitwell.name: AgentSitwellJasperSitwell

AgentSitwellJasperSitwell.msg: {0} summoned a S.H.I.E.L.D. agent for backup!
AgentSitwellJasperSitwell.summary: Veteran S.H.I.E.L.D. agent tasked with leading critical missions to recover stolen tech and monitor the activities of useful rogues including the Punisher and the Winter Soldier.

DiamondbackWillisStryker.name: DiamondbackWillisStryker
DiamondbackWillisStryker.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage by throwing a dagger at a distant enemy

DiamondbackWillisStryker.msg: {0} threw a dagger into a distance.
DiamondbackWillisStryker.summary: Diamondback was a childhood friend of Luke Cage's who later turned to crime. He is an expert with knives, including many with trick effects.
DiamondbackWillisStryker.powers: Deadly skill with thrown knives; various trick knives; enhanced strength

ElektraElektraNatchios.name: ElektraElektraNatchios
ElektraElektraNatchios.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage to a nearby enemy with the lowest HP utilizing assassination arts

ElektraElektraNatchios.summary: Elektra is a skilled assassin who wields a pair of sai. She and Matt Murdock have had a long and troubled romance.
ElektraElektraNatchios.powers: Twin sai; low-level telepathy; unarmed combat

GreenGoblinNormanOsborn.name: GreenGoblinNormanOsborn

GreenGoblinNormanOsborn.summary: Green Goblin is a villain that fools his enemies with swift movements and various explosions. He's appearing all over New York to collect Cosmic Shards.

Thanos.name: Thanos
Thanos.text: On every turn, attack and deal {0} damage to an enemy with the highest ATK

Thanos.msg: {0} blasted the opponent with a powerful burst of energy!
Thanos.summary: The awesomely powerful Thanos, the Mad Titan, has ruled many worlds and destroyed many others. Now he has set his sights on Earth again, intrigued by the potential of the Cosmic Cube shards.
Thanos.powers: Immense strength, force projection and manipulation, flight, super-genius intellect

ThanosWithInfinityGauntlet.name: ThanosWithInfinityGauntlet

ThanosWithInfinityGauntlet.summary: The awesomely powerful Thanos, the Mad Titan, has ruled many worlds and destroyed many others. Now he has set his sights on Earth again, intrigued by the potential of the Cosmic Cube shards.
ThanosWithInfinityGauntlet.powers: Immense strength, force projection and manipulation, flight, super-genius intellect

DoctorStrangeStephenVincentStrange.name: DoctorStrangeStephenVincentStrange

BlackBoltBlackagarBoltagon.name: BlackBoltBlackagarBoltagon

CaptainAmericaStevenSteveRogers.name: CaptainAmericaStevenSteveRogers

UltronBot.name: UltronBot
UltronBot.text: After moving, create an Ultron bot with ATK/HP {0} at the previous position

DoctorOctopusOttoGuntherOctavius.name: DoctorOctopusOttoGuntherOctavius

GeneralLukinAleksanderLukin.name: GeneralLukinAleksanderLukin

AIDAgent.name: AIDAgent
AIDAgent.finishword: Good, I'll be sleeping soundly tonight.

MODOCForces.name: MODOCForces
MODOCForces.finishword: It's a big catch! Does it secure a promotion?

WinterSoldierJamesBuchananBarnes.name: WinterSoldierJamesBuchananBarnes

CaptainAmericaStevenRogersVariantCostume.name: CaptainAmericaStevenRogersVariantCostume2

BlackCatFeliciaHardy.name: BlackCatFeliciaHardy

BuckyBarnesJamesBuchananBarnes.name: BuckyBarnesJamesBuchananBarnes

ShangChiShangChi.name: ShangChiShangChi

ShangChiShangChi.powers: Peerless martial arts skills; duplicate creation

WongWong.name: WongWong

SHIELDAssaultUnit.name: SHIELDAssaultUnit

SHIELDTeamCommander.name: SHIELDTeamCommander
SHIELDTeamCommander.finishword: Assault team ready, Failure's not an option.

HydraEspionageAgent.name: HydraEspionageAgent
HydraEspionageAgent.finishword: Destroy them from within. Hail Hydra!

HandsShadowNinja.name: HandsShadowNinja
HandsShadowNinja.finishword: The Beast will devour your soul…

HandsSaberNinja.name: HandsSaberNinja
HandsSaberNinja.finishword: Who battles the Hand ordains their own death.

HandsMasterNinja.name: HandsMasterNinja
HandsMasterNinja.finishword: By the time you see us coming, it is already too late.

DarkElfSoldier.name: DarkElfSoldier
DarkElfSoldier.finishword: For Malekith, whom none can destroy!

DarkElfSorcerer.name: DarkElfSorcerer

DarkElfLeader.name: DarkElfLeader
DarkElfLeader.finishword: Svartalfheim will rule all the realms!

FrostGiantGrunt.name: FrostGiantGrunt

FrostGiantSwordsman.name: FrostGiantSwordsman

KreeBomber.name: KreeBomber

KreeGuardian.name: KreeGuardian
KreeGuardian.finishword: May the Supreme Intelligence guide my strike.

RavagerGunner.name: RavagerGunner
RavagerGunner.finishword: Keep shooting until they surrender… and then shoot some more!

NovaDenarian.name: NovaDenarian

NovaCenturion.name: NovaCenturion

OutriderParasite.name: OutriderParasite

OutriderWarrior.name: OutriderWarrior

AbominationEmilBlonsky.name: AbominationEmilBlonsky
AbominationEmilBlonsky.finishword: You can't match my strength! Bring hulk now!

AncientOneYao.name: AncientOneYao

AncientOneYao.powers: Enormous magical power including astral projection, dimensional travel, control of powerful artifacts

ArmadilloAntonioRodriguez.name: ArmadilloAntonioRodriguez

BladeEricBrooks.name: BladeEricBrooks

HelaHelaOdinsdottir.name: HelaHelaOdinsdottir

ManThingTheodoreSallis.name: ManThingTheodoreSallis

MoondragonHeatherDouglas.name: MoondragonHeatherDouglas

SpiderGwenGwendolyneMaxineStacy.name: SpiderGwenGwendolyneMaxineStacy

WhiplashAntonVanko.name: WhiplashAntonVanko

YonduYonduUdonta.name: YonduYonduUdonta

QuakeDaisyJohnson.name: QuakeDaisyJohnson
QuakeDaisyJohnson.finishword: No need to thank me for not turning the whole place upside down.

HellcatPatriciaWalker.name: HellcatPatriciaWalker
HellcatPatriciaWalker.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage through sneak attack on the nearest enemy on the same horizontal line
HellcatPatriciaWalker.finishword: I’ve been to Hell and back. Literally. What do I have to worry about now?
HellcatPatriciaWalker.summary: Trained in martial arts and possessing some psychic sensing abilities, Hellcat has also interacted with occult forces, marrying Daimon Hellstrom and fighting alongside Doctor Strange with the Defenders.
HellcatPatriciaWalker.powers: Unarmed combat; psychic/mystic sensitivity; projection of mystical force field; artificial claws

RadioactiveManChenLu.name: RadioactiveManChenLu
RadioactiveManChenLu.finishword: I will melt all your bones with radioactive exposure!

SheHulkJenniferWalters.name: SheHulkJenniferWalters
SheHulkJenniferWalters.text: On every turn, goes into a rage to add {0} ATK and {1} HP to self for every other character on the field
SheHulkJenniferWalters.finishword: Let’s get things moving here. I’m due in court.
SheHulkJenniferWalters.msg: {0} is now furious! Anger drove {0} stronger!
SheHulkJenniferWalters.summary: After a blood transfusion from her cousin Bruce Banner, Jennifer Walters became She-Hulk. She's also a lawyer who sometimes represents her colleagues in the Avengers.

BullseyeLester.name: BullseyeLester
BullseyeLester.text: When knocked out, deal {0} damage to an enemy by throwing a shuriken at them
BullseyeLester.finishword: You can run if you want, but it's not going to make a difference.
BullseyeLester.summary: A one-time government assassin, Bullseye became the Kingpin's favorite hitman, tangling with Daredevil and the Punisher. He has phenomenal and lethal accuracy with any thrown object.
BullseyeLester.powers: Perfect accuracy with thrown objects; adamantium-enhanced skeleton

GhostRiderJohnathonBlaze.name: GhostRiderJohnathonBlaze
GhostRiderJohnathonBlaze.text: On every turn, deal {0} damage each to all characters on a vertical line other than the one Ghost Rider is in with hellfire
GhostRiderJohnathonBlaze.finishword: There are some things worse than death. Believe me, I’ve seen them.
GhostRiderJohnathonBlaze.msg: Furious hellfire rushed across the battle field!
GhostRiderJohnathonBlaze.summary: The fifth spirit to become Ghost Rider is Robbie Reyes, who possesses the powers of the Penance Stare and control over hellfire.
GhostRiderJohnathonBlaze.powers: Chain weapon; psychic powers; can create portals to Hell

OdinOdinBorson.name: OdinOdinBorson
OdinOdinBorson.text: Odin takes the damage dealt from an enemy Battle Line attack instead of the leader. This ability is used once per match
OdinOdinBorson.finishword: No enemy can long withstand the Odinforce.
OdinOdinBorson.msg: {0} blocked an enemy Battle Line attack.
OdinOdinBorson.summary: King of Asgard and Thor's father, who commands the respect of all other gods. In battle, he channels the nearly unstoppable Odinforce.
OdinOdinBorson.powers: Odinforce, sometimes channeled through magical spear Gungnir

AbombRichardMilhouseJones.name: AbombRichardMilhouseJones
AbombRichardMilhouseJones.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage to the nearest enemy on the same vertical line by charging into them, then deal {1} damage to all enemies nearby target
AbombRichardMilhouseJones.finishword: Hey, don’t be scared. I’m the nice monster.
AbombRichardMilhouseJones.summary: Rick Jones endured experiments with gamma radiation, and gained Hulk-like strength and endurance.

VivVivVision.name: VivVivVision
VivVivVision.text: After summoning, deal {0}~{1} damage each to all characters on the same vertical line by firing a solar beam
VivVivVision.finishword: We don’t have to get all emotional and messy. We just have to solve the problem.
VivVivVision.summary: Android created to look like a teenage girl version of Vision, with Vision's appearance and powers.

BaronStruckerWolfgangvonStrucker.name: BaronStruckerWolfgangvonStrucker
BaronStruckerWolfgangvonStrucker.text: After summoning, destroy {0} nearby cosmic fragment
BaronStruckerWolfgangvonStrucker.finishword: By my hand, you will learn your weakness.
BaronStruckerWolfgangvonStrucker.summary: Strucker was one of HYDRA's earliest members and leaders. A true mastermind, he is also a dangerous combatant who wields the Satan Claw. His singular goal is to destroy Nick Fury and S.H.I.E.L.D..
BaronStruckerWolfgangvonStrucker.powers: Healing factor and slowed aging; enhanced strength and energy projection

DormammuDormammu.name: DormammuDormammu
DormammuDormammu.text: After summoning, remove the special abilities of all enemies on the battlefield
DormammuDormammu.finishword: I bring the endless shadow of the Dark Dimension.
DormammuDormammu.summary: Ruler of the Dark Dimension and bitter enemy of Dr. Strange, Dormammu controls an army of alien Mindless Ones and has vast powers over time and space.

BaronMordoKarlAmadeusMordo.name: BaronMordoKarlAmadeusMordo
BaronMordoKarlAmadeusMordo.text: When Baron Mordo knocks out an enemy, deal damage equal to that enemy's ATK to the enemy leader
BaronMordoKarlAmadeusMordo.finishword: No man knows more of darkness and its powers than I!
BaronMordoKarlAmadeusMordo.summary: Mordo studied magic under the Ancient One, then betrayed him. Doctor Strange thwarted his plot and Mordo has been Strange's mortal enemy ever since. He hunts for shards of the Cosmic Cube, hoping to create a gateway to demonic realms.
BaronMordoKarlAmadeusMordo.powers: Superior magical abilities, particularly demonic summoning and control

MariaHillMariaHill.name: MariaHillMariaHill
MariaHillMariaHill.text: After summoning, add {0} ATK to nearby allies
MariaHillMariaHill.finishword: Operation in progress. All personnel execute mission objectives.
MariaHillMariaHill.msg: {0} implemented field tactics, strengthening nearby allies.
MariaHillMariaHill.summary: Maria Hill is a veteran S.H.I.E.L.D. agent and Nick Fury's trusted aide. She often serves as S.H.I.E.L.D.'s de facto leader when Fury is absent, and has the trust of the Avengers.

HeimdallHeimdall.name: HeimdallHeimdall
HeimdallHeimdall.text: After summoning, get a distant cosmic fragment. This has a {0}% success rate
HeimdallHeimdall.finishword: I watch over the realms. No enemy escapes my sight or my sword.
HeimdallHeimdall.summary: The sentinel of the Bifrost guards the bridge to Asgard, and uses his clairvoyant powers to see anything happening anywhere in the Nine Realms.
HeimdallHeimdall.powers: Clairvoyance that can perceive danger, enchanted armor and sword

GwenpoolGwenPoole.name: GwenpoolGwenPoole
GwenpoolGwenPoole.text: After summoning, use all remaining cosmic fragments. Deal damage equal to {0} times the amount used on all nearby enemies
GwenpoolGwenPoole.finishword: Classic adventure story here, guys! And we’re the heroes!
GwenpoolGwenPoole.msg: {0} tossed everything we have at enemy's weak points!
GwenpoolGwenPoole.summary: Gwenpool believes that she has entered a comic-book universe from the "real" reality. She established herself as a dangerous (though goofy) fighter, though her only real superpower seems to be belief that she's a superhero.
GwenpoolGwenPoole.powers: A wide variety of weapons and combat skills; strange power over the fourth wall

TheCollectorTaneleerTivan.name: TheCollectorTaneleerTivan
TheCollectorTaneleerTivan.text: After summoning, create {0} cosmic fragments on all empty slots
TheCollectorTaneleerTivan.finishword: So many wonders in the universe…I must have them all.
TheCollectorTaneleerTivan.summary: An ancient being, the Collector has gathered the universe's life forms for billions of years, and along the way has collected a huge number of artifacts as well.

ThorJaneFoster.name: ThorJaneFoster
ThorJaneFoster.text: When you switch a card, deal {0}~{1} damage to the enemy with the highest HP through a lightning bolt strike
ThorJaneFoster.finishword: The hammer doesn’t make the hero…but it sure does make an impression.
ThorJaneFoster.summary: One of the first humans Thor met during his exile, Jane Foster would later pick up Mjolnir and become Thor herself, filling his role with the Avengers.
ThorJaneFoster.powers: Flight, control of lightning, enchanted hammer Mjolnir

MsMarvelKamalaKhan.name: MsMarvelKamalaKhan
MsMarvelKamalaKhan.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage each to all enemies on the same horizontal line
MsMarvelKamalaKhan.finishword: Maybe this is what I've been waiting for. Maybe I'm finally part of something… bigger.
MsMarvelKamalaKhan.summary: Teenager Kamala Khan discovered she had Inhuman blood, and succeeded Carol Danves as Ms. Marvel. She is a core member of the Champions team of teenage heroes.
MsMarvelKamalaKhan.powers: Can stretch and change her phyisical form

MedusaMedusalithAmaquelinBoltagon.name: MedusaMedusalithAmaquelinBoltagon
MedusaMedusalithAmaquelinBoltagon.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage to a diagonally positioned enemy
MedusaMedusalithAmaquelinBoltagon.finishword: I speak for Black Bolt, and for Attilan.
MedusaMedusalithAmaquelinBoltagon.summary: A member of the Inhuman royal family, Medusa married Black Bolt to form a powerful royal couple. She serves as his interpreter since he cannot speak, and works to keep family rivalries from endangering Attilan.

YellowjacketHenryPym.name: YellowjacketHenryPym
YellowjacketHenryPym.text: After summoning, deal {0}~{1} damage each to 1 diagonally placed enemy with laser blast
YellowjacketHenryPym.finishword: Go big, go small, either is fine. Whatever gets the job done.
YellowjacketHenryPym.summary: The original Ant-Man and a founding member of the Avengers, Hank Pym adopted the new identity of Yellowjacket after designing a new suit with different powers.
YellowjacketHenryPym.powers: Growth and shrinking; bio-electric energy discharge; flight

GrootGroot.name: GrootGroot
GrootGroot.text: After summoning, add {0} HP to allies on the right and left
GrootGroot.msg: {0} released regenerative spores to heal allies.
GrootGroot.summary: A tree-like alien from a world known only as Planet X, Groot is a loyal member of the Guardians of the Galaxy and has a particularly close relationship with Rocket Raccoon.
GrootGroot.powers: Immense strength, can extrude vines, regeneration

AdamWarlockAdamWarlock.name: AdamWarlockAdamWarlock
AdamWarlockAdamWarlock.text: Will not need to recharge after making a Battle Line
AdamWarlockAdamWarlock.finishword: How can you defeat a being created to be perfect?
AdamWarlockAdamWarlock.summary: Created as a perfect artificial human, Adam Warlock rebelled against his creators and explored the universe seeking purpose. He controls the Soul Gem.

BaronZemoHelmutZemo.name: BaronZemoHelmutZemo
BaronZemoHelmutZemo.text: After summoning, strategically destroy {0} nearby empty slot
BaronZemoHelmutZemo.finishword: In the end, one man will rule. Who better than Baron Zemo?
BaronZemoHelmutZemo.summary: Son of the original Baron Zemo and a HYDRA leader, Helmut seeks to avenge his father's death at the hands of Captain America. He searches for Cosmic Cube shards to use in a planned superweapon.

TaskmasterTonyMasters.name: TaskmasterTonyMasters
TaskmasterTonyMasters.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage to an enemy on the same horizontal line through a tactical sword charge
TaskmasterTonyMasters.finishword: Anything you can do, I can do better.
TaskmasterTonyMasters.summary: Able to repeat any move or gesture once he has seen it, Taskmaster has mastered nearly every weapon and fighting technique known to humanity. A criminal by temperament, he sometimes fights on the side of good.
TaskmasterTonyMasters.powers: Perfect procedural memory, enhanced physiology, broad weapons expertise

LizardCurtisConnors.name: LizardCurtisConnors
LizardCurtisConnors.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage to a nearby enemy with the lowest ATK through vicious bites
LizardCurtisConnors.finishword: I’ll grow back anything I lose. Will you?
LizardCurtisConnors.summary: Biologist Curt Connors used his own research to transform himself into the Lizard, with powers of regeneration and telepathic control over other reptiles.
LizardCurtisConnors.powers: Enhanced physical powers, claws and teeth, regeneration, reptile telepathy

MadameHydraOpheliaSarkissian.name: MadameHydraOpheliaSarkissian
MadameHydraOpheliaSarkissian.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage to a distant enemy through a pistol shot
MadameHydraOpheliaSarkissian.finishword: Heroes. So tiresome, so easily swept aside…
MadameHydraOpheliaSarkissian.msg: {0} fired her pistol into the distance!
MadameHydraOpheliaSarkissian.summary: Also known as the Viper, Madame Hydra is a lifelong member of Hydra who has also pursued alliances with the Hand and anyone she believes useful to her ultimate goal of world domination.

AntiVenomEdwardCharlesBrock.name: AntiVenomEdwardCharlesBrock
AntiVenomEdwardCharlesBrock.text: After summoning, add {0} HP to nearby allies through healing
AntiVenomEdwardCharlesBrock.finishword: I know this isn’t a friendly look, but you gotta trust me!
AntiVenomEdwardCharlesBrock.summary: Mutation may have changed its color from black to white, but its power and aggressiveness was well kept.
AntiVenomEdwardCharlesBrock.powers: Symbiote-enhanced strength and speed, can extrude extra limbs or tentacles

NightNurseLindaJaneCarter.name: NightNurseLindaJaneCarter
NightNurseLindaJaneCarter.text: After moving, add {0} HP to all nearby allied characters
NightNurseLindaJaneCarter.finishword: I’m more of a healer than a fighter, but for you I’ll make an exception.
NightNurseLindaJaneCarter.summary: A nurse who has developed a specialty in caring for injured super heroes who can't risk going to a public hospital, notably Daredevil and Iron Fist.

PurpleManZebediahKillgrave.name: PurpleManZebediahKillgrave
PurpleManZebediahKillgrave.text: After summoning, decrease a nearby enemy's ATK by {0} with hypnosis
PurpleManZebediahKillgrave.finishword: So, let me tell you how to feel…
PurpleManZebediahKillgrave.summary: Secreting pheromones which give him mind-control powers, the Purple Man manipulates others into serving his schemes. He takes a special interest in Jessica Jones.

WaspJanetVanDyne.name: WaspJanetVanDyne
WaspJanetVanDyne.text: After summoning, shrink down and deal damage equal to {0}~{1}% of the enemy's HP before returning to original size
WaspJanetVanDyne.finishword: Just a little sting. Then you won’t feel anything until you wake up on the Raft.
WaspJanetVanDyne.msg: {0} became tiny with Pym Particles, then taught the enemy a lesson!
WaspJanetVanDyne.summary: A founding member of the Avengers (who she also named), Wasp has learned how to make devastating use of her Pym particle-created powers.

Destroyer.name: Destroyer
Destroyer.text: On every turn, consume {0} cosmic fragments to fire a destructive beam that knocks out an enemy
Destroyer.summary: The Destroyer is a sentient, indestructible suit of armor created and enchanted by Odin himself to defend Asgard. Hela has gotten control of it in her quest to conquer the Nine Realms.
Destroyer.powers: Near invulnerability to physical harm; fire projection

AbsorbingManCarlCreel.name: AbsorbingManCarlCreel
AbsorbingManCarlCreel.text: After summoning, change own HP to that of nearby character with highest HP through absorption
AbsorbingManCarlCreel.msg: {0} touched and copied health from toughest nearby character!
AbsorbingManCarlCreel.summary: Crusher Creel was endowed by Loki with the power to absorb the physical properties of anything he touches...including shards of the Cosmic Cube.
AbsorbingManCarlCreel.powers: Ability to absorb the physical properties of what he touches

SurturSurtur.name: SurturSurtur
SurturSurtur.text: On every turn, change Surtur's health to {0} using power of the Eternal Flame
SurturSurtur.finishword: When Asgard burns, the fire will spread to all the realms, and Surtur will rule!
SurturSurtur.summary: Lord of Muspelheim and ruler of its fire demons. Surtur wields the Twilight Sword, which can endanger even his old adversary Odin. He is an ally of Hela in her quest to rule all the Nine Realms.
SurturSurtur.powers: Twilight Sword, fire manipulation, demonic legion

YmirYmir.name: YmirYmir
YmirYmir.text: On every turn, decrease the ATK of all nearby enemies by {0} by freezing them with a gust of extreme cold
YmirYmir.finishword: I bring eternal winter, to Asgard and all the realms…
YmirYmir.summary: Frost giant King of Jotunheim and sworn enemy of Asgard, Ymir jumped at the chance to join Hela's march to overthrow Asgard.

MalekithMalekith.name: MalekithMalekith
MalekithMalekith.text: On every turn, deal {0}~{1} damage to an enemy by casting dark magic
MalekithMalekith.finishword: Darkness overspreads the realms, and I rule the darkness.
MalekithMalekith.msg: {0} hid himself, and cast a dark spell on his enemies!
MalekithMalekith.summary: Malekith rules Svartalfheim, the realm of the Dark Elves, and always has an eye out for ways to extend his power to other realms. He has allied himself with Hela's war to rule Asgard.
MalekithMalekith.powers: Magic of the Dark Elves, can summon the Wild Hunt

FandralFandral.name: FandralFandral
FandralFandral.text: After summoning, increase ATK of allies on the right and left by {0} by raising their morale
FandralFandral.finishword: We fight for all that is good in the world. Should we not do it in style?
FandralFandral.msg: {0} raised the morale of nearby allies.
FandralFandral.summary: One of Asgard's famed Warriors Three, Fandral is a dashing swordsman and courageous ally to Thor, protecting Asgard against Hela's newest threats.

SifSif.name: SifSif
SifSif.text: After summoning, deal {0}~{1} damage each on all nearby enemies with a swing of her sword
SifSif.finishword: My sword is pledged to Asgard.
SifSif.summary: Lady Sif is one of the few Asgardians who will speak her mind to Thor. For this reason, and for her battlefield skill, he considers her one of his indispensible companions.
SifSif.powers: Asgardian strength and endurance; particular skill with sword and spears

SkurgetheExecutionerSkurge.name: SkurgetheExecutionerSkurge
SkurgetheExecutionerSkurge.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage each to all nearby characters with a giant axe swing
SkurgetheExecutionerSkurge.finishword: I have ended more lives than the hairs in Odin’s beard, and I will end yours!
SkurgetheExecutionerSkurge.summary: Helplessly infatuated with the Enchantress, the Asgardian warrior Skurge wields the enchanted Bloodaxe, following her every command.
SkurgetheExecutionerSkurge.powers: Bloodaxe can carve paths to other dimension, project ice and fire

UmarUmar.name: UmarUmar
UmarUmar.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage each to all distant enemies by casting a dark spell
UmarUmar.finishword: The powers of the Dark Dimension are mine to control!
UmarUmar.summary: Dormammu's sister, with immense mystical and cosmic powers that are nearly a match for his. She has taken control of the Dark Dimension from him several times, but can never hold it.

DoctorVoodooJerichoDrumm.name: DoctorVoodooJerichoDrumm
DoctorVoodooJerichoDrumm.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage to all nearby, diagonally placed enemies with voodoo magic
DoctorVoodooJerichoDrumm.finishword: The spirits and the loas are the source of my powers.
DoctorVoodooJerichoDrumm.msg: {0} stormed his enemies with the dead!
DoctorVoodooJerichoDrumm.summary: Psychologist Jericho Drumm studied voodoo to avenge his brother's death. His brother's spirit joined him, enhancing his powers, and he became a powerful houngan.
DoctorVoodooJerichoDrumm.powers: Mystical powers including spirit possession, teleportation, control of fire

CleaCleaStrange.name: CleaCleaStrange
CleaCleaStrange.text: After summoning, enchant an ally with a shield that prevents damage once until next turn
CleaCleaStrange.finishword: I will fight for what I love.
CleaCleaStrange.summary: Daughter of Umar and sometime lover of Doctor Strange, the magically empowered Clea is caught between two worlds but always sides with Earth in the end.

NightmareNightmare.name: NightmareNightmare
NightmareNightmare.text: After moving, halve the HP of all enemies on the field. This ability is used once per summon
NightmareNightmare.finishword: This is your final nightmare, the one from which you will never awaken.
NightmareNightmare.summary: The being known as Nightmare rules the Dream Dimension, causing human nightmares and feeding on the psychic energies of dreaming people.
NightmareNightmare.powers: Vast powers over illusion and dreams

NoxNyx.name: NoxNyx
NoxNyx.text: When the enemy switches a card, this character gains {0} ATK
NoxNyx.finishword: I am ancient as darkness, and deadly as the fear of the dark.
NoxNyx.msg: {0} drained surplus mana from the shadows!
NoxNyx.summary: One of the demonic beings known as Fear Lords, Nox seeks to rule Earth by manipulating the fears of its people.
NoxNyx.powers: Manipulation of emotions, other magical powers

TheHoodParkerRobbins.name: TheHoodParkerRobbins
TheHoodParkerRobbins.finishword: In the end, I'll have everything.

FoggyNelsonFranklinPNelson.name: FoggyNelsonFranklinPNelson
FoggyNelsonFranklinPNelson.finishword: Oh, man, what are we getting ourselves into now?
FoggyNelsonFranklinPNelson.summary: Matt Murdock's law partner and friend is a valuably ally to Daredevil and New York's other heroes, providing advice and guidance...if not combat support.

KarenPageKarenPage.name: KarenPageKarenPage
KarenPageKarenPage.text: When knocked out, earn {0} cosmic fragment
KarenPageKarenPage.finishword: I’ll do anything to protect the people I love.
KarenPageKarenPage.summary: Matt Murdock's on-again, off-again love interest who along with Foggy Nelson provides him invaluable advice and support.

LadyBullseye.name: LadyBullseye
LadyBullseye.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage through an assault on a diagonally positioned enemy
LadyBullseye.finishword: The first time I killed a man, all I felt was…impatience to do it again.
LadyBullseye.msg: {0} threw her dagger at an enemy!
LadyBullseye.summary: Kidnapped by the Yakuza as a young girl, Maki saw Bullseye eliminate her captors and was inspired to follow his example. She became a ruthless ninja assassin for the Hand, but also maintains a civilian life as a lawyer.

TyphoidMaryMaryAliceWalker.name: TyphoidMaryMaryAliceWalker
TyphoidMaryMaryAliceWalker.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage to the enemy with the lowest ATK using pyrokinesis
TyphoidMaryMaryAliceWalker.finishword: I don't care who stands in my way. I will take my vengeance.
TyphoidMaryMaryAliceWalker.summary: An assassin with multiple personalities, Typhoid Mary has worked with the hand and also the Kingpin, often hunting Daredevil.
TyphoidMaryMaryAliceWalker.powers: Pyrokinesis, power of suggestion, hypnosis, hand-to-hand combat

LeiKungtheThundererLeiKung.name: LeiKungtheThundererLeiKung
LeiKungtheThundererLeiKung.text: When knocked out, deal {0}~{1} damage to an enemy
LeiKungtheThundererLeiKung.finishword: For centuries I have trained the defenders of K’un-Lun, and destroyed its enemies.
LeiKungtheThundererLeiKung.summary: Lei-Kung the Thunderer is an immortal resident of K’un Lun, whose task is to train every potential Iron Fist. He also rises to the city’s defense when it is under threat.

HoggothHoggoth.name: HoggothHoggoth
HoggothHoggoth.finishword: Your arrogance has summoned me! It is time I take back my powers.

AgamottoAgamotto.name: AgamottoAgamotto
AgamottoAgamotto.text: After moving, split into two characters, each with half HP of original
AgamottoAgamotto.finishword: The powers of the Vishanti are beyond any foe.
AgamottoAgamotto.summary: One of the three Vishanti, extra-dimensional beings who give powers to the Sorcerer Supreme, Agamotto often appears in the form of a red-eyed tiger.

AgamottoAgamottosClone.name: AgamottoAgamottosClone
AgamottoAgamottosClone.text: On every turn, meld into nearby allied Agamotto and add remaining HP to Agamotto
AgamottoAgamottosClone.finishword: The powers of the Vishanti are beyond any foe.
AgamottoAgamottosClone.summary: One of the three Vishanti, extra-dimensional beings who give powers to the Sorcerer Supreme, Agamotto often appears in the form of a red-eyed tiger.

ShouLaoShouLao.name: ShouLaoShouLao
ShouLaoShouLao.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage by breathing fire on enemies in the same vertical line
ShouLaoShouLao.finishword: Who intrudes on K’un-Lun dies in fire and blood.
ShouLaoShouLao.summary: Shou-Lao the Undying is the immortal dragon guardian of the mystical city of K’un-Lun. Whoever would become Iron Fist must defeat him.
ShouLaoShouLao.powers: Fire breath, dragon teeth and claws

BlackMambaTanyaSealy.name: BlackMambaTanyaSealy
BlackMambaTanyaSealy.text: After summoning, decrease a nearby enemy's ATK by {0} with hypnosis
BlackMambaTanyaSealy.finishword: When death comes for you, it’s going to look like someone you love.
BlackMambaTanyaSealy.summary: Implanted with a cranial device that gave her psionic powers, Tanya Sealy became the deadly Black Mamba, who kills with projections of the Darkforce.

SpotJonathanOhnn.name: SpotJonathanOhnn
SpotJonathanOhnn.text: On every turn, make the enemy leader discard 1 card from their hand
SpotJonathanOhnn.finishword: Some people can travel to other dimensions. I am another dimension.
SpotJonathanOhnn.msg: {0} snatched and discarded a card from opponent's hand!
SpotJonathanOhnn.summary: A scientist working for the Kingpin, Dr. Jonathan Ohnn attempted to replicate the energy readings given off by Cloak. The experiment left his body riddled with black spots, each a pocket dimensional warp.
SpotJonathanOhnn.powers: Spots on body are portals to another dimension, enabling teleportation, entrapment of opponents

BlackoutMarcusDaniels.name: BlackoutMarcusDaniels
BlackoutMarcusDaniels.text: When knocked out, capture the enemy with the highest ATK in same vertical line and vanish into the Darkforce Dimension
BlackoutMarcusDaniels.finishword: You ready to face the Darkforce?
BlackoutMarcusDaniels.msg: {0} grabbed an enemy and disappeared into the Darkforce Dimension!
BlackoutMarcusDaniels.summary: Bombarded with Darkforce energy as part of a misguided experiment, Marcus Daniels learned to control his powers and became the villainous Blackout.

DoormanDeMarrDavis.name: DoormanDeMarrDavis
DoormanDeMarrDavis.text: After moving, gain {0} nearby Cosmic Fragment from the battlefield
DoormanDeMarrDavis.finishword: I’m walking with the Darkforce, man. You don’t want to come at me.
DoormanDeMarrDavis.summary: An original member of the Great Lakes Avengers, Doorman adopted his moniker because of his ability to manipulate the Darkforce and create portals to the Darkforce Dimension.

JenniferKaleJenniferKale.name: JenniferKaleJenniferKale
JenniferKaleJenniferKale.finishword: It's going to hurt, but you must endure it to grow stronger.

NicoMinoruNicoMinoru.name: NicoMinoruNicoMinoru
NicoMinoruNicoMinoru.finishword: I will paint your demise with my blood!

SatanaSatanaHellstrom.name: SatanaSatanaHellstrom
SatanaSatanaHellstrom.finishword: Succumb to death, I will grant you the position of my pawn!

MorganleFayMorganleFay.name: MorganleFayMorganleFay
MorganleFayMorganleFay.finishword: Continue with your loser whining after arriving in hell!

SersiSersi.name: SersiSersi
SersiSersi.finishword: The world won't be dismayed over a death of a fool.

GorgonGorgonPetragon.name: GorgonGorgonPetragon
GorgonGorgonPetragon.finishword: The sight of you weaklings demoralize me. Get out of my sight.

GridDineshDeol.name: GridDineshDeol
GridDineshDeol.finishword: Don't you ignore me! I'm going to be as powerful as Mephisto!

IsoXiaoyiChen.name: IsoXiaoyiChen
IsoXiaoyiChen.finishword: No personal feelings…but neither are real solutions ….

KarnakKarnakManderAzur.name: KarnakKarnakManderAzur
KarnakKarnakManderAzur.finishword: Your weakness have been detected, farewell

NajaNaja.name: NajaNaja
NajaNaja.finishword: Inhuman love peace, Why can't you do so too?

Triton.name: Triton
Triton.finishword: I don't believe this is right thing to do, but it's a necessary evil.

CrystalCrystalliaAmaquelinMaximoff.name: CrystalCrystalliaAmaquelinMaximoff
CrystalCrystalliaAmaquelinMaximoff.finishword: Don't pathetically beg for your life, I'm not going to have mercy on you.

FlintJaycen.name: FlintJaycen
FlintJaycen.finishword: My fist and your head, don't you want to know which is harder?

EgoEgo.name: EgoEgo
EgoEgo.finishword: Accept the reality. From the very beginning till the end, your chance at winning was 0

GrandmasterEnDwiGast.name: GrandmasterEnDwiGast
GrandmasterEnDwiGast.finishword: The pawns in this game are weak and feeble. About time for a new game.

KorathKorathThak.name: KorathKorathThak
KorathKorathThak.finishword: Pathetic fool! Till when are you going to blindly suffer!

Mantis.name: Mantis
Mantis.finishword: You're scared, take heart. It's going to be scarier than you imagine.

NovaRichardRider.name: NovaRichardRider
NovaRichardRider.text: When an enemy is summoned nearby to create a Battle Line, switch positions with that character. This ability is used once per match
NovaRichardRider.finishword: Call me cocky if you want, but if I say I’m gonna take you down, you better believe I will.
NovaRichardRider.msg: {0} used the Nova Force to prevent a Battle Line!
NovaRichardRider.summary: As a member of the intergalactic police force known as the Nova Corps, Richard Rider wields the Nova Force against threats across known space -- paying particular attention to his home world of Earth.
NovaRichardRider.powers: Flight, superhuman strength, energy absorption and projection, life support from Centurion suit

QuasarPhylaVell.name: QuasarPhylaVell
QuasarPhylaVell.finishword: I carry the names of my beloved on my shoulders. Do you realize the weight of these names?

StarhawkStakarOgord.name: StarhawkStakarOgord
StarhawkStakarOgord.finishword: I came all the way here searching for injustice, and I'm not leaving empty handed.

TitusTitus.name: TitusTitus
TitusTitus.finishword: It won't be serious if you aren't one of them bad folks.

ProximaMidnightProximaMidnight.name: ProximaMidnightProximaMidnight
ProximaMidnightProximaMidnight.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage by thrusting a spear at the nearest enemy on the same vertical line
ProximaMidnightProximaMidnight.finishword: Thanos pronounces the sentence… I execute it.
ProximaMidnightProximaMidnight.summary: A member of Thanos’ Black Order, Proxima Midnight is a feared combatant due to her unmatched strength and the devastating power of her spear.
ProximaMidnightProximaMidnight.powers: Physical near-invulnerability, spear composed of distorted space-time

CorvusGlaiveCorvusGlaive.name: CorvusGlaiveCorvusGlaive
CorvusGlaiveCorvusGlaive.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage each to all nearby characters with a delicate glaive swing
CorvusGlaiveCorvusGlaive.finishword: You will serve Thanos best in your dying.
CorvusGlaiveCorvusGlaive.msg: {0} made a great swing with his glaive
CorvusGlaiveCorvusGlaive.summary: The cruel leader of Thanos’ Black Order, Corvus Glaive has overseen the ruin of countless planets.
CorvusGlaiveCorvusGlaive.powers: Superhuman physique, glaive sharp enough to split atoms; cannot die as long as glaive is unbroken

BlackDwarfBlackDwarf.name: BlackDwarfBlackDwarf
BlackDwarfBlackDwarf.text: When damaged and not knocked out, add {0} HP

EbonyMawEbonyMaw.name: EbonyMawEbonyMaw
EbonyMawEbonyMaw.text: After summoning, remove the special abilities of a nearby enemy with the lowest ATK
EbonyMawEbonyMaw.finishword: Someday you will die. Why should today not be that day?
EbonyMawEbonyMaw.summary: Ebony Maw is a member of Thanos’ Black Order, fighting with his nearly hypnotic skills of persuasion that prove deadlier than any weapon.

SuperGiantSuperGiant.name: SuperGiantSuperGiant
SuperGiantSuperGiant.text: After summoning, opponent switches all action cards in hand
SuperGiantSuperGiant.finishword: I will make a meal of your mind, and leave your body a shell.
SuperGiantSuperGiant.summary: A member of Thanos’ Black Order, Supergiant is characterized as a “psychic parasite” able to seize control of others’ minds.

Beyonder.name: Beyonder
Beyonder.finishword: Your existence in this world proves it's a failure.

MagusMagus.name: MagusMagus
MagusMagus.finishword: Since you're all dying together, you won't feel alone!

VolstaggVolstagg.name: VolstaggVolstagg
VolstaggVolstagg.text: When you switch a card, this character gains {0} HP
VolstaggVolstagg.finishword: Who would topple Asgard must topple Volstagg first!
VolstaggVolstagg.summary: One of the Warriors Three, the self-styled "Lion of Asgard" would rather be telling stories and drinking than fighting -- but when the time for battle comes, he's as fearsome a warrior as can be found.
VolstaggVolstagg.powers: Asgardian physique, master of many different weapons, battlefield brilliance

HogunHogun.name: HogunHogun
HogunHogun.text: Destroy cosmic fragments on right and left by smashing them

HogunHogun.msg: {0} crushed cosmic fragments with his mace!
HogunHogun.summary: One of the Warriors Three, known as "the Grim" for his dour demeanor. Hogun is rarely found outside the company of Fandral and Volstagg, putting their swords to work on behalf of Asgard.
HogunHogun.powers: Superhuman physical qualities; excellent swordsman and horseman

SkeletalSwordsman.name: SkeletalSwordsman
SkeletalSwordsman.finishword: We have no life to surrender… but you do.

FireDemonServant.name: FireDemonServant
FireDemonServant.finishword: We serve Surtur, and destroy whom he wills.

FireDemon.name: FireDemon
FireDemon.finishword: The flames of Muspelheim engulf you!

FireDragon.name: FireDragon
FireDragon.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage by breathing fire on enemies in the same vertical line
FireDragon.finishword: In fire I rise, and in my fire you fall.

EnchantressAmora.name: EnchantressAmora
EnchantressAmora.text: On every turn, entice the enemy leader to discard 1 card from their hand
EnchantressAmora.finishword: I will destroy you, and you will love me for it.
EnchantressAmora.msg: {0} charmed the opponent into discarding a card!
EnchantressAmora.summary: Asgardian sorceress whose unrequited passion for Thor drives her to extremes. She will do anything to win him, even if it means destroying Asgard -- or Midgard. She hunts the shards of the Cosmic Cube.
EnchantressAmora.powers: Immense magical powers, primarily illusions and mind control

SquirrelGirlDoreenAlleneGreen.name: SquirrelGirlDoreenAlleneGreen

SquirrelGirlDoreenAlleneGreen.summary: As a young girl, Doreen Green learned she could talk to squirrels, and had some qualities of a squirrel herself. She set out to become a super hero, and now splits her time between college and the Avengers.
SquirrelGirlDoreenAlleneGreen.powers: Squirrel-like leaping and chewing abilities; increased strength; control over squirrels

HellstormDaimonHellstrom.name: HellstormDaimonHellstrom

HellstormDaimonHellstrom.summary: Known as the Son of Satan for his demonic ancestry, Hellstorm has great magical powers and a deep knowledge of the demonic realms.
HellstormDaimonHellstrom.powers: Spellcasting, magical netheranium trident that projects soulfire

ShroudMaximillianQuincyColeridge.name: ShroudMaximillianQuincyColeridge

ShroudMaximillianQuincyColeridge.msg: {0} grabbed an enemy and flew away from the battlefield!
ShroudMaximillianQuincyColeridge.summary: The Shroud has powers over darkness and the Darkforce, and uses them to fight crime and evil on his own terms.
ShroudMaximillianQuincyColeridge.powers: Extrasensory perception, creation of solid forms from darkness, Darkforce travel

ShuriShuri.name: ShuriShuri
ShuriShuri.text: After summoning, deal {0} damage twice to the nearby enemy with highest ATK

ShuriShuri.summary: Princess of Wakanda and sister of T'Challa. Leads Wakanda's scientific research and is skilled in martial arts.
ShuriShuri.powers: Genius intellect, strategic skills, hand-to-hand combat

TigerSharkToddArliss.name: TigerSharkToddArliss
TigerSharkToddArliss.text: When you switch a card, this character gains {0} HP

DoraMilajeDoraMilaje.name: DoraMilajeDoraMilaje

SHIELDTrainingHumanoidHalloween2018.name: SHIELDTrainingHumanoidHalloween2018

UlyssesKlawUlyssesKlaw.summary: Ulysses Klaw invaded Wakanda to steal Vibranium for his experimental  weapons. In the battle, he killed T’Challa’s father, T’Chaka, and lost his own right hand. He replaced his hand with a sonic gun that blasts enemies with crippling waves of sound.
UlyssesKlawUlyssesKlaw.powers: Body composed of living sound; can project powerful sound waves; expert physicist and engineer

RedSkullHoodJohannShmidt.name: RedSkullHoodJohannShmidt

RedSkullSuitJohannShmidt.name: RedSkullSuitJohannShmidt

ThunderballEliotFranklin.name: ThunderballEliotFranklin

AsgardianHealingChalice.text: Add {1} HP to target by applying Asgardian medicine. Changes target's ATK to {0} as a side effect. Remove from this battle after use

Action017.name: Action017
Action017.text: 상대가 사용했던 액션 카드 중 임의의 한 장을 복사하여 내 서고로 보낸다.

Action018.name: Action018
Action018.text: 상대가 마지막으로 소환한 캐릭터를 임의의 빈 칸에 소환한다.

CommonEnemy.text: Mark a character with ATK higher than {0} as a Common Enemy. The Common Enemy will be attacked by all nearby characters. Remove from this battle after use

SharpshootersArrow.name: SharpshootersArrow
SharpshootersArrow.text: Sharpshooter shoots an arrow at a selected enemy dealing {0}~{1} damage. Remove from this battle after use

TheEternalFlame.name: TheEternalFlame

OdinForce.name: OdinForce

HeimdallsClairvoyance.name: HeimdallsClairvoyance

SHIELDAssaultUnitNOS.name: SHIELDAssaultUnitNOS

SHIELDTeamCommanderNOS.name: SHIELDTeamCommanderNOS
