CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.Name: CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.Desc: {0} additional Leader HP. \nAdd {1} ATK to all allies after a successful Battle Line Attack
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.msg: Allies were inspired by the heroic charge!
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.MatchingScene: Ah. This ought to be interesting.
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.StartOfTurn: Ready to go./Reporting for duty./Heads up./You had your chance. Now it's my turn./Let's go, let's go!
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.AttackMove: It's always the right time to go on offense./You think you're ready? Think again./I have to fight for what's right./Trust me, you're not ready for this./So many choices of how to put you down.
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.MatchLoss: Okay. Not the end of the world. Get stronger and get back to it.
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.UsingActionCard: Wait'll you see the followup./I'm not done yet./What happens next, you ask? Let me show you.
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.FirstShard: Better grab this before someone else does./Oh! That’s… powerful./What’s this?/Whoa, there’s a lot of power in these.
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.ShardObtainA: Every time I touch one of these I feel stronger./I should grab these every chance I get.
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.ShardObtainB: I'm starting to feel such powerful energy./The power just keeps increasing.
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.ShardObtainC: This is going to unleash something incredible./That was a big rush.
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.MaximumShards: This… is… unbelievable./I’ve never felt so powerful./You fight me now, you better watch out./Amazing! I feel like I could punch the moon out of orbit.
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.InsufficientShards: That’s a little too much./Not quite there yet./Need a little more power./Hmm. Almost but not quite.
CaptainMarvelCarolDanvers.CardSwitch: I have a better idea./I'm going to try something else./Maybe this…/Going to Plan B.

IronManModel38TonyStark.Name: IronManModel38TonyStark
IronManModel38TonyStark.Desc: {0} additional Leader HP. \nOn every turn, if owned cosmic fragments are {1} or more, increase value of a cosmic fragments on field by {2}
IronManModel38TonyStark.msg: Experiment yielded growth in cosmic fragments on battlefield
IronManModel38TonyStark.MatchingScene: Buckle up. The show's about to start.
IronManModel38TonyStark.StartOfTurn: I have to make every move count./Shall we?/Time to dance. How about I lead?/Ready to rock./Here we go.
IronManModel38TonyStark.AttackMove: Time to take a shot./Worried yet? You should be./I’m just getting started./Back to the punching and blasting./I'm powered up!
IronManModel38TonyStark.FinishingAttack: Oh, this is going to leave a mark.
IronManModel38TonyStark.MatchLoss: There's no teacher better than failure.
IronManModel38TonyStark.MatchWin: Rah rah, backslapping, et cetera. Put it in the win column.
IronManModel38TonyStark.UsingActionCard: I love it when a plan comes together./Okay. Now for the big followup!/Set 'em up, knock 'em down.
IronManModel38TonyStark.FirstShard: Well, looky here./Wow. These things pack a punch./Think I’m gonna start a collection…/Where can I get more of these?
IronManModel38TonyStark.ShardObtainB: One is good. More is better./Give me those. What a feeling.
IronManModel38TonyStark.ShardObtainC: I’ll take all I can get./Man, these things really charge you up!
IronManModel38TonyStark.MaximumShards: I'm topped off./Maximum capacity./This is all the power the armor can handle./Time to put these to work!
IronManModel38TonyStark.InsufficientShards: No can do./That’s not going to work./Have to try something else./Can’t quite do it.
IronManModel38TonyStark.CardSwitch: Here’s another angle./What if…?/Hey, I have an idea./This’ll be better. Maybe.

ThorThorOdinson.Name: ThorThorOdinson
ThorThorOdinson.Desc: {0} additional Leader HP. \nDeal {1}~{2} damage to an enemy after moving an ally
ThorThorOdinson.StartOfTurn: Time to act./This is the moment./Here I claim glory and valor!/I have been waiting for this…/For Asgard!
ThorThorOdinson.AttackMove: Battles are won in the attack. Not your attack--mine./I wield the Odinforce!/You would contest the power of Mjolnir?/Do you think yourself worthy to battle Thor Odinson?/For Asgard and glory!
ThorThorOdinson.FinishingAttack: The final blow is the sweetest!
ThorThorOdinson.MatchWin: Victory is the true proof of valor.
ThorThorOdinson.UsingActionCard: There is work yet to be done./I have only just begun./What comes now? I think I know…
ThorThorOdinson.FirstShard: Interesting… Such great power./I would have more of these./I feel a new strength coursing through me./What is this…?
ThorThorOdinson.ShardObtainB: Good fortune… and great power!/I must take these whenever I find them.
ThorThorOdinson.ShardObtainC: Such power as I have rarely felt…/Incredible power gathers…
ThorThorOdinson.MaximumShards: My thirst for power is quenched./This power would overwhelm a mortal./Only a fool would stand against me now!/I have never felt such strength!
ThorThorOdinson.InsufficientShards: This power is yet beyond me./Even I cannot do this./I lack the power./I must gather more power.
ThorThorOdinson.CardSwitch: I see another way forward…/May Odin be with me./Forge a new path!/We shall see…

BlackPantherTChalla.Name: BlackPantherTChalla
BlackPantherTChalla.Desc: {0} additional Leader HP. \nOn every turn, if Leader HP is lower than {1}, deal {2} damage to all enemies on battlefield
BlackPantherTChalla.msg: {0} charged energy, then blasted shock waves!
BlackPantherTChalla.MatchingScene: Fight with honor and let the result fall where it may.
BlackPantherTChalla.StartOfTurn: I will not hesitate, but act./One must know when the time is right to strike./This is the time to act!/I fear no man, nor woman, nor creature of darkness./I have waited long enough.
BlackPantherTChalla.AttackMove: Even in attack, you show your weakness./If I do not land the first blow, I strike back all the harder./Attack with purpose, defend with resolve./Now I prove myself worthy of the mantle of Black Panther./There is nothing to fear. Stand strong.
BlackPantherTChalla.FinishingAttack: This is the moment of triumph!
BlackPantherTChalla.MatchLoss: Another day will come, and with it redemption.
BlackPantherTChalla.MatchWin: In victory we do our ancestors honor.
BlackPantherTChalla.UsingActionCard: The stage is set./It is time to put the plan into action./Now we will see if I have planned correctly.
BlackPantherTChalla.FirstShard: These are very powerful./I must keep these from the enemy./Are these what I think they are…? Ah. Yes./I can find a use for these.
BlackPantherTChalla.ShardObtainA: Such tiny keys to unlock such great power./I will gather these as I find them.
BlackPantherTChalla.ShardObtainB: There's a powerful surge of energy here./Handful by handful, the power grows…
BlackPantherTChalla.ShardObtainC: I am infused with incredible power./Ancestors, help me to control this energy.
BlackPantherTChalla.MaximumShards: I cannot hold more power./I must absorb no more./This energy…it blazes within me!/I can barely contain this power.
BlackPantherTChalla.InsufficientShards: This is beyond my grasp./I cannot./I must try something else./This is too much…for now.
BlackPantherTChalla.CardSwitch: A new plan of battle./Time to change tactics./I see another angle./This may be better.

StarLordPeterQuill.Name: StarLordPeterQuill
StarLordPeterQuill.Desc: {0} additional Leader HP. \nAdd {2}~{3} HP to an ally after using a card with cost {1} or higher
StarLordPeterQuill.msg: {0} healed an ally with used cosmic fragments!
StarLordPeterQuill.MatchingScene: These chumps? This one's in the bag.
StarLordPeterQuill.StartOfTurn: Dance-off!/I can't wait!/Time to get busy./Listen, I have a plan… well, most of a plan./Carpe freakin' diem.
StarLordPeterQuill.AttackMove: Let's make it count./Yeah, bring it on!/Let’s see if you can put up a fight!/I'd rather throw a punch than take one./You want to dance? Check out my moves.
StarLordPeterQuill.MatchLoss: I'm speaking with the utmost sincerity when I say that sucked.
StarLordPeterQuill.MatchWin: Who loves a winner? I know I do.
StarLordPeterQuill.UsingActionCard: Pretty sure I'm forgetting something…/I'm just getting started./You want to see what happens next? Sure you do!
StarLordPeterQuill.FirstShard: I'm not gonna lie. I like this./Give me more!/I'm feeling something… intense!/Powered up!
StarLordPeterQuill.ShardObtainA: I’ll take this./What do we have here?
StarLordPeterQuill.ShardObtainB: Oh, I can find room for these./Ooh, gimme.
StarLordPeterQuill.MaximumShards: Whoa. What a rush!/This is about all I can handle./Now what am I going to do with all this power?/Oh, baby, I am jacked!
StarLordPeterQuill.InsufficientShards: If only./Not quite yet./Biting off more than I can chew here./Save that one for later.
StarLordPeterQuill.CardSwitch: I have a better idea!/New plan!/Let’s try something else./How about… this?

WaspJanetVanDyne.Name: WaspJanetVanDyne
WaspJanetVanDyne.Desc: {0} additional Leader HP. \nAction cards that are removed from game after use may return to library at {1}% chance

WaspJanetVanDyne.AttackMove: You're in for a shock./Can't hit what you can't catch./I might be small, but I pack a big punch./It's on./You looking for a fight? You got it.

WaspJanetVanDyne.MatchWin: I can't take all the credit for that win… but I'll take some of it.

WaspJanetVanDyne.FirstShard: Oh, now this is a feeling I could get used to./Power surge!/Wow. Where can I get more of those?/I feel tingly.
WaspJanetVanDyne.ShardObtainA: Ooh, shiny./Mind if I take this? Thanks!
WaspJanetVanDyne.ShardObtainB: What have we here?/Don’t mind if I do.
WaspJanetVanDyne.ShardObtainC: What a haul./Just what I was looking for!
WaspJanetVanDyne.MaximumShards: No more, thanks./I’ve got all I can handle./We need to use some of these first./Where would I put them?

WaspJanetVanDyne.CardSwitch: Here’s a different idea./What if we try… this?/I think we need something new./Let’s change it up a little.

SpiderManPeterParker.Name: SpiderManPeterParker

SpiderManPeterParker.MatchWin: Not to brag or anything, but that was pretty sweet.
SpiderManPeterParker.UsingActionCard: And now…/For my next trick…/Nobody ever sees this next move coming.
SpiderManPeterParker.FirstShard: Hey, check this out…/Whoa, this is… potent./Yow. Are there more of these things?/Yeah! I’m just getting started.
SpiderManPeterParker.ShardObtainA: Don't mind me, just powering up over here./Add that to the collection…
SpiderManPeterParker.ShardObtainB: Whew! Getting stronger./Couldn’t pass this up, now, could I?
SpiderManPeterParker.ShardObtainC: Jackpot!/Whew. That’s going to my head a little.
SpiderManPeterParker.MaximumShards: Man, I feel like I could somersault to the Moon./I'm gonna arm-wrestle the Hulk./Yo! Maximum rush!/Does Thor feel like this all the time? Cuz it’s amazing.
SpiderManPeterParker.InsufficientShards: Aw, man, I can’t./Power’s not great enough yet./Have to wait on that one./Another time.
SpiderManPeterParker.CardSwitch: Hang on. What about…/Ooh, I have an idea./I bet there’s a better way./Let’s try this instead.

BlackWidowNatashaAlianovaRomanova.Name: BlackWidowNatashaAlianovaRomanova

BlackWidowNatashaAlianovaRomanova.MatchLoss: Forget it and move on. The only fight that matters is the next fight.
BlackWidowNatashaAlianovaRomanova.UsingActionCard: I can still do more./You think I'm done? Think again./I'm not done yet.

BlackWidowNatashaAlianovaRomanova.ShardObtainA: I feel charged up every time I touch one of these./There’s another one.
BlackWidowNatashaAlianovaRomanova.ShardObtainB: I could get used to feeling like this./These things pack a punch… and now so do I.
BlackWidowNatashaAlianovaRomanova.ShardObtainC: Whoa. Intense./That’s almost too much to handle.

BlackWidowNatashaAlianovaRomanova.CardSwitch: Always keep ‘em guessing./Let’s spring a surprise./Here’s a new idea./This might work./Time to change things up a bit.

Thanos.Name: Thanos

Thanos.AttackMove: I will grind you under my heel, and move on./I will show you your weakness./Witness true power./The strength of a Titan will overpower you!/Now the battle has truly begun.
Thanos.MatchLoss: Feel the rage of defeat, and transform it into the fuel of victory.
Thanos.MatchWin: Who can withstand me? No one.
Thanos.UsingActionCard: That was just the beginning./If you are not afraid yet, you will be./There is more to be done.
Thanos.FirstShard: Ahh… the first surge of mighty power./I must have more!/These will be quite useful./Now the power gathers in me…
Thanos.ShardObtainA: More power./I will take what is mine.
Thanos.ShardObtainB: Bring this power to me!/Yes! I grow even stronger!
Thanos.ShardObtainC: Indomitable might!/I control the power of the universe!
Thanos.MaximumShards: I feel… invincible./Even I can handle no more./Now, to unleash this maximum power!/No being in the universe could handle more.
Thanos.InsufficientShards: Patience./This power is almost mine./I must wait a little longer./I can’t… at least not yet.
Thanos.CardSwitch: A different path forward…/There is always a better way./Yes, good…/Let us see…
